story:
N'oubliez pas de passer voir le volet Mises à  jours
Please don't forget to take a look at Updates


Goto English text .


L'idée de départ était de concevoir le smartphone le plus sécurisé sur les réseaux mobiles. Partant d'un concept sur lequel on a travaillé depuis plus de deux années et pour lequel on a déposé une requête de brevet, nous avons imaginé l'architecture de ce smartphone, et suite à  l'avancée de nos recherches, il nous a paru plus que nécessaire qu'il soit d'architecture Intel® x86 (surtout du fait de l'avancée technologique d'Intel® avec les Processeurs de série Z37xx qui correspondaient à  nos besoins). Cela nous a fait réaliser que ce smartphone pouvait donc remplir en même temps la fonction de PC et celle de smartphone, puisqu'il peut fonctionner sous n'importe quel système d'exploitation d'architecture x86 (windows 8.1 ou les versions précédentes, toute distribution Linux et même Android-x86).
Imaginez tout votre environnement informatique tenant dans votre poche.

De fil en aiguille, en travaillant sur son design et ses éventuelles fonctionnalités, nous sommes arrivés à  conclure qu'il est finalement judicieux d'en faire un smartphone haut de gamme avec le meilleur de ce qui se fait dans l'industrie des smartphones et en même temps la puissance et la fonctionnalité d'un PC. Pour un meilleur confort d'affichage en mode PC, nous avons imaginé un écran tactile 12" exploitant la technologie video-sans-fil pour la video et l'audio (en WIDI grâce au processeur Intel® et/ou en Miracast) et la fonction touch à  travers le Bluetooth. Ainsi l'utilisateur pourra exploiter ce smartphone comme PC pour retrouver son univers d'applications et logiciel tournant sous le système d'exploitation qu'il préfère. Une exploitation sur le smartphone lui même ou sur le dispositif 12" sans fil quand vous êtes en déplacement, ou sur n'importe quel dispositif HDMI (TV, projecteur, moniteur...) juste en débranchant la clé WIDI ou Miracast du dispositif 12" et en la branchant sur un autre dispositif HDMI, à  la maison, à  l'université ou au bureau.Nous avons aussi imaginé une multitude de fonctions exploitables grâce aux nombreux capteurs, telle que la mesure des épaisseurs d'objets ou les profondeurs grâce au capteur ultrasonique et une application spécifique. Ou le capteur de température et d'humidité ainsi que le capteur ultrasonique pour des exploitations médicales par le biais d'une application sur laquelle on travaille.

Il n'y a plus aucune limite ou contrainte à  votre smartphone

Grâce à  ce smartphone, vous pourrez non seulement choisir votre système d'exploitation mais aussi la capacité mémoire RAM ou même la mémoire de stockage SSD puisqu'il vous serra possible de les changer vous même si vous décidez de les augmenter. Rendant ainsi possible d'atteindre jusqu'à  4Go de RAM et jusqu'à  1To de SSD.
Vous n'aurez plus à  vous soucier de la compatibilité matériel de votre smartphone

Vous pourrez utiliser avec ce smartphone n'importe quel périphérique USB (pareil que sur un ordinateur) grâce à  son port USB-3 taille standard.
Qui des deux sera le plus rapide ? le transfert de vos données ou leur traitement ?

Pour le réseau, ce smartphone serra équipé de la puissance du wifi 5G. Pour les réseaux mobiles, la puissance de deux Modem Intel® XMM 7160 LTE 4G. Le choix d'intégrer deux modem nous est imposé pour adapter la solution de sécurité réseaux mobiles sur laquelle on travaille, néanmoins ceci permettra d'atteindre des débits impressionnants sur les réseaux mobiles.

La sécurité au plus fin détail

Nous avons pensé à  y intégrer un système d'identification par reconnaissance de l'iris pour renforcer la sécurisation du dispositif et l'ouverture à  des transactions plus sures (moyen de paiement).

Nous pensons à  préserver la nature en réduisant la consommation d'énergie mais aussi en utilisant les énergies renouvelables.

En plus d'une gestion améliorée de la consommation énergétique et de la faible consommation en énergie des composants d'Intel®, nous avons aussi pensé à  intégrer sur le dos de l'écran tactile sans fil 12", un panneau photovoltaà¯que, qui permettra de recharger non seulement l'écran 12" mais aussi le smartphone.


Un concentré de technologies dans un dispositif 5"

Processeur : Intel Z3770 Quad-Core Up to 2.39 GHz 2 MB cach. Intel® Identity Protection Technology
àcran : 5" Full HD 1920 x 1080
Mémoire :   RAM : from 1GB to 4GB, SSD : from 32GB to 1TB, External Memory Support Micro-SD (up to 128GB)
Connectivité :   USB Version 3.0, Location Technology GPS, Ear-jack 3.5mm Stereo, MHLMHL 2.1, Wi-Fi802.11a/b/g/n/ac 2.4G + 5GHz, Wi-Fi Direct, WIDI, Micro HDMI, Blue-tooth Version v4.0, NFC
Réseau : 2 x Intel® XMM 7160 LTE modem : Baseband Functions LTE 100 Mbps, VoLTE DC-HSPA 42 Mbps HSUPA 5.7 Mbps, RF Transceiver Functions 15-band LTE 8-band HSPA 4-band EDGE, MSC33, 4G / 3G / GSM
Système d'exploitation : Multi-boot : Basically : Android-x86 and a Linux distrib, but user can install any OS he want through an external DVD drive on USB port
APN : Video Recording Resolution UHD 4K, Rear Camera â Resolution 13MP, Front Camera â Resolution 2MP, Main Camera â Flash, Main Camera - Auto Focus
Capteurs : Iris scan, Gesture Sensor, HR Sensor, Hall Sensor, Accelerometer, Geomagnetic Sensor, Gyro Sensor, Light Sensor, Barometer, Proximity Sensor, Temperature and humidity Sensor, Ultrasonic Sensor.
Certificats : CEE, FCC, RoHS, IP66/IP67

Spécifications matériels de l'écran tactile 12"

Entrée : HDMI, AC Power in
àcran : 12" Full HD, 1920 x 1080
Connectivité : Blue-tooth Version v4.0, WIDI, Direct WIFI
Sortie : USB power output port, Ear-jack 3.5mm Stereo
Autre : photo-voltaic panel

************************************************************************
Remarque : Nos travaux sont sur deux flancs, la réalisation du smartphone et de son second écran tactile sans fil (qui sont l'objet de cette campagne de Crowdfunding) et des travaux sur la solution de sécurité sur les réseaux mobiles. Les travaux sur cette solution de sécurité ne sont pas concernés par la campagne de crowdfunding. Cependant la conception du smartphone est étudiée de telle sorte qu'il soit compatible avec cette solution. En nous aidant à  réaliser ce smartphone, vous nous aidez certainement aussi à  avancer dans tous nos travaux.
A titre d'information seulement : La solution de sécurité sur laquelle on travaille vise à  protéger l'identité et la vie privée des usagers des réseaux mobiles en assurant un total anonymat sur ces réseaux, à  protéger les communications (voix, sms et toutes autres data) contre leur interception et contre toute forme de géolocalisation.
************************************************************************

Ce dont nous avons besoin :

Nous avons bien avancé mais nous manquons de finance et le montant que nous cherchons à  atteindre permettra de financer le reste de la phase développement et conception, la fabrication des prototypes d'essais puis la phase de production en masse. Si nous n'avons pas opté pour le parcellement des finances par phase, c'est parce qu'on ne voudrait pas être bloqué après une des phase et ne pas pouvoir honorer nos engagements avec vous.

Pour l'instant, nous avons le soutien technique d'Intel® et un partenaire solide qui est eInfochips®, une entreprise reconnue technologique et d'innovation. Il n'y a aucune raison, sauf financière, pour que le projet échoue, parce que tous les aspects techniques sont maà®trisées. Les seules choses manquantes maintenant à  la réalisation sont les fonds et votre soutien.


 En remerciement

Nous avons choisi, en remerciement pour votre soutien, des contreparties fonctionnelles et en lien avec notre projet. Nous sommes persuadés que vous comprenez que ce n'est pas par la valeur de ces contreparties, qu'on vous témoigne notre gratitude. La plus petite de vos contributions témoigne de l'intérêt que vous portez à  notre projet et cela pour nous est la plus grande satisfaction. Encore plus grande sera notre joie quand nous atteindrons le but de cette campagne et quand nous honorerons nos engagements envers tout le monde. Merci d'avance.
Aller à  la F.A.Q

Revenir à la discription en Français
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

English description: Back to French

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams".                                                        Eleanor Roosevelt

The original idea was to design the most secure smartphone on mobile networks. Starting from a concept on which we have worked for over two years and for which we have filed a patent request, we designed the architecture of this smartphone and following the progress of our research, we found that it is necessary to be Intel ® x86 architecture (especially because of the advanced technology of Intel ® Processors Z37xx series that matched our needs). It made us realize that this smartphone could therefore meet at the same time the function of PC and the smartphone, since he could run under any x86 operating system (Windows 8.1 or earlier versions, any Linux distribution and even Android-x86).
Simplicity in design does not preclude refinement nor efficiency. More than that ... have you ever seen such a complete and powerful solution ! Working on its design and potential features , we come to the conclusion that it is ultimately wise to make a high-end smartphone with the best of what is happening in the smartphones industry and at the same time the power and functionality of a PC. For a better display in PC mode, we have imagine a 12" full HD touch screen using wireless video technology for video and audio ( with Intel® WiDi because the processor ability, and/or Miracast) and touch function through Blue-tooth. Thus the user can use this smartphone as a PC, finding his software universe which run under the operating system he prefer. The use on the smartphone itself or on the 12 " wireless device when you're traveling, or on any HDMI device (TV, projector, monitor ... ) just by unplugging the key WIDI or Miracast from the 12" device and plugging on another HDMI device, at home, college or office. We have also devised a multitude of usable functions through many sensors, such as-measuring the thickness or the depths of objects with the ultrasonic sensor and a specific application. Or the temperature sensor and humidity and ultrasonic sensor for medical use by means of an application on which we are working.
Just do it like what you want

With this smartphone, you can not only choose your operating system, but also the (RAM) memory size or even storage memory SSD size, since you can change them yourself if you decide to increase them. Making it possible to achieve up to 4GB of RAM and up to 1TB of SSD.


BYOD experience would never be so practical

You can use this smartphone with any USB device (similar as on a computer) through its full size USB-3 port.



An amazing network speed

For the network, this smartphone will be powered by WiFi 5G. For mobile networks, the power of two Intel® XMM 7160 LTE 4G Modems. The choice to integrate two modem is imposed on us to meet the network mobile security solution on which we work, however this will achieve impressive speeds on mobile networks.



With the best security solution

We thought to incorporate an identification by iris recognition to strengthen the security of the device and for safer transactions (as payment solutions).




Let it be ecologic !

In addition to an enhanced energy management and the low-power consumption of intel® parts , we also thought to include on the back of the 12" wireless touch screen, a photo-voltaic panel, which will not only recharge the 12" screen but also the smartphone.


The best of technology in a 5" device

CPU : Intel Z3770 Quad-Core Up to 2.39 GHz, 2 MB cach, Intel® Identity Protection Technology

Display : 5" Full HD 1920 x 1080

 Memory : RAM : from 1GB to 4GB, SSD : from 32GB to 1TB,External Memory Support Micro-SD (up to 128GB)

Connectivity : USB Version 3, Location Technology GPS, Ear-jack 3.5mm Stere, MHLMHL 2, Wi-Fi802.11a/b/g/n/ac 2.4G + 5GHz, Wi-Fi Direct, WIDI, Micro HDMI, Blue-tooth Version v4, NFC.

Network : 2 x Intel® XMM 7160 LTE modem : Baseband Functions LTE 100 Mbps, VoLTE DC-HSPA 42 Mbps HSUPA 5.7 Mbps, RF Transceiver Functions 15-band LTE 8-band HSPA 4-band EDGE, MSC33. 4G / 3G / GSM.

OS : Multi-boot : Basically with Android-x86 and a Linux distrib but user can install any OS he want through an external DVD drive on USB port.

Camera : Video Recording Resolution UHD 4K, Rear Camera â Resolution 13MP, Front Camera â Resolution 2MP, Main Camera â Flash, Main Camera - Auto Focus

Sensors : Iris scan, Gesture Sensor, HR Sensor, Hall Sensor, Accelerometer, Geomagnetic Sensor, Gyro Sensor, Light Sensor, Barometer, Proximity Sensor, Temperature and humidity Sensor, Ultrasonic Sensor.

Certifications : CEE / FCC / RoHS / IP66/IP67 certification : -Resistance to water jets and temporary immersion (-1 meter for 30 minutes) -Dust proof.

12" Wireless touch display specs :

Input : HDMI - AC Power in

Dispaly : 12" Full HD 1920 x 1080

Connectivity : Blue-tooth Version v4.0,WIDI, Direct WIFI

Output : USB power output port, Ear-jack 3.5mm Stereo

Other : Photo-Voltaic pannel.


************************************************************************

Note: Our work is on two sides, the implementation of the smartphone and its second wireless touchscreen (which are the subject of this Crowdfunding campaign) on one side and on other side work on the mobile network security solution. Work on this security solution are not affected by this campaign of crowdfunding, however the smartphone is designed the way it is compatible with this solution, your help for the implementation of this smartphone might also help us to move forward in all our work.

Only for information : The security solution on which we work is to protect the identity and privacy of mobile users by providing total anonymity on these networks, protecting communications (voice, sms and all other data) against interception and against any form of Geolocation.

*************************************************************************

What we need :

We have made good progress but we lack funds and the amount we are trying to achieve will finance the rest of the developement and design, manufacturing and testing prototypes then mass production phase. If we do not opt for the crushing of finances by phase, it is because we dont want to be blocked after any phase and not being able to meet our commitments to you.

At this time we have d'Intel®technical support and a strong partner which is eInfochips®, a proven technological and inovatif company. There is no reason, but financial one, that the project fall, because all technical aspects are mastered. The only things missed now to achievement is the fund and your support.

 

About rewards :

To manifest our gratitude, we have chosen functional rewards and related to our project. We are confident that you understand that this is not the value of such rewards whom testify our gratitude. The smaller of your contributions reflects the interest you have shown for our project and it is for us the greatest satisfaction. Greater will be our joy when we will reach the goal of this campaign and when we will honor our commitments for all. Thank you in advance.



Project schedule :







Back to Description        Retour à la description

F.A.Q :

US:

we will update soon we receive your questions. We will also update on every news on the project.

FR:

Nous ne manquerons pas de mettre à  jour la FAQ dès que nous recevrons vos questions. et bien évidemment, nous vous informerons régulièrement de l'avancée du projet.


1 - Is "L'Ultime" a pack of 5" smartphone and 12" wireless touch screen ?

      Qu'est ce que je reçois en achetant L'Ultime ?

US : Yes, L'Ultime will always be livred with a 12" wirless touch screen

FR :  L'Ultime est livré en un pack : Le smartphone 5" et son écran 12" sans fil


2 - Do i have to buy separately à  WIDI or Miracast key ?

      Dois je acheter séparément une clé WIDI ou Miracast ?

US : No, The 5" device is WIDI and Miracst ready and there is one WIDI or one Miracast key plugged to the Wireless 12" touch screen you can unplug to use it on your TV or any other HDMI device.

FR : Non. Le smartphone exploite nativement WIDI et Miracast. l'écran sans fil 12" possède une clé (soit WIDI soit Miracast) que vous pouvez aussi utiliser sur un autre dispositif HDMI.


3 - Did L'Ultime uses WIDI or Miracast only ?

      Seules les technologies WIDI et Miracast seront exploitables ?

US : We will contact with AIRTIME in order to study the possibility of integrating their AIRTAME dongle into L'Ultime pack.

FR : Non, L'Ultime est capable d'exploiter toute les technologies de video/audio en wifi, cependant nous étudions la possibilité d'y intégrer le dongle AIRTAME.


4 - Can I install on L'Ultime the OS I want ?

     Puis-je installer mon système d'exploitation sur L'Ultime ?

US : L'Ultime comes with double boot : Android-x86 and, a Linux distrib or windows 8.1 with different price, however and because it is a real PC, you can install on it any OS you want as you usually do on your PC. by plugging a CD or DVD drive or a flash memory on its Full size USB3 port

FR : L'Ultime est livré en double boot : Android-x86 et, selon le prix, une distribution Linux ou windows 8.1. Du fait que c'est un vrai PC, vous pouvez brancher desus un lecteur CD ou DVD ou bien un flash disque et installer l'OS que vous voulez comme cela se fait sur n'importe quel PC.


5 - Can I use L'Ultime as a PC without its 12" wireless touch display or without coupling with an external HDMI display ?

     Peut on utiliser L'Ultime comme PC sans son écran 12" ou un un autre écran HDMI ?

US : Yes, L'Ultime is a 5" Full HD display but for that reason and because size and resolution, it is better and more confortable to use a bigger display in PC mode.

FR : Oui. mais pour un meilleur confort d'affichage, il est préférable d'utiliser en mode PC un écran plus grand que son écran 5" Full HD.


6 - Is wireless keyboard and mouse part of the pack ?

     L'Ultime sera t il livré avec un clavier et une souris sans fil ?

US : No. if needed, you have to purchase them separately. only the rewards pack with the mention include them

FR : Non, seules les contreparties oà¹ cela est mentionné en seront dotées.


7 - Is the final price of L'Ultime determined ?

      Avez vous déjà  définie le prix final de "L'Ultime" ?

US : We have a global idea about it, but it is not yet fixed.

FR : Nous avons une estimation approximative mais nous n'avons pas encore fixé le prix final.


8 - What softwares can I run on L'Ultime ?

     Quels logiciels peut on exécuter sur L'Ultime ?

US : L'Ultime is an x86 architecture based. however you can run software according to OS in use. you can also access Android Google-play when running Android-x86.

FR : Vous pouvez utiliser tous les logiciels en adéquation avec l'OS utilisé. Vous avez aussi accès au Google-play d'Android quand vous êtes sous Android-x86.


9 - PC Mode vs Phone mode?

a) Are modes exclusive?  Can I use PC and phone simultaneously?

b) Windows Phone or 8.1 Full?

Peut on exploiter le mode PC et le mode Phone en même temps ? Windows Phone OS oubien Windows 8.1

US : Modes are not exclusive. You can use both in the same time on the OS running. There is a full phone UI for each OS. But under Android-x86, only Android phone function is avaible.   No Windows Phone OS, but a Windows 8.1 full, with Phone UI apps.

FR : Oui les deux modes sont exploitable simultanément grâce à  une application "Interface utilisateur de téléphonie" pour chaque OS. Seul le mode Android Phone serra disponible si vous bootez en Android-x86. Il n'y aurra pas de OS Windows Phone. ca sera windows 8.1 pour PC.


10) I want fastest CPU, largest RAM and 128GB SSD.

Je voudrai un CPU plus rapide, plus de RAM et SSD

US : At this time, we will only provide the pack with the Intel Z3770 CPU. you can upgrade as you want RAM and SSD for up to 4Gb RAM and 1TB SSD.

FR : A ce stade, nous ne fournirons que des pack avec le processeur Intel Z3770. vous pouvez augmenter comme vous voulez la RAM et le SSD pour un maximum de 4 Go de RAM et 1 To de SSD.


11) Studio Edition has more memory/SSD. Any other differences?

       l'àdition Studio propose plus de RAM et de SSD, y'a t'il autre chose qui la distingue ? 

US : No, we only add an USB to MIDI cable and Ubuntu Studio with its Audio/video apps.

FR : Non, on y a intégré un cable USB vers MIDI et Ubuntu Studio avec toutes ses applications de production Audio et Vidéo.


12) Is the 12" device a tablet with RAM and SSD and CPU ?

Le périférique 12" est il une Tablette avec CPU, RAM est SSD ?

FR : L'appareil 12" est seulement un écran sans fil tactile, il n'ya pas de CPU, pas de RAM et aucun stockage dessus mais ce sera une bonne idée de l'équiper d'un stockage (SSD ou Disque dur), nous penserons à  cela (Merci à  fsan1)  ;-)

US : The 12" device is only a wireless touch screen, there is no CPU, no RAM and no storage on it. However it will be a great idea to put on it a storage (ssd or Harddrive). we will think about it (Thanks to fsan1) ;-)

 

13) Is it possible to get a triple boot with GRUB or another way ?

       Serait-il possible d'installer un triple boot avec GRUB ou autre ?

US : L'Ultime is Multi-boot : you can get more than two OS on boot on GRUB, (mint and Ubuntu 14 and so can make multi-boot)

FR : Le Multiboot est possible en plusieurs OS, pas uniquement pour deux OS. à  l'instar de Mint ou Ubuntu 14, on peut utiliser aussi GRUB ou autre moyen de multiboot.


14) Would it be possible to upgrade the processor?

      Serait-il possible d'upgrader le processeur ?

US : Unfortunately not on this version.

FR : Malheureusement pas sur cette version.

Back to Description        Retour à la description

à  réaliser ce smartphone, vous nous aidez certainement aussi à  avancer dans tous nos travaux. A titre d'information seulement : La solution de sécurité sur laquelle on travaille vise 
à  protéger l'identité et la vie privée des usagers des réseaux mobiles en assurant un total anonymat sur ces réseaux, 
à  protéger les communications (voix, sms et toutes autres data) contre leur interception et contre toute forme de géolocalisation.************************************************************************Ce dont nous avons besoin :Nous avons bien avancé mais nous manquons de finance et le montant que nous cherchons 
à  atteindre permettra de financer le reste de la phase développement et conception, la fabrication des prototypes d'essais puis la phase de production en masse. Si nous n'avons pas opté pour le parcellement des finances par phase, c'est parce qu'on ne voudrait pas 
être bloqué après une des phase et ne pas pouvoir honorer nos engagements avec vous. Pour l'instant, nous avons le soutien technique d'Intel® et un partenaire solide qui est eInfochips®, une entreprise reconnue technologique et d'innovation. Il n'y a aucune raison, sauf financière, pour que le projet 
échoue, parce que tous les aspects techniques sont maà®trisées. Les seules choses manquantes maintenant 
à  la réalisation sont les fonds et votre soutien. En remerciementNous avons choisi, en remerciement pour votre soutien, des contreparties fonctionnelles et en lien avec notre projet. Nous sommes persuadés que vous comprenez que ce n'est pas par la valeur de ces contreparties, qu'on vous témoigne notre gratitude. La plus petite de vos contributions témoigne de l'intérêt que vous portez 
à  notre projet et cela pour nous est la plus grande satisfaction. Encore plus grande sera notre joie quand nous atteindrons le but de cette campagne et quand nous honorerons nos engagements envers tout le monde. Merci d'avance.
Aller à  la F.A.Q

F.A.Q : 
US:

we will update soon we receive your questions. We will also update on every news on the project.
FR:
Nous ne manquerons pas de mettre 
à  jour la FAQ dès 
que nous recevrons vos questions. et bien évidemment, nous vous 
informerons régulièrement de l'avancée du projet.
1 - Is "L'Ultime" a pack of 5" smartphone and 12" wireless touch screen ?
      Qu'est ce que je reçois en achetant L'Ultime ?
US : Yes, L'Ultime will always be livred with a 12" wirless touch screen
FR :  L'Ultime est livré en un pack : Le smartphone 5" et son 
écran 12" sans fil
2 - Do i have to buy separately à  WIDI or Miracast key ?
      Dois je acheter séparément une clé WIDI ou Miracast ?
US : No, The 5" device is WIDI and Miracst ready and there is one WIDI or one Miracast key plugged to the Wireless 12" touch screen you can unplug to use it on your TV or any other HDMI device.
FR : Non. Le smartphone exploite nativement WIDI et Miracast. l'écran sans fil 12" possède une clé (soit WIDI soit Miracast) que vous pouvez aussi utiliser sur un autre dispositif HDMI.
3 - Did L'Ultime uses WIDI or Miracast only ?
      Seules les technologies WIDI et Miracast seront exploitables ?
US : We will contact with AIRTIME in order to study the possibility of integrating their AIRTAME dongle into L'Ultime pack.
FR : Non, L'Ultime est capable d'exploiter toute les technologies de video/audio en wifi, cependant nous 
étudions la possibilité d'y intégrer le dongle AIRTAME.
4 - Can I install on L'Ultime the OS I want ?
     Puis-je installer mon système d'exploitation sur L'Ultime ?
US : L'Ultime comes with double boot : Android-x86 and, a Linux distrib or windows 8.1 with different price, however and because it is a real PC, you can install on it any OS you want as you usually do on your PC. by plugging a CD or DVD drive or a flash memory on its Full size USB3 port
FR : L'Ultime est livré en double boot : Android-x86 et, selon le prix, une distribution Linux ou windows 8.1. Du fait que c'est un vrai PC, vous pouvez brancher desus un lecteur CD ou DVD ou bien un flash disque et installer l'OS que vous voulez comme cela se fait sur n'importe quel PC.
5 - Can I use L'Ultime as a PC without its 12" wireless touch display or without coupling with an external HDMI display ?
     Peut on utiliser L'Ultime comme PC sans son 
écran 12" ou un un autre écran HDMI ?
US : Yes, L'Ultime is a 5" Full HD display but for that reason and because size and resolution, it is better and more confortable to use a bigger display in PC mode.
FR : Oui. mais pour un meilleur confort d'affichage, il est préférable d'utiliser en mode PC un 
écran plus grand que son écran 5" Full HD.
6 - Is wireless keyboard and mouse part of the pack ?
     L'Ultime sera t il livré avec un clavier et une souris sans fil ?
US : No. if needed, you have to purchase them separately. only the rewards pack with the mention include them
FR : Non, seules les contreparties oà¹ cela est mentionné en seront dotées.
7 - Is the final price of L'Ultime determined ?
      Avez vous déjà  définie le prix final de "L'Ultime" ?
US : We have a global idea about it, but it is not yet fixed.
FR : Nous avons une estimation approximative mais nous n'avons pas encore fixé le prix final.  
8 - What softwares can I run on L'Ultime ?
     Quels logiciels peut on exécuter sur L'Ultime ?

US : L'Ultime is an x86 architecture based. however you can run software according to OS in use. you can also access Android Google-play when running Android-x86.

FR : Vous pouvez utiliser tous les logiciels en adéquation avec l'OS utilisé. Vous avez aussi accès au Google-play d'Android quand vous 
êtes sous Android-x86.


9 -  PC Mode vs Phone mode?
a) Are modes exclusive?  Can I use PC and phone simultaneously?
b) Windows Phone or 8.1 Full?
Peut on exploiter le mode PC et le mode Phone en même temps ? Windows Phone OS oubien Windows 8.1

US : Modes are not exclusive. You can use both in the same time on the OS running. There is a full phone UI for each OS. But under Android-x86, only Android phone function is avaible.   No Windows Phone OS, but a Windows 8.1 full, with Phone UI apps.
FR : Oui les deux modes sont exploitable simultanément grâce 
à  une application "Interface utilisateur de téléphonie" pour chaque OS. Seul le mode Android Phone serra disponible si vous bootez en Android-x86. Il n'y aurra pas de OS Windows Phone. ca sera windows 8.1 pour PC.
10) I want fastest CPU, largest RAM and 128GB SSD.
Je voudrai un CPU plus rapide, plus de RAM et SSD

US : At this time, we will only provide the pack with the Intel Z3770 CPU. you can upgrade as you want RAM and SSD for up to 4Gb RAM and 1TB SSD.

FR : A ce stade, nous ne fournirons que des pack avec le processeur Intel Z3770. vous pouvez augmenter comme vous voulez la RAM et le SSD pour un maximum de 4 Go de RAM et 1 To de SSD.


11) Studio Edition has more memory/SSD. Any other differences?
       l'àdition Studio propose plus de RAM et de SSD, y'a t'il autre chose qui la distingue ? 
US : No, we only add an USB to MIDI cable and Ubuntu Studio with its Audio/video apps.
FR : Non, on y a intégré un cable USB vers MIDI et Ubuntu Studio avec toutes ses applications de production Audio et Vidéo.  
12) Is the 12" device a tablet with RAM and SSD and CPU ? 
Le périférique 12" est il une Tablette avec CPU, RAM est 
SSD ?
FR : L'appareil 12" est seulement un 
écran sans fil tactile, il n'ya pas de CPU, pas de RAM et aucun stockage dessus mais ce sera une bonne idée de l'équiper d'un stockage (SSD ou Disque dur), nous penserons 
à  cela (Merci à   
fsan1)  ;-)
US : The 12" device is only a wireless touch screen, there is no CPU, no RAM and no storage on it. However it will be a great idea to put on it a storage (ssd or Harddrive). we will think about it 
 (Thanks to  
fsan1) ;-)

 
13) Is it possible to get a triple boot with GRUB or another way ?
       Serait-il possible d'installer un triple boot avec GRUB ou autre ?
US : L'Ultime is Multi-boot : you can get more than two OS on boot on GRUB, (mint and Ubuntu 14 and so can make multi-boot)
FR : Le Multiboot est possible en plusieurs OS, pas uniquement pour deux OS. 
à  l'instar de Mint ou Ubuntu 14, on peut utiliser aussi GRUB ou autre moyen de multiboot.


14) Would it be possible to upgrade the processor?
      Serait-il possible d'upgrader le processeur ?
US : Unfortunately not on this version.
FR : Malheureusement pas sur cette version.

story:
Morph Kaos is a smartphone case that you purchase once, and customize forever.  Whenever! 

THE PROBLEM - All cases are static. You buy yellow. You're stuck with yellow. The more custom cases you want, the more money you'll pay. Who wants that?

THE SOLUTION - Morph Kaos, 1 case that changes with you! 

Prototypes Shown.

Hardware

Software/App

1. The Mobile App - iOS and Android.  Hyrbid app deployment for multi-platform ease, yet all of the native user experience.

2. Custom Built Firmware boards

3. Bluetooth Smart BLE modules for rapid prototyping

PERSONALIZATION IN SECONDS

Individuality Disrupt Initiation.  Morph Kaos assembles in seconds.  

  • 4 corner screws secures the sophistication 
  • Download FREE mobil app {Apple store or Google Play} 
  • Sync Up 
  • Create Log-In Account in-app 
  • Customize Whatever.  Whenever.  

Simple.

An area of essential focus is to provide the ability to update via the Morph Kaos mobile app, the case's firmware, in addition to the display i

Present State

We have currently reached the stage where we have completed the  hardware designs.  Coding is still ongoing.  In addition to having selected the factory which will manufacture the device. We are planning to use the funds generated through this campaign to begin mass production, advertising, general expenses, and to cover the costs of international licensing.

Pledges & Rewards

 Compatibility

To activate your Morph Kaos device, you'll need the following

  • Iphone 5s
  • Galaxy S5
  • Morph Kaos app (coming soon)

*Morph Kaos has a wireless charging battery functionality.  Wireless charger not included in perks at this time.


Join The Radical Movement!

Own Morph Kaos and together we'll shake up this old and boring industry of static smartphone cases.  

Team Morph Koas has conceptualized, tinkered, rejected, accepted, designed and reimagined Morph Kaos by the multitude in the past year.  From what type of display technology could plausibly be utilized to the scalable app model for the user experience with global fortune 500 brand loyalty involvement/licensing ------ and everything in-between.  

You, we, us will bring Morph Kaos to what will inevitably take its natural course within all things - That of Change!

2014 SID Display Exhibit 

Morph Kaos will come standard with a product key per device.  This key will be required to be inputted into the mobile app to activate/sync with the mobile app.  An account is then required to be created.  Standard Login ID and PW.  Bluetooth functions within your phone with be utilized for pairing.  Images you personally upload into the app, will be yours and kept in a preference level that you can name customize. 


ABOUT OUR TEAM

First and foremost - We all believed we can, so we put in the effort!  

The formation of our import company,  MSM Imports LLC, was to source OEM mobile accessory products from China to label and sell online and brick-n-mortar routes.  Upon visiting a large trade show convention in Guangzhou, a native-Asian business partners suggested that we originate our own product idea from scratch instead.  Brand it, input sweat equity and manufacture it.  We left China with a very new perspective.  The focus shifted.  3 months or so later, Morph Kaos (original name Smart Kase) was conceived.  

We set about a course of beginning a Tech Startup in lieu of MSM Imports.  Since Feb 2013, Smart Concepts was legalized and has been working on the design and development of Morph Kaos.  Along the path to product, there's been emotional hires and strategic fires.  The nucleus of the team in now secure and we're confident that with idea support communities like Kickstarter, that we can bring change to the smartphone case industry.  

Morph Kaos HUMOR - Case-oholic Anonymous (AA parody)

story:
Meet Johnny, The Pencil Case. He's simply elegant. And unfortunately, he came out too early. Apple's slow roll-out of the Apple Pencil made it challenging for Johnny to fund. We are re-grouping, and hope to have news for you soon.

Have you thought about how you're going to protect your pencil? Do you currently protect your pencil today? Don't stress, just slip a Johnny on it. Every pencil needs a case, and that's why we designed Johnny. Johnny isn't just any case though, he's tastefully refined and designed to be rugged enough to live with you. 

  • Stainless steal threaded fastener/closure
  • Padded interior to protect the pencil and avoid scuff marks
  • Totally symmetrical interior leaving no right or wrong way to load the pencil
  • 2.5mm wall thickness ensuring great protection from falls or impacts

Press

"Slip the Johnny on your Apple Pencil and enjoy peace of mind with the protection you get from the Johnny’s slightly bigger than Apple Pencil-size, lightweight, plastic tube technology." - 9to5 Mac

Hunted on Product Hunt

"If you're looking for an Apple Pencil case then this is the only one I have seen." The iPad Guide 

Statement by Johnny's Designer

"We set out to design a case that would play a great supporting role to the pencil, without stealing the show or changing the plot.  The simple and honest design is familiar and easy to use, yet adds a distinctly analog experience to the digital pencil. The precisely machined stainless steel threads evoke a feeling of security and permanence while also providing a satisfying ritual before and after each use." - Chris Whittall, Director of Industrial Design, Speck Design

Manufacturing Roadmap

Johnny has already been designed and engineered by our friends at Speck Design. Inspired by the Apple Pencil's aesthetic, their design team created the perfect compliment to your product collection. We've already talked with multiple manufacturers, have preliminary cost of goods and have our production partners ready lined up. Once we've reached our $65,000 goal, we'll press "go" and get these Johnnies rolling. The sooner we fund, the sooner your pencil is protected.


Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone has a pencil, but your friends that do, or plan to buy one, should know about Johnny. You can never be too safe. 

FAQ:

What is Johnny made of?
Johnny's body is a PC/ABS blend of plastic for added strength, his middle is a threaded stainless-steel ring and he has soft cushioning foam material on both ends inside.

What does Johnny weigh?
Johnny weighs less than 1/10th of a lb

Does it matter which way the tip is facing when I put it in the case?
No

Can I charge the pencil while it is in the case?
No

Why does Johnny screw together v. use magnets?
This is for the protection of your Pencil. We wanted to make sure that he stays shut when you want him to. Magnets also attract ferrous crud in your bag or drawer or whatever that we want to keep away from the pencil.

Is Johnny a perfect circle all the way around?
Yes, as perfect as we can make it.

Can I put other things in Johnny?
You can do whatever you want with your Johnny.

Will Johnny come in any other colors?
Depends on how many Johnny’s backers bring into the world *hint hint*

Do I need to charge Johnny?
No, he’s delightfully analog.

   Manufacturing Roadmap



 Johnny has already been designed and engineered by our friends at Speck Design. Inspired by the Apple Pencil's aesthetic, their design team created the perfect compliment to your product collection. We've already talked with multiple manufacturers, have preliminary cost of goods and have our production partners ready lined up. Once we've reached our $65,000 goal, we'll press "go" and get these Johnnies rolling. The sooner we fund, the sooner your pencil is protected.




   Other Ways You Can Help Not everyone has a pencil, but your friends that do, or plan to buy one, should know about Johnny. You can never be too safe. 



FAQ:



What is Johnny made of?Johnny's body is a PC/ABS blend of plastic for added strength, his middle is a threaded stainless-steel ring and he has soft cushioning foam material on both ends inside.
What does Johnny weigh?Johnny weighs less than 1/10th of a lb
Does it matter which way the tip is facing when I put it in the case?No
Can I charge the pencil while it is in the case?No
Why does Johnny screw together v. use magnets?This is for the protection of your Pencil. We wanted to make sure that he stays shut when you want him to. Magnets also attract ferrous crud in your bag or drawer or whatever that we want to keep away from the pencil.
Is Johnny a perfect circle all the way around?Yes, as perfect as we can make it.


Can I put other things in Johnny?You can do whatever you want with your Johnny.
Will Johnny come in any other colors?Depends on how many Johnny’s backers bring into the world *hint hint*
Do I need to charge Johnny?No, he’s delightfully analog.

story:
Ivan model 2 is a multi-purpose, configurable plastic enclosure with internal mounting points for hardware platforms such as Raspberry Pi-3, Arduino and others, plus mounting plates for sensors such as a camera and a PiR movement detector. Ivan empowers developers to combine their software and chosen hardware platform with sensors so as to turn their project into a professional looking product, without the need to tool their own plastic.


We took on-board suggestions from the community made during our Ivan model 1 campaign. Ivan model 2  includes two front panel switches as standard and cost less than our earlier 8 switch model. But more on that later.

  • Ivan model 2 comes standard with two push-button switches on the front panel.
  • Two multi-color/RGB LED’s which glow through front switch plate.
  • Removable, adjustable tilt/swivel bench-top or wall mount base.
  • Removable rear panel providing screw-less access to user’s choice of electronic platform.
  • A battery cavity to accommodate a 2000 mAh Li-Po battery.
  • Removable side panel specific to: Raspberry Pi models 3, 2 and B+
  • Another removable side panel specific to: Raspberry Pi Zero.
  • Yet another side panel which is blank, enabling users to customize holes as user requires.
  • Open base suited to Raspberry Pi models 3, 2 and B+ et al.
  • Removable blank base panel enabling users to customize holes as required.
  • Internal ring mount to glue a user supplied speaker. A speaker grill is incorporated into the front surface of Ivan.
  • Two internal mounts to glue user supplied microphone(s) – one located on front and one rear surfaces. User is required to make a hole(s) through Ivan if they choose to fit microphone(s).


Alternate, interchangeable front panel switch plate supporting 8 push button switches. Switches are intuitively positioned as 4 up/down/left/right functionality and 4 additional switches.

To support backers of our campaign, each sale of Ivan on Indiegogo will include all plastic panels we mentioned PLUS the Optional Add-on plastic switch plate supporting 8 switches. This means our backers can customize their Ivan to use either 2 or 8 push button switches on the front panel as they shall receive both switch plates plus a total of 8 switches and 8 switch caps. It’s our way of saying thank you.


Users connect LEDs and switches to their chosen hardware platform using their own hook-up cables.


As we mentioned, Ivan is engineered to mount any one of a variety of electronic hardware platforms.

Hardware platform mounts included in our Indiegogo campaign pack are:

  • Raspberry Pi models 3, 2 and B+
  • Raspberry Pi Zero
  • Arduino Uno, 101 and all those others platforms with the same footprint.
  • Electron by particle.io
  • Photon by particle.io
  • CHIP by NextThingCo
  • Omega2 by onion.io
  • Beaglebone


Ivan is also engineered to not only fit the hardware platforms we mentioned, but expansion HATS and boards such as: 

  • Sense HAT for Raspberry Pi-3
  • Witty Pi HAT for Raspberry Pi-3 by uugear
  • Photon Power Shield by particle.io
  • Photon with battery shield by sparkfun.com
  • Photon Shield Shield by particle.io

  • Use the tilt swivel base to stand Ivan on a bench-top.
  • Tilt Ivan’s tilt/swivel base and then wall mount.
  • Remove the tilt swivel base and stand Ivan upright.
  • Lay Ivan on his front surface – front panel switches are protected by clever bumps on the front panel when Ivan is laying down.


To support the developer community, post successful Indiegogo campaign, we shall release the STL files of a blank side panel, a blank base panel and a blank sensor plate. This enables developers to customize then 3D print these panels suited to their requirements.

Additionally, we shall release the STL file of a shortened rear cover. This covers the battery compartment while leaving the main hardware mounting area exposed. This enables users to view, for example, the Sense HAT when fitted to Raspberry Pi 3.


It does this by internally mounting the electronic hardware platform, HATs and other expansion boards. We want you to be aware that hardware platform and expansion board push buttons, LEDs, memory card slots and some connectors are not externally accessible or visible once mounted within Ivan. We have detailed this for each supported hardware platform, HATs and expansion board in Ivan’s Tech Table. So please check these details out.


Examples of what users can achieve combining Ivan with appropriate sensors, hardware and their clever code. 

  • A security PiR motion detector sending message to phone.
  • A wall mounted Bluetooth to Internet gateway.
  • An Internet of Things implementation controlling lighting.
  • A wall mounted Bluetooth to Wi-Fi gateway.
  • A time-lapse camera.

Ivan applications are only limited to the imagination of each developer.


We shall supply Ivan’s cardboard product box without any goio.co branding -- “white label”. Our backers can create their own wrap-around product sleeve to brand Ivan as they wish. Additionally, they can create their own spec label to place on the rear recessed area of Ivan which is designed to take a label of dimensions 35 mm wide x 15 mm high, 1.3 inches wide x 0.5 inches high.


Ivan turns projects into products by internally mounting the electronic hardware platform and sensors. As such, please be aware that various hardware platform push buttons, LEDs, memory card slots and connectors are not externally accessible or visible once mounted within Ivan. Refer to Ivan’s Tech Table below for information on each hardware platform and supported sensors. Users may develop code to utilize Ivan’s push buttons and LED’s to mimic those concealed by Ivan's housing.


We've already put in the work to get Ivan off the ground: we developed a working proof of concept and refined these to the develop prototypes and printed plastic models. Our time-line below projects how we shall progress Ivan from here to getting an Ivan into your hands.


We hope you feel as we do, that Ivan provides an great solution to turn your projects into products. We know that there's a market for Ivan. But we need you to show your support. If you can see how Ivan can be of benefit to you then check out our reward pack perks. Select a pack and please fund our campaign. This will guarantee you'll be among the first in the world to receive an Ivan.


goio.co was founded by Rick Spielrein, a pioneer of the IT and voice-over the-Internet (VoIP) industries.
Rick co-founded the first company to provide commercial VoIP services to the public on a global basis. With an accumulated fifty years of experience in the technology sector, the team at goio.co have created and commercialized in excess of twenty technology-based products. These vary from embedded firmware technologies to widely distributed Internet-based, real-time media exchanges. Technologies developed by the team have been sold or licensed to such companies as Sony, Toshiba, Roland-DG, Mitsubishi, Hyundai, Bondwell, WorldCom and Ozemail. The team have manufactured, assembled, deployed and operated technology projects in seventeen countries.


Our experience in product development tells us that no matter how experienced we may be, and how well we plan, we are always subject to the unknown and to those matters which are out of of control. Examples of the unknown might include an unexpected low yield rate in manufacturing due to contamination. Our experience enables us to plan for many variables, harden product to cope with variables and react appropriately when a curve ball is thrown at us. Where a deviation from the expected occurs, our undertaking is to react appropriately so as to mitigate the deviation and make relevant information available to all concerned.


Thanks for letting us tell you about Ivan and the team at goio.co
We hope you feel as we do, that Ivan provides an great solution to turn your projects into products.

story:
What is Wall Measure

Wall Measure bundles our industrial grade distance measurement sensor with common smart phones to enable quick acquisition of multiple wall measurements in a simple click.  Measures are stored in the phone and/or in the cloud and you can access them anytime and from anywhere by simple clicks on pictures.  You can also share them with others instantly and effortlessly, with no possibility of mistakes or misunderstanding!


Extra Development

Our second goal is to develop a web application that will use multiple shots to generate simple 3D CAD files to be used with your favorite CAD program.

If we raise more than 300,000 USD we will develop a subscription-based online service called "Wall Measure to CAD".  We will provide all supporters (levels "Pioneer" and above) with a free 1-year unlimited subscription!


Development timeline

Wall Measure leverages our existing Teraranger sensor, so we can deliver within a  tight time frame.

Were will the funds go

How We Started

Terabee started as a service provider for drone-based aerial work and evolved towards becoming a technology development company.  We work closely with CERN (European Centre for Nuclear Research) towards the development of smart flying indoor inspection systems, able to safely and quickly navigate in unknown environments. In order to ensure anti-collision protocols and self-localisation of autonomous robots, Terabee developed novel "super fast and light" distance measurement sensors and 3D cameras based on Time of Flight (ToF) technology, which is taking robotics and autonomous navigation to a new era.

After completing successfully the first sensor for robotics (already available on www.teraranger.com), we would love to share it with the architectural and construction world, where we have many friends guiding us in the development.  In reality, we believe that this tool can go beyond professional use, and will become useful even to normal people going shopping for wardrobes or shelves in large furniture stores.


The Team


Max Ruffo, PhD, Co-founder&CEO

Bringing technical Innovation.
Former department manager for a Boeing R&D centre, was one of the pioneers in 3D printing. Also expert in business & process optimization, product development and consulting (strategy).

 


Claudio Parrinello, PhD, Co-founder&Business Development

Striking the right partnerships.
Former head of technology transfer at CERN, has strong track record in academics research and international consulting.

 


Bjarne Hadland, Co-founder&Advisor -
Business in his blood.

Serial entrepreneur who introduced unmanned underwater robotics in the 70s, then started and managed several companies. Former CEO of Thomson-Reuters Scandinavia, founder of Fronter AS (now sold to Pearson).


Jan Kovermann, PhD, R&D Specialist 

Genius at work.

Former physicist at CERN, rare and deep experience in Radio Frequency and everything related to waves, electronics developer. Keen DIYer and problem solver at all levels.

 


Francesco Bullini, R&D Engineer

Developing our Apps.
Holds a Master Degree in Engineering from University of Bologna. Expert in Service Oriented Architectures and Application Servers. Passionate in AI and Agent Based Systems. 

 


Luís Rodrigues, Project Manager

Taking the project to successful finish.
Former CERN employee working in the ATLAS experiment. Holds a master in Artificial Intelligence from University of Évora. A hybrid engineer with diverse skills ranging from high performance/high availability computer architectures, big data handling and web based full stack architectures development.


Frequently Asked Questions

Is the device eye safe?
Absolutel yes.  Our innovative sensor is as performant as a laser but does not use laser technology - we work with modulated infrared light, which is completely safe even for children.

How big is the hardware?
The sensor which we are going to base Wall Measure device on is L32xW27xH15mm, the full device will be a bit bigger but we still don't have final dimensions (the render you see on the video is just an artistic render - the final design might vary considerably).

How big is the maximum wall I can measure?

As big as you can fit in the picture, with the only limitation that you should be not further than 15m distant from it.

Can I measure tables and other features that are not against a wall?

You can take only measurements on the same plane of the wall, for example distances to doors and windows, shelves, wardrobes etc...

What precision do I get?

Our preliminary tests showed about 1-2cm precision, but we aim at testing further and see if it is consistent in all conditions and how we can improve it.

Can I measure other irregular features?

Not really, the current product is designed and will work only with planar walls, and you need to take pictures perpendicular to it.  We have ideas on how to change this in future, but we need further testing before committing to a full 3D measurement tool.

I asked for my perk to be sent to the wrong address! What do I do?
We will be contacting all our contributors at the end of the campaign about their product choice. When we do, please respond and let us know the correct address where you would like your Wall Measure device shipped.

Am I supposed to manually add shipping if I'm not in the US&EU?
Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. When you pledge, manually add an additional $20 to the price of the perk you want. We will do the matching at the end of the campaign.

Help! What do I do if I forget to pay for shipping?
No problem. Click the contribute now button at the top of the page and manually enter $20. It will be added to your pledge amount. Enter the same personal information you did on your initial order. We will do the matching ourselves at the end of the campaign.

Can I upgrade my perk?
Please contribute the difference and select no perk. We will match up your contribution to the correct perk and will confirm after the campaign.

What are the risks and challenges in making Wall Measure?
We still have some problems to solve:

  •  One is to compensate some distortion in the picture taken with a cellphone camera: we will test the most common cellphones and provide a calibration process so that everybody can contribute calibrations to the system;
  • The outdoor range of our sensor is not as good as indoor, we know how to improve it and we're currently working on this; for indoor measurement the sensor is fully ready

How do I know that you will deliver the promise?
We developed this very innovaive sensor in a record time because we have a fantastic team that works very hard - that is why important organizations like CERN want to work with us. We understand phyisics principles, electronics, mechanics, optics, software, and web applications. Timescales are always a bet, but we promise to make our best effort  to make Wall Measure in time and with good performance and easy to use.

Is Wall Measure waterproof?
Wall Measure is splashproof - please do not bring it in your swimming pool!

story:
Shop and chat with your friends in a virtual shopping world on your iPad.


Shop in an interactive virtual world with your friends, earn unique rewards with your favorite brands!

NueCity is a free game-changing virtual shopping app that allows consumers to not only shop, but to chat with their friends while doing so. In NueCity, shoppers will browse through stores in a street setting and are able to trade discount badges (e-coupon) with their friends or other users without going through another portal!


World #1 virtual REAL shopping world. 

The problem with online shopping these days is the experience can be flat and boring such as the hassle of multiple credit card inputting, numerous browsers up, and no social shopping features. Would if NueCity could solve this for you?

We think of NueCity as a virtual metropolis with avenues you can stroll and people you can meet up with in a park. Like any city, growth and opportunity go hand in hand.


Shop in your local area or other cities, easily find what you need. 

We are empowering the real shopping experience so you can find local boutiques and stores in your area like Los Angeles, Hollywood, or other cities in the future!


Allows you to shop with friends, exchange rewards, and make new friends. 

We’re taking the online shopping experience and ramping it up a few notches. In NueCity, you now have a way to share your shopping experiences with your friends and family. Get their opinions before you buy that paisley sweater or that spiked dog collar. And if you buy something in NueCity, you will be rewarded with discount ‘badges’ and other cool ways to save money.


Earn rewards from your favorite brand like never before. 

Why should shopping be a solitary experience? Let the joy of spending money and earning rewards be a new kind of experience.

Shop and checkout in the same app.

A lot of the shopping apps or e-commerce competitors redirect the user to another website in order to checkout. Most of the time they require the user to register a new account. We found that very complicated and not user-friendly so we've created an easy checkout system where you can easily purchase your items. 

Where we are at.

We've worked extremely hard to develop our system with limited resources, that's why we need a little more capital to make NueCity an even more vibrant and wondrous place. We’re so close, designs are done, and our virtual world is ready to launch on iPad. In fact, we’re on the launch pad right now. We just need some more fuel to get us where we need to go. 

Milestones

virtual city environment framework - completed

avatar customization system - completed

all-in-one checkout system - completed

individual brand reward system - completed

beta launch on iPad - March

social chatting feature - April

release on Android tablets - June

release on iPhone & Android phones - September

This is how we going to use the money

Future Releases

· Social features. Have the ability to import your friends from Facebook, Instagram or Twitter. Be able to share products or stores with your friends. Meet new friends and trade rewards together. 

· Available on other devices.  While we’re ready for the NueCity iPad launch, it’s our long-term goal to make our app available for any type of mobile device.

Marketing budget and expand

Mobile and tablet shopping has gone through the roof! We will use the fund to promote NueCity in the following ways:

· Social media blasts on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.

· PR/News release.

· App store ranking promotion.

· Participate local events to gain attraction.

         

We would love you to get in on the ground floor of our innovative app. It won’t take much of an investment, and the payback will be very worthwhile. So consider being a ‘Special Citizen’ of NueCity as we change the way online shopping is done and how we share the experience.

Join us as a store owner

Nue Pet Avatars Selections


Team

NueCity is the brainchild of Peter Wang with the dedication of our genius team. This tech-savvy, engaging team has been working tirelessly on this project for a year since January 2013. They've been working hard on developing new ways to make online shopping more innovative and exciting.  


WEBSITE

www.nuecity.com

CONTACT

info@nuecity.com


Perk Description
story_txt:
Shop and chat with your friends in a virtual shopping world on your iPad.

Shop in an interactive virtual world with your friends, earn unique rewards with your favorite brands!NueCity is a free game-changing virtual shopping app that allows consumers to not only shop, but to chat
with their friends while doing so. In NueCity, shoppers will browse through stores in a street setting and are able to trade discount badges (e-coupon) with their friends or other users without going through another portal!World #1 virtual REAL shopping world. The problem with online shopping these days is the experience can be flat and boring such as the hassle of multiple credit card inputting, numerous browsers up, and no social shopping features. Would if NueCity could solve this for you?We think of NueCity as a virtual metropolis with avenues you can stroll and people you can meet up with in a park. Like any city, growth and opportunity go hand in hand.Shop in your local area or other cities, easily find what you need. We are empowering the real shopping experience so you can find local boutiques and stores in your area like Los Angeles, Hollywood, or other cities in the future!Allows you to shop with friends, exchange rewards, and make new friends. We’re taking the
online shopping experience and ramping it up a few notches. In NueCity, you now
have a way to share your shopping experiences with your friends and family. Get their opinions before you buy that paisley sweater or that spiked dog
collar. And if you buy something in NueCity, you will be rewarded with
discount ‘badges’ and other cool ways to save money.Earn rewards from your favorite brand like never before. 
Why should shopping be
a solitary experience? Let the joy of spending money and earning rewards be a
new kind of experience.Shop and checkout in the same app.A lot of the shopping apps or e-commerce competitors redirect the user to another website in order to checkout. Most of the time they require the user to register a new account. We found that very complicated and not user-friendly so we've created an easy checkout system where you can easily purchase your items. Where we are at.We've worked extremely hard to develop our system with limited resources, that's why we need a little more capital to make NueCity an even more vibrant and
wondrous place. We’re so close, designs are done, and our virtual world is
ready to launch on iPad. In fact, we’re on the launch pad right now. We just need some
more fuel to get us where we need to go. 
Milestonesvirtual city environment framework - completedavatar customization system - completedall-in-one checkout system - completedindividual brand reward system - completedbeta launch on iPad - Marchsocial chatting feature - Aprilrelease on Android tablets - Junerelease on iPhone & Android phones - September
This is how we going to use the money

Future Releases· Social features. Have the ability to import your friends from Facebook, Instagram or Twitter. Be able to share products or stores with your friends. Meet new friends and trade rewards together. · Available on other devices.  While we’re ready for the NueCity iPad launch, it’s our long-term goal to make our app available for any type of mobile device.
Marketing budget and expand 
Mobile and tablet shopping has gone through the roof! We will use the fund to promote NueCity in the following ways:· Social media blasts on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.· PR/News release.· App store ranking promotion.· Participate local events to gain attraction.
         We would love you to get in on the ground floor of our innovative app. It
won’t take much of an investment, and the payback will be very worthwhile. So consider being a ‘Special Citizen’ of NueCity as we change the way
online shopping is done and how we share the experience.
Join us as a store ownerNue Pet Avatars SelectionsTeam

brainchild of Peter Wang with the dedication of our genius team. This tech-savvy, engaging team has been working
tirelessly on this project for a year since January 2013. They've been working hard on developing new ways to make online
shopping more innovative and exciting.

story:
I am seeking to launch my website, www.BeyondtheGloves.com


You can contribute any amount, the amounts for the perks are just if you want full access. $1,$5,$10 or any $1000 is acceptable. Thanks!!!

BeyondtheGloves.com is a combat sports fitness site that is a fitness tracker with a social edge. Measure, track, and rank yourself; connect with other fighters; and search for opponents at the local, regional, or national level!!!

Mission

The mission of BeyondtheGloves.com is to foster a community of combat fighters who are willing to share their experience and experiences and to promote communication and interaction within the combat fighting community. Whether you’re training in Boxing, MMA, Muay Thai, Karate, or another combat sport, BeyondtheGloves.com empowers the fighter by putting an extensive database at the fingertips of the fighter.

Unique Problem

Currently, there are no web sites aimed at tracking workouts for combat sports.  In addition, if a fighter is looking to train or spar, the trainer or coach in your gym will ask around or call other gyms/clubs looking to match you up with a fighter who (hopefully) has a similar skill set. This is all done by word of mouth. The fighter puts their faith into the trainer or coach to find a suitable opponent.

Unique Solution

BeyondtheGloves.com empowers the fighter by letting them track all of their skill sets and workouts on our website (more on that later).  The fighter can then conduct their own research by utilizing BeyondtheGloves.com’s unique search function and extensive database to find another fighter that fits their weight, fight experience, and skill set criteria. 

Example of how BeyondtheGloves.com works:

If I am an MMA fighter that has a very strong ground game, but I am looking to improve my stand up attacks, I could use the BeyondtheGloves.com search function to find a fighter that has a strong stand up game.  Once I find that unique fighter, I can view their bio which will include their workout stats and statistics. Then I can contact them to either set up a training session, a sparring match, or to just exchange ideas on how to improve.

Here is an example of the search criteria a Boxer or an MMA fighter could use on BeyondtheGloves.com:

I am looking for a Male, between 140-145lbs, between 5’7 and 5’9, less than 1 year experience, less than 10 sanctioned bouts, southpaw, within 20 miles.

The search criteria would be processed through the database and a list of possible opponents that fit the exact criteria would be displayed along with their bio and contact info.

Fitness Tracker

BeyondtheGloves.com enables the user to create a profile listing all of their vital statistics and a record  of all their workouts which can later be tracked to measure improvement. Customizable and preset workouts allow the fighter to easily select workouts common to combat fighters and provides a database of new and interesting workouts.  BeyondtheGloves.com automatically ranks the fighters in relation to posted workouts allowing the fighter to gauge his progress. Compare yourself to other fighters at a local, regional, or national level!

                                                                                                       

WE ARE SCHEDULED TO LAUNCH THIS SITE IN 3 MONTHS, AND WE ARE LOOKING FOR MEMBERS IN ORDER TO RAISE THE ADDITIONAL CAPITAL NEEDED TO PROPERLY LAUNCH BEYONDTHEGLOVES.COM

How you can help fund Beyond the Gloves!

I am seeking $10,000 dollars, $7,837 will be used to finish programming www.BeyondtheGloves.com. The remaining funds will be used for essential infrastructure costs. 

You can also spread the word by connecting with us on Facebook beyondthegloves.com

 Bio

Hello, my name is Aaron Consuelo and I have been boxing since I was twelve. I am registered with the US Boxing Association and have actively competed in several tournaments such as Golden Gloves. I also mentor and train several young boxers and MMA fighters. I have a B.A. in Political Science from The University of Texas at San Antonio and an M.B.A. from Our Lady of the Lake University in San Antonio.

story:
Short Summary

My friend and I made a bet, that if we can get crowd funding for the Ubuntu Edge for the both of us, then we will give the money to charity.

Just another way to help get an innovative technology out to the world!

What We Need & What You Get & The Impact

We need funding to purchase Ubuntu Edge, the next generation of innovative technologies in the mobile world.

You get a part in making this a reality!

And make you feel good too! :-)

 

 

 

We are truly grateful for any help received!

story:
FIRST OF ITS KIND 16-in-1 USB C DOCKING COMPLETE WITH POWER BANK FEATURES , ALL IN ONE DEVICE

With the global pandemic that recently took control of the world and changed life as we know it, many of us have started working at home. Adapting to these new changes may have been difficult at times. So, we started thinking of ways to make your home office more convenient.

There is nothing worse than sitting down in front of your computer and having to struggle for hours with your setup. Our solution was to create a simple and effective device that will streamline your office setup, thereby eliminating stress and frustration.

IMAGINE!!! When you are on the go and there is an emergency meeting being called and your device is running out of power.

 

WORRY NOT!!! DockPro is equipped with a 10,000 mAh POWER BANK to give that extra stretch of power for your Laptop/Tablet or cellphone to operate.

We have created the ultimate docking station for your laptop. Thinking of every aspect of an office, DockPro is sure to make your life easier. With 16 practical features, our goal was to make our product hassle-free, versatile, and easy to use.

 

DockPro is specifically designed for universal compatibility. New devices on the market, such as Apple and Huawei are all changing their ports to USB 3.0, this means that most older connectors are rendered useless, such as HDMI, traditional VGA, and AUX ports etc.

 

So picture this, you have just bought a brand new laptop, you take it home and want to plug in your monitor, or an external keyboard and you realize they all have limited USB connectors. This is where DockPro becomes your perfect solution.

 

To make DockPro the best docking hub on the market, we pulled out all the stops. We wanted to make sure that all your devices and connectors could be plugged into DockPro so that you can have a peace of mind.

 

On the docking hub itself, we have a USB-C PD connector that plugs into your USB-C/ThunderBolt port on your laptop to unleashed the full potential of your devices.

Extend your devices feature by using DockPro:

All of these useful features combined into one will change the way your home office functions.

DockPro’s POWER BANK FEATURE

We built-in a smart intelligence switch on the docking station it-self. 

Should the 'ON' button is engaged the power bank feature is enabled,

While off, the docking hub will be enabled and power bank disabled. 

 

Below are the function if the 'ON' button is enabled

1. Docking features would be disabled

2. Power bank features would be enabled

3. USB-C PD 60 Watt would be enabled which automatically makes the PD port transform into an output for charging any devices.

4. Quick charge 3.0 USB A is enabled with an output of max 27watt

5. QI Wireless Charging is also enabled

 

Refer to below video 

 

DISPLAY OPTION

On Windows operating system , DockPro extends your monitor up to 2 display through HDMI and VGA.

  • As for MacOS, it extends to 1 display and mirror another display.
  • HDMI - max 4k resolution is achieved
  • VGA – max 2k resolution is achieved

WIRELESS CHARGING

HIGH SPEED CHARGING

Max 60 Watt PD output and USB 3.0 to charge your devices.

 

Fast data transmission

Over 10x faster than USB 2.0, Sync Data at 5Gbps - Transfer 4k Video in seconds

 FAST DATA TRANSFER 

Simultaneous reading on both SD and TF card reader.

 DOCKPRO PROPOSED TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS 

COMPARISON CHART

DESIGN

Designing DockPro was a challenge as it is the first of its kind. Requirements are high as all necessary features are to be bundled in a portable, sleek and classy chassis. Using high-grade aluminum casing, DockPro would be sturdy and it is able to withstand daily abuse.

The LED Battery Indicator on DockPro also indicates the power bank features are enabled. The state-of-the-art wireless charger included is compatible with most of the  Qi wireless devices. The wireless charging feature on DockPro is capable of charging your phone wirelessly even if it is 5 - 8 mm away from the docking hub.

A built-in ethernet jack (RJ45) means you can connect a LAN line to your device for better connectivity, DockPro’s ethernet port supports up to 1,000 Mbps! No more battle with weak WI-FI signals!

Overheating is a thing of the past thanks to aluminum alloy used in the design of DockPro, this material is an effective heat dissipater that will keep your DockPro cool.

Our Prototypes and Sketches!

How Cearus Technologies conceptualize DockPro from an idea to a reality.

 Initial sketches 

More sketches and testing... 

After working on our initial sketches and drafts, we finally created a 3D render to see how everything worked in a 360 view and created the DockPro prototype.

WORKING PROTOTYPE  

 

HOW IT WILL LOOK LIKE IN 3D

Risks and challenges

We have our manufacturer ready and a working prototype. Our planning is extremely well detailed and we are prepared for any possible hiccup that might pop up. However, we will keep you informed every step of the way.

 

Cearus Technologies

About Us

Cearus Technologies is a Singaporean vehicle created by David and Mark to materialize their ideas on harmonizing technologies to a small package.
While the progress of technology has brought tremendous convenience in our everyday lives, the myriad of standards and the diminishing of USB slots allocated in a modern laptop has introduced some burden. Just the other day while preparing for a presentation, David realized he has to carry with him a variety of USB dongles for a simple projector presentation.

That’s when DockPo was conceived.

With the 16-in-1 Dockpo by Cearus Technologies, we believe that it will meets the high demand usage of connectivity with devices for laptops. By incorporating a power capacity of 10,000mAh, it changes from just a simple USB hub to a dock which allows laptops to be charge on the go.

Cearus Technology is targeting to deploy and deliver its innovative ideas to fans and customers by 2021. Its goal is to be one of the trend setters in this new technological era.

story:
Infinity Cover is more than a simple cover: it's the new colorful way to personalize & protect your phone.

With Infinity Cover it’s simple to start every day in the right way and Muffin helps you to be whatever you want: what style will you have today?

Infinity Cover has 3 parts:

1. The invisible cover protects your smartphone and show your style.

2. With the background slide you can choose your Muffin’s adventure!

3. The Muffin Sticker, applied wherever you want, make your own scene! The Muffin Stickers are washable and can be repositioned anywhere: they use an innovative system to stick to surfaces without using glue.

Easy peasy! Just apply your favourite Muffin Sticker on a background slide and put them in the invisible cover. Done!

With Infinity Cover, you can choose from 11 different styles of Muffin and their relative background.

There’s more! Soon hundreds of new backgrounds will be available , so you can customize even more your cover!

During the launch period, covers for these phone models will be available!

  • iPhone 4 to 6 Plus
  • Samsung Galaxy S2 to S5

Your model is not compatible? Send us a comment: we'll try to release other models as soon as possible!

PLEASE REMEMBER!! When you donate, write your phone model on the "Address Line 2" textbox, in the "Address" paragraph!

Infinity Cover was created by Sam & Matt: we're two guys who like to reinvent boring things, like mobile phone covers, to make it fun for everyone.

So, if you like our idea and want to live these adventures with Muffin, support us to make it real.

Purr-bye,

Sam & Matt

Visit our website: Infinity Cover

Follow us on Social Network! Facebook - Twitter

Music: Royalty-free music from Bensound.

Really thanks to Diego Riselli for the Muffin's illustrations! Check out his works! Diego Riselli's Behance Profile

Risk & Challenges

Our primary mission is to make the final product in a couple of months after the end of the campaign: in this way we will be able to send the product to all the backers later this year.

The product is simple to realize (mainly we just have to take care of improving the final quality of the product and finding the best possible suppliers for the printing). Will be taken with the packaging of the product, to protect the integrity of the article inside.

We will ensure that our backers receive as soon as possible the product they have bought.

FAQ

1. What will I find in the package?

According to the perk you purchase, included in the package will be a transparent cover, the Muffin Sticker and a variable number of Slide Background.

2. How douse the Muffin Sticker work?

Muffin Stickers do not use glue, they are reusable and washable: they use a system of micro-suction to stick to the Slide Background.

3. When will I receive my product?

Our goal is to ship the product by the end of this year.

4. How much is shipping?

The cost of shipping is included in the perk you purchase.
