story:
One Organizer to Rule Them All

According to Wikipedia, electrical wiring was first used in the mid 1800's. For nearly 200 years man has been plagued with the scourge of tangled wires. They said Bluetooth would solve it, but these were hollow lies (more on that later). We believe we've finally solved the problem with a magical, state of the art, non-invention: the Cable Pod by Neaterly™

Cable Pod’s patented design fits almost any cord and will tidy up your bag or backpack instantly. Imagine a life where untangling everything you own isn’t the first task when you sit down at your desk or get home from work. It will save you literally minutes every single day.

What would you even do with all those extra minutes? Here's our list of the top 5 uses for time Cable Pod will save you:

  • Google the familiar looking actor from the movie you just watched and go down an IMDB rabbit hole
  • Revive your Farmville account 
  • Scroll through the endless, increasingly numbing feed of content on your Instagram
  • Aggressively comment on politically charged YouTube videos
  • Shamefully start a TikTok account and tell nobody

Think one satirical list is enough for an opening? Guess again. Here's a list of Cable Pod's features and accomplishments:

  • Guinness World record holder in all cable winding categories; including the 10 ft. charging cables nobody really ever needs*
  • Beat IBM Watson in both Jeopardy! and Chess last week. Take that, machine learning**
  • Defeated Chuck Norris in a mono y mono cable winding showdown***
  • Scientists now believe Cable Pod is the key to achieving a cold fusion reaction****
  • If you put Cable Pod on top of your phone it will stop the government from listening*****  

The “Wireless” Era has More Wires than Ever

Tangled wires plague us all.

Oh, you’ve gone "wireless", you say? How are you charging these accessories? That's what I thought...with a wire.

The rise of Bluetooth headphones, portable power sources, and wearable tech have ushered in an era of constant charging needs. As we carry around more chargers, we’re losing and damaging them at higher rates. Thus, Apple and Samsung's racket is confirmed once more. The wireless movement is nothing more than an elaborate rouse to sell more chargers. Alas, our corporate overloads win again; we're nothing more than junkies looking for our next hit of that sweet Bluetooth nectar. 

Find below a video showing how Cable Pod works:

 

 

But what if there was a way to fight back...

Cable Pod is the world’s best organizer for charging cables, wires, and earbuds. It looks like something you might have seen before, but it's so much more than just another wire organizer. It is a beacon of freedom from our wire overlords.

Self-Organizing Magic****** 

Stack ‘Em, Pack ‘Em, and Rack 'Em

Since the Earth is indeed flat, there is no polarity, and therefore no magnets. Literally dozens of YouTube videos confirm this claim. 

Cable Pod combines state of the art AI integration and magic****** to bind together in literally any environment. You can throw them in your bag and they will magically find each other and self-organize. That's better than any fancy machine learning. You might be organized, but are you organizing your organizers yet? Level up.

If you buy enough they double as thicc Pogs. If anyone sends us a picture of their Pog collection and it impresses us, we'll send them a free High Roller Cable Pod and post the picture here on the campaign. There's only one winner, so be ready for the competition. Second best Pog collection gets nothing.

It’s Your Money and You Need it Now…For Things Besides Replacing Headphones

True life: I’m on my third set of wireless headphones this year. I’ve downgraded from Beats to some knockoff ish I was re-gifted last Christmas. Every time I lose a pair, I trust myself less with owning nice things.

Don’t be like me. Replacing stuff I lose, ordering Seamless, and paying for streaming services I don’t watch drain my monthly budget. If you are like me, you’re in the right place. Cable Pod will literally solve all these problems. *******

Recent studies showed that the average American purchases three phone chargers and one pair of headphones every year. That's like $100+ if you're not buying the cheap stuff, so why keep giving Apple more money? Let's be real: they haven't put out anything legit since Jobs left us. We stay because of the blue text and pure fear, not the talking emojis and 17 cameras. The word "dongle" still conjures up a weird level of rage in me...like why make me carry more wires as the products get more "advanced"? And then you have to hear it from Samsung people like "Oh I've been able to drop mine in a pool since 2013 and now you're over here with even more wires and you still think you're better?" And it's like yes, I do think I'm better because Apple's marketing machine has been conditioning me since I was a child to think this way, and how can you blame me? It's really a bigger discussion about consumer protection and marketing oversight in this country.

Sorry, we're off topic. Cable Pod will save you a bunch of money on replacing accessories. With all those savings you could treat yo self to a nice dinner once a year courtesy of Cable Pod. When was the last time Apple did that? 

Mad Durable

A new study found that cockroaches and Cable Pods are the only two things that would survive a nuclear apocalypse. ******** Cable Pod is made from a soft-yet-durable polymer that can withstand a rugged journey in your crowded bag or suitcase with ease.

Buy Cable Pod once and never replace it – or a lost charger – ever again.

We’ll send out a survey after the campaign to confirm your shipping information and the color you would like to receive.

Features

  • Perfect Grip 
  • Universal Design 
  • Stackable 
  • Fast-Action 
  • Good for Target Practice against the Fridge or Whiteboard 
  • Durable Chewy Toy for the Puppy

The Process

The idea for Cable Pod came about around the time I lost my second pair of headphones this year. We wanted to create a convenient, straightforward solution to a problem a lot of us deal with daily.

It’s not the worst thing you’ll deal with on any given day, but we felt the annoyance that comes with finding your headphones tangled in a ball (it happens within seconds every time) or seeing your phone charger fraying is a universally shared feeling.

We spent countless hours creating Cable Pod with an intuitive design, durable material, and universal fit for most cables. It works quite well.

Disclaimers:

*We don't know if The Guinness Book of Records does not keep any sort of cable winding records, but Cable Pod really does wind and unwind in under three seconds.

**Cable Pod has no ability to play game shows or chess.

***Chuck Norris jokes are really tired. Sorry for this one.

****Cold fusion will not be achieved in our lifetime - with or without Cable Pod.

*****The government is definitely listening to you, but Cable Pod can't help.

******Cable Pod uses magnets to stack. Magic isn't real and the Earth is not flat.

*******Cable Pod will not actually solve your personal finance problems. If you're in debt, seek assistance. Honestly.

********No studies were commissioned to test the durability of Cable Pod against high levels of radiation. This is quite obviously a joke. 

Risks and Challenges

Our team of product designers have produced some products that you might already have around the house. We understand the risks of launching new products and because of that we only develop the ones we think will really resonate with you.
story_txt:
One Organizer to Rule Them AllAccording to Wikipedia, electrical wiring was first used in the mid 1800's. For nearly 200 years man has been plagued with the scourge of tangled wires. They said Bluetooth would solve it, but these were hollow lies (more on that later). We believe we've finally solved the problem with a magical, state of the art, non-invention: the Cable Pod by Neaterly™Cable Pod’s patented design fits almost any cord and will tidy up your bag or backpack instantly. Imagine a life where untangling everything you own isn’t the first task when you sit down at your desk or get home from work. It will save you literally minutes every single day.What would you even do with all those extra minutes? Here's our list of the top 5 uses for time Cable Pod will save you:
Google the familiar looking actor from the movie you just watched and go down an IMDB rabbit hole
Revive your Farmville account 
Scroll through the endless, increasingly numbing feed of content on your Instagram
Aggressively comment on politically charged YouTube videos
Shamefully start a TikTok account and tell nobody
Think one satirical list is enough for an opening? Guess again. Here's a list of Cable Pod's features and accomplishments:
Guinness World record holder in all cable winding categories; including the 10 ft. charging cables nobody really ever needs*
Beat IBM Watson in both Jeopardy! and Chess last week. Take that, machine learning**
Defeated Chuck Norris in a mono y mono cable winding showdown***
Scientists now believe Cable Pod is the key to achieving a cold fusion reaction****

story:
Visit our website ChargeBite.com

 

 

          Don't forget to add 5$ for international shipping.

 

 

People are talking:

Ubergizmo: "The ChargeBite is a charger that doesn’t have you relying on an electrical outlet in order to get your charging needs."

Technabob: "What it does is draw power from other 30-pin iOS devices to transfer to your own. See where I’m going with this?"

TUAW: "Surely no white night can end well with a phone that isn't working. So what do you do? Find an outlet and hope you've brought an adapter? That's so 2009 of you."

TECHSPOT: "A new product by the name of ChargeBite aims to revolutionize the way you charge your iPhone."

Geeky Gadgets: "The ChargeBite requires no cables or extras and can be carried on your keychain, allowing you to syphon juice form friends mobiles when your battery becomes a little low."

Cult of Mac: "I have to admit, although I scratched my head at first, I actually love the idea of the ChargeBite. I don’t want to carry around any more batteries with me, or remember to charge another gadget"

Also Seen in: Says.com, BWW, CHILLIES, C.IT, Computing forever, Technews (video)

 

ChargeBite is a brand new type of iPhone charger that charges your iPhone by transferring power from your friends' iPhones.
It's beautifully designed, extremely practical and will completely change the way you think about chargers.
Simply connect yours and your friends' iPhones to their designated ports, and that's it --- charging is on.

 
 
 Share on   
 
  

We know that there are a lot of situations that a power outlet or USB port are just not available, or maybe you happen to forget to charge your battery pack overnight? Fortunately, nowadays almost EVERYONE has an iPhone. All that energy, just waiting to charge your empty iPhone…

So we set a goal to create the first social charger – one that will allow you to share energy with your friends, and charge your battery while doing it. A couple of weeks later – the first ChargeBite was born.

  

  • ChargeBite is based on the concept of sharing energy between devices.
  • It is completely portable and attaches to your keychain. No power outlet, USB port or cable are required.
  • Absolutely no preparations required. No pre-charging is needed. ChargeBite is always ready to go.
  • ChargeBite is beautifully designed. With a smooth and elegant finish, and with 3 color combinations available, its also a treat for the eyes.
  • charging speed - excatly like a USB port.
  • ChargeBite is solid and robust. With no parts to lose or cables to rip.
 

 
Share on   

 

ChargeBite is perfect in giving you those few valuable percentages when you need them the most. Who hasn’t experienced his iPhone dying at the worst possible moment? Or had to make a really important phone call just to realize he has only a few seconds left? From now on, in situations that 5 percent more would make all the difference, ChargeBite is your iPhone's lifeline!

 

We've been working hard to make ChargeBite as intuitive and easy to use as possible. ChargeBite doesn't require any pre-installation or modifications done to your iPhone, no additional accessories and no iPhone applications.

ChargeBite’s way of use is simple and straight forward. Simply connect your iPhone to the designated plug and your friends' iPhones to the remaining free plugs and ChargeBite does the rest…

 

Visit our website ChargeBite.com

 

There are a lot of charging solutions out there: chargers based on sunlight, movement, thermoelectric effect, external battery and juice pack cases. Each one is restricted by various constraints. While some require sunlight, others need to be pre-charged.

What's ChargeBite constraint you ask?

ChargeBite just needs 2 friends! No precharging, no cables and no other special requirement.

Whether you're in a pub, hanging out with some friends, eating at a restaurant or relaxing on the beach, as your iPhone runs out just look in the eyes of your responsible friends and smile embarrassedly… They'll probably agree to share some good ol' precious energy if you ask them nicely :)

 

We spent a lot of time and effort perfecting ChargeBite's design. We wanted ChargeBite to not only be pactical and effective but also beautiful and elegant. A device you'll be happy to attach to your keychain. 

The design is fashionable, modern and with 3 available color combinations, fits the style and personality of every user. With a diameter of little more than a golf ball and less than half of an inch thick, ChargeBite is small and light enough to easily fit in your pocket.

 

Since the day we first thought about a social charging solution, it was obvious that efficiency optimization is critical. Here's how we imp­roved along the way:

  • The first design had 5% to 15% efficiency, which means having to take 15% from each charging iPhone in order to gain 5% battery – ouch.
  • A lot of reassessment led to changing the concept of our circuitry completely, enhancing the efficiency to 5% to 10%.
  • further development and were already at  5% to 8%.

After some research we concluded that 5% to 5% is ideal.

We expect serial production to make the efficiency even better, so we'll get even closer to the ideal efficiency, but being good engineers means always seeking for a better solution. So we decided not to rely only on production, and budget some of the funded money just for improving the efficiency rate. 

 

ChargeBite uses three 30 pins connectors which allow the following compatibility options:

Visit our website ChargeBite.com

A robber pulls out a gun on someone in the street and says: "your money or your life." The man replies: "I'm an engineering student; I have no money and no life…" were just a couple of engineers that got tired watching our family and friends get stuck without battery, constantly looking for power outlets, begging to borrow a call from everybody… we knew there had to be a better way! 

We both have more than 5 years' experience in the industry, Liran as an electrical engineer and Asaf as a mechanical engineer.

We knew when we started this project, giving our backgrounds, that we will really complement each other's capabilities and were really excited about the results!

We have proven the concept, built working prototypes and determined our production plans.

The next step is perfecting the design and starting serial production of ChargeBite. That means plastic molds, dies, material, circuit boards, packaging, and delivery… pretty expensive stuff. We will use the funding from Indiegogo to begin serial production and bring a beautiful new ChargeBite right to your door.

It's obvious what we get from your generous contribution. We get to see our vision realized – starting serial production and providing as many users as possible a device that we believe will make their iPhone experience much more enjoyable. In order to show our great appreciation to our awesome supporters in Indiegogo, we are offering ChargeBite at special prices, which will only be available here in Indiegogo, not to mention that you'll be the first ones to own a ChargeBite and be enveed by all your friends.. :)

All contributions, big or small, will be greatly appreciated and rewarded.

So, if you are excited as we are, help us get the word out. Get social on Facebook and twitter and don't forget to checkout our site!

 

Share on   

Visit our website ChargeBite.com

 

Have a burning question?

Contact email:    ASK@ChargeBite.com

story:
UPDATE NEW PROJECT ON KICKSTARTER HERE!

What is a Camera Stabilizer?

A good camera stabilizer will flow through the air capturing captivating dynamic footage along the way. We really like the effect that stabilizer shots have in film but we don't like the complexity and bulkiness of the stabilizers on the market today.

Why is the FloCam a Better Solution?

The key functional difference between the Tooga FloCam and other stabilizers is a bendable counterweight arm which allows the operator to not only control the number of stackable weights, but also the weight position.


Changing the weight position means that adjusting the center of gravity is much more intuitive than rigid arm stabilizers where set-up is much more trial and error based.

The Tooga quick snap connection makes set up fast. We spent a lot of time making sure the tolerances are perfect so that the modular design works as good or better than a single piece stabilizer design.

We use a very low-friction u-joint and ball bearing combination to make our gimbal assembly.  The high precision U-Joint is the most critical piece of engineering.  We added a thumbsteer feature that lets the operator make fine tune adjustments on the fly.

Compatible with Any Camera (under 4lbs.)

The FloCam works with cameras ranging from small smart phones to larger DSLR style cameras.

Super Portable

Why buy a stabilizer that you will never want to take with you?  We absolutely hate bulky gear but love stable footage.  With FloCam you can get great footage no matter where you happen to be going. Hiking? Shooting an event? No Problem!  Just take the FloCam.

Additional Applications for Tooga:

Low Angle Camera Stabilizer:

Flip the support arm around and the Tooga can be used as a low angle stabilizer.  This is great for getting creative style shots angled up at your subject.  Use a skateboard to get even more interesting angular movement.

Standalone Tripod Accessory:

There are seven 1/4-20 threaded holes in the Tooga Shell.  These are great places to attach extra lighting, mics, gopros, etc.  The Shell is a great tripod accessory on its own.

The Tooga suction cups are incredibly powerful.  We've even attached the Tooga to the outside of an airplane!  They simply screw into the sides of the Tooga Shell using the 1/4-20 connection ports. 

Prototype #3 on the outside of an airplane

What will I get for backing this project?

See the chart below to pick the best pledge level.  We plan to retail the Tooga FloCam for $250 after this project is complete.

How Did You Guys Think About FloCam?

Chris has been in the videography gear business for a while and had the idea of making a camera stabilizer with a bendable arm.  Setting up a camera stabilizer shouldn't take hours!! 

After several rounds of prototyping he had a working prototype but there were some problems with the early prototypes.  

At first, the bendable arm was too loose.  Chris was getting some great shots but eventually the arm would fall out of balance.  After several material changes he discovered a great way to achieve flexibility and strength.  The bendable arm we developed is solid.  Set up with the FloCam takes about 1/10th the time as setting up rigid stabilizers.

The bendable arm stiffness was solved but there was still a problem about how to fasten the arm to the Tooga Shell firmly and solidly. Chris brought Shan Kim on board who quickly determined that a snap fit connection would be much better than a 1/4-20 screw in connection.  After two rounds of prototyping it was a great success and the arm design is now super solidly connected to the base.

Tooga Snap first concept sketch by Shan Kim

Chris brought Sherry Wu onto the team at the beginning of summer.  He showed her the early prototypes and she immediately started sketching out amazing designs.  Her idea of making an ergonomic handle shape and thumbsteer really took the Tooga FloCam design to another level.  After two rounds of prototyping we had a fully functioning, awesome looking, Tooga FloCam. 

Handle Concept by Sherry Wu.

Only some of our prototyping and design sketches :)

Tooga FloCam Team - Shan Kim, Sherry Wu, Chris Anderson

The design is complete and our prototypes work great.  Our suppliers are lined up and ready to pump out some FloCams and Suction Cups.  As soon as we reach our goal on Indiegogo our manufacturing partners have agreed to start production early to speed things up a bit.  We plan to ship out Indiegogo rewards in November 2013 if we can achieve our Indiegogo goal quickly.  If funding takes a long time and we achieve funding on the last day of the Indiegogo project then we will most likely ship in mid December.  Let's hope we are funded early!!

The longest part (and most expensive part) of the production process is making the molds for the plastic parts.  We do this with a partner overseas. There are ten unique parts that will need a mold.  Once we can prove this project will be funded the mold making will begin and should take about 30-45 days to complete.

Once the moulds have been completed the parts can be sent to us very quickly and at a very fast rate.  It will take about 2 weeks after the molds are completed to receive the final parts.

When we receive the final parts will will make sure everything looks good and then start shipping.  If this project is heavily backed then shipping may take a few weeks.  We estimate that we can ship about 500 per week once we start receiving parts from our suppliers.  International shipments may take longer depending on customs procedures / etc.  We plan to use DHL in international shipments because that seems to be the fastest way to send products to countries outside the USA.
story_txt:
UPDATE NEW PROJECT ON KICKSTARTER HERE!
What is a Camera Stabilizer?
A good camera stabilizer will flow through the air capturing captivating dynamic footage along the way. We really like the effect that stabilizer shots have in film but we don't like the complexity and bulkiness of the stabilizers on the market today.
Why is the FloCam a Better Solution?
The key functional difference between the Tooga FloCam and other stabilizers is a bendable counterweight arm which allows the operator to not only control the number of stackable weights, but also the weight position.



Changing the weight position means that adjusting the center of gravity is much more intuitive than rigid arm stabilizers where set-up is much more trial and error based.


The Tooga quick snap connection makes set up fast. We spent a lot of time making sure the tolerances are perfect so that the modular design works as good or better than a single piece stabilizer design.


We use a very low-friction u-joint and ball bearing combination to make our gimbal assembly.  The high precision U-Joint is the most critical piece of engineering.  We added a thumbsteer feature that lets the operator make fine tune adjustments on the fly.


Compatible with Any Camera (under 4lbs.)
The FloCam works with cameras ranging from small smart phones to larger DSLR style cameras.



Super Portable
Why buy a stabilizer that you will never want to take with you?  We absolutely hate bulky gear but love stable footage.  With FloCam you can get great footage no matter where you happen to be going. Hiking? Shooting an event? No Problem!  Just take the FloCam.



Additional Applications for Tooga:
Low Angle Camera Stabilizer:
Flip the support arm around and the Tooga can be used as a low angle stabilizer.  This is great for getting creative style shots angled up at your subject.  Use a skateboard to get even more interesting angular movement.



Standalone Tripod Accessory:
There are seven 1/4-20 threaded holes in the Tooga Shell.  These are great places to attach extra lighting, mics, gopros, etc.  The Shell is a great tripod accessory on its own.



The Tooga suction cups are incredibly powerful.  We've even attached the Tooga to the outside of an airplane!  They simply screw into the sides of the Tooga Shell using the 1/4-20 connection ports. 



Prototype #3 on the outside of an airplane

What will I get for backing this project?
See the chart below to pick the best pledge level.  We plan to retail the Tooga FloCam for $250 after this project is complete.



How Did You Guys Think About FloCam?
Chris has been in the videography gear business for a while and had the idea of making a camera stabilizer with a bendable arm.  Setting up a camera stabilizer shouldn't take hours!! 
After several rounds of prototyping he had a working prototype but there were some problems with the early prototypes.  
At first, the bendable arm was too loose.  Chris was getting some great shots but eventually the arm would fall out of balance.  After several material changes he discovered a great way to achieve flexibility and strength.  The bendable arm we developed is solid.  Set up with the FloCam takes about 1/10th the time as setting up rigid stabilizers.
The bendable arm stiffness was solved but there was still a problem about how to fasten the arm to the Tooga Shell firmly and solidly. Chris brought Shan Kim on board who quickly determined that a snap fit connection would be much better than a 1/4-20 screw in connection.  After two rounds of prototyping it was a great success and the arm design is now super solidly connected to the base.



Tooga Snap first concept sketch by Shan Kim

Chris brought Sherry Wu onto the team at the beginning of summer.  He showed her the early prototypes and she immediately started sketching out amazing designs.  Her idea of making an ergonomic handle shape and thumbsteer really took the Tooga FloCam design to another level.  After two rounds of prototyping we had a fully functioning, awesome looking, Tooga FloCam. 

Handle Concept by Sherry Wu.


Only some of our prototyping and design sketches :)


Tooga FloCam Team - Shan Kim, Sherry Wu, Chris Anderson

The design is complete and our prototypes work great.  Our suppliers are lined up and ready to pump out some FloCams and Suction Cups.  As soon as we reach our goal on Indiegogo our manufacturing partners have agreed to start production early to speed things up a bit.  We plan to ship out Indiegogo rewards in November 2013 if we can achieve our Indiegogo goal quickly.  If funding takes a long time and we achieve funding on the last day of the Indiegogo project then we will most likely ship in mid December.  Let's hope we are funded early!!
The longest part (and most expensive part) of the production process is making the molds for the plastic parts.  We do this with a partner overseas. There are ten unique parts that will need a mold.  Once we can prove this project will be funded the mold making will begin and should take about 30-45 days to complete.
Once the moulds have been completed the parts can be sent to us very quickly and at a very fast rate.  It will take about 2 weeks after the molds are completed to receive the final parts.
When we receive the final parts will will make sure everything looks good and then start shipping.  If this project is heavily backed then shipping may take a few weeks.  We estimate that we can ship about 500 per week once we start receiving parts from our suppliers.  International shipments may take longer depending on customs procedures / etc.  We plan to use DHL in international shipments because that seems to be the fastest way to send products to countries outside the USA.

story:
Final Production Version May Very As We Continue To Make Adjustments.


 Bluetooth technology has been around for quite some time and has been used in many different devices. Headphones continue to use this technology but not many have explored the possibility of earbuds. We have been working closely with a factory that is experienced in bluetooth technology and works directly with major brands in order to help bring these earbuds to our market.   

We want to sell an earbud that has no cords, clips or adapters and contains everything you need within the wire. We decided to find a way to bring the POWER-LINES to reality and to do this we need the support of backers like you.

OUR GOALS:

-Connect to any Bluetooth device

-Allow users to create a custom fitting earbud. No two people are the same and in reality, no two ears are the same either! So why should any two ears be limited to a “one size fits all” earbud? We are offering custom comfort - mix and match six buds and four tabs to create the perfect fit.

-Direct the sound into the ear. The majority of earbuds send the sound directly into the side of your head. For a cleaner and more clear sound we are using earbuds that are designed with a slight angle. This angle channels sound waves directly into your ear.

-Lose the cord. Why? It gets in the way!

-User friendly. Electronic devices are cool but only if they are easy to use. Simply hold the power button down and connect directly to your Bluetooth device. 

The POWER-LINES contain everything needed to function.

-Built in battery that easily recharges with USB clip.

-Microphone built into earbud that allows you to make and receive calls just like any other bluetooth headset.

-Includes built in play, pause, and volume controls.

 

we are currently working on additional attachments when customizing the fit.


TIMELINE:

Taking on a project like this requires a lot of time and planning in order to successfully accomplish everything. We were able to find a manufacturer who has been willing to help with creating samples as we move to our final product.

-January-

Our goal is to run the project during this time as we finalize device requirements and continue with testing to insure we can provide a quality product.

-February-

If all goes as planned and we are able to successfully raise the funds to finish the project, we will be able to use the funds to start the production of the first batch of earbuds. Another portion will go into product packaging. This is another project in itself that we are working on in order to provide a clean finished product.

-March-

According to the timeframe we were presented, our order should be in transit to our location. We will use this time to prepare our backer rewards so that when they do arrive, we can be ready to ship them out.

-April-

This is our goal for fulfilling rewards!

Specifications we intend to use in final product if funded:

Bluetooth V4.0+EDR

Profiles supported HSP, HFP, A2DP and AVRCP

Operating distance 10 meters Class 2

Rechargeable 85 mAh Lithium-ion battery

Music playing time: Up to 4.5 hours

Standby time: Up to 120 hours

Charging time: About 1.5 hours

Final Production Version May Very As We Continue To Make Adjustments.

story:
CARD LOK: THE BEST PHONE ACCESSORY EVER MADE

 

 

 

 

FEATURES:

  • 5MM SLIM DESIGN

  • HOLDS UP TO 7 CARDS

  • RFID PROTECTION

  • SELF CLOSING SAFE LOCK

  • CUSTOMIZABLE GRIP 

  • VIDEO STAND

  • DROP-PROOF DURABILITY

  • MIRROR

  • EASY ACTION CARD REMOVAL

  • UNIVERSAL FIT ON ALL SMARTPHONES

 

 

EASY APPLICATION ON ANY PHONE:

 

 
 

 

 

AVAILABLE IN PURE WHITE, DUSTY PINK, & ALL BLACK

 

 

CUSTOMIZABLE GRIP CORD

 

 

 

DROP PROOF DESIGN

 

 

THE CARD LOK ORIGIN STORY:

“My friend told me she was trying to find a nice credit card wallet for her phone, but just couldn’t find what she wanted anywhere. 

 

She didn’t want a cheap silicone thing that she couldn’t get the cards out at first and later on stretches to the point cards literally falls out.

 

She bought several others and tried them, but discarded them all, because they were either too big or just not practical and after all she wanted to keep her favorite phone case on the phone. Of course she also wanted a mirror, a video stand and some grip feature to hold it. (Oh, and RFID protection too.)

 

So I said it sounds like a nice challenge, we will try and make her one and, voila! CARDLOK. She was our first test user and she loved it.”

 

 

PRESS KIT

story:
NOLA is the coolest and the most versatile passive audio amplifier for smartphones you can find. Are we too confident? No, not at all! Combining the integration of magnets and a striking and functional design, we come up with a product that can be used in any environment, in a safe and funny way. The unique experience of enjoying our favorite music at a countless number of places and environments allows us to make this statement.



This project main goals are to make the experience of music reproduction more enjoyable and fun, as well as to create a product with good quality at a fair price. For that, we’ve inspired ourselves through several ways that allow amplifying sound, and through situations in which we can find music and its intimate and social features.



NOLA’s versatility allows you to enjoy your music at home, at the office, outdoors (as long as the weather is fine!), and even when (you'r triyng to impress your friends with a basic ollie)! It's up to you! So, go out and be loud!




The shape, inspired by a mix of a saxophone and an elephant trunk, has been duly tested and optimized for amplifying results of up to 15dB of volume.The inner part also receives superficial polishing to maximize the amplification of sound of your smartphone.

 NOLA is an acoustic amplifier based on the passive principle, which means it does not use external energy sources to amplify the sound. The sinuous and fluid form of the piece allows the abrupt acceleration of sound waves, which allows the increase of sound volume. Structurally we looked for a way that would naturally amplify the sound, such as a trumpet or a gramophone. The sound increases in volume because there is a small initial cavity in the part, ending in an opening that is exponentially larger than the initial one.

To assure your smartphone's safety and the correct functioning of NOLA, we've integrated magnets - in the back side - that can bear a weight of 4,2Kg. With this feature, NOLA will adhere to most metallic surfaces. Be aware that copper, aluminium and some steel alloys are not magnetizable. For that reason, we created two accessories so you can enjoy your NOLA experience even when Magneto is in prison, waiting for the Professor, (yes, we love X-Men).


 

To cover as many situations as possible in which NOLA can be used, we designed two complementary accessories, in which design follows the same fundamental premisses: functional design together with the natural beauty of the materials and forms.

Table Stand – ideal to use when you are desperate to have a dance break at the office.

Wall Stand – the best friend for all of those who like to sing in the shower or like to live up-side down. You can screw it down or, if you'd like, you can stick it with the complementary nano-suction tape that comes with it.


Any smartphone within 72mm width x 12mm thickness is compatible with NOLA.

Bold people wear it.

Charming and tropical people love it.

….and trendy and smart people can't live without it.

 

 

It all began in a sunny day on a Portuguese beach. Shadowed by a sun umbrella, the NOLA creators had a breakthrough because of a small disaster envolving a smartphone and lots of sand. The question that arrose was: is there a safe way to use your smartphone on the beach to enjoy some music? Well, if only there was a way to stick it to the pole of the sun umbrella...EUREKA! There it was! As a matter of fact, this question reminded them that you use your smartphone in several places where you can find several different types of metallic surfaces. Why not develop a solution to cover all of these situations? And so NOLA was born.

To achieve an optimized product, we’ve exhaustively tested several geometries and dimensions of the part. It was a long way until we could state that we’ve reached a high performance product. The sound amplification has been tested on different prototypes, in which we assessed changes in the part’s geometry in order to understand its impact on the volume input and quality of the final sound. On the other hand, the fixation on metallic surfaces has been a huge challenge, since the magnets disposition and integration was essential for achieving a reliable product. Several hypothesis were exhaustively tested and assessed. This product is a balanced compromise between performance and design.

The NOLA you see at the present campaign is a prototype. NOLA'S TEAM is seeking funding to improve and produce this prototype. Therefore, the final version of the product - the production version - is going to be an optimized version in terms of:  dimensions, materials, finishing of surfaces and textures, packaging.

To achieve the best performance, the choice of materials is essential, so ABS will be used, with surface treatment in the production mold. In this way it is possible to have customized and functional surfaces, such as in the interior zone, where the polished surface enhances the reverb effect of the sound. On the other hand, the dimensions were revised in order to increase compatibility with smartphones. In the production version will also be included, in the interior zone, an integrated support to stabilize the smartphone in a safer way. 
 

 

The main challenge will be the switching from the prototype to the production. This has been one of the biggest stumbling points we’ve faced when trying to reach a final product. This switching will always have its constraints, duly identified. However, we should take them into account, when planning, in order to be the most approximate to reality. On the other hand, we’re talking about a market saturated with the most diverse products, but we believe that with our approach based on creativity, performance, versatility and quality, we will stand out.

Most of the funds will be applied in the production and production tools: given the complexity of the product - NOLA has a design based on hairpin bends and organic shapes - the manufacture of the mold and the production of parts demand the highest portion of the funding.

We also have into account other expenses related to shipping, bureaucracy and possible unexpected circumstances which can imply more investment. We think in a bold way, but with our feet on the ground, respecting the challenge and the responsibility of deliver the best product and know-how to whom support us.

NOLA TEAM is a collective of creative and forward-thinking people. The team is united by the will to create a portfolio of cool, smart and functional design products at a fair price. To achieve that, the main caractheristics of this team are design concepts based on performance and visual harmony, a bold and outside-the-box communication approach, knowledge and experience on product engineering and materials. Besides NOLA we have plenty other product ideas that will rock your world. So, in order to be able to develop them, we now need all your support. We promisse it will be worth it!

For us INDIEGOGO is the most flexible tool, with the most comprehensive coverage in the universe of crowdfunding. The ease with which we can show our concept to a vast number of potential backers was a key factor for the choice. On the other hand, crowdfunding is an exceptional tool that fosters the creators’ proactivity and independence. It allows, in a simple way, to prove the quality and validity of any concept.

Your smartphone will be compatible with NOLA if it fits the following dimensions:  72mm width x 12mm thickness. NOLA will enhance it's performance if the smartphone's speakers are located on the lower side of the smartphone. When using NOLA, the integrated magnets are not in direct contact with the smartphone. This way, your mobile phone will not be damaged. Depending on the phone model, there may be potential interference with location systems, such as the compass. This is an excepcional situation - which can also happen in zones / environments with strong magnetism - and that will not damage your mobile phone, producing only wrong readings. NOLA's integrated magnets will only damage your phone if they are in direct contact with it and for a long period of time. This should be a concern to have in the use and transportation of NOLA.NOLA can be fixed on various metal surfaces. Certain alloys of stainless steel and aluminum, for example, may not adhere or have such a strong fixation.Since there is a wide variety of metal materials where NOLA can adhere, you must always test the surface before placing NOLA and your phone.
He will probably want to steal your NOLA for being so cool, but don't worry because Wolverine will show up to help you out.

story:
How it begins

I am an entrepreneur that have a vision of a better world.  It was about a year ago where I discovered crowed funding websites like indiegogo and kickstarter.com plateforms that allows me to dream big, and make what was impossible before, possible. 

This is my 4th project, also the most promising and biggest project I have so far.  It all begins 8 months ago, simply when I argued with my girlfriend who should go switch off the light when we were both in bed....

This is how the idea of a Bluetooth lightbulb comes to life.  For 8 months, I have been working with my engineer friends, sourcing the right supports and sharing my vision with a group of talented and innovative partners, we are now only steps away from completing the Lumen, it will be the world first RGBW, Bluetooth controlled LED smart bulb.

What is Lumen

The Lumen Smart Bulb combines the practical utility of a standard white bulb, the party fun of multi-coloured lights, and the longevity and costs savings of an LED bulb. All of this, within a single package that works with existing standard bulb sockets already in our homes. Everything can be controlled easily from a proprietary application in our mobile smart phone, available for both ios and android devices. 

Not Just a concept

The Lumen Smart Bulb is more than an idea. Tabu has been developing the Lumen Smart Bulb for some time. With an existing and perfectly functional prototype, the Lumen Smart Bulb is in its final stages - light-years ahead of the competition and a mere two steps away from reality. 

What so special about Lumen?

RGBW

We never want to create a gadget or a decoration.  We want to create something that is truly useful in our daily life.  That why we created the RGBW LED light. 

‘W’ represents white. Unlike the usual RGB lightbulb which mimic "white" light by combining RED, GREEN and BLUE light, The Lumen has included 6 Watt white LED light that generates over 400 lumens of light. It create a perfect warm-white light that is great for daily usage. 

‘RGB’ stands for Red, Blue and Green. The Lumen Smart Bulb can create light in absolutely any color one fancies from the full color spectrum. 

Power saving and long lasting

400 lumens is the equivalent of a traditional 60W lightbulb, at an unbelievable one-tenth of the power consumption, Lumen is able to create the same amount of light, translating to obvious electricity savings. 

The Lumen Smart Bulb is LED and rated to 30,000 hours, or 20 years*, say goodbye to frequent bulb changes.

Bluetooth 4.0 Controls

Why Bluetooth 4.0?  BT 4.0 is the new trend and they are available in all the new apple device and the new Android models.  It allow to establish a direct interaction between the device and Lumen, which just make everything so much easier.  Unlike the previous bluetooth version, pairing is done in a very fast a automatic manners.  Bluetooth 4.0 also have the advantage of multi control capabilities and with a range of up to 30ft, you control all the Lumen bulbs in your home right from the palm of your hand whether you’re in the bed room or the living room. 

Cool features

We have now developed our proprietary application that lets you control all the Lumen Smart Bulbs at home (or a selection of them) from your mobile smart phone.  We have include additional cool features like:
 
 

Party mode transforms your living room into a dance floor with flashing lights that change color to suit the music playing. 

Sleep mode simulates calming moonlight to improve sleep and enhance rest.

Wake mode starts very dim, gradually getting brighter till it reaches maximum intensity at the stipulated wake up time, just tell Lumen how long you want the process to take, 5 minutes or even an hour. 

Ambient mode creates the perfect conditions for a romantic date or a quiet evening at home.

When time goes by, we will add additional features to our application. :-) 

Simple, Easy, Plug and Play

Existing market solutions for advanced lighting systems that try to do what the Lumen will do require complex wiring and clunky control boxes fixed at a certain point in the home, and are expensive. 

The Lumen Smart Bulb works with existing standard E27 and E26 bulb sockets. It’s a truly plug and go system that’s affordable and absolutely easy to install. Simply screw it in place of your existing bulb, and its ready to be controlled from the app in your smart phone. 

The bluetooth module built into every bulb means that, no routers or complicated configuring is required, nor will you require an additional remote control for your radio frequency controlled bulbs. 

Why Crowed Funding?

This is my 4th projects posted on a crowed funding website, I have experienced some of the best community support from the backers.  Both good comments and constructive advice, allow me to build better product.  Creating a product is difficult with many challenges.  Sometime, supports from a community is what get me going and be more determine. 

What is the Funding for?

We have clear plan and well evaluated the cost of the product down to the individual component.

Preproduction Cost:

  • Ordering Prototypes for testing: $5000
  • Safety certificate application (CE, UL, TUV): $25,000
  • Initial Software and Engineering deign fee: $30,000
  • Other License cost: $8,000

Production Cost:

Hardware Tooling: $10,000

Minimum Order Quantity: $12,000

shipping, handleing and other cost: $10,000

Total $100,000

We need your support:

This revolutionary bulb is only possible through total designing from scratch. Every internal component from the LED, PCB module, to the bluetooth module, to the control unit, and even the transformer module, is custom made and brand new. We have already achieved this through an experienced engineering team and in collaboration with our partner, Signeo lighting, with their decades long experience in delivering quality, internationally certified lighting solutions to the market. A product of this complexity and potential requires exacting and extensive testing for performance and reliability, which are indispensible qualities of any Tabu product. 

Because of the different procedures for applications across different certifications, we cannot rule out the risk that delivery to certain countries might be delayed. However, our existing working prototype and application (currently for the iOS, with android compatibility to come later) gives us strong confidence that we will be able to achieve delivery by 2013. Kickstarters, together let’s redefine lighting the world over.
story_txt:
How it begins
I am an entrepreneur that have a vision of a better world.  It was about a year ago where I discovered crowed funding websites like indiegogo and kickstarter.com plateforms that allows me to dream big, and make what was impossible before, possible. 
This is my 4th project, also the most promising and biggest project I have so far.  It all begins 8 months ago, simply when I argued with my girlfriend who should go switch off the light when we were both in bed....
This is how the idea of a Bluetooth lightbulb comes to life.  For 8 months, I have been working with my engineer friends, sourcing the right supports and sharing my vision with a group of talented and innovative partners, we are now only steps away from completing the Lumen, it will be the world first RGBW, Bluetooth controlled LED smart bulb.


What is Lumen
The Lumen Smart Bulb combines the practical utility of a standard white bulb, the party fun of multi-coloured lights, and the longevity and costs savings of an LED bulb. All of this, within a single package that works with existing standard bulb sockets already in our homes. Everything can be controlled easily from a proprietary application in our mobile smart phone, available for both ios and android devices. 
Not Just a concept
The Lumen Smart Bulb is more than an idea. Tabu has been developing the Lumen Smart Bulb for some time. With an existing and perfectly functional prototype, the Lumen Smart Bulb is in its final stages - light-years ahead of the competition and a mere two steps away from reality. 
What so special about Lumen?
RGBW
We never want to create a gadget or a decoration.  We want to create something that is truly useful in our daily life.  That why we created the RGBW LED light. 

‘W’ represents white. Unlike the usual RGB lightbulb which mimic "white" light by combining RED, GREEN and BLUE light, The Lumen has included 6 Watt white LED light that generates over 400 lumens of light. It create a perfect warm-white light that is great for daily usage. 
‘RGB’ stands for Red, Blue and Green. The Lumen Smart Bulb can create light in absolutely any color one fancies from the full color spectrum. 
Power saving and long lasting
400 lumens is the equivalent of a traditional 60W lightbulb, at an unbelievable one-tenth of the power consumption, Lumen is able to create the same amount of light, translating to obvious electricity savings.

The bluetooth module built into every bulb means that, no routers or complicated configuring is required, nor will you require an additional remote control for your radio frequency controlled bulbs.

Ordering Prototypes for testing: $5000
Safety certificate application (CE, UL, TUV): $25,000
Initial Software and Engineering deign fee: $30,000
Other License cost: $8,000

Production Cost:
Hardware Tooling: $10,000

shipping, handleing and other cost: $10,000

story:
What are we doing?

During last few years, population of digital storage device like  SD, MicroSD, and USB drives kept on increasing on my desk. More memory device I acquired, more I misplaced causing lot of frustration. I couldn't find a solution  that organized my storage devices while giving me quick access to them, I was looking for something that was designed well enough to deserve a spot on my desk thus with support from my friends and family, my dad and I  came up with a simple, yet well designed, MicroSD, and USB memory organizer called VeeHub. So today my dad and I are launching the VeeHub.

Presenting the VeeHub

The VeeHub is a beautiful device that organizes 5 USB drives, 8 SD cards, and 11 MicroSD cards. It is made from high quality ABS plastic (same as plastic used in LEGO®) providing great strength ensuring that it won’t break no matter how hard it falls off your desk. The VeeHub is weighted evenly so that USB drives won't tip it over. It uses space efficiently, storing 24 memory device in a small footprint. It looks beautiful, and is worth displaying by itself on a desk.

 

Uses:

The VeeHub organizes and protects your data, while looking good enough to show off on your desk.

There are many advantages of using the VeeHub:

  • If you use your storage drives on a daily basis, it protects the contacts necessary to transfer data.
  • If you are a photographer the VeeHub provides quick access to your SD cards.
  • If you are a student or an office worker the VeeHub helps you avoid losing drives that contain your precious files.
  • For those tinkers who love microSD, but hate losing those tiny cards, the VeeHub locks them into place while continuing to provide quick access to your microSD cards.
  • Great for anyone who likes having quick access to everything.
  • Five USB Drive slots for a backup everyday of the work week.
  • Makes a great gift, especially with 20 character custom message.

 

The technical stuff:

  • The VeeHub will be 3D printed to allow for customization.
  • The VeeHub will be made from ABS Plastic, the same high quality plastic used in LEGO® (If you've stepped on a LEGO® you know how strong ABS is).
  • The VeeHub will have 5 USB slots, 8 SD slots, and 11 microSD slots. 

Advantage of 3D printing is that each piece is made individually. This allows for continuous improvement so the final product’s design may differ but will retain 5 USB slots, 8 SD slots, and 11 microSD slots.

How the funds will be used:

The biggest advantage of 3D printing is that the start up cost is low while allowing flexibility to improve the product. Most of the funds will be used directly to obtain a 3D Printer and raw material. Balance part is for distribution costs.

We can provide special price for bulk orders of the VeeHub (with or without custom message).

One last thing:

If you do not want to pledge monetary then please do us a favor and spread the word to others.

story:
The Problem

I don't know about you, but I don't buy a new phone because I think it will look good in a case!

With most modern phones now having huge HD screens, we are all literally asking and paying for trouble.

It does not take much break a phone, and it takes even less to crack a screen!  

Did you know, the average person drops their phone once a week!

The information you store on your phones is unique to you! most of it is irreplaceable! One bad drop, and all your numbers, images, videos and music could be gone forever.


Our solution

Aesthetics (The looks) play a huge role in our choice of phone.

It makes no sense to cove it...

Our solution is to proved some protection whilst keeping the case size and weight to the absolute minimum! leaving  you to admire your new purchase.

It is public knowledge that the corners of a phone are the most vulnerable to damage.

Our design protects all 4 corners of your i-phone 5 and 5s with resilient plastic and impact reducing foam. 

Our innovative design creates a 1mm air gap around the entire phone, this gap has been tested to reduce the chances of scratching from grit and debris on surfaces and reduce dents and cracks from drops.

Our innovative corners will be available in a huge range of colors to suit your personality, or pick and mix each corner. corners use a 3M semi-permanent adhesive to attach solidly to each corner of the phone.


Where we are at

At Size Zero, we have taken advantage of the latest 3D printing technology.

Our 3D printers have changed the way we work forever. We now can conceive an idea and have it prototyped and tested by the end of the day.

With this new turn of speed, we have gone through over 50 designs before arriving at the current corner.

What your funding will go towards

  • help further develop our design.
  • Help pay for tooling.
  • Help pay for the first run of products. (for our backers)
  • Help pay for the development of packaging.
  • Pay for logistics to get our product to you.
  • Help continue the development for our new range.


About us!

Kit Kaye

Director / Designer

Qualifications

Ba Product Design (1st)

Masters Of Advanced Product Design (Distinction)

At the age of 23 years i have pushed myself... and i believe that i have achieved more than most. I have obtained a 1st class Ba honours degree in Product Design, a Masters of Advanced product design “with distinction”, i run a start-up company and currently work as the Chief Director of Design for an elite sports company “Rikoset”.

In my daily job, I lead the design process where we take products from their conception through the design and manufacturing phases to their final release for everyone to enjoy. This also involves a large exposure to all of other equally important factors involved in the release of a product. Because of this, I fully believe, with the experiences of the CORNERS team, my design education and role as Chief of Design, that we can easily bring corners to the market!

“Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.”


Mathew Aston

Director / Designer

Qualifications

Bsc Product Design (1st)

Ever since designing his first product as a 3 year old ( vacuum out of newspaper and empty bottles) Matt has been fascinated with good design and taking things apart to see how they work! Since graduating with a first-class honors degree in Product Design with Mechanical Engineering he has gone on to work for a top consumer electronics accessory company, designing some of the best gadgets on the market! It's through this experience  that has provided the knowledge, contacts and track record in taking a product to market!


Short Summary

With CORNERS we are confident that we can fulfill every backer within 2 months as we have the manufacturers with the tooling ready to go!

We have spent a lifetime testing different adhesives and we are confident that teaming up with 3M has provided the best solution.

This product will be smallest case on the market offering a full 360 degree protection for your phone!

Our corners, available in many colors, will provide some protection to your phone without the weight and bulk. The impact dampening  materials will lessen the damage caused by a drop and provide scratch deference from grit on flat surfaces.


Other Ways You Can Help

Don't worry if you cant pledge, you can help in other ways!

If you like corners please share our campaign with all your friends on Facebook and twitter.

story:
Do you want to control every moment of your 3D print with just a couple of click from your computer, tablet or smartphone? Sharebox 3D allows you to do this by connecting all your printers to your device without any cable!

Sharebox3D is the best tool to manage all your incredible 3D prints and thanks to your support we can realize it!


What is Sharebox3D?

Sharebox 3D is an external hardware that allows you to do a lot of different things with your 3D models and your 3D printer. It has wifi included so that you can control your prints anywhere you are. You can also share a .stl file with your friends while you're having a coffee or you can share it with your collegues during a business appointment.

For more info visit www.sharebox3d.com




Slicing

Sharebox 3D allows you to do the slicing of your stl from your smartphone, computer or tablet. You can work on your model anywhere you are, modifying the printing settings and sharing them with your friends or collegues. In a few words: thanks to Sharebox 3D you can generate a gcode file ready to be printed. And now...we know what you're thinking about...and the answer is  yes! You can also start your print. Once you've sliced, saved and shared your file, you can also start the print thanks to the wifi connection. You can print your object even if you are not in the office.

For more info visit www.sharebox3d.com


Compatibility


Sharebox 3D is fully compatible with any 3D printer and it is updated with all the new printers on the market thanks to its automatic updating system.


Control your 3D prints

Once the print starts, Sharebox3D will continue to help you; you can  control your print thanks to an integrated webcam: you can always supervise the printing process even if you are not near the 3D printer! You can do whatever you want without looking at your print because you can see how your work is going on with just a couple of clicks directly from your device! 


Moreover, a message on your smartphone or tablet will warn you when your print is over and communicate you any other information about the printing process. In addiction, if the print accidentally stops, Sharebox3D will inform you about the number of layers already printed so that you can start again the printing process from the right point.

For more info visit www.sharebox3d.com

How to support us

Sharebox 3D is not a smoky project: it's ready to be launched. We’ve already worked on it and now we have to pass from the planning phase to the production one. This is a great challenge: we want to give you the best tool for your prints using an easy plug&play hardware. However for these last steps we need your help!

You can help us in a lot of different ways. Share this campaign on your social network pages, talk about us with your friends and collegues: be part of the revolution!

Sharebox 3D is a tool which can change the way we think about the 3D printing world. It can give to thousands of people the possibility to discover this new fantastic world, taking part in a great cultural revolution. You are the protagonist, not the printer, because you are the person who creates the idea that is going to be printed: Sharebox3D allows you to unleash this creativity everywhere you are at any time. There is only one limit: your fantasy.

We are asking you to help us to free you ideas.


F.A.Q s

How can I understand when the print will be finished if I’m not near the printer?

Sharebox3D will warn you as soon as your print is finished sending you a message. You can relax on your sofa or  have a business appointment during the printing process because with just a couple of clicks you can control everything from your device. 

Do I have to make a cloud subscription?

No, you don’t. Sharebox3D is an external hardware and it doesn’t require a cloud subscritpion: once you’ve it, you can work from your device to improve your 3D prints from anywhere at anytime!

Do I need to update Sharebox 3D?

Sharebox3D has an automatic updating system so you can keep it up to date with any new printer on the market. You don’t have to download any update!

What does it mean "full compatibility"?

Sharebox3D has a full compatibility with every 3D printer that uses a Marlin firmware: this allows you to work with the majority of 3D printers on the market (like Ultimaker, Printrbot, Leapfrog, Prusa, Robo3D, Solidoodle, Witbox).
Sharebox3D can be used with a lot of different slicing softwares (both open source and professional) like Slic3r, Cura, Simplify3D and Replicator G.



Designed by Sharebot
We have a an important role inside the 3D printing world with our products: we have already launched three 3D printers dedicated to the consumer market and we've presented three others printers for professional users. Sharebox3D is the latest project that encloses our experience so that everyone can take part in the incoming revolution!
Visit the Sharebot website!
For more info about the campaign visit www.sharebox3d.com

There is only one limit: your fantasy.
We are asking you to help us to free you ideas.




F.A.Q s
How can I understand when the print will be finished if I’m not near the printer?
Sharebox3D will warn you as soon as your print is finished sending you a message. You can relax on your sofa or  have a business appointment during the printing process because with just a couple of clicks you can control everything from your device. 
Do I have to make a cloud subscription?
No, you don’t. Sharebox3D is an external hardware and it doesn’t require a cloud subscritpion: once you’ve it, you can work from your device to improve your 3D prints from anywhere at anytime!
Do I need to update Sharebox 3D?
Sharebox3D has an automatic updating system so you can keep it up to date with any new printer on the market. You don’t have to download any update!
What does it mean "full compatibility"?
Sharebox3D has a full compatibility with every 3D printer that uses a Marlin firmware: this allows you to work with the majority of 3D printers on the market (like Ultimaker, Printrbot, Leapfrog, Prusa, Robo3D, Solidoodle, Witbox).Sharebox3D can be used with a lot of different slicing softwares (both open source and professional) like Slic3r, Cura, Simplify3D and Replicator G.

Designed by SharebotWe have a an important role inside the 3D printing world with our products: we have already launched three 3D printers dedicated to the consumer market and we've presented three others printers for professional users. Sharebox3D is the latest project that encloses our experience so that everyone can take part in the incoming revolution!
Visit the Sharebot website!

For more info about the campaign visit www.sharebox3d.com

story:
What is this all about?

As part of the 501st Legion (biggest Star Wars costuming club worldwide) I wanted to do an imperial officer costume. Part of the costume are the so called “imperial code cylinders”. In the first three Star Wars movies (1977-1983) they used radiation dosimeters, but today these dosimeters are very rare and hard to come by and most of the time very expansive, so I thought about creating a replica and when I took the dimensions I realized that it had the perfect size for an USB-stick. In-universe the code cylinders are for data transportation and security codes – a perfect fit if you ask me!

About me & the project:

My Name is Andreas Laube and I’m from Germany. I’m part of the 501st Legion (biggest Star Wars costuming club worldwide) and a huge Star Wars Fan.

I just want to do this and already put much effort into this project, but I can’t do it all on my own. The molds for the stick and production-costs (almost all manufacturers start production at a minimum of 500 pieces when it comes to metal usb-sticks) are very expansive for one person alone and I just don’t have that amount of money at hand. So I asked my friends and members of the 501st Legion if they’d be interested in an USB-Stick like that and the feedback was very positive!


The last campaign didn't reach its goal, but I've received much positive feedback and many requests of trying it again over the last months. I've decided to wait a bit and see if I can lower the costs or upgrade the specifications of the sticks. And here we are... production costs have not changed, but we have an upgrade from USB 2.0 to USB 3.0 for the same price as well as the option to different capacities from 16GB to 64GB!

The USB-Sticks will be made of metal, with a functional clip and the size of the original dosimeters, just a bit shorter: 65mm (2.56”) long / 15mm (0.6”) in diameter [plus the clip]


Project-plan: I’ve arranged everything, so if we hit the goal I’ll let production start. This will most likely take about ~6 weeks, so I think I could ship the sticks till the end of Juky. If we don’t hit the goal, everybody gets their money back and nothing happens… :/

Perks: (please click on the image for a bigger Version to see everything)



All prices include shipping & handling! If you want to order more, just claim 2 perks or more of the sticks you want. indiegogo.com allows only 20 perks, so I couldn't list all the possibilities ;)

Other:
If I've forgotten anything or you have a question, feel free to ask!
Tell your friends & fans, use the share-buttons and spread the word ;)

story:
Be first and get one for a free!
First 5 contributors will get Booster for a FREE!

Firts 5 contributors will get it for a free only when campaign reach the goal.


Mobile Phone? -Yes!, Solar Charger? - Yes!, On your WRIST? - What?!


Booster

My story

The history of developing Booster is closely related to my smartphone. When I was traveling and I wanted to listen to music, connect to the Internet or even if I tried to use the GPS, my battery always got discharged very fast. So I started thinking how to increase the operating time of my phone. Of course, there were a lot of power banks or solar chargers in the market, that´s true. BUT. Each of them needs a recharging cable. As I am a forgetful man, that was absolutely nothing for me. Then I got the idea of making something similar to a watchband, but with a charging cable integrated to one of the bands.


Render from 3D model

 

In-built charging cable detailed view (patented)

The final prototypes of PCBA

 

Design

Booster is the first wrist solar charger, which can be also used as a power bank.
It can help you everywhere and every time you need to charge or boost you smartphone's battery.


Booster is not only a wrist solar charger or a fashion accessory, but primarily your personal rescuer in sudden situations when the battery in your smartphone is almost discharged and you have to make an important call, check the web or use the GPS urgently.


Booster is really the first one wrist solar charger, You can't find a similar product in any market around the world!



3D model black Booster

3D model pink Booster

Materials


Booster is made from harmless materials. The shell is made of zinc alloy with the surface plating "Black Nickel". This gives the impression of a really robust and strong case. Actually it is also good for the electronics inside, because it´s perfectly protected.

The shell is made of zinc alloy, thickness of walls 1.5mm

Bottom is made of stainless stell with 2mm thickness.

Bands are made from 100% silicone, this material is pleasant to touch.

Booster impact

Booster will give you the feeling of independence on the electricity and also a piece of certainty.

All of us can hardly imagine the life without a smartphone. Nevertheless, frequent using of the smartphone consumes the capacity of its battery.

Try to imagine a situation when your smartphone is completely discharged and you have no possibility to recharge it. I'm sure almost every owner of a smartphone knows this situation really well.

Now, the same situation, but try to imagine that this time you have Booster!

Try to answer yourself, can Booster help you to make an important call, send a text message or check anything on the website?

I'm convinced that Booster can help!
You will feel independent and free with having Booster.


Booster can be constantly worn on your wrist and due to in-built charge cable will be ready to charge you phone anytime and without any extra accessory!


Using Booster you can even decrease the emission of carbon dioxide due to high
You can also decrease emissions of carbon dioxide due to high effiency solar panel. Although the solar panel is not large, even a small one can help with eliminating the ecological footprint and keeping the Earth a nice place for living for the next generations.


How to use

Booster is designed to be worn on a wrist, it means that the only thing you have to do is to wear it. Booster recharges itself using a normal everyday lighting exposure. Or when you don't want to wait for charging it via sun rays you can also use a micro USB input on the side and recharge the internal battery from your PC, standart charger with micro usb connector.

Led diode next to micro USB input has double colour RED / BLUE.

Colours mean:

  •  RED - in-built battery is fully charged

  • BLUE - charging of in-built battery in progress

We can also provide a solution for those with other charging connector than micro USB.


Following list of included connectors:


  • Iphone 4 connector - micro USB
  • Nokia diam. 2mm - micro USB
  • Nokia diam. 3.5mm - micro USB
  • Samsung - micro USB
  • Mini USB - micro USB


Packaging box


For special product is needed special box

Specification

  • Solar panel - polycrystal 5.5V, 45mAh
  • Battery - Li-On 3.7V, 900mAh (nominal)
  • PCBA - Lead free
  • Weight - 125g
  • Dimension - 38x55x17.5mm

Booster doesn’t produce to atmosphere any gram of CO2 when is used under sun shine.
Total time for charging internal battery from external source is about 30minutes-2hours, depends on current from external charger.
Charging time for solar energy is about 30hour under sun-light to charge internal battery for full capacity or when is used for 3hours can increase stand-by mode of your phone up to 2days or 15minutes of call.

Why we need your support

I have spent lot of time designing, meeting suppliers discussing the details and prices. I did it al lafter my official job work time. Simultaneously I had to change my job, because the development and making of samples were expensive. I payed in total  +5000$ only for supplier´s payment.


At this time is everythink ready for mass production and assembly. I have agreed contracts with supplier. The assembly line and team are ready.

To tell the truth, more money is needed for starting the mass production. So that’s why I would like to ask you for support. In order to bring a product with no competitors into a market I need You!

Only together we can create something bigger!

Other Ways, You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can still help me to reach my goal!

  • Spread the word out and make some awareness about this campaign.

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools

Challenges


Booster was established as a pilot project of my life dream "Producing a unique product for final customer". Simultaneously it was tested if I can create product which doesn't has competitors in the market.


I hope that this is the only one product and more than one product with my signature will appear in the market in the near future.

Rewards


Booster plans and Timeline


After finishing the campaign on Indiegogo.com, 2 months for production and assembling will be needed.


Then we start sending Booster to contributors!

Spread the word out and make some awareness about this campaign.


Use the Indiegogo share tools

Simultaneously it was tested if I can create product which doesn't has competitors in the market.I hope that this is the only one product and more than one product with my signature will appear in the market in the near future.
