She's not happy, so she decides to drop the bread and come back later or just
buy from the seller alongside the road. Now here's where we come in. If she
could just have scanned a QR Code pasted on the Bread wrapper to pay, and show Shoprite
staff an e-receipt from us confirming her payment, she'd be good and happy.
2. 
Fatima is a Shoprite customer. She visits Shoprite
one busy Saturday and buys lots of items. Noticing that the queue at the
checkout point is long, she pulls out her phone, launches our app and scans the
QR Codes of all the items she has picked from the shelves. She immediately pays
and gets an e-receipt that she can show to the Shoprite staff as proof of
payment.
3.  John
loves movies. He sees a trailer on Youtube for a movie currently showing in the
Silverbird Cinemas and loves it instantly. But he's usually weary of the fact
that tickets for hit movies are hard to buy on location at the cinema because
of the long queues. So luckily for him, a QR Code is shown at the end of the
trailer he watched to enable him "Follow to pay". He pulls out his
mobile phone, scans the QR Code, pays for the movie, and gets an e-receipt
immediately to show as proof of payment. On getting to the cinema, he just
walks in, shows the receipt to the staff, and takes a seat to watch his
favorite movie.


THE STEPS


Pick an item off the shelf that you would like to buy and scan the qr code on the item to put it in a virtual cart. (Much like this:)

Pick other items like this one as you go on with your shopping.
When done, visit your cart in the app and make payments.
You get an e-receipt confirming that you have paid for these items.
Proceed to bag the items you have bought at designated points in the store.
On your way out, present the e-receipt to the store staff so they can confirm your payment and update their records.

And that's it. You're done. That simple. No queuing. All self-service. That's what we envision.



WHERE WE ARE

 We are currently on a beta testing stage. We just launched the base for our payments system. It features making qr codes for various activities on the web and how that would be helpful for a "buying" or "paying" activity. We have activities like  "Like on Facebook", "Follow on Twitter", "Watch on Youtube" etc. currently on the site.
This funding would enable us to establish ourselves as a proper company, hire staff to help with other software integration issues, and ensure that we move fast enough to get ahead of competitors and other big companies trying to get it this space.
Sample QR code designs




Scan any of those codes to test it.
Visit our site to see more




YOU CAN CONTRIBUTEEach dollar you contribute to our project would help bring the Knitle reality into a better one. As you may have figured out, this idea isn't only helpful here at home in Nigeria but it can be applied worldwide. So you helping us, would mean we can expand and you'd be able to get this awesome self-service shopping soonest in your area.
See the side bar for perks that can encourage you to contribute and get some usefulness for your money in the mean time.

HOW YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS WOULD BE USED

$10k would go into getting proper office spaces.
While we are superstars at software development (yes we are :)), we need extra help with a lot of other logistics. So another $15k would go into hiring top talent in the country, relocating them to our city, and ensuring their salary payments for at least a year.
$10k would go into launching our payments portal, its marketing, and customer acquisition.
Believe you me, that's about what we need. The remainder $15k would be kept for unforeseen challenges. We can't escape them, and they would always come because, hello, this is Nigeria.


ABOUT US

We are young people from Nigeria just trying to do something worth writing about. We happened to have attended and met at Covenant University, Nigeria, one of the best universities in Nigeria, and there we sparked our entrepreneurial drive.


CONCLUSION
We are sorry if all of your questions are not answered, and we know they aren't. We are basically engineers and totally new to this. This was tasking in itself and all we want to do is make great products. If you believe in this and are willing to overlook our seeming weakness, please back us in this campaign. Thanks a lot for understanding.

Knitle Team.

story:
The Idea

My Moto Mod™ candidate is there to tackle one major problem ; to get rid of the frustration of untangling your earphones every time you use them. We all have experienced that situation when we see a ball of wires instead of our earphones. Worst case, they might even have broken. In addition, you don't need to carry separate earphones whenever you go out.

For this, we have created the EarMods, the perfect companion for your Moto Z smartphone. The case has built-in earphones with retractable wires, so they always stay inside, protected. Even if you do not own a Moto Z smartphone, we have an option for you too. The mod also has a headphone jack if you want to plug in your own headphones, and a 1000 mAh battery to keep you going all day.  The mod and phone can also stand on the side  using a built-in stand.

The EarMods lite version has 2 headphone jacks instead of one, so you can watch a movie or listen to music with your friends. this, too has a 1000 mAh battery,  but it does not have built-in earphones. 

For a limited number of people, we would make custom EarMod cases for their smartphone which work by the audio jack or bluetooth.

Never carry earphones again

  • The EarMods have built-in earphones that can be pulled out easily.
  • When not in use, they stay inside the case, protected and concealed.
  • The wires can go back in with just a push of a button.
  • The mod is connected to your Moto Z with magnetic connectors on the back.
  • The earphones inside do not need a dedicated app to be used, and can be used as soon as you connect the mod.
  • The mod also has an extra battery and headphone jack.

Design

The EarMods is made to be as thin as possible. The back looks a little bit like a camera grip, with the bottom part slightly bulging out to make space for the retractible earphones.  The back has soft touch material and a glossy stripe.

We have 3 base colours in the beginning. 

Black

 

White and Grey

Grey and Black

EarMods Lite

We have made another version of EarMods, the EarMods lite. This version is much thinner as it does not have built'in earphones. It has 2 headphone jacks instead of one, and it, too has an additional 1000 mAh battery. The mod and phone can also stand on the side  using a built-in stand.

The EarMods lite will be around 5 mm thick.

If you want it top have a storage for your earphones, you can get a storage add-on by adding $5 to your pledge ( only for EarMods lite). The add-on will attach with ease using magnets and pins, and can be removed whenever you like. The proposed thickness for the add-on is 9-10 mm, but it may vary.

I

To reduce the thickness of the storage add-on, the EarMods lite will have a removable compartment to accommodate the earbuds easily. The compartment and its cover can be seen in the picture below.

Customisation

For an additional $10, we will make the back cover of your choice of colour or design. Just choose the Customisation perk along with your EarMods.

Also, for a limited number of backers, we will make a custom EarMods  case for your smartphone. This will not have additional battery of headphone jack.

 

The Impact

  • We are a finalist in the Transform the Smartphone challenge, and we need your support to advance and make this product a reality.
  • With your love and support, the EarMods will be in the market soon.

Timeline

November 2016 : Chosen as a finalist in Transform the Smartphone Challenge.

December 2016: Design and early testing

January 2017: Received the development hardware

February 2017: Launched Indiegogo campaign.

February 2017: Prototype complete.

April 2017: Campaign ends.

November 2017: Delivery of EarMods.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our campaign link with your friends ans family on social media to help us!

EarMods, a Moto ModsTM concept for Moto Z smartphones.”“*Moto Mods™ is a trademark of Motorola Trademark Holdings, LLC.

Moto Mods™ snap onto any Moto Z to give it a whole new superpower. They transform your phone allowing it to do things other phones can’t. To learn more visit www.motomods.com .

story:
DISPELLING MYTHS ABOUT MAGNETS.

There's a misperception that magnets harm phones. That is simply not the case. Neodymium magnets are widely used within electronic devices and do not interfere with phone reception or any other phone functions. Apple iPhone and Android devices use NAND flash memory, which is immune to magnets.

 

Designed for joy rides, to-work rides, coffee-shop rides, hard-core rides and all other rides.

 

As easy as 1, 2.

1). Use an allen key to remove stem cap bolt & cap

2). Place phone mount in position. Insert bolt and tighten.

 

FORM

At F3 Cycling, the premise of form follows function is what drives us. True to this principle, our Phone Mount's aesthetics are sleek and minimalistic. Practically becoming one with the bike.

 

FUNCTION

 

1). The interface uses 4 neodymium magnets that are 100% safe for your phone. They create a strong bond, yet provide an effortless release with our patent-pending twist & lift design. Plus, the larger surface area gives stability vs. small connection of quarter turn phone mounts

2). Multiple choice decision. Position A puts your phone directly over the stem in a more out front viewing position. Position B moves your phone back and offers more extreme angling adjustability. This position must also be used with steep upright stems.

3). Docks your phone in portrait or landscape mode. Change positions on the fly in seconds.

4). Adjustability to angle your phone to your preferred viewing position.

5). Large device mounting. If you're one of those fanatics who trains inside when it's not so nice outside, mount an iPad and load your favorite training software where the conditions are perfect year round or binge watch your favorite TV show. NOTE: our mount is not designed to use large devices for outdoor riding.

6). We use 3M's strongest grade adhesive (for these type of applications) to bond our ultra-thin case plate to your phone case. 4 symmetrically placed circular protrusions enable phone docking, then allowing a twist to raise motion for undocking. The purposeful ergonomic case plate design feels nice to the touch, yet is barely noticeable when not using it. 

NOTE: case plate application guidelines must be strictly adhered to. Packaging comes with detailed instructions and our website has a how-to video.    

7). Some computer brands and other electronics come with tethers. So, we created a tether like no other.  A few revolutions takes it on or off in seconds. We recommend using it at all times, but after watching Mike bomb down railroad tracks at 17mph, it's doubtful you'll feel the need.

 

Many riders want to use a phone and GPS. We've got you covered as our Phone Mount works beautifully in tandem with our FormMount mounting system. You can even add a GoPro or light. There is no cleaner solution to offer a bicycle more devices and less clutter.

 

A matter of safety. Reflectors, bells or lights are one thing, but today's large smart phones can take up a lot of real estate. Space better served for things like your hands. Another safety feature of stem cap mounting is how it positions your phone in the center of your line of sight.

 

Biking with your phone displayed has become commonplace. More and more companies (and crowdsourcing campaigns) are trying to keep up with the demand. While we want our campaign to focus on the virtues of our mount, the comparisons are worth mentioning. It won't take much online browsing time to discover these facts for yourselves.

Many mounts out there today are not very user friendly in terms of how they affix to handlebars and/or lock your phone into some sort of clamping mechanism, with many of the designs using a rubberized material to hold your pricey phone in place. This makes for a clunky look, questionable phone security and it takes up precious handlebar space.

That said, there are a few nice looking mounts that also that attach your phone easily. The problem is some of those require the use of specific phone cases that can bring the total package cost to well over $100 and limiting you to that company's case design. Some even use a magnet interface, but they have well documented performance issues.

 

 - Dual position angle adjustable mount. 

 - 7" braided Nylon tether and black anodized aluminum anchor with stainless steel threads

 - Black powder coated steel case side plate, with 3M VHB adhesive

 - M6 x 30mm A4 stainless steel cap bolt.

 - Alcohol prep pad.

 - 10% Discount card for sitewide savings at f3cycling.com

 

What you say about yourself can often pale in comparison to what others say about you. Here's a representation of just some of the kudos we received during and after our 2016 FormMount Indiegogo and Kickstarter campaigns.

We also urge you to visit f3cycling.com and read customer testimonials.

 

We were diligent with updates during our first campaign. This time around will be no different. You will be kept informed every step of the way.

As a company, we at F3 pride ourselves on giving the same level of detailed attention to our customers as we do our products. We strive to not only meet, but exceed customer expectations. We're proud of the acknowledgments to that point posted all over social media.

 

 

We believe best in class products are made all over the world. We just didn’t want to make our products all over the world. Yes, for the pride of keeping it close to our hearts, but equally if not more importantly, close to our minds. We believe outsourced manufacturing hinders the creative process. And that thinking shouldn’t stop when production starts. We believe innovating is advanced by freedom. Freedom to adapt on the fly to scrutinize every nuance. Test. Then scrutinize every nuance again. Those nuances are what it takes to create a product in which we truly believe. 

 

Making things, and making things well for a discerning customer base is not for the faint of heart. It is expensive and decisions have to be made timely throughout the design, tooling, manufacturing and fulfillment processes. That said, we deeply understand the process.

Goal:  The cleanest looking phone mount designs incorporate the use of magnets, but there are very few magnetic designs currently available. The ones out there today fall short in regards to holding power and reliability. So our goal was to change this by designing a magnetic retaining system that was powerful and reliable. With aesthetics that are clean and minimalistic, where form truly does follow function. A design that would fit onto virtually any bike with a 1 1/8” thread-less steering system, which is the overwhelming majority of bicycles built within the last 25 years. AND, it had to be easy enough for anyone to install and use with confidence. We are proud to say that we have achieved this goal with our stem cap phone mount.

Materials.

Our Mount is injection molded entirely out of 40% Carbon Fiber Filled Nylon 6/6. We use this material for its strength, durability, light weight, and stiffness and beauty. The hinge bolt and nut are made out of 316 Stainless Steel, chosen for its superior corrosion resistance.

 

 

Parts: Base and Magnets.

It's form follows the needed geometry requirements to house four, .500” diameter by .375” long magnets. We are using the strongest magnets currently available, Rare Earth Neodymium, in the strongest grade, N52. These four magnets are positioned to the far corners of our mount, to offer us the greatest mechanical advantage available from our wide and flat platform like base. Our mount base geometry, magnet positioning, and Neodymium strength are all working together to give us the holding power and dynamic stability we require. 

Parts: Case Side Plate.

We didn’t want to lock customers into buying a uniquely designed proprietary case. Also, from a manufacturing and price point standpoint, we did not want to create multiple case designs to fit ever changing, multiple phone models. This wouldn’t be economically feasible with our “Made in America” approach to manufacturing. So, we designed a powder coated metal plate, that attaches to compatible phone cases with an industrial strength adhesive made by 3M. This 3M VHB adhesive is a 5900 series that is industry standard, specifically designed for adhering to a broad spectrum of hard to bond surfaces, including powder coating.

Three-Fold Case Plate Challenge.

1) Make it thin enough to be as unobtrusive as possible, yet thick enough to achieve the magnetic saturation needed to meet our holding power requirements. The magic number was .060” thick.

2) Design a docking feature that positions the phone in portrait or landscape while also aiding to overcome the high pull force of the Neo magnets. The solution, four symmetrically placed circular protrusions that allow the phone to undock with a simple twist and lift motion due to the air gap created as the geometry of the design lifts the plate away from the base during the rotation.

3) Attach it to the phone case reliably - Achieved using 3M VHB 5900 series acrylic adhesive, an industry gold standard.

 

We created the phone component for FormMount, which gave us a design, tooling and manufacturing leg-up on getting our Stem Cap Phone Mount to market. It uses the magnets, case plate, tether anchor and tether from our phone component, so we have that manufacturing process already in place. Our local molder for the stem cap version is ready to go and has a manufacturing timeline that allows us to be confident enough to ship in July. Our hardware vendor and packaging vendors are all set with everything ready to launch.

 

 

Risks and challenges

We have planned well to get our Stem Cap Phone Mount to market timely and to specifications that meet our stringent demands. Manufacturing and real world performance is one of the biggest challenges for most crowdsourced products. In our case, as detailed above, the risk has all but been eliminated and our successful Kickstarter campaign has brought us to Indiegogo to continue getting the good word out for this customer requested design.  We are ready and excited to get FormMount Phone to you.  

 

Here's a great cycling product that keeps your focus on the road and your hands on the handlebar.

 Hey Backers,

We too are backers. Getting as excited about other products as we hope you get about ours. Of course, we are especially attentive to other imaginative cycling products. This one really caught our attention because it aligns so closely with one of our primary demographics: bike commuters.

Like FormMount phone, this high visibility jacket combines beautiful aesthetics and unparalleled functionality with an emphasis on increasing safety for commuters. We highly recommend checking it out. You won’t be disappointed.

-Mike, Tim & Frank.

Urban Circus is a high-visibility, waterproof and reversible jacket made specifically for urban riders and bike commuters. The idea was born out of a lack of diversity on the market and the necessity for a cycling jacket that is highly-visible, highly-functional but also looks great! After a year of development, the first Urban Circus jacket was successfully launched in 2014! Today, their newest collection is made from a fabric comparable to Gore Tex, it's unisex, ESO certified, reflective & fluorescent, waterproof, breathable and windproof! For more information, visit the Kickstarter page.

Urban Circus- When safety and visibility is on-par with design and comfort!

Getting as excited about other products as we hope you get about ours. Of course, we are especially attentive to other imaginative cycling products. This one really caught our attention because it aligns so closely with one of our primary demographics: bike commuters.Like FormMount phone, this high visibility jacket combines beautiful aesthetics and unparalleled functionality with an emphasis on increasing safety for commuters. We highly recommend checking it out. You won’t be disappointed.-Mike, Tim & Frank.Urban Circus is a high-visibility, waterproof and reversible jacket made specifically for urban riders and bike commuters. The idea was born out of a lack of diversity on the market and the necessity for a cycling jacket that is highly-visible, highly-functional but also looks great! After a year of development, the first Urban Circus jacket was successfully launched in 2014! Today, their newest collection is made from a fabric comparable to Gore Tex, it's unisex, ESO certified, reflective & fluorescent, waterproof, breathable and windproof! For more information, visit the Kickstarter page.Urban Circus- When safety and visibility is on-par with design and comfort!

story:
Due to taxes, indiegogo fees and paypal fees, I will need to raise 5500000 on flexible funding, 3005000 on fixed funding.

This project has been abandoned due to not having done the much needed preparation prior to launching the campaign.
Donate if you want, will probably just use it to fund marketing for a future campaign.

Until a future campaign, I will work on preperations, assembling team and so forth.

story:
After several months analyzing and shaping our concept, we reached a viable solution: selling mobile plans and sharing profits.

This company will be running on one of the largest carriers in the U.S., aiming to ensure that we can provide excellent quality service, but also make the life of our customers better.


How does it work?

Be our client enjoying our plans, invite your friends to our company and save money with us, improving your financial life!


How this can improve your financial life? It's easy! When your friends, or any friend of your friend* pay the monthly plan, you earn up to 10%** of the plan cost (without taxes or fees of your state).
*Up to your six generation;
**Percentage applied in the total of the six generations.


How we do it? While other carriers spend millions of dollars on billboards, TV commercials and retail locations, we spend that money in the most powerful advertising, our customers!


What can you do with these earnings?



What will be the type of Plans and Conditions?

We will have PREPAID Plans with NO CONTRACT:
     - Limited voice and text with limited data;
     - Unlimited voice, text and limited data

What are our objectives?


Where it goes the Funding?


When will our project take place?


Where will our project take place?


Will start in U.S.!

We know that are many non U.S. residents that can be interested in this company, but at this moment we can’t start at the same time in other country. If you really like and believe in this project, help us to reach our goal, because we want to expand this concept to other countries, with forecast for 2016 and we will have you in consideration.


Why are we raising funds?

We are working in this company since the beginning of the year and now we need your help.

We believe this project will make the difference, because through a product used more and more daily, we will create the opportunity to have best equipment’s, services and at same time improve the financial quality of our customers.

Remember: This campaign is "Fixed Funding", so if the campaign don't reach the goal, your funding will be refund directly from Indiegogo.

Why should you support us?


How can people get involved?

There are two great ways to help us even more:
     - Share this campaign with your friends on social networks;
     - Send us your feedback and be part of your history.

How we can help other Crowdfunding Campaigns?

We will invest 10% of our 1º year profits in others Crowdfunding Campaigns.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Perks

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQs?

Who can I contact you directly?
     - You can send us a e-mail: project.mobile.us@gmail.com
     - Contact us through our website: ProjectMobileUs
     - Or even through the comments here in Indiegogo

How can I make suggestion of the brand?
After funding us you will receive an e-mail with the link of the form. This form will be available until the end of campaign. The voting will occur between 1 and 31 October, 2014.

How can I choose the charity to donation?
After funding us (one of the packs) you will receive an email with the link for voting. The charity with more votes will receive the donation (only will happen if the campaign reach at least 100% funding).

How do I sign up?
Simple, contribute with one of our plans now and start changing your life sharing this opportunity to your friends.

How many friends can I have?
You can have unlimited friends, that will be in your first generation.

If I fund after any referred funder by me, they will be in my 1st generation?
Unfortunately no. You only will have in your 1st generation, funders after you.

I fund a Plan perk, but not paid the rest during November, 2014. What happens?
Unfortunately we cannot provide the perk.

Can I get a refund for my contribution?
Contributions are not refundable (except if you didn't have our Network). All contributions go toward bringing this company to life. Please see the Indiegogo Terms of Use for more details.

What will be the type of network?
We will operate on the same nationwide 4G Network used by one of the largest carriers in the U.S. and we only can reveal in 1 November, 2014 (at this moment we cannot reveal what would be the carrier with we will work, because of the NDA - Non Disclosure Agreement).

I fund a Plan perk, but if the Carrier with you will work doesn't is available what I can do?
If in your home don't have Network, all Plan values you paid will be refund!

What type of phone will work?
All unlocked GSM Phones or the phones that work in the carrier we will be running (at this moment we cannot reveal what would be the carrier with we will work, because of the NDA - Non Disclosure Agreement).

Can I change and keep my phone number?
Yes it's possible. You only need to request “porting” your number in the activation process. This will be only available in the end of December, 2014 to Indiegogo funders, and after January, 2015 to new clients in that date.

I’m in a contract with other carrier, what can I do?
First you need to know when your contract ends with your carrier. If this occurs before January, 2015 you can change right way and start changing your life funding us. If your contract ends after January, 2015 you need to see what are your benefits in changing to us, not only looking for the price plans, but also looking at the potential earnings.

Can I make International Long  Distance Calls?
Yes you can!

What's the Service Availability conditions?
We will have a Coverage maps, only to approximate the anticipated wireless coverage area outdoors. The Service area, coverage and quality may vary and change without notice depending on a variety of factors including network capacity, terrain and weather. Outages and interruptions in Service may occur, and speed of Service can varies (like the others companies).

How can I pay my service?
You will have three ways to pay it:
     -  Pay through your Credit/Debit Card;
     -  Autopay through your personal account (using your available earnings);
     -  Use gifts coupons generated by other customers.

How will be the Support Service?
We will have Support through our Customer Care Department, by calling or Email.

story:
After years driving RC cars and building robots, we've taken everything we've learned and created an RC board capable of unique features for such small car. 

It can run fast and drift as well as performs fast break. If you don’t have skills to control so much power, just adjust the regulator to reduce power output and enjoy smooth rides.



          Testing Fast Brake

Nowadays kids spend so much time stick to smartphones and tablets that they forget what is to be outside and play with friends. We know that we can’t get rid of children’s technology addiction but we can give encouragement to get outside a play with friends.

 WFC is easy to use and comes ready to go. Most importantly, it is incredibly fun to ride.


                                       Fast Connect


WFC Features

We develop the “brains” of the RC car, and it is applicable for many sizes a variety of RC vehicle. If you are wondering why we only work with 1:24 scale, it’s simple, we believe 1:24 RC car are small enough to ride at home and don’t provoke major damage to your house but also isn’t too small to drive outdoor.

                    Windows Interface                                  IOS/Android Interface

We've designed WFC to be ultra-portable and durable. The form factor is small enough to fit in your backpack.  

Our goal is to make the easiest, most intuitive control system possible. We have embraced the latest emerging Wi-Fi standards so you have access to the fastest response possible and efficient energy management.

Depending at the model you can expect:

  • Distance: Capable of 100m (more than 100 yards)
  • Mass: 300 g (with battery) 
  • Top Speed: 14km/h (3,9 m/s) 
  • 0 to Top Speed: 3s 
  • Run Time: 30 min
  • Included Batteries/Charger: 3 x AA Ni-MH + charger (included)
  • Optional (20$) Battery/Charger: 2 x li-ion cell + charger (included)


We developed innovative and unique solutions. This is done by maintaining state of the art design and functionality, whilst encompassing high quality electronic materials with the latest Wi-Fi technologies.

Are you a developer?

If you are a developer and like to program, we left serial port open so you can give WFC to do tasks or personalize it. You just need a computer and 3.3v serial programmer. With this you can transform a RC car in a robot in seconds.

Manufacture

We now believe we have the final revision of the electronics and software. Manufacture is now ready to produce. We do not anticipate having to make any changes to the design, the timescales for our Rewards allow for us to make several more revisions. We test our electronics to the limits and it performed very well.

Models Available

Why you only see 2 models in the video?

We prepared this two prototypes from dealer samples, but they are too expensive to buy separately. The RC cars we select are 100% compatible with our electronics.

 RS 4 model that you see in the video isn’t available because unfortunately this model have no lateral “glass”, and it leaves exposed electronics, so we prefer to offer you more reliable solution.

                                  Some Prototypes Involved


Team 

Our team is constituted with three computer and telecommunication engineers, but it’s not limited to us. Many friends help us getting the ideas, also we have support from university were we graduated. We have developed lots of robots for school projects, we have worked as a team for long time now, and we believe we have the right skills and the right contacts to make products for everyone.


At the moment we are working in a garage, but we have hope that our ideas become a reality. With your support we will be able to move to better facilities and create more projects to entertain and simplify your life. We have the skills, we just need an opportunity.

Risks and challenges

We’ve been developing WFC software and hardware for the past year, and we’ve been testing our latest hardware prototype for the past 4 months. Everything already performs excellently, and is capable of doing everything that we have described. 
That just leaves the usual things that might go wrong during manufacturing. We have been in contact with two separate companies that can produce the boards. And one company that can provide excellent RC cars, in short time. They are just waiting for the green light.

story:
What is Suitch?

Last year my brother and I created a startup focusing on developing devices with internet capabilities and technology products for the internet of things so from then Suitch was born.


Suitch is a wireless enabled socket that allows you to convert your current home and office devices into internet enabled things by putting Suitch between your wall outlet and the device plug.
The project evolved through several phases, firstly it was a single interface which allowed making a phone call and execute some commands in a server as a search engine with voice recognition. We quickly added extra applications with features such as saving data in evernote, publishing on twitter and publishing on facebook, using the phone call or by calling from skype. Some of these features were in development phase when we introduce them in some hackathons such as http://www.opendatamty.org/ and by winning the second place at the Angel Hack Monterrey 2013 edition.
Till that moment we were paying a bunch of servers to start knowing the best telephone provider out there and to be able to create our little virtual assistant, this took us a couple of months and of course some extra funds in investment to test voice codecs, response latency and well we ended several times the RAM of these machines and yeah they crashed, so these took us again to the beginning and we had to redo the code several times as a consequence we also had to do extra jobs to pay our own servers.

Since then we had to focus on our own project which consists of three major platforms that make it work.


a) Build a server to connect electronics for the internet of things, this server should notify via your favourite messenger (facebook messenger, hangouts messenger or telegram messenger) in an easy way. Besides this server should be able to recognize voice commands when making a phone call or using skype in natural human communication.

b) Design and build a simple dashboard to visualize in a friendly manner connected devices and the spoken commands. Using the dashboard you will be able to review in real time the status of the devices and execute actions from the dashboard directly on the connected Suitch.

c) Design a device with persistent internet connection which can turn on and turn off other devices from house and office while using the dashboard and by calling from a common landline and skype as well.


Earthquake notification

We know there are a lot of devices which are very useful in your daily life, but they are not connected to internet or they don't have characteristics to use them from your smartphone.

We have been working in the last couple of weeks with many of the main sismological agencies to add features to Suitch to disconnect itself when it detects an incoming earthquake some seconds before they even hit your zone in order to avoid more disasters.

Suitch works to control your devices using voice commands and text. You can also configure the server to notify you via email, facebook, telegram and hangout messenger. Additionally Suitch can be paired together with applications such as Gmail and Evernote to use the system as a small virtual assistant.

Prototypes status

The prototypes are now ready, from the server to the Suitch devices and in order to continue with our project we will use the funds to start producing the first units commercially available. 


We are currently moving our main servers which keep the service alive into cloud servers, this allows us to offer almost full time service, nearly 99% of uptime inherited from the cloud service and obviously load balancing. When you support with your pledge we will be able to have better access to tooling, and better server providers.

Our work schedule

We will be producing first the electronic stuff, because we already have identified our providers and we are ready to give them the order to start producing our PCBs. We will be contacting them 3 days after we receive the money from indiegogo, this will be done this way to end up any documents or legal papers we need to provide as a result of the money transfer.


We know the PCB production will last from 3 to 6 weeks depending on the amount of PCBs to produce but we will be doing other tasks in parallel.
Our electronics provider is already identified and also waiting for the order to start shipping, they will be contacted 7 days after receiving the money from indiegogo. The delivery time for these providers would be between 5 to 8 weeks after placing the order with them. Because we would try to place a medium order we might have to wait a little bit longer for them to finish electronics production. In case we see we need to alter our schedule, we will notify you with time.
Enclosure production will start 5 weeks after receiving the funds, because the needed plastics to produce them would take some time to arrive at our place. The production of the enclosures would take from 4 to 7 weeks and they will be 3D printed, one of our goals is to be able to mass produce everything in molds, we already have identified a provider for this, we will notify you if our provider lowers the price to produce using molds from them.


It is clear that we not only need to fundraise but we also need some personnel to fulfill the needs of our project in its production state. We will be making some interviews and hire 2 or 3 people to help us out with quality control test, soldering, assembling, packaging and finally shipping. The packaging, handling, shipping and logistics is already analyzed and we are now closing allianses with some shipping companies to streamline the process.

With the teamwork we will be putting together, at the end of receiving all the pieces and electronics from our providers we will be performing quality test on every piece received from our providers with the aim of identifying or exchanging any damage on them.


The assembling of Suitch will start 10 days after ending with the production of the enclosure and of course running quality tests on them, every Suitch will be tested individually. Because every Suitch needs some love, finishing all the units might take from 2 to 4 weeks to start shipping.

Shipping and delivering

Our final stage will be making the site public to everyone and we will close beta tests so that everyone will be able to start using their accounts. We will send you notification on your package being sent out.

Your support means a lot to us!

There is no small or big support, just the action itself for us means a lot, we have worked long months to publish this project, so we want to thank you for your support and for giving us the chance to deliver this amazing product to you.

With the teamwork we will be putting together, at the end of receiving all the pieces and electronics from our providers we will be performing quality test on every piece received from our providers with the aim of identifying or exchanging any damage on them.


The assembling of Suitch will start 10 days after ending with the production of the enclosure and of course running quality tests on them, every Suitch will be tested individually. Because every Suitch needs some love, finishing all the units might take from 2 to 4 weeks to start shipping.
Shipping and deliveringOur final stage will be making the site public to everyone and we will close beta tests so that everyone will be able to start using their accounts. We will send you notification on your package being sent out.Your support means a lot to us!There is no small or big support, just the action itself for us means a lot, we have worked long months to publish this project, so we want to thank you for your support and for giving us the chance to deliver this amazing product to you.

story:
Trak-Off Designs, Inc

Let me introduce the Trak-Off cell phone case.  The video really explains it all, so if you haven't watched it yet, please do.  (Tami and I will wait...)

All done?  Good.  As I said, the Trak-Off case design is simple, but the problem it solves is complex.  Cell phones have changed the world and nearly all of us rely on them for work, family and fun.  The downside is they have collected data about us and our lives that, with a little work, is available to anyone who wants it.   When we're using our phone there isn't much that can be done about that, but why leave that data flying around when you aren't using your phone?  

 

Tell 'em to Trak-Off.

Put yourself back in control of your data.  Once your phone is inside the case you cannot be tracked, and your data is not available to data snoops.  The Trak-Off cell phone case is a product for the millions of cell phone users across the world who object to cell phone tracking whether by businesses, municipalities, governments or individuals.  

Tami and I... (I'm Art by the way. Nice to meet you.) Tami and I formed Trak-Off Designs, Inc. just a few months ago.  (No easy task in California.) Our goal is to successfully manufacture, market and sell this product.  We have had a number of wonderful business advisers to help us avoid the obvious pitfalls.  We have a plan for handling company growth from initial manufacturing to full fledged intergalactic domination.  (That's a thing, right?)

    The general idea of the Trak-Off cell phone case is to block all communication to and from the cell phone.  This not only prevents GPS tracking, but also blocks emails, texts and calls just as if the phone was off. 

It also has the benefit of preventing your phone's background data leakage as it talks to all the nearby networks: sharing location information, past WiFi connections and lots of other assorted metadata.  (Your phone is very gregarious even when you are not. It's like that annoying guy at the party who won't stop talking about himself.)

Reclaim your privacy

For the user a key part of the design is convenience.  Don't want to be bothered in a business meeting, at the movies, or while at lunch?  In less than two seconds the phone can be secured in the Trak-Off case and the user has instant privacy.

This is far faster than powering down the phone and can be reversed just as quickly. The Trak-Off case is also a phone case and provides the basic protection to the phone and screen that any such case provides. The premise of the Trak-Off case is simple: a portable, attractive cell phone case for blocking all communication to and from the cell phone.  There is no other cell phone case with this functionality.  

Help us help you help us bring this product to market.  (You know what we mean.)     

           

About Us

Tami and I have been marriage partners for almost 30 years and have been through many adventures together.  From raising kids to raising cats, dogs and chickens, life is a learning experience.  (Hint: raising chickens is a lot easier than raising kids.)  We've had several small business adventures along the way as well.  Though none were a runaway success, we didn't lose money on them either.  (Now that is a ringing endorsement!) 

This is a bigger project than anything we have done previously.  That's why we have spent so much time laying the groundwork trying to get everything right from the get go.  I have been a science and technology teacher for the last 25 years.  (If you had a great experience in school then I'm on a good footing here, if not then just pretend you didn't read that last sentence.  Or the next one.) As a teacher I've been involved in some big projects  over the years.  I'm good with big projects, sometimes working with budgets of as much as a hundred thousand dollars to set up and implement new programs. 

Science and technology has been my training and my passion for as long as I can remember.  We have followed with interest over the last few years the rise of the smart phone.  We have been fascinated with the way it has changed our world and the way that we as humans interact.  We have also watched as everyone from local police departments to government agencies to big business has been caught with their hand in the information cookie jar. 

We have a solution.

We want Trak-Off Designs, Inc. to succeed.  Not just because we have even bigger ideas.  Not just because we have put our heart and soul into this this year, but because we truly want this product out there for the consumer.  We are big fans of personal choice: the more solutions to a problem the better.  The Trak-Off phone case is one small part of that.  Not to mention that we have the coolest logo and corporate slogan ever invented and it would be a shame to see that fade away.  (Tell 'em to Trak-Off.  I would love to see that on billboards, banner ads, and television commercials.)

Just think about it:  by contributing to the Trak-Off campaign you will have saved the data of millions of registered voters.  Well maybe not saved exactly, but at least saved it from falling into a data snoop's hands.

Check out our timeline (past, present and future) for an idea of where we've been and where we're going.  From our 2014 patent application to the 2016 opening of our mega manufacturing facility, it's all here.

(See the full size timeline on Facebook)


The details

Breaking it down:

We've been through the numbers and we need about $26,000 to get this project off the ground in a small-sized way.  We have set this amount (plus the Indiegogo cut, plus the 20% perk costs) as the minimum necessary.  If we don't reach our goal all your generous donations will be refunded. More money and we can go bigger.

  • Die cut press-  We aren't getting anywhere without one of these magic devices to cut massive amounts of Trak-Off cases in less time than it took me to write this sentence.  They cost from $3,000 at the low end to upwards of $100,000.  We can get by initially with the fully manual $3,000 model.
  • Box X/Tacking  sewing machine:  This is essential for being able to stitch the webbing to the case as quickly as possible.  Time is money here.  There are three box-X stitches and  two tacks on every Trak-Off case.  These are time consuming if done by hand.   Not counting delivery, programming and set-up costs this beauty runs about $6,000.
  • Heat Cutter- This device cuts the webbing in as perfect a way as can be done.  Totally professional.  This one's a bargain at about $200.
  • Trak-Off website- I have designed websites before, but this needs to be... well it needs to be good and it needs to be fully functional from the first order.  Prices vary, but I'm setting aside $1,000 for this,  We already have the www.trakoff.com domain name.
  • Trak-Off case fabric (vinyl shell, fabric liner, webbing, etc.) - Our cost estimate put his at right around $5.50 per Trak-Off phone case.  Of course all the parts and pieces come in different size packs and rolls but for our initial run of 2,000 units this comes in at $11,000.  We truly believe the market for this is in the millions worldwide, but we're big enough to start small.  Again if we surpass our goal we can go bigger on the initial run.
  • The little Trak-Off fabric tags- These babies run almost $1 apiece believe it or not.  That's a whopping $2,000 for our first run.
  • Slide Case Package - The artwork for these has already been designed.  If you watched the video you got a good look at both sides of this.  Including set-up and shipping these run about 60 cents each in lots of 3,000.  That's $1,800 for the first run of 2,000 units with 1,000 packages left over for the second run.
  • Perks- (That's you.)  Of course we have no way of knowing what level people will support us at, but our estimates across all levels - accounting for more support at lower levels is:  about 20% of the crowdfunded amount will be used to fulfill the perks.  This includes product costs, set-up fees, shipping costs to us, shipping and packaging costs to you.  (I don't know about you, but I want a T-shirt and a hat already.)
  • Assorted costs- Office equipment, utilities, banking fees, stamps, mailers, the Trak-Off sponsored Indy car.  The bits and pieces that make a business run.

The Challenges

I am scared to death of this project.  I am scared of failing.  Strangely enough I am also scared of succeeding.  In fact I am probably more scared of succeeding than I am of failing because there so many different levels of success and all of them have their own challenges.  We have tried to come up with a scaled business plan so that we can handle the success at different levels.  We hope to start small and own this product "from the root to the crown" (as one of our business friends advised us), but we also have found a manufacturing partner if we cannot meet demand.  That adds cost of course, but saves time.

You Can Help

Get the word out about us.  Link to our campaign or our promotional video on your Facebook page.  Remember if we don't meet our minimum then the Trak-Off phone case won't ever be a reality.  And that means that neither you nor I get our T-shirt.

If you've read this far you are a glutton for punishment.  I'd even give you the Reading Stuff and Things Award (if I had designed one.)

You are also awesome. (That is no small power.  Use it wisely.) 

Thank you.

Sincerely.

Art & Tami McMahon

story:
What is Mobile+?


Mobile+ Features at a Glance

Mobile+ features the latest technology available:

Bluetooth 4.0, Wifi 802.11n, 3G/4G/LTE/WCDMA, Infrared, 39MP Video Camera, a display resolution that matches iPad, a mode of security that's UNMATCHED by anyone and of course printing, scanning and faxing capabilities. I forgot to mention UNMATCHED pairing system.


Video Camera

Mobile+ includes a rotating 39MP camera for really breath taking pictures, and a 50X Zoom Video that can record videos as far as ½ mile away from the scene. Mobile+ even includes infrared technology to facilitate taking pictures or recording videos in the dark.



Storage

If storage space is an issue then Mobile+ is all you need. Mobile+ comes with 32GB,  64GB or 128GB internal storage; if that's still not enough, any Mobile+ version comes with SDXC up to 256GB. We cannot make it happen without your pledge.


Security

We take security very seriously; before you’re able to use Mobile+, you must unlock it with your index finger. Once you do, you are prompted to enter your userid and password. A few seconds later, a random 4 to 8-digit number is sent to your cellphone; you must enter those digits into Mobile+ to proceed with the unlocking .  You can leave Mobile+ unattended without any fear of prying eyes or theft. Mobile+ is completely unusable if stolen. We even disable side-entry to discourage theft alltogether. Please help us make it happen.



Pairing Mobile+ with Other Devices

You've heard of pairing before, who hasn't? But you've never paired your devices with Mobile+, have you? Silly me, there is no Mobile+ to  pair with yet. Whether it's across the room or across the ocean, you can pair any device with Mobile+ (that's not a typo; you read correctly. You will be able to pair Mobile+ here in New York with your partner's phone in Paris). You can make your device the master and Mobile+ the slave, vice versa. For instance, let's say you are in London, your boss is in Barcelona, and you want to share with your boss... You know what? Let's watch instead. See how pairing with Mobile+ is nothing like "the pairing" you are used to.  We need your help to make it happen.


What you can do with our pairing approach is only limited by imagination. Please support our campaign; make a pledge now to help us reach our goal.


What will your contribution do?

Without your help, Mobile+ cannot happen. Every cent collected will go towards materials, components, 3d printing, prototyping activities. Thus far, there have been a few of those activities already, and we expect quite a few more before completion. As you might imagine, this is not an easy task to integrate printing, scanning and faxing into a tablet and try to keep the weight in check. Any pledge collected is used as follows:

1)  to pay for the expenses related to the activities of completing Mobile+ (activities include buying raw materials, components, paying manufacturer for materials & services, send schematics to the printer and repeat that process over and over and over till completion)

2)  to pay for legal fees to protect Mobile+ from infringement

3)  to pay for patent expenses

4)  to begin manufacturing of Mobile+; beyond expenses mentioned above, all remaining pledges will go directly to the manufacturing of Mobile+


Mobile+ Impact in the World

Imagine for a moment what it means to have Mobile+ around; everyone will have a printer, a scanner and a fax within reach. No more looking around for a printer or a fax machine. If printing, faxing or scanning is not of interest to you, how about being able to capture activities in the dark with Mobile+ infrared technology. And if security is important to you, Mobile+ gives you peace of mind. No one can hack into Mobile+ without your index finger and your cellphone. Let us together leave a world without Mobile+ behind. We need your help to make Mobile+ happen.



What Do You Get By Helping?

We really need your help to make Mobile+ happen. Why should you help? It's not about the perks, it's about contributing towards innovation. It's about making a difference. It's about helping make innovation happen. This is an opportunity to add your name to the list of those who have helped make innovation happen.  Yes, your name will be prominently displayed in our website and entered into the annals of history of Mobile+.  Be a part of Mobile+. Be a part of innovation. Help us make it happen!


Mobile+ Progress Report

From the time I scribbled my idea on a piece of paper to today, we have made tremendous progress. Our engineers have been working tirelessly to complete Mobile+. The slideshow below provides a glimpse of the types of activities our engineers have been involved in. We could have been further ahead but as it is in any innovation, money is always the elephant in the room. We really need your help, your support, your pledge to complete Mobile+.



Not to outdo the progress our engineers are making on the innovation end, the management team has been working in parallel to complete the necessary logistics to immediately launch Mobile+ upon successful engineering completion. See "MOBILE+ LAUNCH" section below for details on logistics and timeline

    How Else Can You Help?

    During the campaign, we are collecting suggestions to integrate into Mobile+; if you think of a feature or functionality that you’d like to see in Mobile+, please submit your ideas. We don’t just collect your ideas; we seriously consider them. Please submit them here on Indiegogo in the COMMENT section or directly to InterNotes Mobile site or you can email your ideas.

    In addition to your suggestions to help Mobile+ become the greatest, the coolest gadget of the millennium, we need your help to share our fundraising campaign with your friends (on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Vine or any other social networks) or use our Referral Form to refer your friends. Thank you so much for helping us reach our goals.


    PERKS/REWARDS

    Thank You For Helping. You didn't have to but you did anyway. Thank you so much.


    Thank You For Helping. You didn't have to but you did anyway. Thank you so much.


    Thank You For Helping. You didn't have to but you did anyway. Thank you so much.


    Thank You For Helping. You didn't have to but you did anyway. Thank you so much.


    As an Early Bird Mobile+ owner, you are rewarded with a whooping $300 OFF the regular estimated market price ($599) and FREE SHIPPING during the campaign. Thank you for being an Early Bird Mobile+ adopter! Your pledge helps get us closer to our goal.


    As a Daybreak Mobile+ owner, you are rewarded with a fantastic $200 OFF the regular estimated market price ($599) and FREE SHIPPING during the campaign. Thank you for being a Daybreak Mobile+ adopter! Your pledge helps get us closer to our goal. 


    As a Late Bloomer Mobile+ owner, you are rewarded with a great $100 OFF the regular estimated market price ($599) and FREE SHIPPING during the campaign. Thank you for being a Late Bloomer Mobile+ adopter! Your pledge helps get us closer to our goal.


    As a NightOwl Mobile+ owner, you are rewarded with $25 OFF the regular estimated market price ($599) and FREE SHIPPING during the campaign. Thank you for being a NightOwl Mobile+ adopter! Your pledge helps get us closer to our goal.



    PERKS EXTRA

    We appreciate pledge of any amount to help us reach our goal. We recognize you do not have to but we thank you for choosing to. Here is what we came up with as extra incentive for your generous pledge. This is in addition to the perks in the PERKS/REWARDS section.

    Extra Incentive

    If you make a contribution of $50 or more, you are automatically ELIGIBLE to receive a free Mobile+ when it becomes available. Share with your friends (on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest or any social network) about Mobile+.

    For EACH of your friends who makes a contribution towards our goal (whether it's a $10 contribution or the purchase of Mobile+),

    • claim a $10 discount if your contribution is $50
    • claim a $25 discount if your contribution is $100
    • claim a $50 discount if your contribution is $150

    towards the purchase of Mobile+. Collect enough $$ discount to cover the Regular Mobile+ price ($599) and receive a free Mobile+ tablet at time of shipment; shipment is FREE during the campaign.

    Note: the friends you refer MUST NOT be a current backer in this campaign.

    Example: let’s assume you make a pledge of $150 today; let’s also assume you refer 9 friends who make a pledge of just $25. For each of your friends, you receive a discount of $50, a total of $450. Since you already made a pledge of $150, the cost of Mobile+ is fully covered. At time of shipment, you will receive a fully operational Mobile+ with all the features and functionalities described here. Because all those activities happen during the campaign, shipping is also FREE. This is just another way to recognize that you didn't have to help but you did anyway. Thank you!


    Mobile+ Launch

    Not to outdo the progress the engineering is making, we have taken a number of steps to shorten the time it would take to introduce Mobile+ to the market.Timeline of activities is discussed below.

    we have already taken the following steps, some of which are completed while others are work in progress:

    May 2012: InterNotes Mobile applied for and was granted a provisional patent (EFS ID: 12900728; Application No: 61653525; Confirmation No: 9840)

    May 2012: InterNotes Mobile applied for a tax ID with US Internal Revenue Service; tax ID was issued (EIN: 45-5388174)

    June 2013: Filing with New York (NY) Department of State for Certificate of Corporation; one (1) billion shares registered along with the filing. NY State approved InterNotes Mobile request for Corporation status in the state of NY (DOS ID: 4377538)

    Ongoing: Schematic Update, Improvement, Change, Substitution. This is where most of the time is being spent to bring scanning, printing & faxing to Mobile+ by keeping weight and/or loss of performance in check

    Ongoing: Negotiation with Manufacturer; we take a one-stop shopping approach to minimize delay, problems and cost. The manufacturer tasked to complete the prototype is also responsible for manufacturing; in addition, the manufacturer is tasked to handle procurement of raw materials and any components necessary to build Mobile+.

    TBD: Upon final schematic, a new provisional patent will be filed with the US patent office to reflect the final drawings as well as the look, features and functionalities of Mobile+

    TBD: Upon final schematic, certification with FCC

    Jan-Feb 2015: Finalize Schematic

    March 2015: Working prototype; corrections, improvements, changes,etc..

    April 2015: Fully working Prototype

    May-June 2015: Working model

    July-Sept 2015: FULL testing of all components and functionalities

    October 2015: Preparation for production and other miscellaneous

    Oct-Nov 2015: Production begins

    Nov-Dec 2015: Shipment begins


    Risks & Challenges

    The biggest obstacle to completing this project is money. We have both manufacturing experience assistance and the engineering knowledge to bring Mobile+ to you. Yes, there is also the challenge of integrating all those functionalities into such a small footprint and keeping the weight in check. Our manufacturer is fully engaged and has been looking at every venue for smaller and smaller footprints. Our management team has been tirelessly working all the logistics for a successful launch. However, the major obstacle that always comes to the conversation is money. That’s why we do need your help to take Mobile+ to the finish line. Please, make a pledge today and help us reach our goals. Thank you.


    Who Are We?

    InterNotes Mobile Corporation is an innovation company which was founded in January 2012 with the exclusive task of bringing Mobile+ to the market. Mobile+ was conceived due to limitation of certain tasks on the road; I found out I couldn't travel with a printer, a scanner or a fax. So, I decided to put them into something I already travel with, a tablet. I am excited about the idea of bringing Mobile+ to you; I also feel a sense of duty and accomplishment to make it happen. However, I am not alone in the journey. Mobile+ is run by a team of veterans in the business with various degrees of knowledge and experience, from Engineering to Logistics and Procurement to Management and Marketing. We are confident that with your support, with your help, with your pledge, we can make Mobile+ happen.
