random 4 to 8-digit number is sent to your cellphone; you must enter those digits into Mobile+ to proceed with the unlocking .  You can
leave Mobile+ unattended without any fear of prying eyes or theft. Mobile+
is completely unusable if stolen. We even disable side-entry to discourage theft alltogether. Please help us make it happen.


Pairing Mobile+ with Other DevicesYou've heard of pairing before, who hasn't? But you've never paired your devices with Mobile+, have you? Silly me, there is no Mobile+ to  pair with yet. Whether it's across the room or across the ocean, you can pair any device with Mobile+ (that's not a typo; you read correctly. You will be able to pair Mobile+ here in New York with your partner's phone in Paris). You can make your device the master and Mobile+ the slave, vice versa. For instance, let's say you are in London, your boss is in Barcelona, and you want to share with your boss... You know what? Let's watch instead. See how pairing with Mobile+ is nothing like "the pairing" you are used to.  We need your help to make it happen.What you can do with our pairing approach is only limited by imagination. Please support our campaign; make a pledge now to help us reach our goal.

What will your contribution do?

Without your help, Mobile+ cannot happen. Every cent collected
will go towards materials, components, 3d printing, prototyping activities. Thus far, there
have been a few of those activities already, and we expect quite a few more
before completion. As you might imagine, this is not an easy task to integrate printing,
scanning and faxing into a tablet and try to keep the weight in check. Any pledge
collected is used as follows:
1) 
to pay for the expenses related to the activities
of completing Mobile+ (activities include buying raw materials, components, paying manufacturer for materials & services, send schematics to the printer and repeat that process
over and over and over till completion)
2) 
to pay for legal fees to protect Mobile+ from
infringement 
3) 
to pay for patent expenses
4) 
to begin manufacturing of Mobile+; beyond
expenses mentioned above, all remaining pledges will go directly to the
manufacturing of Mobile+

  Mobile+ Impact in the World
 Imagine for a moment what it means to have Mobile+ around; everyone will have a printer, a scanner and a fax within reach. No more looking around for a printer or a fax machine. If printing, faxing or scanning is not of interest to you, how about being able to capture activities in the dark with Mobile+ infrared technology. And if security is important to you, Mobile+ gives you peace of mind. No one can hack into Mobile+ without your index finger and your cellphone. Let us together leave a world without Mobile+ behind. We need your help to make Mobile+ happen. 
 What Do You Get By Helping? 

We really need your help to make Mobile+ happen. Why should 
you help? It's not about the perks, it's about contributing towards 
innovation. It's about making a difference. It's about helping 
make innovation happen. This is an 
opportunity to add your name to the list of those who have helped make 
innovation happen.  Yes, your name will be prominently displayed in our 
website and entered into the annals of history of Mobile+.  Be a part of
 Mobile+. Be a part of innovation. Help us make it happen!
Mobile+ Progress ReportFrom the time I scribbled my idea on a piece of paper to today, we have made tremendous progress. Our engineers have been working tirelessly to complete Mobile+. The slideshow below provides a glimpse of the types of activities our engineers have been involved in. We could have been further ahead but as it is in any innovation, money is 
always the elephant in the room. We really need your help, your support,
 your pledge to complete Mobile+.Not to outdo the progress our engineers are making on the innovation end, the management team has been working in parallel to complete the necessary logistics to immediately launch Mobile+ upon successful engineering completion. See "MOBILE+ LAUNCH" section below for details on logistics and timeline
   How Else Can You Help? 

During the campaign, we are collecting suggestions
to integrate into Mobile+; if you think of a feature or functionality that you’d
like to see in Mobile+, please submit your ideas. We don’t just collect your
ideas; we seriously consider them. Please submit them here on Indiegogo in the
COMMENT section or directly
to InterNotes Mobile site or you can email your ideas.
In addition to your suggestions to help Mobile+ become
the greatest, the coolest gadget of the millennium, we need your help to share
our fundraising campaign with your friends (on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram,
Pinterest, Vine or any other social networks) or use our Referral
Form to refer your friends. Thank
you so much for helping us reach our goals.PERKS/REWARDS
Thank You For Helping. You didn't have to but you did anyway. Thank you so much.Thank You For Helping. You didn't have to but you did anyway. Thank you so much.Thank You For Helping. You didn't have to but you did anyway. Thank you so much.Thank You For Helping. You didn't have to but you did anyway. Thank you so much.As an Early Bird Mobile+ owner, you are rewarded with a whooping $300 OFF the regular estimated market price ($599) and FREE SHIPPING during the campaign. Thank you for being an Early Bird Mobile+ adopter! Your pledge helps get us closer to our goal. As a Daybreak Mobile+ owner, you are rewarded with a fantastic $200 
OFF the regular estimated market price ($599) and FREE SHIPPING during the campaign. Thank you 
for being a Daybreak Mobile+ adopter! Your pledge helps get us closer to our goal. As a Late Bloomer Mobile+ owner, you are rewarded with a great $100 
OFF the regular estimated market price ($599) and FREE SHIPPING during the campaign. Thank you 
for being a Late Bloomer Mobile+ adopter! Your pledge helps get us closer to our goal. As a NightOwl Mobile+ owner, you are rewarded with $25 
OFF the regular estimated market price ($599) and FREE SHIPPING during the campaign. Thank you 
for being a NightOwl Mobile+ adopter! Your pledge helps get us closer to our goal. 
PERKS EXTRA
We appreciate pledge of any amount to help us reach our goal. We recognize you do not have to but we thank you for choosing to. Here is
what we came up with as extra incentive for your generous pledge. This is in
addition to the perks in the PERKS/REWARDS section.
Extra Incentive
If
you make a contribution of $50 or more, you are automatically ELIGIBLE to
receive a free Mobile+ when it becomes available. Share with your friends (on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest or
any social network)
about Mobile+.
For EACH of your friends who makes a
contribution towards our goal (whether it's a $10 contribution
or the purchase of Mobile+), 


claim
a $10 discount if your contribution is $50

claim
a $25 discount if your contribution is $100

claim
a $50 discount if your contribution is $150

towards the purchase of Mobile+. Collect enough $$
discount to cover the Regular Mobile+ price ($599) and receive a free Mobile+
tablet at time of shipment; shipment is FREE during the campaign.Note:
the friends you refer MUST NOT be a current backer in this campaign.
Example:
let’s assume you make a pledge of $150 today; let’s also assume you refer 9
friends who make a pledge of just $25. For each of your friends, you receive a
discount of $50, a total of $450. Since you already made a pledge of $150, the cost of
Mobile+ is fully covered. At time of shipment, you will receive a fully
operational Mobile+ with all the features and functionalities described here. Because all those activities happen during the campaign, shipping
is also FREE. This is just another way to recognize that you didn't have to help but you did anyway. Thank you!

Mobile+ Launch
Not to outdo the progress the engineering is making, we have taken a number of steps to shorten
the time it would take to introduce Mobile+ to the market.Timeline of activities is discussed
below.
we have already taken the following steps, some of which are completed while others are work in progress:
May 2012: InterNotes
Mobile applied for and was granted a provisional patent (EFS ID: 12900728; Application No: 61653525; Confirmation No: 9840)
May 2012: InterNotes
Mobile applied for a tax ID with US Internal Revenue Service; tax ID was issued (EIN: 45-5388174)
June 2013: Filing with New York (NY) Department of State for Certificate of Corporation; one (1) billion shares registered along with the
filing. NY State approved InterNotes Mobile request for Corporation status in the state of
NY (DOS ID: 4377538)
Ongoing: Schematic
Update, Improvement, Change, Substitution. This is where most of the time is being spent to bring scanning, printing &
faxing to Mobile+ by keeping weight and/or loss of performance in check
Ongoing: Negotiation
with Manufacturer; we take a one-stop shopping approach to minimize delay, problems and cost. The manufacturer tasked to
complete the prototype is also responsible for manufacturing; in addition,
the manufacturer is tasked to handle procurement of raw materials and any components
necessary to build Mobile+.
TBD: Upon
final schematic, a new provisional patent will be filed with the US patent office to reflect the final drawings as well as the look,
features and functionalities of Mobile+
TBD: Upon
final schematic, certification with FCC
Jan-Feb 2015: Finalize Schematic
March 2015: Working prototype; corrections, improvements, changes,etc..
April 2015: Fully working Prototype
May-June 2015: Working model
July-Sept 2015: FULL testing of all components and functionalities
October 2015: Preparation for production and other miscellaneous
Oct-Nov
2015: Production
begins
Nov-Dec
2015: Shipment
begins
Risks & Challenges
The biggest obstacle to completing this project is money. We have
both manufacturing experience assistance and the engineering knowledge to bring
Mobile+ to you. Yes, there is also the challenge of integrating all those
functionalities into such a small footprint and keeping the weight in check.
Our manufacturer is fully engaged and has been looking at every venue for
smaller and smaller footprints. Our management team has been tirelessly working
all the logistics for a successful launch. However, the major obstacle that always comes
to the conversation is money. That’s why we do need your help to take Mobile+
to the finish line. Please, make a pledge today and help us reach our goals.
Thank you.Who Are We? InterNotes Mobile Corporation is an innovation company which was founded in January 2012 with the exclusive task of bringing Mobile+ to the market. Mobile+ was conceived due to limitation of certain tasks on the
 road; I found out I couldn't travel with a printer, a scanner or a fax. So, I decided to put them into something I already travel with, a tablet. I am excited about the idea of 
bringing Mobile+ to you; I also feel a sense of duty and 
accomplishment to make it happen. However, I am not alone in the 
journey. Mobile+ is run by a team of veterans in the 
business with various degrees of knowledge and experience, from 
Engineering to Logistics and Procurement to Management and Marketing. We
 are confident that with your support, with your help, with your pledge,
 we can make Mobile+ happen.

story:
The Grand is a tablet that is specifically designed to meet the needs of seniors looking to get connected in a digital world.

Introduction:

Human beings have a natural need for connection - connection to family, loved ones, and the world around them. For most of us, today's technology greatly improves our ability to connect and stay current. But as products like smartphones and tablets progress, the trend is to become smaller and more complex. Though this may seem natural, it means more difficulty for our grandparents, parents and aging loved ones. The unfortunate truth is that a generation is being left behind while the rest of us become more connected than ever.

What is the Grand Tablet?

The Grand is a solution which includes hardware, software and support. The Grand is a tablet that is specifically designed to meet the needs of seniors who are trying to connect to the digital world.We have designed the solution with ease of use be as the major focus.The Grand is also the world’s first tablet with remote login capability built into the tablet. This allows both our tech support and family members to eliminate frustrations.

What makes us different?

The current trend in today’s devices is smaller and more compact designs that are blurring the lines between tablets and smartphones. The Grand is not just a tablet. The Grand is the solution developed from the ground up to meet the needs of seniors.  The user-interface is simplified. The fonts and icons are larger. The preloaded apps were selected by polling thousands of seniors on their preferences.  Our tech support is based in America and provides seniors with videos to help them learn how to use the preloaded apps like Facebook and Pill Reminder.

What you get: 

The first generation of The Grand comes with a 10.1 inch screen making it extremely easy to see and use.The Grand’s operating system is Android 4.2 allowing access to thousands of Apps but also has a specialized launcher which simplifies the user experience. The Grand comes bundled with a package of Apps that are used by and developed for seniors like Pill Reminder, AARP and Facebook.

Grand Tablet Tech Specs:

·Display: 10.1", 1280x800 IPS (16:10)

·Touch Panel: Capacitive 10-touch

·CPU: Quad-core CPU & Quad-core GPU - Rockchip 3188

·RAM: 2GB DDR3

·Operation System: Android 4.2

·Wi-Fi: 802.11/b/g/n

·Bluetooth 4.0: Optional

·Sensor: G-sensor, Gyro sensor, light sensor

·Others: E-compass, Micro SD slot, mic, speaker, mini HDMI output

·Multimedia: Audio, Video (1080P), Photo, eBook, game, email, internet…

·Battery capacity: 7600mAh by 3.7V

·Camera: Front .3M, back 2M auto focus, flashlight

What about Tech Support?

Due to the fact we will be working with many first time computer users, we have built in a secure remote login to quickly solve our customer’s problems. With our tech support interface we can help you resolve your problems in seconds instead of hours. No more battling with your loved ones trying to diagnose what problems they currently are having with their computer. Using remote desktop technology our Tech Support team can directly help you or your loved one with any troubleshooting that you may experience.

What about Viruses, Spyware, and Malware?

Unlike Windows PC’s, tablets and their OSs are more difficult to hack and install viruses. Our team also has done extensive research to ensure that all the apps that come with our device are not only easy to use but also free of viruses and malware. Privacy and security are a top priority with the Grand and you can rest easy knowing that your device will safe and secure.

What about the preinstalled apps?

The Grand tablet comes bundled with a package of apps that we found will be most useful for seniors and first time computer users:

AARP - Get access to all the extra online features of the very popular AARP magazine

Facebook - Stay connected with friends and family and view pictures as the are uploaded

Mind Games - Improve your brain health and performance with brain games designed to exercise memory and attention

Ancestry.com - Enables our user’s direct access to study genealogy

Kindle eBooks - Provides access to millions of eBooks and eMagazines

Skype - Allows users to video chat with their friends in family even if they live in another country.

Calendar and Pill reminder - allows you the ability to set reminders and task notifications, so that you will never be late for an appointment or forget to do a task again!

Netflix - Stream all your favorite TV shows and movies.

Language Support

Because the core operating system is Android, the tablet supports all of the major languages.

Continuing education

People say that one thing that truly intelligent people always have in common is their desire to continue learning.People who have not had access to computers are feeling more behind than ever.With the Grand Tablet you now have access to millions of text books enabling you to learn more about anything. Companies like the teaching channel provide college level courses that you can stream right from your Grand. Everything from investing for retirement to ancient history, you can have it all with the click of a button.

We need your help!!

We are so close to providing the solution to the world, but we need your help. Over the past 18 months, we have come a long way in the development of the Grand tablet. Our prototype has been created and we began extensive beta testing 5 months ago. With your help, we will be able to convert our prototype into a production ready model. We need to finish software developments and finalize designs with the manufacturer. With your help we will be able to get these devices in the hands of the people that need them.


Risks and challenges

Like many Indiegogo campaigns, there can be problems with taking their prototypes into the production face. All of the current technology that we have sourced is constantly changing. For us to source a tablet with the exact specs of our prototype could be a challenge. However this will probably result in a device with better specs than the one we are prototyping.

We are still in the beta testing phase of product development and might have delays due to unforeseen circumstanced in implementing the software modifications based off of feedback. This problem will be mitigated by our developers and their ability to work quickly to meet our deadlines. We have been working for months with our suppliers making sure the components live up to our expectations.

We have developed a great team of passionate people, but as we grow we will need to bring on more people. This is always a challenge as businesses grow and is why we have begun actively looking for new team members to help us reach our goals. Our plans are completed, and now we need the resources to get the ball rolling and make these dreams a reality.

story:
Mass production is starting this month. Last chance to be one of the first to receive Jiffy.

A BIG THANK YOU TO ALL THE BACKERS OF THE PREVIOUS CAMPAIGN! THANK YOU FOR YOUR TRUST AND SUPPORT. IT MEANS A LOT TO US! 

Small, stylish wearable device that fits in your pocket. Pull it out when your other devices need saving in any emergency. Jiffy uses the new technology "Quick Charge 2.0" This is the fastest technology out at the moment for charging devices.

We are living in the time of technology that has been developing more and faster than ever. Technology has become essential in today’s world. Our lives have become closely linked to mobile electronic devices, because they give us freedom of communication.


Jiffy helps your devices when they run out of juice.

When the battery runs out devices and gadgets become useless pieces of plastic and metal. They become unusable.

Jiffy is an eco-charger and using the new technology "Quick Charge 2.0" will assure your device a quick charge that truly offers freedom and unlimited independence when it comes to charging your mobile devices and gadgets.That’s it! You are completely independent of any power supply, electric network, or wall outlet.  Jiffy is an eco-charger that has a priceless advantage both in everyday life and especially when travelling and going on new adventures even to the ends of the world.

THE IDEAL SITUATION- to maintain a last call, an emergency call when you are in a critical situation, to send a last text, or study a map with GPS in case you get lost and can’t find sources to charge your device nearby.

TOTAL ENERGY INDEPENDENCE- charge devices and gadgets at any time, any place and without taking in to consideration the weather, or temperature outside.


Imagine a scenario of being lost in the woods, in the desert, or in a jungle. Your phones battery will be assured only by Jiffy!


PRIORITY- compared to other methods of charging gadgets, Jiffy doesn’t need gas balloons with chemical reactions as other chargers. You can use it at night, in the shade, in thick forests unlike solar chargers. Jiffy also doesn’t need wind, or water currents.

IMPORTANT-No traditional electricity, no air pollution, and you don’t need to look for a power outlet. In this way you don’t need to worry about where you will charge your mobile phone, camera, Bluetooth headset, or any other devices that can be charged through USB.

Charge while on any type of transportation: train, ship, bus, or even wagon. You can rest assured and camp as much as you want, do extreme mountain sports, go hiking, or rock climbing without worrying that your camera, or smart phone will be without battery and you will remain without communication.

We all know how problematic it is to find an electrical power outlet when going on longer trips. Also we know situations when electricity shuts off at home because of powerful rain, wind, or other natural phenomena that cause damage to power grids. You will be able to access the internet, radio, or other news portals in times of danger and emergency.

Thanks to the USB attachment with LED light, Jiffy can be used as a light source. It does not need batteries and can be used at any time when there are blackouts and electricity and light are most needed. It is perfect to have a Jiffy handy in your emergency kit.

MULTI USB- the cable is perfect to charge any gadget at any time. Charge your devices and gadgets, or help a friend that needs help, but needs a different kind of cable.

How does Jiffy work? 

Jiffy represents a USB charger that mechanically produces electricity without eliminating toxic substances into the atmosphere. Electricity production is carried out by a three phase asynchronous micro generator with very high productivity, which is driven by a complex mechanical watch. With a simple movement the mechanism is charged with kinetic energy which is transmitted to the micro generators. The charging module is 5V USB that charges all the devices that support the standard USB. The intensity of electric current is up to 2200 mA and this offers a faster charge, by using the new tehnology "Quick Charge 2.0".

For the people that are less technical, Jiffy with the 2200mA can simultaneously charge 6 smart phones with 4” screens that are navigating the internet through Wi-Fi, or 4 smart phones that are navigating the internet through 3G. 

Technical info about the prototype:

Behind the micro generator is mounted a controller that has the function of continuously recovering the current and 5V voltage stabilization. Also an electrolytic capacitor which has the function of a micro accumulator is connected in the scheme to remove the current fluctuations produced by mechanical processes under the influence of kinetic energy.

Electrical scheme

We documented our work process and wanted to share with you the important steps. Also watch the first prototype we tested.

Thanks for making it all the way down here to meet team Jiffy!

What we intend to do after the campaign is finished?

After the Indiegogo campaign is finished we will start work on Jiffy immediately because we know that time is the biggest enemy for a start up. We know that we will encounter obstacles along the way, but we are ready to face them and if everything goes as planned we will deliver Jiffy within the timeline that we estimated. 

We hope that Jiffy is just the first of many devices that we work on. For us this is hopefully going to be a successful campaign that will turn into a small business and generate enough income to give us the possibility to work on bigger projects. It would be great to work on other projects that will bring solutions to problems like reusable energy, eco friendly energy, global warming etc. These are the problems that bother us and we hope that with your help we will be able to start attending to them.

TIMELINE


Perks

Charge your devices and gadgets, or help a friend that needs help, but needs a different kind of cable.How does Jiffy work? Jiffy represents a USB charger that mechanically produces electricity without eliminating toxic substances into the atmosphere. Electricity production is carried out by a three phase asynchronous micro generator with very high productivity, which is driven by a complex mechanical watch. With a simple movement the mechanism is charged with kinetic energy which is transmitted to the micro generators. The charging module is 5V USB that charges all the devices that support the standard USB. The intensity of electric current is up to 2200 mA and this offers a faster charge, by using the new tehnology "Quick Charge 2.0".For the people that are less technical, Jiffy with the 2200mA can simultaneously charge 6 smart phones with 4” screens that are navigating the internet through Wi-Fi, or 4 smart phones that are navigating the internet through 3G. Technical info about the prototype:Behind the micro generator is mounted a controller that has the function of continuously recovering the current and 5V voltage stabilization. Also an electrolytic capacitor which has the function of a micro accumulator is connected in the scheme to remove the current fluctuations produced by mechanical processes under the influence of kinetic energy.Electrical schemeWe documented our work process and wanted to share with you the important steps. Also watch the first prototype we tested.Thanks for making it all the way down here to meet team Jiffy!What we intend to do after the campaign is finished?After the Indiegogo campaign is finished we will start work on Jiffy immediately because we know that time is the biggest enemy for a start up. We know that we will encounter obstacles along the way, but we are ready to face them and if everything goes as planned we will deliver Jiffy within the timeline that we estimated. We hope that Jiffy is just the first of many devices that we work on. For us this is hopefully going to be a successful campaign that will turn into a small business and generate enough income to give us the possibility to work on bigger projects. It would be great to work on other projects that will bring solutions to problems like reusable energy, eco friendly energy, global warming etc. These are the problems that bother us and we hope that with your help we will be able to start attending to them.TIMELINEPerks

story:
Your life is filled with adventure, and the fact of the matter is this: the best is yet to come.

Yes, there are going to be adventures where you will need a backpack filled with supplies –

and you want to be prepared. There will also be adventures, however, where you don't

need to lug around every wire, accessory, and device that you own. You can pack lighter 

for those adventures, leaving the suitcase behind you, ready to face the day with a 

minimum of supplies.

 

For those adventures, Pocket for Everyday is the right choice. At the office, out for a day trip,

or somewhere close to home, Pocket for Everyday is the perfect, lightweight, compact

storage solution that holds your earphones, chargers, USB cords, AUX cables, stylus and

other accessories without taking up any space unnecessarily. There are three clear pockets 

built into Pocket for Everyday so that you can stay organized all day long, accessing your

items when you need them quickly and easily. 

 

Pocket for Everyday fits neatly into most bags, it's made from water-resistant material, it's

extremely durable, it's travel-friendly, and it comes with both a pen sleeve and a woven loop

for attachments like straps or carabiners.

 

 

 

Designed in California, Pocket for Everyday is exactly the convenient device, accessory,

and cable organizer you have been waiting for.  

 

Never again will you feel like your devices, cables, and accessories are holding you back.

Whatever you have on your agenda and wherever you plan on going, Pocket for Everyday

will be there with you, the travel-friendly organizer that is at once stylish and convenient.

Spending the night at a friend's house? Pocket for Everyday.

Going to the office? Pocket for Everyday.

Camping for the weekend? Again, Pocket for Everyday. This is the organizer that you can

rely on for total flexibility.

 

 

Our goal through this campaign is to raise $5,000 in order to cover the costs of

manufacturing, marketing, and distributing Pocket for Everyday on a large scale. We

have streamlined the process for this, but we know that we are going to have to solve

some significant logistical issues as we sell more units and scale up. This is why we

need your help. Make a contribution today so that we can bring Pocket for Everyday

to the masses!

 

It started in California, where working under the wonderful sunshine led us to the idea of having simple and innovative ways to organize our messy and tangled cables. It was then when we came up with our concept: simple design, big solution. 

We are obsessed about organizing cables and have made it our mission to solve the many organizational and operational problems that we all face day after day in today’s tech-driven world. Competing against big names, we put our ideas to the test and received recognition from world-renowned Red Dot and iF International Forum Design for product design.

We believe the power of innovation can change lives, and whether you need something you can keep next to your bed or something you can travel with, we have you covered. Our focus is always on great product ideas executed properly—and backing up our great products with outstanding service.

If you ever have any questions or feedback about the Pocket for Everyday or any of the other products we carry in our catalog, feel free to reach out to us at  customercare@ut-wire.com 

Check out our website at www.ut-wire.com 

Instagram: @utwireproducts

Facebook: UT Wire

 

 

International Shipping:

We strive to provide the simple organizing solutions for all and offer global shipping from our California warehouse.  Please note that the price of the product does not include additional customs taxes, duties, VAT, GST, or any other taxes specific to countries.

For an estimate of what you may have to cover, please consider the following tool for calculating duties: www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator

 

Return Policy:

Your pledges greatly contribute to the production and launching of our product, so we cannot offer returns or refunds. We will make our best effort to control the production quality; however, there is a chance for a few to slip under our radar. To make sure this unlikely event is covered, we offer a limited warranty that for manufacturing defect that is valid for 30 days upon receipt.  Please contact us at customercare@ut-wire.com should this be your case!

 

Risks and challenges:

Although we have put a lot of thought and planning into this launch, the risk of delay is always real. We trust our manufacturing and order fulfillment partners to make the launch as smooth as possible, but it is the first time that we at UT Wire are handling a project of this size.

If any other challenges arise, we will be sure to keep all our contributors in the loop. Transparency is something that we value deeply, and you can count on us to be honest about where we are in this process.

story:
Since the introduction of the new Macbook Pro in 2016, professional Macbook Users have been disappointed by the absence of the SD Card slot, which represented the last garrison of possibility to extending the storage of your Macbook, Macbook Air or Macbook Pro with a USB-C Port. 

Because of their bulkiness, USB Sticks have never been the right solution. Also the danger of breaking the USB-C Port.

To overcome this problem we developed...

iSTORH: SLIM USB-C Micro SD Card Reader

The slim design of our USB-C Plug provides a seamless linkage between your Macbook and the USB-C card reader. The card reader will be attached by a 3M magnetic mount on the back of your device.

You can carry your Macbook, Smartphone or iPad wherever you want without distracting the data transfer.

 

Be a part of our community and profit

from our referral program

1. Login to your indiegogo Account

2. Become a Backer

3. Click one of the Share button

4. Get 10$ off for each Referral who backed one iSTORH through your link

story: MY PROJECT

story:
Coyote Case: A Case for Just in Case

Protecting yourself and your family just got easier. The Coyote Case is a powerful, personal protection system contained in a sleek and durable smartphone case. When the panic button is activated, a piercing 100+ decibel siren sounds and an emergency text message with your GPS coordinates is sent to your emergency contacts. No fumbling to unlock your phone or open an emergency app – just one click, and help is on the way. There is also a stealth mode that sends your SOS text message without the siren. 

We need your help to bring the CES award-winning Coyote Case to market

In case you are new to crowdfunding, here’s how it works:

  1. We invested personal resources up front to design an awesome product.  Our team has spent nine months, countless hours, and thousands of dollars to build a product that we’re really passionate about.
  2. Coyote Case is now ready for production. We are asking you to help us raise the funds needed to complete the manufacturing by pre-ordering our product or supporting us with other funding options.
  • If we raise $120,000 in pledges, we receive the money and will complete manufacturing and shipping within four months (by April 2013).
  • If we do not receive the full $120,000 of funding, we will not move into production, you don’t pay a cent, and Coyote Case goes back to the drawing board.

To support our team, please click the "Contribute Now" button and select your perk, completing the transaction on PayPal. We do not receive any of the funds until the end of the campaign (in Dec.), and only then if we are fully funded. If we do not reach our goal, your purchase is refunded by Indiegogo at the end of the campaign. We will update you regularly during this campaign and afterwards on our progress so you can stay informed and ask questions. Please read on to get a better sense of what we have been up to and how you can help. PLEASE help us achieve our funding goal so we can bring this case to market and empower individuals to travel freely and with confidence .... We appreciate it greatly!

 

Who is it for?

After nine months in development, we are proud to offer the Coyote Case for the iPhone 4/4s and the new iPhone 5, and we plan to expedite Andriod case development should we reach our Indiegogo goal. Coyote Case is ideal for kids, college students—especially women—and their concerned parents. It is also great for city dwellers, young professionals, and travelers including those who travel by air. For outdoor lovers, it’s a convenient way to enjoy a long walk, run, hike, ride or other pursuit with portable protection. It also offers greater peace of mind for those in disaster prone areas, those with a chronic health condition or the elderly who desire greater independence.

Our story

Creator Jonathan Page was concerned for the safety of his family after hearing how his niece felt personally threatened one evening last year. A father of two daughters, Jonathan wanted to do something more to increase their safety and empower them to travel freely and with greater confidence. As he began to research, he learned the facts about assault and felt called to action:

  • There are over 10,000 serious assaults a day in the U.S.
  • One in four college women have reported rape or serious assault during their college experience.

It’s likely that you know someone who has had a threatening or serious encounter. So you can understand the motivation to want to do something to help prevent those situations from happening to them. It’s what drives our team to relentlessly work toward the quality-built product we have planned to deliver for your protection.

 Evolved design for greater protection

After several iterations of design, testing, and user feedback,; we have finally reached Version 3 of the Coyote Case (thanks to Andy, out CES award-winning product designer). The functional design of this Coyote Case is rooted in human behavior and ergonomics. We studied how people respond in stressful situations and built a product that is intuitive, durable, and lightning fast. 

Customizable controls

Coyote Case takes into consideration much behavioral research, which suggests that the natural reaction of the human hand is to make a clenching motion when under duress.

The user features on the exterior of the case include:

  • Three options for user sensitivity level: "0" the siren is turned off. "1" activation requires one side button squeezed. "2" activation requires 2 side buttons squeezed together.
  • Three options for alarm mode: siren + emergency text, only siren, or only emergency text.
  • The buttons on either side of the case are the activation buttons and, when depressed by applied user pressure, trigger the Coyote Case protective features. This can be done deftly, subtly, and without looking at your phone.

Materials and Design

Externals: The Coyote Case is currently offered for the iPhone 4/4s and the new iPhone 5. The finish is designed to have a soft touch feel to enhance the user experience while protecting the smartphone. The case thickness is less than 1/3". The radius edges and pillow back fit comfortably into small or large hands. Your purchase includes batteries for the case, and you can choose from five colors at launch.

Internals: The Coyote Case electronic module is comprised of the highest quality components. This includes a piezo buzzer element (siren), printed circuit board, lithium ion battery, and user interface capable of 7 levels of customization. The piezo buzzer element featured in the video emits the siren at just over 100db (similar to a smoke dectector). The case design allows for a harder resin to be used in the center section creating a better sound chamber for the piezo.

Bluetooth: The Bluetooth 4.0 technology utilized in the case is FCC-approved and will connect to our proprietary app, which is already developed. When the case is triggered, the Bluetooth signal will awaken and activate the Coyote Case app to acquire the current GPS location and send the emergency text with location map to pre-set contacts. The Coyote Case app has been developed already for iOS and meets all of the Apple requirements. It will be free to download when (and if!) the case is available.

About our Manufacturing

For Coyote Case’s manufacturing and assembly, we have been grateful to receive the guidance of several supply chain experts and Fortune 500 engineers. The selected contract manufacturer has the capacity and capability to deliver on our product based on this design and engineering plans, and they have a strong track record in manufacturing similar devices (and indeed have manufactured many technical products you likely use today). We will continue to work closely with our team of experts and the manufacturer for quality control and reliability if the product is brought to market.

Value Priced

Our pricing on Indiegogo reflects our desire to get the Coyote Case to market quickly and to offer a value to our supporters who make it possible. We are grateful that you share our vision.  The costs include the advanced nature of the case elements, manufacturing, assembly, and shipping. When available in stores next year, Coyote Case will retail for approximately $120.

Community-minded entrepreneurs

As a company rooted in caring and a team that is dedicated to helping others, we plan to donate 5% of net Coyote Case profits to support non-profit organizations and causes that help, empower, and care for women in crisis and their families.

Please help us create this case

We’re so close to realizing our vision for manufacturing the completely integrated Coyote Case. The siren, Bluetooth-functionality, and the Apple Coyote case app all exist and have been vetted independently by experts. The new design and expectations of its performance have been very carefully considered. We’re simply now at the point we need to “connect the dots” and funds are needed to do so.

 Your funds will help:

  • Fabricate two sets of steel molds; one each for the iPhone 4/4s and 5
  • Pay for independent lab testing and regulatory approval for UL
  • Pay for additional engineering to complete the bluetooth integration between the case and the app.

We need to hit our minimum to fund this effort as this is where we fall short compared to established, well-resourced companies. We’re simply now at a point we can’t fund this effort alone. 

Together, we can realize our vision to help protect and empower people to travel freely and with confidence. We hope you'll be inspired to share this vision and product with others so we can reach our goal. We have a passion to make this world a safer one for all and we can't do it without the community's support!

Be safe,

The Coyote Case Team

story:
Our website

What is Fussé?

Fussé is a small team of hard-working, creative and innovative individuals that are dedicated to developing simple, yet powerful consumer hardware. We omit the frills and unnecessary bells and whistles you, the consumer, will never use. Our goal is to create products that are innovative, yet familiar and simple enough there's no learning curve, unforeseen complexity, or technical problems.

How do we do it?

We design products from the viewpoint of the consumer. It's simply the most effective way to do it. Instead of creating a device with a goal of stuffing it with features so that it'll sell the most, Fussé devices focus on modern simplicity. What's the point if a device cannot do what it was advertised to do? What if the manufacturer creates it so that it's obsolete even before it reaches your home?

When we look at an idea, we first look at what you, the consumer, wants. If you don't want it to be very big, we make it small. If you want three features and not four, we don't include the fourth one for fun. That way, you get a product that is useful in it's entirety, and we ensure that you aren't paying for features and stuff you'll never use. It also ensures that the features that are included function as advertised. If we say it turns on, it most definitely will turn on.

What is the Crux?

What you read above was mostly theory, and our goal and mission. But how do you know that we do what we say we do? Crux is the fruition of this philosophy. Simply put, it's a very small, full-fledged computer. That doesn't really sound innovative, but read on. It's a spherical device that can fit in your palm - and a very beautiful one at that. It's the definition of innovation, great design, and extreme efficiency.

Crux, to be precise, is under three inches wide, long, and tall. It contains a very fast quad-core low power processor, coupled with an advanced GPU and 4GB of high-speed memory. Crux comes with 64GB of fast, flash storage. Installed on that storage is Windows 8.1. Yes, it runs a full desktop operating system very fluidly. The back, which is as beautiful as the rest of the device, contains one full-size USB 3.0 port, one microUSB 3.0 port (for power), one HDMI port, and one audio port.

We estimate that Crux+Ken will cost you anywhere from $300-$350, with all hardware and software included.

$5,100,000.00 sounds like a lot of money. Honestly, it is a lot of money. It's money we do not have right now. It's money that you, by becoming a backer, can make happen. Since we will not be making the hardware by hand in a garage, we are planning to work with the big guys (Qualcomm, NVIDIA, ARM, Samsung, etc.) to assist us in our production needs. That, in and of itself, is going to cost around $3 million. $0.5 million of the remaining $2 million will be saved in a special "savings" account. The rest will be spent on overhead, licensing, wages, and benefits.
story_txt: Our websiteWhat is Fussé?Fussé is a small team of hard-working, creative and innovative individuals that are dedicated to developing simple, yet powerful consumer hardware. We omit the frills and unnecessary bells and whistles you, the consumer, will never use. Our goal is to create products that are innovative, yet familiar and simple enough there's no learning curve, unforeseen complexity, or technical problems.How do we do it?We design products from the viewpoint of the consumer. It's simply the most effective way to do it. Instead of creating a device with a goal of stuffing it with features so that it'll sell the most, Fussé devices focus on modern simplicity. What's the point if a device cannot do what it was advertised to do? What if the manufacturer creates it so that it's obsolete even before it reaches your home?When we look at an idea, we first look at what you, the consumer, wants. If you don't want it to be very big, we make it small. If you want three features and not four, we don't include the fourth one for fun. That way, you get a product that is useful in it's entirety, and we ensure that you aren't paying for features and stuff you'll never use. It also ensures that the features that are included function as advertised. If we say it turns on, it most definitely will turn on.What is the Crux?What you read above was mostly theory, and our goal and mission. But how do you know that we do what we say we do? Crux is the fruition of this philosophy. Simply put, it's a very small, full-fledged computer. That doesn't really sound innovative, but read on. It's a spherical device that can fit in your palm - and a very beautiful one at that. It's the definition of innovation, great design, and extreme efficiency.Crux, to be precise, is under three inches wide, long, and tall. It contains a very fast quad-core low power processor, coupled with an advanced GPU and 4GB of high-speed memory. Crux comes with 64GB of fast, flash storage. Installed on that storage is Windows 8.1. Yes, it runs a full desktop operating system very fluidly. The back, which is as beautiful as the rest of the device, contains one full-size USB 3.0 port, one microUSB 3.0 port (for power), one HDMI port, and one audio port.We estimate that Crux+Ken will cost you anywhere from $300-$350, with all hardware and software included.$5,100,000.00 sounds like a lot of money. Honestly, it is a lot of money. It's money we do not have right now. It's money that you, by becoming a backer, can make happen. Since we will not be making the hardware by hand in a garage, we are planning to work with the big guys (Qualcomm, NVIDIA, ARM, Samsung, etc.) to assist us in our production needs. That, in and of itself, is going to cost around $3 million. $0.5 million of the remaining $2 million will be saved in a special "savings" account. The rest will be spent on overhead, licensing, wages, and benefits.

story:
What has been missing...

I love listening to music, geek stuff and the DIY concept. I know and use pulseaudio for more than 8 years, and it has evolved into a great software. I love the idea of controlling the audio streams, from a room to another, from a big badass HiFi system to a simple cheap bluetooth speaker.

I do use this feature when I have to work in another room while I do not want to stop the music (please DJ, don't stop the music !). However, I miss one thing : controlling pulseaudio with a beautiful web app running on my server. And let's be honest, the basic volume control app is not enough.

What I want...

I want to develop this missing piece, a beautiful bootstrap based web application, which controls the streams volume, where the audio streams are played and from which microphone the applications will use.

What you want...

What you want is... I believe the actual working application, but not the hassle of tweaking for days and then getting bored (you may want to do that, but when ?!). So, what you want is this application, free of charge but moreover, you want it to be open source.

Why a crowdfunding campaign...

I did not start coding this application before because I know it requires a lot of time to do it the right way. I can develop a simple piece of software but I will not be satisfied because it would not include specific features that can make this project a badass one...
I want to raise a fair amount of money to develop the application using what's best out there :
  • A Django based application
  • A JSON API (so we can evolve to mobile apps !)
  • A Responsive web frontend with Bootstrap 3.1
  • A low level python wrapper (so Django is not mandatory)
The code will be published on github with an Apache License (so you can do whatever you want with this !)

How we can help each other...

Well, you can help me develop this application by funding this campaign, I thank you in advance for all the help you'll provide !

Money & goals

The base amount will allow me to work full time to develop the application. Besides, as I think it is a great project, we can set up some strech goals  :
  • The *Golden Blue* goal : >= 5'000€ : The support for automatic bluetooth pairing and management (it is one tricky stuff)
  • The *Platinum* goal : >= 12'000€ : An android application to control every aspect of pulseaudio
  • The *Let's go to the moon together* goal : > 20'000€ : A broadcasting station kickass frontend, with transcoding control, with a full control API

story:
中文版頁面（正體）


Media Coverage of Filmbo

Geeky Gadgets -"... provide users with a mini robot photographer perfect for selfie videos..."

gadgetify - "Using them, you will be able to capture better shots, create higher quality time-lapse videos..."

MOBICRUNCH -"If you won an iPhone and like to record videos of yourself... need a Filmbo to enhance selfie video recordings."

veooz -"... perfect for selfie videos... without the need for anyone to hold your camera."

iPHONENESS -"... a robotic device that keeps your iPhone 4s or later on you as you have fun outside your home."
( Compatible with iPhone 4S, 5,  5C,  5S, 6 & 6 PLUS  )

Are you like me and enjoy playing sports and taking selfies? Have you ever wanted to show off a trick move and not been able to record it on your own? Maybe, like me, you just couldn't get a friend to help you or maybe you just wanted to practice on camera alone (and not embarrass yourself in front of your friends). That's the problem I had. I wanted to capture all of my best moves but because the camera couldn't follow me, it was hard to keep everything in frame. What I really needed was a personal robotic photographer, one that was small and easy to carry. That's why I developed Filmbo.

Why Filmbo?  "Action" selfies.

So what is Filmbo? Basically, Filmbo is a  lightweight auto-tracking camera dock that works with your iPhone. I like to think of it as my own personal robot photographer. All you have to do is put your iPhone in the dock, click the app, select the desired mode and Filmbo follows you automatically. That's it! You don't have to worry about whether you're in frame or not anymore. Now, you can focus on what you're doing and Filmbo stays focused on you. Go ahead and record that trick move you've been practicing! Show it off to all of your friends! With its three auto-tracking modes Filmbo captures all the action. Most importantly though, Filmbo stays focused on you. Amaze all your friends with your “action” selfies. They'll probably ask you: “How did you record that?”


What can Filmbo do?

Robotic Video Mode: You get the best shot without worrying where to place your camera. Filmbo tracks your every move and records it automatically.


Moment Photo Mode: The best moments come and go in a flash, and there are shots that not even the fastest human photographer can capture. Fortunately, Filmbo works faster than a human ever could and can be configured to take a picture exactly when there is a big movement or a change of speed.


Robotic Time-lapse Mode: Want to take sequential photos on a series of movements but worried about going outside the frame? No problem. Filmbo can track you, place you at the center of the frame and take pictures at the time interval you desire.


Features



Multi Modes & Simple UI: Filmbo features three capture modes: Robotic Video Mode, Moment Photo Mode and Robotic Time-lapse Mode. Simply press the button for the desired mode and you're good to go.


Full 360 degree movement: The dock swivels 360 degrees and tilts vertically 20 degrees. It can be attached to any tripod with a 1/4 inch screw to further eliminate blind spots.


Easy to carry: At only 0.35 lb(160g), Filmbo can even fit in your pocket.

                 


Long battery life (it can also charge your iPhone): Filmbo can last for 8 or more hours per charge. It can be charged using a USB cable or used as a power source for your iPhone.

Easy to share: Filmbo works with iOS, which allows footage to be easily modified, filed or shared.


How it works?

                      

Filmbo features smart motion tracking technology that can keep your iPhone's camera lens centered on you at all times. You can also configure your Filmbo to do a full-length recording, take photos at specific time intervals, or take a picture whenever it detects a sudden movement. Even in a crowd,  Filmbo is able to adjust its speed and direction to match your movements, giving you the most natural image possible. Best of all, you don't need to wear any sensors or tracking devices to have Filmbo track your movements.


Filmbo uses Bluetooth 4.0. The dock can be quickly swiveled and tilted to keep track of its target. It can even trigger the cellphone shutter to take pictures or record videos. Simply install the Filmbo app on your iOS-based device, switch on the dock, position your phone and choose one of the three capture modes to begin. No more wasting time setting up your tripod or adjusting your camera angle. Now you can focus on what you're doing while Filmbo focuses on you.


Specs

Weight: 0.35 lb / 160 g
Maximum Speed: 50° per second
Mount Type: ¼'' tripod mount
Compatibility: iPhone 4s, 5, 5C, 5S, 6 & 6 PLUS. 
Size: 4.2 x 0.9'' / 10.6 x 2.4 cm
Battery Life: 8+ hours (USB rechargable)

Reward

We have already completed the prototype. With your support, we can bring this exciting new concept to market in a shorter time. The retail price will be set at US$169 at the time of launch. As a reward to our early supporters, we will be offering the following exclusive packages at Indiegogo.

        
Black Filmbo Base


The Plan

We have already made arrangements with three different manufacturers to produce PCB, plastic electronic parts and mechanical components.  All of  the parts will be assembled, packaged, tested for quality and shipped promptly!  We are ready to start production as soon as we reach our goal.                           

                            


About Us

We are a dynamic and creative team comprised of members with backgrounds in electrical engineering, software, and marketing. Our love for sports and our desire to capture life's best moments were what inspired us to develop Filmbo. In the first two prototypes, we used radio signals to control our devices, but they ended up being bulky and expensive, not to mention that the subject had to wear a transmitter, which completely took the fun out of the activity.

We then realized that, given the smartphone's popularity for taking selfies and videos, we thought: “Why not build something that works with smartphones?”. This idea gave birth to Filmbo, a light and intelligent robotic companion for your cellphone. 

     

Risk and Challenge

We all wish to see this fun idea being put into production, but as with any start-up that involves manufacturing hardware, reaching mass production will be one of the toughest challenges, especially when there are different factors and risks involved at different levels of  production. We will try to minimize risk in every aspect from supply, manufacturing, assembly to quality control, and we are fortunate to have a professional team and strong, committed suppliers on our side. We are ready for mass production!

Whether you sponsor our project directly or simply share what you heard about Filmbo with friends, you will be helping us achieve our  production goals. Once again, we thank you for your support, and hope that our efforts can take the mobile lifestyle to a whole new level!


FAQ

Where can I order Filmbo?

Currently, Filmbo can only be ordered from our web page on Indiegogo.

How can I buy it at early bird price?           

We are offering early bird packages only on Indiegogo with limited availability. As an appreciation to our sponsors, we have priced our Indiegogo Filmbo combor far below the market retail price.

Do you ship globally? 

Yes we do! Free shipping! If you are a distributor and is looking to order large quantities, please email us to discuss further details. 

What is the retail price of Filmbo?

The retail price of Filmbo has been set at US$169. We will only offer special pricing to our sponsors during our Indiegogo fund-raising campaign.

Can Filmbo work with multiple smartphones?

Yes it can! Although Filmbo's dock can be paired with only one smartphone at a time, you can easily swap phones at any time.

Can Filmbo track multiple subjects?

Yes. Filmbo will track whatever makes the largest movements in a shot. If a group of people travel in the same direction, Filmbo will track the entire group; however, it can not be configured to track a particular person in a group of people.

Does Filmbo only track people?

Filmbo tracks anything that moves (animals, human, objects etc) within an appropriate distance.

Can Filmbo work with ordinary digital cameras or GOPRO?

Currently it does not support these devices. Filmbo requires iOS to perform image calculations and Bluetooth to control the dock. However, we have made plans to develop docks for digital cameras and GOPRO. Stay tuned for updates.

Does Filmbo support iOS only?

For now, yes. In order to ensure the best motion tracking result, we have focused our efforts to develop Filmbo on iOS. We will start development for Android support in the near future.

Will there be any updates or upgrades to the Filmbo App?

Yes, our team will continually provide users with an updated app to enable more functions.

Will Filmbo have other Apps other than the one mentioned?

We have hopes for the Filmbo dock to do more than auto camera tracking. For that, we have begun developing new applications, so please stay tuned to our website.

Can Filmbo be used with FaceTime?

Currently, no. However, our team is committed to developing an app that can support FaceTime. We will keep our sponsors and users updated as soon as we make progress.
