story:
Healthy Strings is a Bluetooth® Low Energy humidity and temperature sensor with a companion smartphone app.

Referral Contest:

How to Participate

**See Referral Contest rules below.



As winter fast approaches, it brings with it cold, dry air that has the potential to damage wooden instruments if they are not given proper care.  Healthy Strings monitors the temperature and humidity inside your instrument’s case, providing real time data back to your smartphone.  The app will then alert you any time the humidity or temperature are outside the ideal range.


How does Healthy Strings protect my instrument?

Every musician knows the most dangerous threat to their instrument is the environment to which it is exposed.  High quality wood has the tendency to shrink or expand when the relative humidity changes.  As relative humidity decreases, wood starts to shrink and the extra stress on the instrument can cause joints to fail and cracks to form.  

  • Healthy Strings alerts you when the relative humidity is too low, giving you time to make adjustments before it's too late.  
  • You may already own a room and case humidifier but what you don't have is a way to know the exact conditions inside your closed case.  Healthy Strings uses Bluetooth technology to connect wirelessly to your smartphone.  

Where is Healthy Strings in the development process?

  • We are early on in the development cycle, but have a clear path forward.  We have an iOS app that connects to and reads humidity and temperature data from a Bluetooth development kit.    


How will funds be used?

  • Now that we have a working app prototype and have proved the concept, it's time to finalize the design of the sensor and prepare for production.  
Timeline

Other Ways You Can Help

Do you know a musician?  Let them know about Healthy Strings.  Use the share buttons at the top of this page and get the word out about our campaign.  


*PayPal disclaimer:
“Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.”


**Referral Contest Rules:
If the campaign successfully meets the funding goal, the top referrer will be notified.  The top referrer is the person who has referred the largest amount of contributions to the campaign.
story_txt:
Healthy Strings is a Bluetooth® Low Energy humidity and temperature sensor with a companion smartphone app.

Referral Contest:
How to Participate
**See Referral Contest rules below.










As winter fast approaches, it brings with it cold, dry air that has the potential to damage wooden instruments if they are not given proper care.  Healthy Strings monitors the temperature and humidity inside your instrument’s case, providing real time data back to your smartphone.  The app will then alert you any time the humidity or temperature are outside the ideal range.



How does Healthy Strings protect my instrument?
Every musician knows the most dangerous threat to their instrument is the environment to which it is exposed.  High quality wood has the tendency to shrink or expand when the relative humidity changes.  As relative humidity decreases, wood starts to shrink and the extra stress on the instrument can cause joints to fail and cracks to form.  


Healthy Strings alerts you when the relative humidity is too low, giving you time to make adjustments before it's too late.  
You may already own a room and case humidifier but what you don't have is a way to know the exact conditions inside your closed case.  Healthy Strings uses Bluetooth technology to connect wirelessly to your smartphone.  


  Where is Healthy Strings in the development process?  We are early on in the development cycle, but have a clear path forward.  We have an iOS app that connects to and reads humidity and temperature data from a Bluetooth development kit.    







How will funds be used?

Now that we have a working app prototype and have proved the concept, it's time to finalize the design of the sensor and prepare for production.  
Timeline




Other Ways You Can Help


Do you know a musician?  Let them know about Healthy Strings.  Use the share buttons at the top of this page and get the word out about our campaign.  


*PayPal disclaimer:
“Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.”


**Referral Contest Rules:
If the campaign successfully meets the funding goal, the top referrer will be notified.  The top referrer is the person who has referred the largest amount of contributions to the campaign.

story:
universe2go in the press:

link

link

link

link


universe2go will turn you smartphone into a fascinating guide through the night sky with augmented reality (AR) binoculars. 

How does it work?

The augmented reality binoculars are a completely new technology, which we call “Stargazer”. It allows you to see the real sky and the generated overlay images simultaneously. To do this, universe2go uses an app on your smartphone (IOS/iPhones or Android devices). It generates images of the night sky based on your local time, geographic location and the orientation of the device. Or in short: it knows where you are and what you are looking at.

You may know a lot of successful sky map Apps on all mobile platforms which claim to have an AR feature. They show the background image from the camera to generate the illusion of an overlay of reality and virtual content. This works fine in the living room but is totally useless at the night sky because the smartphone camera is not light sensitive enough to catch the stars. universe2go in contrast generates "genuine" augmented reality!

Where does it work? - on every location on planet earth.

Which languages does it speak? - English and German.

Runs on which platforms? IOS/iPhone and Android.

Obviously it makes sense to leave your sofa and explore the real night sky outside to make use of universe2go!

What can you do with universe2go?

In Discovery-Mode you explore the 88 official constellations of the night sky. Learn how the visible constellation change with the seasons of the year and which stars at the sky belong to which constellation. The constellation will be visualized to you by universe2go with lines between the real stars, that you can see in the sky. And the best about it all: You will get a short audio explanation about the specialities of the constellation. The audio is available in English and German.


Constellation lines connecting the celestial stars to show you the 88 celestial constellations.

In Mythology-Mode universe2go will show you images of mythological figures, which the ancient cultures associated with the stars in the sky. Linger a short moment at the image and universe2go will start to narrate an ancient greek legend about it. Through this very entertaining way you will learn a lot about the gods, heroes,beasts and beautiful princesses of old.


Mythological figures image overlay to show you images of mythological figures of the ancient greek astronomer Ptolemy and others.

In Deep-Sky-Mode you will see interesting sky objects beside the stars, which you normally would not be able to see with your naked eye. Discover beautiful nebulae, galaxies and star clusters, which are invisible but nevertheless populate the sky in huge numbers. universe2go will show you a fine selection of interesting objects. The most important information will be displayed as overlay in the head-up-display. Then universe2go will zoom to show you great images of the best telescopes world-wide like the Hubble Space Telescope and will explain them with spoken background information.


Object information show you detailed information about stars, nebulae, galaxies, comets and planets.

Have you ever been to a 3D planetarium yet? 

When you hold on to a deep sky object you will get a zoomed image, a close up view of the objects, most of them in astonishing 3D!

(you need to watch this image with anaglyp / red-cyan glasses; with the universe2go no glasses are necessary to see the 3D effect)

For me this is the coolest feature of universe2go! You will love it.

You consider yourself as an experienced astronomer? Great! – Take the challenge and try to search & find constellations, stars, planets or deep sky objects in the sky. universe2go will set the task and will give you feedback if you are wrong or right  .

universe2go is for everyone!

Have you ever looked at the night sky and wandered which stars belongs to wich constellation?

Have your kids ever asked you about the stars and the night sky and all you knew was the big dipper?

Did you ever wanted to find the polar star and learn about what makes him so special?

Do you love to listen to fascinating stories about heroes, beasts and princesses of old?

Have you ever asked yourself how far you can see with your naked eye?

Do you want to know where all this beautiful Hubble images are located in the sky and learn more about their background?

Do you want to know if a meteor shower is coming tonight?

Did you ever wanted to find a comet that you heard or read about?

You know absolutely nothing about astronomy yet? (Or even if you do but love to learn something new...)

Then universe2go is definitely for you!!!


Will it work with any smartphone?

To claim that it will work with any smartphone would be incorrect - for any app.

Anyway universe2go works with many of the currently available smartphones on the market. (Windows phones excluded, could be a stretch goal).


The app will be available on the Apple App Store for IOS and on the Google Play Store for Android devices. You can choose from a list of compatible smartphones or put in the dimensions (size of display, number of pixels) in the settings.

universe2go will come with a hardware adapter for your smartphone so that it will securely fit into it. This adapter is made of a smooth material to protect the smartphone from scratches. If you change your smartphone some day you can buy just another adapter to keep using universe2go.

The evolution of universe2go


The first prototype was glued together with cardboard and some optics "at hand" nearly two years ago. The image quality was lousy but it proved that the idea would work. But as Thomas A. Edison put it "Innovation is 1% inspiration and 99% perspiration." After more than one year of development universe2go has now reached a great level of image quality, reliability and user friendliness. 


First of all the hardware (optics) needed to be optimized to be lightweight, yield a sharp image and get the maximum field of view in order to make even the big constellations to fit in real size.


Secondly we developed special algorithms to accord for the inherent measurement errors of the smartphone, especially the compass. Although the sensors in the devices have a high precision (e.g. they yield very exact measurement) the compass has a very low accuracy which is usually not better than +/- 15 degrees. We even put the smartphones on a computerized telescope mount and spun them around to make measurements. In endless testing sessions outside on the "real night sky" I finally figured out how to reliably identify the correct stars and to align the overlay image with the real sky. 

We experimented also with external sensors but beside the cost effect, we really wanted to stick to the idea of a "passive" device. You know - Murphy's Law; with additional sensors you would always deal with empty batteries, connection problems, incompatibility and so on. universe2go works as long as your smartphone works!

And last but not least we experimented a lot with different user interaction types to make the app very easy to use and control when it is inside the Stargazer device. Most of the time universe2go will work "automatically" - just look at a "Point of Interest", a star, a planet or a deep sky object and it will start explaining or telling an interesting story. Only when you want to switch between modes or change settings you control the app with movements of your head (which is very easy to learn, as many test persons have proven already). 

Where do we stand now?

We are now ready for production of the universe2go. We already designed and planned the production with industrial standard 3D data formats. universe2go will be Made in Germany in order to guarantee a high quality of the product.

  • The raised funding will be mainly used for creating the tooling for the injection molding but also for optimizing the Android and IOS apps and for mixing and sound processing of the audio.

Why should you fund this?

First of all you should fund universe2go because you think it is a very cool idea. Many people which have seen the prototype so far think that, too. Here are some testimonials:

"Great idea! Especially the 3D images" - Thomas Jacob

"Brilliant. Super idea. I believe this has a big future!" - Daniel Bockshecker

"I didn't know that stargazing could be that much fun!" - Marion Hofmann

Since we have filed several patents, we are experienced in implementing new technologies together with our industry partners. In the past we sold most of our ideas and lost control over them which hurts sometimes. With universe2go we wanted to enter a new road and a new experience because we believe in sharing ideas and in the community of people who want to see interesting projects growing and developing into a great product. 

For us universe2go is important not only for the business part of it but because

  • we want to share our enthusiasm for the night sky. Ralph Waldo Emerson said it perfectly: "Seen in the streets of cities, how great they are! If the stars should appear one night in a thousand years, how would men believe and adore; and preserve for many generations the remembrance of the city of God which had been shown! But every night come out these envoys of beauty, and light the universe with their admonishing smile." - Love this! 
  • universe2go makes you go outside and realize this beauty instead of using your iPad or smartphone inside as a cool gadget which shows virtual stars on your living room wall. 
  • it is a great educational device which let's you and your kids learn with great fun.
  • we need your support to make universe2go happen! The costs for the tooling is the most critical hurdle to take for any hardware project and a great risk for the entrepreneur if he does not know if anyone is really interested in his idea.
  • we want to establish an internet platform and a community where you can share astro images and stories of your own about the night sky. And Indiegogo is a great way to start such a community. Be the first one to join!

The road ahead

The next step is to make the injection molding tooling which takes about 6-8 weeks. When the tooling is complete, we will begin test production runs. If everything works fine we should be able to move to full production by Summer. The production timeline looks like this:

  • March: In conjunction with professional German mechanical engineers and designers with experience in mass market consumer products manufacturing we will finalize the tooling design. The pre-production prototype has been tested in the field and we are satisfied with the usability and look of the design. 
  • April: Injection molding tooling should be complete. Our manufacturer has done work of similar or more challenging designs for many clients in Europe. We have reviewed the tooling milestone based on the finalized 3D industrial data formats together with professional manufacturing experts. 
  • May: Final checks of engineering prototypes.  
  • June/July: Production begins. Our manufacturer has a large facility capable of producing 10,000 units per week, if necessary, and a demonstrated track record of high quality production for major consumer brands. 
  • end of July: Product transferred from factory, labeled, and shipped to backers' doors!

Stretch goals

More money - more fun! We have some more ideas to enhance the universe2go experience even more. Here is the first stretch goal: 

  • $60.000 - if we reach this funding goal, universe2go will get telescope connection functionality. (You will need a separately sold wireless device to interface with your telescope) 

More details about the goal and the next stretch goal will be given when each of the stretch goals are reached. There a some exciting options down the line!

Spread the word

Even if you do not want to fund universe2go yourself, maybe because you are not so much into night sky and astronomy, you can support us!
  • Tell friends about this campaign and the idea. Share it on Facebook, Twitter or Google+ or any other social media platform. 
  • All I want is, to make universe2go come to live and share my enthusiasm about the night sky with others.

Thank you!

Thank you! Yes, you! For all you out there who helped me coming this far with my idea. For all the encouragement and motivation and criticism and advice. 

My very special thanks go to: Marion Hofmann, Michael Hoock, Sebastian Madgwick, J-P Metsavainio, Paul Schlyter and Isidro Villo.

And thank you to all the new supporters of universe2go. Let's create a new way of sharing our love for the stars!


FAQ

  • What do I need to use universe2go? - you need a Stargazer device and a compatible smartphone (iPhone4, 4S, 5, 5S, 5C, iPod touch 4th Gen., Samsung Galaxy S3,S4,S4 active,S4 mini, Google Nexus, Sony Xperia, HTC One, LG G2). You need to download the free app universe2go from the Apple App Store or the Google Play Store .
  • My smartphone is not on the list. Can't I use universe2go anyway? - MAYBE, if it is smartphone running Android, you probably can. Check the specs of your smartphone. It needs a gyro sensor, a gravitational sensor and a compass. (GPS is supported but is not mandatory, you can specify your location manually in the settings). The size and resolution of the display does not matter. (For very small displays the 3D view might not be available.). (refer to your manual or load AndroSensor from the Google Play Store to check the available sensors of your device).
  • In which languages is the audio? So far you can listen to universe2go in English and German. (Let's see - hopefully Spanish and French will follow soon...)
  • Can I use earphones? - NO, not yet. That is because every smartphone has the earphone plug at a different position so the Stargazer device would need many holes for all device types (you can drill one on your own if you dare...). I am checking the possibility of having a small adapter plug that would fit into the case. Anyway you can use a Bluetooth headset if your smartphone supports it (which it does, probably).
  • Do I need an internet connection? - NO, all content is stored on the smartphone. You will need an internet connection only for content updates (planned to give you fresh information about new events)
  • Can I use universe2go without the Stargazer device? YES - you can. You can switch to a sky map mode in the settings. The sky map mode has the basic functions but no audio. 
  • Will universe2go be open source? - NO, not by now. The technology of the universe2go is currently registered and protected by patent law. But we are thinking about releasing a lightweight do-it-yourself cardboard kit that you could assemble together with your kids after we have successfully entered into the market.
  • Can I use universe2go with my glasses on? - YES, we designed the Stargazer device flat on the viewer's side to make it convenient for use with glasses on.
  • What is the difference between universe2go and a planetarium app? - JOY OF USE! A planetarium app is an intelligent sky map, but still it is a map. With universe2go you immerse into the real sky with augmented reality. And then, there is this awesome 3D effect... 

Who we are

Martin is the co-founder and CEO of innospiring with a PhD in quantum chemistry. He previously worked for Bayer as innovation manager. innospiring is an innovation consulting company based in Germany. The whole universe2go team is made up of programmers, a graphics designer and an audio engineer.

Website: http://universe2go.com

Contact: info@universe2go.com

The whole universe2go team is made up of programmers, a graphics designer and an audio engineer.Website: http://universe2go.comContact: info@universe2go.com

story:
Short Summary

TrashTalkr is a walled garden of burns. It is a safe haven for rips. It's where we all say the things you'd never say in public, directly to your friends.

From sports rivalries to videos games and beyond, crass cross-talk has found its home.

What We Need & What You Get

Our $10k total investment will go entirely to development and initial server costs.

Any contributor over $5 will recieve a free app upon release.

Contributors between $10 and $20 will recieve the app for free and a lifetime of free DLC content upgrades

Contributors over $20 will recieve the app for free and a lifetime of free DLC content upgrades

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about your TrashTalkr!

story:
In the Press:

Check out all the articles featuring the Root 101!

Network World

Geeky Gadgets

Phone Arena

Android Authority

Liliputing

Into Mobile

TG Daily

Android Community

GSM Lover

Airing News

EFY Times

VR Zone

The Gadget Show

And many more...

 

What is the Root 101?

The Root 101 is the most open source and affordable tablet available today.  It comes with a completely stock version of Android Jelly Bean 4.2 (the most current version) with no bloatware apps, no ugly skinned version of Android, and comes with root access so you can install any app and even custom ROMs.  We've spent months perfecting the software to get the most out of the hardware.  As of now we've already ported two of the most popular aftermarket ROMs to the Root 101...CyanogenMod and Paranoid Android. These ROMs give Android a unique look and feel and give you more customization options than the stock OS.

We're dedicated to making this the most open source tablet available.  All our source code will be available online making it much easier for developers to build custom ROMs.  As people develop new ROMs we'll host them on our website for others to use.

When Google releases new versions of Android we'll keep updating our software so that you're always using the latest and greatest.  There's nothing worse than buying a new device only to find that a new version of Android is available a few months later and you're stuck with the old version.

 

Why Did We Choose Indiegogo?

We're a new consumer electronics start-up and it's hard to get into this business.  Manufacturing great products takes a substantial initial investment.  In order to sell devices for an affordable price a large number of units need to be made.  Indiegogo gives us the opportunity to bring our product to tech enthusiasts just like us.  We've all backed other products on this site and are huge fans of crowdsourcing.  It gives people like us, who are passionate about what they do, the chance to create things never possible before.

 

What We've Done So Far?

We're a small team of 3 people (Tomi, Justin and Fredrik) with many years experience in Android development and device manufacturing.  We've spent the last six months preparing ourselves for this Indiegogo launch.  

Hardware

Everyone on our team has been tablet enthusiasts since before the original iPad was announced.  It's impossible to count how many tablets we've owned over the past few years.  The last few months were spent testing just about every hardware configuration you can imagine.  We knew we wanted to keep the price low, have long battery life and enough power to run apps and watch HD videos.  After all the testing we finally ended up with the combination of components that we felt gave us the best results.  Once this was done we began working with many hardware partners in China to figure out the best plan for manufacturing.  After successful prototypes were built and tested, the design and bill-of-materials were finalized.  The factory has the components ready to go and is now waiting for the go ahead from us to begin manufacturing.  We've estimated about 4 weeks from Indiegogo funding to delivery to our HQ in the US.  Once that happens then its about 2 weeks until it's delivered to your door.

Software

Much of the focus of tablets is on the hardware, but in reality the software is just as important.  Having spent much time on Android tablets we knew we wanted to give our customers options.  And we knew that a stock version of the OS had to be one of those options.  Our amazing software developer has been hard at work optimizing Android for the Root 101.  A good, clean Android build does wonders for both performance and battery life.  He's also completed ports of CyanogenMod and Paranoid Android, so as of right now we have 3 builds of Android running on our prototype devices.  There's still a small amount of fine tuning to be done in the code, but that will be finished well ahead of manufacturing.  When the product launches all our source code will be available on Github.

Stock Android 4.2

CyanongenMod 10.1

Paranoid Android 3.55

 

Tech Specs

The Root 101 has everything you need for a great tablet experience.  A great screen, long battery life, a dual core processor and all the connectivity options you want...WiFi, Bluetooth, Micro USB and MicroSD slot.  It even has a Mini HDMI out so you can output up to 1080P video from the tablet to your TV.  Here's the full list:

-10.1” IPS HD screen with 1280 x 800 resolution

-Multi-touch capacitive screen

-AmLogic AML8726-MX Dual Core 1.5GHz CPU

-Mali-400 Dual Core GPU – up to 1080P video

-1GB RAM

-16GB Internal Storage

-MicroSD slot – up to 32GB

-Wi-Fi (802.11 b/g/n)

-Bluetooth

-VGA Front camera and 2MP rear camera

-9 hours battery life (7000mAh)

-Mini HDMI slot – output up to 1080P to TV

-Micro USB slot

-3.5mm headphone jack

-Microphone

-G-Sensor

-2 Rear speakers

-Rear aluminum shell for strength and durability

-Dimensions: 260mm x 173mm x 9.9mm

-Weight: 1.39lbs

 

What Will the Final Product Look Like?

The images you've see so far are of one of the prototype devices.  The final tablet will be the same, but with different colors and finishes.  Here are some renders of what the final product will look like.

See our website HERE for more pictures.

Project Timeline

  • December 2012 - March 2013: Component testing and initial software development
  • March - April: Component and factory selection, prototype developed and manufactured
  • April - May: Prototype testing, software development, design and bill of materials finalized.
  • May: Manufacturing specifications and pricing agreements signed, USPS shipping partnership established.
  • May - June: Indiegogo campaign creation, packaging designed, software development
  • June - July: Indiegogo campaign, software finalized
  • Early July: Indiegogo campaign complete and manufacturing begins
  • Early August: Root 101s arrive from factory at HQ in the US for final quality control
  • Mid August: Root 101s shipped to customers
  • After August: Continued software development and ROM updates

 

More Information

If you'd like more information on the Root 101 you can check out our website:

tronity.com

Or you can follow us here:

facebook.com/TronityRoot101

twitter.com/TronityInc

story:
Our New Campaign is Here

Indiegogo has asked us to relaunch new campaign as flexible funding one and has stopped this Campaign.

Due to some technical reason Indiegogo can not continue fixed funding campaigns generated in India. here are the screen shots of the support requests we send when our campaign was disabled for funding and answer we got from support team.

Our Request

http://postimg.org/image/7nz4lcc0h/

Response from Indiegogo Support team

http://postimg.org/image/otfy8hdb5/


We truly apologies for the inconvenience caused. we will update the link of new campaign here as soon as it is launched.

We will also take care about couple of funders who have funded us prior to disabling of campaign. we will make sure that they get there funds refunded. and would like to thank them for support.

Short Summary

IOTrain is a simple, small yet brilliant piece of innovation which allows Arduino to have as many digital IOs as you wish. Each module adds 24 IOs to your project and you can cascade multiple such modules to fulfill your project requirements

Who We are

I am Tushar Jambhekar, I own Jambhekar Automation Solutions.We are experts in electronics and PC based Industrial automation. For past 7 years we are in this field and in India we have provided services to companies like Whirlpool, John Deere, Emerson etc.

The Story Behind IOTrain

For quite some time I am working on Arduino. and it is awesome development platform . It simplifies the development a lot.

However when you select a particular Arduino board you are limiting the number of IOs that can be utilized in your project. E.g. UNO is having 14, Leonardo is having 20 whereas ADK has got 54.

If your projects needs more IOs; then things suddenly get quite tough. You might need to

  1. Design custom circuits
  2. Implement complex protocols like SPI, I2C etc.
  3. Spend many days in debugging code.
  4. Struggle to comply with timing constraints.
  5. Spend money on costly equipments to analyze timing characteristics.

And so complexities pile up.

I wanted to eliminate all these complexities once for all.

I believe that developing small projects on Arduino is simple and it should remain simple irrespective of size of project.

Meet IOTrain and Say No To Complexities

IO train is cascadable IO expander which goes well with Ardiuno philosophy. Each IOTrain Module has got 24 digital IOs. and you can cascade as many modules as you want till the time you don’t hit total of 65000 IOs.

Also for interfacing IOTrain to Arduino or compatible board you don’t need to learn much. IOTrain comes with its own open source Arduino library. Library functions are similar to Arduino’s digitalWrite and digitalRead functions

How It Works

Under the hood IO Train uses I2C protocol. During initialization of IOTrain auto detection algorithm in firmware detects the number of modules attached to i2c bus of Arduino. Each module on bus assign itself appropriate channel numbers (e.g. first module takes channel number 0-23, second module occupies 23-47 and so on.). and subsequent commands can use channel number for reading or writing status information on it.

Blink Program with IOTrain


IOTrain is Open Hardware and Open Source

On successful completion we will release the source files of software and hardware on our product site

Compatibility

IOTrain can be used to extend IOs on any Arduino or Arduino compatible board which has got hardware i2c interface. It consumes only two pins on Arduino and in return can happily give back hundreds of IOs.

Technically IO Train can be used by any device which is capable of communicating over i2c. but it will need IOTrain library to be ported for the device.

IOTrain works on 5V logic levels hence level shifter will be required for devices that do not work with 5V levels.(We or working on it and trying to make it work on both 5 and 3.3V levels)

Are you thinking about using IOTrain with Raspberry PI? We feel that its a great idea. and as soon as we hit the project goal we will introduce the stretched goal for porting IOTrain to RaspberryPi. We will also add 3.3V <-> 5V level shifter board required by raspberry pi as a perk

What is Current Status of Project

We have created 5 prototype boards for IOTrain. we have completed the development of firmware and we have also completed the IOTrain Library for Arduino.

By cascading 5 IOTrain modules we have tested it for up to 120 channels of input as well as outputs and it is working great

What Needs To Be Done Yet

Double layer PTH PCBs instead of curent single layer ones

Our current prototype PCBs are manufactured in house using single layer design. However for final product we will be using double layer PTH PCBs. design of new PCB is complete but manufacturing will be done immediately after completion of campaign. (Double layer PCBs always perform better than single layer PCBs hence this does not involve any risk)

One more prototype run

Our current prototype is working great however we will be creating one more prototype which will focus on making board compact and sexier.

Validate that IOTrain works for very very high channel counts

Theoretically IOTrain supports up to 65000 channels however we have tested it only up to 120 channels. Upon receiving of funds we will manufacture multiple boards and will test it for at least 1024 channels. (We have already simulated most of the situations like extended lengths of i2c bus etc. but we still need to test with lots and lots of cascaded boards)

Ensure quality of manufactured product using automated test equipment

We want to make sure that each module delivered to our customers is defect free. We are ready to invest time and money required for that. We already have plans for automated test system to test each manufactured module before dispatch.

What We Need and What You Get

We need your support to turn this project into reality. To bring prices down we need to mass produce our modules and we need at least USD 7,500 to start producing boards. Funding of USD 10,000 or more will make our life more simpler though. So please Support us by picking biggest perk you can. By passionately picking bigger perk you are not only supporting for a cause but you are also receiving back a bigger reward.

Please don't stop yourself just by picking the big perk. you can support the cause in many ways which wont cost you a penny. you can

  • spread the news about IOTrain over social media
  • ask your friends and relatives to support this project
  • if you know journalists ask them to write about IOTrain
  • follow us on twitter @t_jambhekar and #IOTrain
  • re-tweet the #IOTrain tweets
  • let us know about people and projects who can use IOTrain .(we will take efforts to make IOTrain to be a great experience for them)

In return to your support we are responsible not only to you but also to community

For you we will

  • take best of our efforts to deliver your rewards in time if not earlier.
  • provide defect free product and great experience.
  • provide you email support if you face difficulties in using IOTrain.

For Community we will

  • make IOTrain a evolving product
  • support IOTrain users to fair extent (IOTrain is open source so some users may not be our customers)
  • continuously learn through the process and make life of hardware tinkerers easier.
  • create more such products.(we are lined up with other ideas)

Rewards

IOTrain (pin header)

IOTrain (screw term)

How your money will get utilized

  1. To manufacture additional prototype run with double layer PCB
  2. Make large orders for production and bring price down
  3. To build automated test equipment for quality check
  4. Documentation, example codes etc.
  5. Working on half a dozen related ideas we have.

Risks and challenges

As with any project, there are risks and challenges with this project as well. First of all, we’re still not finished with our product. That means some issues may still arise, though unlikely.

Moreover, testing and setting up manufacturing process takes time. unforeseen causes might delay the process to some extent.

As far as prices are concerned we have taken in to account the extra costs to cover manufacturing risks.

story:
Short Summary

After 15 years of full time entertaining I am TIRED of looking unprofessional and dealing with modified home improvement store cases!  Nothing on the market is durable, professional looking, or made for an entertainer!  Until now!!  

B. Happie Entertainment is already the manufacturer of Happie Amp, the leading, #1 selling, #1 trusted PA system for entertainers.  We also manufacture Ultimate Control.  The mp3 player with remote that has taken the industry by storm.  Recieving rave reviews around the world!  

Now, we have set our focus on creating the PERFECT case for the working pro.  We have consulted many working pros and factored in everything needed.  

CHECK THIS OUT!!

The Case

  • Cushioned black velvet top for a professional performance area
  • Build in dial locks to keep prying eyes out
  • Black ionized aluminum frame for durability and professional look
  • Black sides and bottom provide non-scratch, non-dent long lasting surface
  • Customizable pick and pluck foam inside to make your own pockets
  • Custom sized pockets in the lid for cards, coins, pens, markers, wands, TT, silks and more.
  • magnetic feet attach to the metal table to prevent tipping over
  • Rubber feet on the bottom to protect the case when you set it down.
  • 17 inches by 13 inches.
  • 4 inch or 5 inch depth. YOUR CHOICE. SAME PRICE FOR THIS CAMPAIGN.
 

 The stand and table

  • Tripod stand folds down to 22" and up to 45"
  • durable aluminum tripod frame holds steady and wont tip
  • lightweight for easy transportation
  • solid and thick metal table top
  • elegant black velvet table cover
  • the table can be used seperately too!
  • elastic straps hidden under the table hold the case and stand for trasnport WITH ONE HAND
  • breaks down in seconds

What We Need & What You Get

This is an opportunity to make sure you get one of these cases and at a significant discount!  Availability may be limited!  We are ordering based on orders placed here.  If our target is not met, you will not be charged.  Since manufacturing will take place at the end of the campaign (or once the minimum is reached) delivery is estimated 60 days after the campaign ends.  

Retail for this case is $249 plus shipping!  We are offering this fund-raising special deal of $200 and only $5 shipping in the US.  Additional shipping for international orders can be determined by starting an order here - http://goo.gl/ejKQr once you enter your address, shipping options will come up.  Rates may changed based on carriers current rates.

The offers:

  • A $50 donation will get you a $70 Happie Amp gift certificate good toward any Happie Amp products.  You will get it after the campaign ends.
  • A $205 donation will get you the Portable Pro Buskers Table including US shipping. $265+ value (international shipping will be determined after the campaign is over.) 
  • A $400 donation will get you 2 Working Pro Close Up Cases and free US shipping. $520+ value.  (international shipping will be determined after the campaign is over.)
  • A $600 donation gets you a Working Pro Close Up Case and an Ultimate Control! $698 value
  • A $1000 donation gets you a Working Pro Close Up Case and $1000 credit toward any Happie Amp purchase!  Yes, a FREE Working Pro Close Up Case!! 

 HOW THIS WORKS:

You make your contribution now and the money is held in escrow until we:

A: REACH THE GOAL!  And then money is released to B. Happie Entertainment / Happie Amp to produce the tables.  Production begins and in about 2 months you receive your delivery.

B: Our goal is not reached and your money is refunded to you in full.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word!  Share the link to this campaign with your friends. Use the indiegogo share tools.
story_txt:
Short Summary
After 15 years of full time entertaining I am TIRED of looking unprofessional and dealing with modified home improvement store cases!  Nothing on the market is durable, professional looking, or made for an entertainer!  Until now!!  
B. Happie Entertainment is already the manufacturer of Happie Amp, the leading, #1 selling, #1 trusted PA system for entertainers.  We also manufacture Ultimate Control.  The mp3 player with remote that has taken the industry by storm.  Recieving rave reviews around the world!  
Now, we have set our focus on creating the PERFECT case for the working pro.  We have consulted many working pros and factored in everything needed.  
CHECK THIS OUT!!
The Case



Cushioned black velvet top for a professional performance area
Build in dial locks to keep prying eyes out
Black ionized aluminum frame for durability and professional look
Black sides and bottom provide non-scratch, non-dent long lasting surface
Customizable pick and pluck foam inside to make your own pockets
Custom sized pockets in the lid for cards, coins, pens, markers, wands, TT, silks and more.
magnetic feet attach to the metal table to prevent tipping over
Rubber feet on the bottom to protect the case when you set it down.
17 inches by 13 inches.
4 inch or 5 inch depth. YOUR CHOICE. SAME PRICE FOR THIS CAMPAIGN.


 
 The stand and table

Tripod stand folds down to 22" and up to 45"
durable aluminum tripod frame holds steady and wont tip
lightweight for easy transportation
solid and thick metal table top
elegant black velvet table cover
the table can be used seperately too!
elastic straps hidden under the table hold the case and stand for trasnport WITH ONE HAND
breaks down in seconds

story:
Press Coverage

Gotta Be Mobile: "Magic Case Almost Turns an iPhone Into Swiss Army Knife. One of the most useful cases designed."

Trend Hunter: "The Magic Case quite literally is the Jack of all trades. It’s hard to find something this functional phone case by Elad Ben-Hur for the iPhone doesn’t do."

Apple Fan Site: "Overall we think this case would be a great benefit to iPhone users across the world."

Fashion Notes: "Want something that’s functional, pretty and protective all in one for your most beloved iPhone. The solution? The Magic Case. A revolutionary idea."

Tech Fan Site: "The Magic Case by Elad Ben-Hur, is slick, sturdy, unique and cool and features some interesting concepts."

iPhone Club Netherlands: "The Magic Case adds a lot of features to your iPhone."

iPhone France: "The Magic Case has more than one trick up his sleeve."

Poder Pda: "The Magic Case is very ingenious and it's great for iPhone users."

iPhone Rumors: "The iPhone Magic Case not only helps to lower cell radiation but also achieves all of the features as well and so much more."

iMagzin: "The Magic Case does something beyond an additional function."

Phones Review: "The Magic Case is slim yet sturdy offering protection for the display."

Wired: "Magic case for iPhone, like the Swiss Army knife of phone cases. One of the projects that we really like."

 

 

How The Magic Case Was Born

Hi, my name is Elad Ben-Hur and I am the inventor and the creator of The Magic Case.

I love the iPhone, it is a great high tech communication tool, very useful, helpful and unique. We all know what it can do, but we still need to protect it and protect ourselves from cell phone radiation.

My main goal on this project was to take the iPhone accessories to the next level. My objective was to produce an iPhone case that is practical, sturdy, slick, unique, cool, fun and that has many useful functionalities, and most important have the abilities to protect the iPhone users from cell phone radiation plus shielding the iPhone from external damage.

There are many iPhone gadgets and accessories out there on the market, but most of them are limited on their functionalities.

The Magic Case protects your iPhone, and with the many of it's useful functions such as, the kickstand, the car holder, the wallet and more, all  in one thin and sturdy iPhone case, makes The Magic Case handy practical and unique. 

I’ve worked on The Magic Case for almost a year, worked on its design, making research about cell phone radiation and testing it, survey the people on their qualities preferences for their cell phone case etc.

I made and tested many prototypes and finally locked on the final prototype that you can see here and in my video clip.

I am fully satisfied with my invention and I know that you will be satisfied too from the first moment you use The Magic Case product.

 

 

The Magic Case overview

The Magic Case is a three-part system (a cover, front case and back case with hanger). The case’s two light frames are attached to each other with no extra parts. Put them one on top of the other and it clasps on the iPhone. The cover is made from polyurethane and magnets that click perfectly on the front and the back of the case and attached on the side to slide it smoothly from side to side (with no screws or adhesive).

 

Reduces Cell Radiation

From Apple iPhone's user manual:

  • "When on a call using the built-in audio receiver in iPhone, hold iPhone with the dock connector pointed down toward your shoulder to increase separation from the antenna. When using iPhone near your body for voice calls or for wireless data transmission over a cellular network, keep iPhone at least 15mm (5/8 inch) away from the body”

 

How The Magic Case protects you? 

Embedded inside The Magic Case's cover an industrial aluminum foil and 3 small aluminum parts plus mini antenna that after months of research we found the perfect way for casing them inside the cover. The result of it, is that the cover redirects cell phone radiation away from the user by up to 90% as was professionally tested by the ORDOS TECHNOLOGIES LABS LTD that are specialized on cell radiation research, safety and measurements.

The Magic Case not only protects you from cell phone radiation while using the iPhone, it also protects your body from the radiation when the iPhone is placed in your pocket (The aluminum doesn't block the radiation your device need in order to communicate with cell phone towers because the mini antenna stabilizes the signal).

 

Full Protective Case

The slim yet sturdy Magic Case protects your iPhone screen and its back, including the buttons, speakers and connectors, so your iPhone is fully protected all around (The Magic Case drop tests finished successfully from a height of 8 feet indoor and outdoor, on a flat and rocky surfaces). The Magic Case is made from hard high quality plastic that covers an outer metal frame witch make's it durable and carefree when you take your iPhone out of your pocket.

 

Smart Panel

The breakthrough design with the precision cuts on the front cover of The Magic Case, permits the user full view of time and date display, and the other for slide and caller ID that make's no need to open The Magic Case to answer a call (needs only a simple slide to answer the call).

The covers are magnetic and click on the front and the back of The Magic Case (fits on both sides) and are designed to cover and protect the iPhone from external damage.  

The home button allows the iPhone to be used with The Magic Case closed and using SIRI is effortless.

The Magic Case's cover has also a perfect opening for the back camera and the receiver, and in no time you can remove the covers from the case.

Photo from Left to right: Time and Date, Caller ID, SIRI:

  

 

iPhone Wake/Sleep 

Open The Magic Case's cover and the iPhone magically wakes up (turns itself on). Close it and the iPhone automatically goes into a sleep mode (turns itself off).

This feature occurs due to a perfect combination between The Magic Case and a special APP that will be release exclusively FREE for the buyers of The Magic Case.

 

Kickstand

The Magic Case serves as a stand for the iPhone, enabling landscape and portrait orientation at multiple angles - perfect for watching movies, typing, or making video calls

The Magic Case’s cover folds in just the right places to become the perfect FaceTime and movie-watching stand.

It also does double duty as a keyboard stand. Fold it back to tilt iPhone into a comfortable typing position.

The hanger opens up to portrait positions in multiple angles.

 

Mount

With The Magic Case’s strong, strategically placed magnets, you can take your iPhone to any magnetically responsive surface and mount it on the front or the back of it.

 

Car Holder

The Magic Case has a flexible hanger that helps place the iPhone in the car by hanging it over your car's internal mirror.

 

Hanger

The Magic Case conveniently hangs on a piece of equipment while you use your cell phone to time yourself, so basically you can hang it anywhere for multiple uses. For example you can use it as an holster, hang it on your bicycle, on your wall charger, on your pants, etc.

Hang your iPhone and take video or pictures while you ride or drive.

For fun, you can "looping" the phone with your finger and keeps the phone secure in your hand during everyday use.

 

Wallet

The wallet feature that is located on the back of The Magic Case helps perfectly secure up to two credit cards and three fold (to half) bills.

Photo from Left to right: Full Wallet, Handy, Use the wallet as the cover secures it on the back while using the hanger.

 

Bottle opener

The hanger of The Magic Case can be used also as a bottle opener. Just pull it from the back of the case and use it as a bottle opener (This bottle opener was optimized and tested on all types of bottles from Coke to beer).                                                

 

Cable Organizer

Wrap your earbud cords or charger cable without skipping a beat. When you're done using your earbuds, simply wrap them over your iPhone, snap the cover closed, and pop your earbuds right off. The Magic Case keeps your cords and charger cable neat and secure, whether in a bag, pocket, or attached to your iPhone.

         

 

Colors

The Magic Case comes in 5 colors: blue, green, pink, gray, black. All colors are availabe to both Magic Case 5 and 4/4S models.

 

Size & Weight

The Magic Case in iPhone 5 model weighs 38 grams (1.3 OZ) and measures 4.9 inches (126.8 MM) Tall, by 2.4 inches (61.6 MM) Wide, by 0.49 inches (12.6 MM) Thick.

The Magic Case in iPhone 4/4S model weighs 32 grams (1.1 OZ) and measures: 4.6 inches (118.2 MM) Tall, by 2.4 inches (61.6 MM) Wide, by 0.56 inches (14.3 MM) Thick.

 

Where We’re At

We have a clear plan to cross the finish line, and part of that plan relies on you. We have calculated that we need $50K to bring The Magic Case to the market. The funds are for the molds and for the production level (please keep in mind that this is a fixed project , that means if we don't reach our goal none of us gets The Magic Case and the contributions are refunded). 

Here is a breakdown of our timeline for the project:

  • February - Indiegogo Campaign.
  • March - Indiegogo Campaign Ends + DFM Evaluation And POs Issued.
  • April - Tooling And Production.
  • May - Production And Products Shipping.

 

A Little Bit More About The Project And Myself

I am an industrial designer and software engineer. I am looking for funding the production stage of this project in order to be able to produce The Magic Case for iPhone users and make it a reality.

I believe that The Magic Case with its useful functional features and its qualities, can help make iPhone cell communication tasks much practical and easy. 

I put a lot of thought into the design of The Magic Case. I produced many prototypes and checked them of one by one until I got the present prototype that is perfect (Keep in mind that when the Magic Case will be produced from molds in mass production, it will look nicer more appealing, shinier and thin than the prototype in the video).

The Magic Case will be produced from high quality materials in the colors mentioned, and will come with 3 years warranty.

  

FAQ

Will the magnets erase my iPhone memory?

  • No, your data is safe. iPhone use flash memory that isn't affected by magnetic fields.

Will the magnets interfere with my iPhone's performance?

  • No. The magnetic field of The Magic Case is far enough from the iPhone itself.

Will The Magic Case (and cover) cause antenna Interference or degrade my signal?

  • In our lab testing, we found no degradation of signal strength with the case (and the cover) on vs off.

Will the magnets harm my credit cards while using The Magic Case as a wallet?

  • We tested it for months in our labs and we use it every day and there is no harm to credit cards because they are far enough from the magnets and basically the magnets aren't strong enough to damage them.

Where can I mount my iPhone with The Magic Case ?

We use The Magic Case to attached our iPhones to refrigerators, dry-erase boards, MacBook displays and other magnetically-responsive surfaces.

Does The Magic Case works with all iPhone docks?

  • Yes, with no problem.

Does The Magic Case works with all screen protectors ?

  • Yes, with no problem. 

Does The Magic Case works with other phones or devices other than iPhone 5/4/4S ?

  • While The Magic Case is designed specifically for the iPhone 5/4/4S, we hope to offer versions for other devices in the near future.

How I select which Magic Case model and color I get with my order ?

  • We will send you a form when the funding is completed so we can confirm the exact combination you will be getting.

Where do I add money for international shipping?

  • When you select a contribution level, you’re prompted to enter in the total contribution amount just below. This is for people that need international shipping (outside the US).

What if I forgot to add international shipping?

  • Please contribute again and add shipping cost at your perk level (or add it to the “Thank You” perk).

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Patents Pending

 

Visit our web site: www.themagicase.com 

Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/TheMagiCase  

 

 

Apple & iPhone are registered trademarks of Apple, Inc and are not affiliated in any way with our product.

story:
By the Iceberg Team

                                                                                                     Athens, Greece


A simple concept behind Iceberg 

We decided to create a unique dock for a unique device (Galaxy S4 or relative type) that is not only a useful ergonomic dock but also an object of elaborate design.

High quality

Iceberg Dock is made out of 100% high quality, solid aluminum. It is CNC-cuted, polished and anodized and comes with a luxurious finishing in two colors that complement the device’s tones (natural silver and black).

Details

 The CNC process

Use it the way you want

Now you can place your smartphone device the way you want.

Iceberg Dock is a super-steady, double-docking station. You can charge your device at portrait mode in 10° angle or use it for display at landscape mode in 45° angle. 

You can show videos to your friends without holding the device in shaking hands or you can skype-meet without an unstable, disturbing camera frame.


You can also charge your device while it stands beautifully on your desk or next to your bed, and you can undock it effortlessly due to its weight of 350gr.

You can even use its back size as a card stand for your office or the whole object as a beautiful iceberg-shaped paper weight.

Iceberg Dock is a functional object but a unique small-scale sculpture as well. It includes all basic docking functions for smartphones like Galaxy S4, as it enables charging, displaying, data transferring and even ‘laying’ of a second device on the other side.


Connection

You can plug in your own cable when you need to use it as a charging station or as a data transfer station. You can also remove the cable very easily when you are finished and move iceberg dock somewhere else. No screws, no hand tools, no wasted time - just unplug and go. 

        ...plug, unplug and go!


Specifications

- Size: 10cm x 8cm x 7cm (W x D x H)

- Weight: ≈ 0,35 Kg

- Material: Aluminum 6061, CNC Cut, Anodized

- Input Connection: Female micro USB type B

- Output connection: Male micro USB type B

- Anti-slip/scratch pad base protection

- Compatibility: Galaxy S4 type or bottom micro-usb charging phones


Personalize it!

About us

Five months ago we decided to create the Iceberg team: a team, with a mixture of designers and mechanical engineers who had the fresh idea of the Iceberg Dock, a dock ideal for Galaxy S4 type smartphones.

After observing the everyday use of Galaxy S4 type smartphones, we decided to launch a product that fulfills the needs of its users. We put into it all our efforts for a uniquely designed object as well as a fully functional gadget. 

Today, after experimenting with it for some months, we are more than happy to share with you our new idea. Your trust and support will help us make it true.

The four members of our team have different complementary experience and backgrounds and this makes us a dynamic group. 

Let us introduce ourselves to you:

Spiros Koutsaridis (mechanical engineer) and Angeliki Malakasioti (architect and designer) who enthusiastically initiated the project and designed the first model, Kostas Ikonomidis (mechanical engineer) who actively run the project through all stages and realized our first prototype, Giorgos Demenagas (mechanical engineer) who is responsible for managing the communication of our campaign and pushing it forward.

The management of all technical difficulties was accomplished thanks to our three mechanical engineers (Spiros Koutsaridis, Kostas Ikonomidis, Giorgos Demenagas) who invented the right solutions at the right moment. Angeliki Malakasioti created the audiovisual and communicational material for Iceberg Dock [http://sliceavisage.wix.com/angeliki-malakasioti-web]. 
And all of us united our efforts by engaging in the creation of our Indiegogo campaign.

We would also like to thank the following people:

- Thodori Makrosava and Alki Ikonomidi for experimenting with their Galaxy S4.

- Bernd Montag for using his font ‘sensation’ in our campaign.

- Kevin Macleod for using his music in our video.

  [Ghostpocalypse - 7 Master by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a CC Attribution 3.0.]


What more from us?

We are more than happy to help you with any more questions or concerns you may have, so please feel free to contact as at icebergdock@gmail.com


Thank you!

The Iceberg Team

story_txt:
By the Iceberg Team
                                                                                                     Athens, Greece




A simple concept behind Iceberg 

We decided to
create a unique dock for a unique device (Galaxy S4 or relative type) that is
not only a useful ergonomic dock but also an object of elaborate design.

High quality
Iceberg Dock is
made out of 100% high quality, solid aluminum. It is CNC-cuted, polished and anodized
and comes with a luxurious finishing in two colors that complement the device’s
tones (natural silver and black).


Details






 The CNC process



Use it the way you want
Now you can place
your smartphone device the way you want. 
Iceberg Dock is a
super-steady, double-docking station. You can charge your device at portrait
mode in 10° angle or use it for display at landscape mode in 45° angle. 
You can show
videos to your friends without holding the device in shaking hands or you can
skype-meet without an unstable, disturbing camera frame.







You can also charge your device while it
stands beautifully on your desk or next to your bed, and you can undock it
effortlessly due to its weight of 350gr.



You can even use
its back size as a card stand for your office or the whole object as a
beautiful iceberg-shaped paper weight.






Iceberg Dock is a functional object but a unique small-scale sculpture as well. It
includes all basic docking functions for smartphones like Galaxy S4, as it
enables charging, displaying, data transferring and even
‘laying’ of a second device on the other side.


Connection


You can plug in
your own cable when you need to use it as a charging station or as a data transfer station.
You can also remove the cable very easily when you are finished and move iceberg dock somewhere else. No screws,
no hand tools, no wasted time - just unplug and go. 

        ...plug, unplug and go!





Specifications


- Size: 10cm x 8cm x
7cm (W x D x H)
- Weight: ≈ 0,35 Kg- Material: Aluminum 6061, CNC Cut, Anodized- Input Connection: Female
micro USB type B- Output connection:
Male micro USB type B- Anti-slip/scratch pad base protection- Compatibility:
Galaxy S4 type or bottom micro-usb
charging phones

Personalize it!
Iceberg Dock can
be a perfect personalized gift. With the estimated delivery time around New Year's Eve, write your own engraved message on the Iceberg Dock and make a
wonderful present to the people you love.







Have a look at our unique perks

story:
What is REMTickle?

REMTickle is a device that will enable you to remotely power on your computer SAFE and EASY. Installation is so simple that anyone who can make an ordinary website account and plug a few wires will be able to install and use this device. You will no longer have to call someone to start your computer and you will never again need to leave it on, increasing CO2 emissions and exposing it to the internet.

REMTickle is noninvasive (no need to turn on your computer to install new hardware) and it uses Wake On Lan to power up any computer from your Local Area Network. One REMTickle device can be used to power up multiple computers from the same local network.

Why would you need REMTickle?

Accessing a remote computer isn't all about accessing its files. A remote computer may have a lot of resources you need to access like licensed programs, intranet access, processing power or maybe just a free, vacant computer that can be used to process some large amounts of data.

How does REMTickle work?

This is how REMTickle works:

1. Automatically discovers the computers from your network;

2. Sends its outside IP address to the server every time it changes so that you can easily access your network;

3. Accepts secured power or requests messages from main server and passes them to the local network;

4. OPTIONALLY - Monitors your internet connection and reboots the router if it fails to reconnect.

In order to turn on a computer you have to log in to your REMTickle account and then select the location and the name of the computer you want to POWER ON.


Easy to mount!






CO2 emissions and environment


Leaving a computer always on not only costs you money every month when the electricity bill is to be payed but it also has a severe impact on the environment. 

REMTickle is designed for extreme low power use (in fact, it uses the same power supply as your router). Also, the CO2 emissions generated by the production of one REMTickle is evaluated to be equal to those generated when leaving your computer on for 8 to 12 days, assuming that your power comes from a classic thermal power plant. And the math is even more in our favor when talking about multiple computers in the same location that can be started with the same device.

IP WATCHDOG

REMTickle can work as an IP watchdog, monitoring the internet connectivity. In case it detects loss of the internet connection, it automatically resets the router by cutting off its power and restoring it after a few seconds. This feature prevents you from having to drive a long way to the office just to reset a frozen router.

story:
Power Problem

The Apple Bluetooth Magic Trackpad and wireless Keyboard are great products. Unfortunately, they consume a lot of batteries and always seem to go dead at the worst possible time leaving you scrambling to find fresh batteries.

Solution

In an effort to keep batteries out of landfills and make owning these devices more cost effective, we thought it would be great if they had the option of being powered via a USB port. So in January 2012, we got to work.

After a few design iterations, we came up with a sleek one-piece design which is not only economical to make, but looks good too. This design is compatible with both Apple wireless keyboard (the two AA version) and Magic Trackpad.  You'll never have to raid your TV Remote for batteries again.

How does it work?

The power adapter replaces the batteries and the battery cover "button" on the wireless keyboard and TrackPad. Simply remove the AA batteries, slide in the adapter, then twist it to lock it in just as you would the original battery cover.  Plug the attached USB connection into a USB port on your computer or into any USB "wall wart" charger for an endless supply of power.  There are no drivers to install as peripherals still use Bluetooth to communicate with the computer.  When you turn off your computer, the USB ports shut down, so  there is no need to remember to turn off your Trackpad or keyboard.  If you want to go wireless again, simply swap the adapter out for some batteries and the original battery cover.

Under the hood...

Internally, the adapter contains the proper electronics to regulate the 5 volts from the USB port down to the 3 volts needed for the keyboard or TrackPad. It utilizes high quality surface mount low dropout voltage regulator and filtering capacitors. The end cap is milled from high quality stainless steel to match the look of the original battery cover, and the extension tube is milled from 6063 aluminum.  All parts are sourced or manufactured in the USA.

Why we need your support...

All the mechanical and electrical design work as well as the prototype is done, but manufacturing an elegant replacement battery cover is not cheap.  Notice our emphasis on it being elegant?  We believe our products should seamlessly compliment Apple's style and design.  So, in order to make this as affordable as possible, we need to place a large order and buy parts in bulk.  With your help we can start production very soon!

 

Options...

Some people are using the Apple wired keyboard and would like to plug the Power Adapter to it instead of into the comptuer.  So there is no need for a 3 ft cord.  Everyone will have the option to select how long they want the cord to be.  We will send out an email after the campaign closes to ask for the details then.

 

Thanks!

story:
For more than 15 years, TREKSTOR has a proven track record to foster trends and innovations in the IT and consumer electronics space. Being a medium-sized enterprise with international ambitions, we develop and market our products not only in Germany, but Europe and around the globe.  

A number of TREKSTOR products reached the peak of the sales charts and established us a market leader. Cemented by legendary success stories with our first MP3 players, external hard drives and most important the “Volks” cooperation with BILD.de. But apart from that, we also established ourselves as an OEM partner for retail and industrial customers.

This includes the TREKSTOR WinPhone 4.7, which was released in March of 2015. But now it is time to replace the device with an updated and even better version. Introducing:

TREKSTOR WINPHONE 5.0

Originally developed to accompany our B2B Smartagent, the device attracted some press interest during the 2017 IFA (Internationale Funkausstellung) in Berlin. And the press coverage lead to a large number of inquiries from individuals looking to replace their current Windows Mobile based smartphone, but who were not satisfied with the options available in the consumer market. Some people even suggested to put it on Kickstarter.

As TREKSTOR, priding ourselves for listening to our customers, we did just that. Check out the device below and decide for yourself.

 

Where are we now?

  • The device is fully designed from a hardware and materials perspective.
  • On the software side, the device will receive an upgrade to the latest OS version right before manufacturing, to give you the best experience possible.
  • We also already found an ODM to produce the device once the campaign launched successfully.
  • Finally, our logistics team is standing by to deliver each individual device to you, once they landed in Germany and have undergone final quality control.
  • Should you ever have an issue, the TREKSTOR service and support team is standing by to assist you.

 

Features

For your convenience, the Winphone 5.0 comes with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 617 Octa-Core CPU with 1.5 GHz, which should provide ample performance for any of your needs. We also build in 3 GB RAM and 32 GB of storage, the latter which can be expanded by up to 64 GB via microSD card. For all the photo lovers out there, we included a 13 MP main camera with dual flash and another 5 MP selfie-cam for video-calls. They can be done from home utilizing WiFi oder via 4G on the road. Connectivity is topped of by Bluetooth 4.2, a micro-USB port and a 3.5mm headphone jack.

So what else is there to know? Well, much. The device is fully made from Aluminum and Glas, with the front being protected by Gorilla Glas 3. The battery capacity is 2250mAh, which provides up to 5 days of standby or up to 6 hrs of call time. And all that fits into a device with a weight of 150 gramms, that fits easily into your pocket or purse, whatever you prefer.

 

Frequencies

This phone uses an LTE chip with a set number of LTE bands (see image above). Before purchasing the phone, please visit FrequencyCheck.com and select your country and carrier to find out, which bands you require. 

 

Design

Here are some detail photographs of the final device as we have it in our office and you can see in the video.

 

Timeline

 

Press feedback

 

Important Information

  • Some people maybe concerned, that Windows 10 Mobile has been written off by Microsoft. But there are two important factors to consider: Yes, there won't be any new functionality, but on the other hand, both RS3 and RS4 updates have been said to include further updates. Apart from that, Microsoft also promised to fix and bugs or security problems. From our side we can promise, that as we will provide the device with any update that is generally available.
  • TREKSTOR is a German company and offers service and support only in such countries, where regular operations take place. If you are outside these countries, please be aware that in case you need service, extra fees might apply
