We need to leave enough space for our names, K Bartczak and A Biro too...after all, we want to be immortalized on GarbleCard with you!

 

 
In researching the potential demand for GarbleCard, we have read a great many articles, studies and interviews addressing Smart cards and the related RFID technology and applications. The links below are valuable explanations used, in part, to prepare this project for Indiegogo. If you are interested in learning more, articles like these are a good place to start:
Newer cards can be hacked too. SmartCard Technology. How Smartcard Technology Works. Should I use my new RFID enabled Smartcard?Mythbusters banned from speaking about FRID chip by Visa and MastercardWho's been scanning your credit card?

 
This Indiegogo project is needed to raise the funds to mass manufacture the first ever production run of GarbleCard. It will be produced by the same companies that actually manufacturer credit cards already, however none of these are set up to produce cards with this kind of shielding technology. Accordingly, there are high costs, complex machine retooling and large minimum orders to get GarbleCard off the ground. It might be a cliché, but it’s true to say that without support of people like you on Indiegogo, this can't happen, and people everywhere would continue to be at risk of largely preventable fraud.
While we have working prototypes, to produce these in mass, we need your support. Our mission is to protect people from credit and identity theft. While the cards are cheap to produce, once the factory's equipment is set up, ultimately we can only get started with your help.
Not only do we need the funds to produce the first production run of GarbleCard, but we need funds to inform people about how high the hacking risks are right now, and what can be done about it. We want to make this affordable enough that everyone can be protected. This may not be possible if we're forced to use some other funding options that have to maximize returns over protecting the largest number of people.
Even if you can't afford to pledge yourself, we need people just like you, sharing on social media. We need people to show the people they care about how to protect themselves. We're determined to stop the current wave of credit card and identity theft dead in it's tracks. Every pledge or social share you make helps to make it real.
Thank you!
Kevin and Andy

story:
The ZBand does one thing and does it great.

Visit out website www.zband.biz

 

Note: Indiegogo are still experiencing issues with Internet Explorer 8 at the moment which prevents users from pre ordering and pledging support for the ZBand campaign.

To resolve this issue upgrade Internet Explorer to version 9. Alternatively use Google Chrome of Firefox.

Apologies for the inconvenience, the Indiegogo technical teams are working on this issue and it will be resolved soon. Contact support@indiegogo.com if you want assistance with your pledges.

 

So what is the ZBand all about?

The ZBand is a simple idea. It is a silent alarm wristband that vibrates to give you a gentle awakening without disturbing those near you. You set your alarm using your android device which communicates with the ZBand. When designing the ZBand we kept simplicity in mind and designed it to be small, light, comfortable, affordable and user friendly. The principle of the ZBand is simplicity, as Steve Jobs once said "Simple can be harder than complex. You have to work hard to get your thinking clean to make it simple. But it's worth it in the end, because once you get there, you can move mountains"

Who is the ZBand for?

Tired of being woken up by your partner's alarm in the morning? Don't want to wake the children in the next room or your newborn beside you? Or do you just hate the sound of alarms? Then the ZBand is for you. The ZBand is ideal for those who don't like an audio alarm bellowing out first thing in the morning. It is perfect for couples getting up at different times or for students or backpackers staying in dorms. The ZBand is also very useful for people with hearing difficulties where it can be used as a morning alarm or to alert the wearer of different times of the day.

How does the ZBand work?

5 simple steps:

1. Download our free Android app to your phone or tablet

2. Pair the ZBand with an android Smartphone or tablet using Bluetooth

3. Turn on the ZBand by pressing the button on the wristband and then press the connect button on the ZBand app.

4. When connected use the 3 toggles on the top of the screen choose to set alarm times and frequency of alarms, snooze functions or vibration strength. At the bottom of the screen press the save button and the ZBand will vibrate to confirm the function was saved. Then, the App disconnects from the ZBand.

5. Have a gentle awakening by the ZBand without disturbing anyone else in the vicinity

 

Members of the Band

Paul Griffin BTech, DipBus  and co-Founder

I'm a guy in my 30s from a great place called County Mayo on the west coast of Ireland. I never liked noisy alarms and in the summer of 2009 came up with an idea for a silent alarm. Many people have great ideas but just do not have the time to pursue them. Having thought about the ZBand for several months, in January 2010 I decided it was time to do or die. Some of the best ideas come from necessity and I wanted to develop a waking up solution that would improve my quality of life. So I took the plunge to bring the ZBand from idea to reality.

Initially I thought it would take a year at most to develop the ZBand. In fact it has taken three years' of hard work, while at the same time doing the day job to pay the bills. Throughout the period of development, my family and friends always believed in me and believed in the ZBand but they thought I was a little mad to put so much time and resources into it. I think, and I hope you'll agree, that the ZBand has been worth the effort.

Almost a decade ago I started my own company in Ireland. Even though the country has experienced the deepest recession in its history, my company has remained strong. This is due to our professionalism, high quality product, attention to detail and reliability: qualities that characterize the ZBand.

Declan Leonard BSc and co-Founder

Similar to Paul, I'm in my 30's and a fellow Mayo man from the west of Ireland. I've known Paul for many years now as we met as students in the University of Limerick and we both live and work in Dublin. One fine summer's day Paul came to me with the concept for the ZBand. I really liked it. Like all good ideas, it was simple. I immediately thought, why didn't I think of this years ago. Anyway, with my background in IT I was well placed to help Paul to bring the ZBand from an embryonic concept to the real physical product and phone application we see before us. It's been a long hard road, but it's worth it. I hope you enjoy the fruits of our labour.

FAQ

Q. Can I download the ZBand App to my android tablet?

A. Yes, the Zband App can be downloaded to any Android device be it a Smartphone or a tablet.

Q. Does the ZBand have to be in Bluetooth range for the alarm on the ZBand to go off?

A. No, the android device is used to set alarms on the ZBand. Once alarms are set on the ZBand the phone or tablet does not need to be connected to the ZBand.

Q. How do I set the vibration strength for the ZBand?

A. After downloading the ZBand app and pairing the ZBand to the android device you can connect the android device to the ZBand. When connected the ZBand app will show a screen with 3 toggles at the top of the screen. The 3 toggles show set alarms, snooze function and vibration strength. Press the vibration strength toggle, when open you can set vibration strength and then press save settings.

Q. On the set alarm screen, what does name mean?

A. This gives the user an option to name each alarm, for example 'Work' or 'Medicine' . The user does not need to name alarm if they do not wish to and can carry onto save alarm.

Q. Can the ZBand be used on different platforms?

A. At present the ZBand can only be used on the Android platform but we plan to have it on all platforms in the near future.

Q. Can I use other alarms on my device while using the ZBand?

A. Yes, the ZBand does not interfere with any other alarm on the phone or table, therefore the ZBand can be use on its own or in conjunction with another alarm

Q.How long does the ZBand last without a charge?

A.The ZBand will last approximately 10 days of regular use on a 30 minute charge. To charge the ZBand you can use the cable supplied or any macro USB charger which is the standard charger for nearly all android smartphones.

 

What stage is the ZBand at now?

At present we have the design and all the testing done on the ZBand and are very happy with the outcome. The next stage is the tooling stage, we are finalizing terms and this stage should be under way in the next week.

The ZBand App is fully finished and looks great. Again with simplicity in mind we designed the App to be as user friendly as possible.

What do we need the funding for?

We are looking for funding of $10,000. This is to get the ZBand into mass production and also to get the word out there about the ZBand.

You will be helping us get the word out there by pre-ordering a ZBand on Indiegogo. Once you have received your ZBand you will be telling your friends how great it is.

story:
PLEASE CONTINUE TO MONITOR WWW.POSTIFIER.COM FOR FURTHER INFORMATION ON OUR RE-LAUNCH.

   

 Click on the logo to view the article

Say goodbye to checking an empty Postbox!

The postbox has been around for centuries. We check them every day before entering the comfort of our home, apartment or flat and far too often find it's empty. Postifier is about to change all that.

Postifier was designed to provide the solution to those pointless frustrating walks to your postbox and back, empty handed. With smartphones as popular as ever we developed a device which sends an instant notification to your smartphone if post arrived during the day.

  • Postifier supports iOS and Android
  • Uses Bluetooth SMART (Low Energy)
  • Has a battery life of between 6 to 9 months
  • Average pairing range of 30metres or 100feet

Perfect for these situations

  • For the elderly and those with mobility impairment - Prevent them making fruitless trips to check an empty Postbox.
  • Long driveways - save those walks back down the driveway or having to get out of your car to check your postbox.
  • When carrying heavy bags - save the hassle of having to put down your bags whilst trying to locate your postbox keys.
  • When you are inside your home and waiting for the post - you can go to the front door with your smartphone and you will know if the post has arrived (even more useful when its raining and you don't fancy that walk outside in the cold).
  • Extreme temperatures or just pure laziness.

   

Where we are at

Our first prototype was developed based off the original Bluetooth 2.0 version. This was a proof of concept project and allowed us to iron out any issues and to focus on getting Postifier to do exactly what it is suppose to do.

Once we were satisfied with the results, we started work on the next generation Bluetooth SMART (Low Energy) version using a TI system on chip module. We chose this as it increased the battery life significantly and we are achieving between 6 to 9 months life span.

The size of Postifier is also important. We wanted something that sat inside the postbox and wasn't obtrusive. We have managed to squeeze all the components into a size similar to a pack of gum.

We partnered up with experts in the electronics field specialising in sensors and wireless technology. Our engineers have spent the last 8 months designing several PCBs, coding firmware and testing many different sensors and Bluetooth modules.

Real world testing has been completed and we are extremely happy with the results. We felt that it was time to take it to INDIEGOGO and get your support.

Why we need your help

All internal electronics, firmware, connectivity and iPhone app is complete. We focused all our efforts in getting this core area developed first. However we still have work to do.

We are asking for $30,000 which will go directly to:

  • The design of the custom, small and weatherproof enclosure
  • Final PCB revision
  • Component order/procurement (Initial estimated production run of at least 500 units)
  • Component assembly
  • Regulatory testing and approval
  • Android application development
  • Packaging design

With the funds raised we will be able to achieve all of the above and get Postifier into your postbox.

Here's How It Works

Postifier has reusuable adhesive, so you stick it to the inside roof panel of your postbox. The sensor detects change in infrared light when post is inserted into your postbox. The Bluetooth module then activates and waits for pairing with your smartphone.

You need Bluetooth enabled and the application running (minimised) in background and that’s all there is to it. You will now be notified on your smartphone before you reach your postbox, or when you drive into your driveway and never again open an empty postbox!

Once the notification appears on your smartphone, the application opens and you press OK. This will get Postifier ready for the following day. It really is that easy!

   

Enclosure Designs

FAQ’s

1. Can we ship internationally? Yes! Please add $10 for international shipping outside of Australia.

2. Which smartphones are compatible? It will work on all current or future iPhone’s (4s, 5 or later) and Android smartphones that support Bluetooth SMART (Low Energy). It will also work with the iPod Touch 5th Gen or later. Please consult your smartphones manual to confirm if it supports Bluetooth SMART (Low Energy).

3. How many smartphones will Postifier work with? Up to 3 smartphones can be paired to receive notifications.

4. What is the battery life expectancy? Based on our testing results, we are achieving a life of between 6 to 9 months (depending on usage). The batteries are replaceable.

5. What is the range of Postifier? We have achieved an average pairing range of 30metres or 100feet during testing; however this depends on factors such as line of sight. We have tested with a metal and wooden postbox.

6. How do I get the Postifier application? Download from the Apple App Store or Google Play - FREE!

7. What temperatures can Postifier operate in? Based on the components datasheets it can operate in -25°C to +85°C. Perfect for all parts of the world.

8. How can I get in contact for further information? Please email info@postifier.com for any questions.

9. You're a distributor or reseller and would like to carry our product? Contact us at info@postifier.com

5. What is the range of Postifier? We have achieved an average pairing range of 30metres or 100feet during testing; however this depends on factors such as line of sight. We have tested with a metal and wooden postbox.
6. How do I get the Postifier application? Download from the Apple App Store or Google Play - FREE!
7. What temperatures can Postifier operate in? Based on the components datasheets it can operate in -25°C to +85°C. Perfect for all parts of the world.
8. How can I get in contact for further information? Please email info@postifier.com for any questions.
9. You're a distributor or reseller and would like to carry our product? Contact us at info@postifier.com

story:
THE PROJECT

Remember the days of analog sound? Back in those days when there was no option, initially Gramophone then Tape recorder were the only fantastic thing that people used to like. It used to be an analog form of recording. By then, there were no major inventions like the iPods and smartphones which people currently use. There were the loud speakers that used to amplify sound unlike today where we have preamp to amplify sound to a great level. Many today don’t remember that but for those who have experienced it know of its unique quality and sound texture.

So here we are introducing ANLG, a beautifully hand-crafted ceramic barrel that allows you to play music from your smartphone. ANLG is simple, attractive, and its iconic design creates a centrepiece for gatherings. It enhances your audio so you can use it for music at the park, conference calls, and podcasts. Portable so you can take it anywhere, and it doesn’t waste battery life connecting to Bluetooth speakers.

We spent 2 years redesigning the experience and to bring that feel into contemporary music listening experience.  We have designed numerous iterations and prototypes. Along the way, we adopted technologies from acoustical engineering to optimise every aspect of experiencing music & amplification.

DESIGN

When we started ANLG we had one vision in mind, to design a gorgeous, sustainable, intuitive, energy efficient product and still make it accessible to everyone. It must have the warm and filling audio that music and audio are meant to be played. We worked together and listened to the quietest voice & fragile ideas. We transformed the ideas on paper to designing 3 dimensional objects. The final product is really remarkable in connecting the visual and tactile experience and an iconic Danish design that is a fit for every home.

Feel the difference between the over technological sounds of today with the simplicity of analog.

INSPIRATION

When team ANLG embarked on the journey to design analog amplifier, we combed principles of the modern science and primordial art. The Golden Ratio always finds its manifestation in the entire universe ranging from us, the Homo Sapiens, who take our shape in the mother's womb to the shape of galaxies.

For example, the conch that amplifies the sound of a simple blow of air is very apparent example of how the sound can get enhanced melodiously and in sync with nature using art and science provided by nature to us. 

 

SIMPLICITY, UTILITY, BEAUTY

ANLG has a pure, pared-back style that is centred around warm functionality, flawless craftsmanship and understated elegance that enhances the beauty of your living room, study or office. 

It was extremely important, that product is characterised by the use of earthy muted tones, honest materials and minimal ornamentation. 

It's an ideal addition to your spaces and make it more liveable.

No matter where you are & what you do ANLG just fits in!

ANLG is deep sea waterproof if your phone is! ?

It merges seamlessly with these design icons of the 20th century!

 

WHEN WE SAY - 'FULLY HANDCRAFTED', WE MEAN IT!

The nature of handmade goods means that there are fewer of them, so whatever you are adding to your home is as unique as you are. Each of them are personalised so we offer higher quality and more attention to details. Work done by hand takes less energy than a mass production assembly line, which makes it more environmentally sustainable.

 

CHOICE OF COLORS

PRODUCT & PACKAGING SPECIFICATION

Recycled Cardboard Package to house your ANLG

Your alluring ANLG comes with gorgeous pocket size design journal. ?

 

TIMELINE

We want you to have your ANLG as soon as possible. Here’s our plan to achieve that:

TEAM & COMMUNITY

Thank you for your pledge in advance, and for sharing this campaign with as many people as you can, through word of mouth, social media and email. Your support means a great deal for us.

Follow us @anlg.theamp to stay in touch about product, updates & love: 

instagram / facebook / twitter

Risks and Challenges

As it stands true for all things made by hand in ceramics, the end result is highly dependent on the quality of raw materials, skill of the craftsperson and even the weather! With all these challenges, we try our best to make the best product and the ultimate experience for you :)

The Golden Ratio always finds its manifestation in the entire universe ranging from us, the Homo Sapiens, who take our shape in the mother's womb to the shape of galaxies.For example, the conch that amplifies the sound of a simple blow of air is very apparent example of how the sound can get enhanced melodiously and in sync with nature using art and science provided by nature to us. 

 
SIMPLICITY, UTILITY, BEAUTYANLG has a pure, pared-back style that is centred around warm functionality, flawless craftsmanship and understated elegance that enhances the beauty of your living room, study or office. It was extremely important, that product is characterised by the use of earthy muted tones, honest materials and minimal ornamentation. It's an ideal addition to your spaces and make it more liveable.No matter where you are & what you do ANLG just fits in!ANLG is deep sea waterproof if your phone is! ?It merges seamlessly with these design icons of the 20th century! WHEN WE SAY - 'FULLY HANDCRAFTED', WE MEAN IT!The nature of handmade goods means that there are fewer of them, so whatever you are adding to your home is as unique as you are. Each of them are personalised so we offer higher quality and more attention to details. Work done by hand takes less energy than a mass production assembly line, which makes it more environmentally sustainable. CHOICE OF COLORSPRODUCT & PACKAGING SPECIFICATIONRecycled Cardboard Package to house your ANLGYour alluring ANLG comes with gorgeous pocket size design journal. ? TIMELINEWe want you to have your ANLG as soon as possible. Here’s our plan to achieve that:TEAM & COMMUNITYThank you for your pledge in advance, and for sharing this campaign with as many people as you can, through word of mouth, social media and email. Your support means a great deal for us.Follow us @anlg.theamp to stay in touch about product, updates & love: instagram / facebook / twitterRisks and ChallengesAs it stands true for all things made by hand in ceramics, the end result is highly dependent on the quality of raw materials, skill of the craftsperson and even the weather! With all these challenges, we try our best to make the best product and the ultimate experience for you :)

story:
MapChat

Time. Time is everywhere, it's on your wrist, going to work has a time, sharing a picture on Facebook has a timestamp. We want to give you back your time and focus on the moments that happened and where they took place.

We all have had that feeling that we vaguely remember something but can't recall it completely. Isn't it sad that we sort of forget such moments? Facebook isn't quite convenient to search back through the moments that we once put up there. It's just a constant stream of information coming your way which can range from funny videos to selfies. But, what about those moments that you really care about? We want to put those memories in a bigger spotlight, we want to give it its own place on the map.

Hi Indiegogo, we are Windorado and we are based in South-Korea. We developed an app (MapChat) that gives users a new way of interacting with each other. We offer chatting with friends, chatting with random people, sharing pictures and videos ... the interesting thing of this is that it all happens on Google Maps.

 


MapChat is a more visual representation of the usual timelines we are used to see in Facebook, Twitter, etc. You can leave so-called footprints (Video/Pictures/Text) at your location and these are then visible to others. Instead of seeing things chronologically like we do on our timelines.

The ability to see who is using the app around you on the map makes it also possible to talk and interact with other people you might not even know.

What makes us different from all the other apps out there?

MapChat is our visualization of how an app can be different when it comes to social media apps.

We do this by utilizing what we are already familiar with, Google Maps, and using it as our platform. Together with the map you can record your moments and never forget them. MapChat becomes your personal map of memories.

We all know how both Twitter and Facebook overflows us with information from several sources. It used to be just a place for friends and family to tell us they are celebrating the birthday of Grandma and how she is blowing out her candles. But now it has become the source for all kinds of news. We are watching dancing cats on Facebook and reading the news on Twitter. 

We are taking a step back with our app and bring back the social in social. This is your news feed, but reinvented.

Some of our features 

 • Chat on the map
You can chat on the map and check each other's location.
 • Managing locations and appointments
You can create useful notes for locations and pin down appointments on the map.
Now you will never forget the time and location of your appointments.
 • Convenient Social Network.
You can create posts, photos, videos and anything else on the map.
• Meet new friends and dating.
You can make new friends based on interest, location, etc. You can even use this app for dating.


 



What We Need & What You Get

With this campaign on Indiegogo we try to establish the basis of MapChat. We ask your support in being one of the first to inhabit your local area within MapChat. For this we ask a little bit of money to get things started and push us in the right direction. We have set up our first concepts and will built from here on!

You can help us in many ways possible, actually a simple download or feedback would help us a lot! Check out the perks on the side and help us out!


The Impact

 

We are confident in our current app that we are sure you will enjoy your own space in MapChat! With your help we can create a new form of social sharing that is unlike what we are using at the moment. It is your world on the map and whatever you want to share or do is up to you.

We are already thinking of new ideas to built upon this idea, but for us your moments on the map will be our first priority!
Google Maps hasn't been used like this before so we are very passionate about our work! 

We now need you, the user to try it out for yourself! 

 

Risks

We already have an early version of our app in the Google Play Store (http://ow.ly/DM1lf) and an iPhone version is coming up as well. We'll make sure to hit our deadlines and we just need that extra push to get things rolling.

We have experience with releasing apps and have done so in the past. 'Lovekeeper' has been an app of us and garnered a lot of interest and downloads from users all over the world, so we know what it's like to manage an app like this.

Other ways you can help
Any help is appreciated so please follow us on Facebook or Twitter. Feel free to give us any feedback there! Although we are continually developing and improving our app we would like to hear from you how we can do better!


Facebook l Twitter l Google Play Store l Instagram
