story:
The NFC Wallet Card is the Easter Egg of all crowdfunding projects!

This "fixed-funding" project failed to raise it's goal, so Indiegogo refunded all users. But do not worry, you have found the Easter Egg of Indiegogo!

We secretly used this campaign to organize the biggest hardware wallet giveaway. This means, that everybody who have claimed a perk, will receive it for free.


We have sent out 40 FREE NFC Wallet Cards to 29 early adopters +3 lucky winners from 17 countries.

 

Thank you all! You will receive your rewards very soon!​


Keep updated at :

  • nfcwalletcard.com

  • @NFCWalletCard on Twitter
  • /u/nfcwalletcard on Reddit

 

Use #nfcwalletcard and share you experience with others!
 

The project

We have developed the NFC wallet card for one simple reason. To help people to easily and securely store their valuable secret data.

Smart protection for your most important secret data

Our mission is to provide a secure and easy-to-use solution for sensitive data protection. We all have important passwords, codes and other kind of secret data, but most people do not know how to protect these properly. Fortunately you can use the new NFC wallet card to securely store your valuable information easily.

Protect your most important data with this new smart technology!

 

Protection for important secret data

NFC wallet card is an innovative way to protect your important secret data, it is a very secure offline data storage for sensitive secret codes.

This product is designed to be a very secure cold storage hardware for cryptocurrencies, passwords and sensitive data, but you can use it to securely store any kind of secret text you want to protect.

NFC wallet card is a truly offline hardware, which is a huge advantage for security reasons.

As a passive device, the chip simply does not have the ability to interact with it's environment, so you can be sure, you have full control over the hardware.

Use the free mobile application to access all features and security levels!

 

Free shipping

Shipping fees can be a problem for the most crowdfunding projects, but fortunately we have a logistic partner, and we can offer you free shipping worldwide!

Cards will be sent as International Primary Business Letter, which is one of the fastest options available.

Every card comes with a FREE black RFID blocking sleeve, which protects your card by blocking radio signals, so the card in the sleeve can not be accessed by NFC readers/writers around.

 

Powered by NFC technology

Data connection with a single easy move

NFC stands for Near Field Communication, which is a subset of RFID. NFC is a radio frequency based technology, which allows communication between devices in a short range.

Near Field Communication provides easy data connection over the air, without the need of any cables or ports.

Our cards are equipped with the highest quality NFC chips to benefit from the advantages of this contactless technology.

Easy usage with modern smartphones

Modern smartphones have an integrated NFC module on their backside, which can be used to interact with our cards. Due to the contactless technology, you only need to hold the card near to this module to access it.

Using this awesome technology, you can store your data on an NFC chip without the need of any active power supply.

Cards are open by default and work with any NFC software or mobile application you like.

You can also use our mobile application to access additional features and security levels!

 

Exclusive and modern product design

All of our cards have the same dimensions, they are 55 mm wide and 85 mm tall, like most of the plastic cards you already have, so they can perfectly fit into any card holders and regular wallets.

We developed a super sleek, extra lightweight design, the cards are 0.4 mm thin, and their weight is only 1.85 grams.

We are a green company, so we decided to make a product which is as environmental friendly as possible.

Our cards have a six-layer design and contain only 0.2725 grams of plastic. This means 94.7% less plastic consumption compared to regular plastic cards.

The NFC chip itself is fully covered by an acrylic coat, so the most important part of the card is totally waterproof.

 

Cold storage wallet for cryptocurrencies

Our innovation

Most hardware wallets for cryptocurrencies are micro computers, with all the disadvantages like

  • the need of a power source,
  • the risk of failure of single components,
  • potential hardware and software vulnerabilities,
  • non-transparent operation
  • and so on...

But we recognized the fact, that this kind of complexity comes with too much unneeded risks and unnecessary attack vectors.

So instead of creating another complex hardware, we focus on utilizing the features of the mobile device we all have already.

This leads to a more stable and transparent operation, while being much more cost effective!

 

Secure cold storage protection

The most important goal we achieved during the development of our product is the outstanding security it has.

The NFC hardware we have integrated to the wallet card always remains offline, so the biggest security issue is solved by the architecture itself.

Cards are open by default, so you can use them out-of-the-box with any NFC software and mobile application you like.

Using our free application you have access to all additional security features, which give you an easy-to-use toolset to manage your cards. In the app you can choose from multiple security levels suitable for your needs.

Due to these security levels, your cards will be protected even if others are able to physically access them.

 

Outstanding compatibility

The NFC wallet card natively supports any kind of cryptocurrencies, which are based on a private key or a secret code.

Yes you read it right. Any! Even those that not exist yet. NFC wallet card is a solution to securely store any kind of secret text data, which makes is very useful to protect your private key.

Check the technical overview for more info!

 

Secure protection for cryptocurrencies

This product is an NFC vault with secure data encryption.

You can use the wallet card to securely store your private key, but it is also suitable for redeemable cryptocurrency codes as well.

We developed a rock solid solution to protect the interest of crypto holders and investors.

NFC wallet card is a perfect way to create an encrypted offline backup of your private key!

 

Protected offline password container

The problem we solved

We all have accounts protected by passwords. If you care about information security, you must already know that strong passwords are long and really hard to remember, because they contain a lot of random characters.

Saving passwords to the browser's storage is not a secure way to store them, because if somebody can access your computer, your passwords can be stolen easily.

Password managers are usually running on a computer with internet connection, and some of these softwares even synchronize data over their cloud service, which is a potential security problem, because they are direct targets of hackers.

You should never share your passwords with any kind of third party anyway!

Writing passwords to a paper seems to be a good option, but you still have the risk that somebody will access and read them.

 

Protection for important passwords

Our wallet cards can be used to securely store your most important passwords offline.

Because of the passive NFC architecture and our strict application policy, you can securely store and view your passwords, while being offline.

If you have an account you can not afford to loose, use our wallet card, and secure your password as soon as you can!

You can use our free application to encrypt and save your password to the wallet card. The application runs offline, and never ever access the internet.

The app comes with multiple kind of security levels, so you can be sure that your passwords are safe, even if others can physically access your wallet cards.

 

Ultimate protection for sensitive data

Sensitive data need to be protected

People have a lot of pieces of codes, which need to be protected and have to be kept in secret.

There are PIN and PUK codes, bank authentication data and answers for security questions.

It's really hard to remember all kind of these sensitive data, but you should never store any on your computer or written down to a piece of paper.

Service providers like banks always warn you not to write these codes on a paper, but remember them. But we all know that it is really hard to remember all one-by-one.

 

Protection for your sensitive data

Our wallet cards can be used to easily secure sensitive data. The only way to keep data secure is to encrypt and store it offline.

This is the reason why we developed the NFC wallet card, which is a perfect way to securely store your important data.

With our free and easy-to-use application you can choose from multiple kind of security levels, so you can be sure that your data is protected securely, even if others can physically access the cards you used.

 

Additional level of security using the key card

Key card is a hardware key

You can choose from multiple security levels when using our application. Most of these security levels apply data encryption before storing your secret on the wallet card.

You can use the key card to encrypt your data without remembering the encryption password.

Key cards are empty by default, you can fill them with newly generated encryption key data using our application.

 

Key card as a 2FA hardware

Two-factor-authentication is a proven way to improve the security of your protected data. This technique is widely used by the biggest IT companies for a reason.

Literally the 2FA key is a super strong encryption password you don't need to remember, because it is stored on the hardware itself.

You can have the key card as a 2FA hardware using security level three.

This way attackers will not be able to get their hands on your data even if they know your encryption password.

 

How to use it for security purposes

When you create your wallet card using our free app you can choose to have a key card added to the setup.

Due to the multiple type of security levels we provide, you can utilize the benefits of this additional protection easily.

You can protect unlimited number of wallet cards with a single key card, which makes your life much easier.

 

Free and easy-to-use mobile application

Advanced features of our application

Our cards are open by default and work out-of-the-box with any NFC software and mobile application you like. The NFC chip comes preformatted to NDEF to ensure compatibility with smartphones.

However our mobile application contains additional features to make the usage of your cards more secure and easy.

 

Strict access policy

The application will only ask for the most essential access rights, and will have no access to any resource which is not really needed. It will never scan your contact, messages, media files, etc...

For security reasons, our application is totally separated from the internet. The app will never reach or call any servers, and will never connect to the internet.

When you finish interacting with your cards, always use the "safe exit" button to shut down the app! This feature will wipe all previously used memory blocks, to completely remove any trace of your private data you entered.

 

Development progress

Currently we are working hard to finish the development of the Android application, which is supposed to be publicly available soon.

Our application will always have a free version which will work with all the cards we offer.

As a new startup, we really could use any help to raise funds for the application development. If you like our project and you can afford, please donate some crypto or buy your cards at our crowdfunding page at Indiegogo to support our progress!

 

Advance features of our mobile application

You can use all the additional security features with our free and easy-to-use application.

 

Creating a new wallet card

You can save your data to a new and empty wallet card using this feature. Creation of a new wallet card is just three easy steps:

  1. You enter the data you want to store securely. This can be any kind of important secret text you want to protect. Check the technical overview for more info!
  2. Select one of the security levels, and enter the details required by the chosen level.
  3. Place the wallet card to the back of your mobile device to write the data to it.

 

Creating a new key card

This feature helps you to create a new key card by generating a very secure random encryption key and saving it to the key card.

Creation of a new key card is also very easy:

  1. Select a security level you want to apply to the key card.
  2. Enter the details required by the chosen security level.
  3. Place the card to the back of your device and it will write the newly generated data to the key card.

 

Opening a wallet card

You can view the data stored on the wallet card by opening it. Opening a wallet card is really easy:

  1. Scan the wallet card you want to open.
  2. Enter the credentials required by the security level you used to create the wallet.

After you opened the wallet card successfully, you will be able to make modifications and save the edited data to the card.

 

Making a clone

You have the option to easily create backups of any cards you have. Of course this feature works for wallet and key cards too.

You only need to scan the card you want to clone, then use the other card to save a copy.

Clones will require the same credentials as the card you cloned.

 

Making cards readonly

In some cases it is very important to write protect your wallet or key cards to prevent overwrites.

This way nobody will be able to delete or overwrite data on your wallet card. Keep in mind that making a card readonly is a permanent operation and can not be undone.

 

Wiping data

When you don't need the data on the card anymore, you can clean it by wiping it's memory.

This operation will safely remove the data from the chip by overwriting all bytes on the card before emptying it to remove traces of previously stored data.

 

Security checklist

It is always a good practice to going through the security checklist before interacting with cards to protect yourself against unseen threats.

This checklist will suggest you some quick tasks like turning off networking, bluetooth, entering airplane mode and rebooting your device.

 

Safe exit

Always use the safe exit command to shut down the application!

This feature will explicitly overwrite and clean the memory which was used by the app to remove traces of data you entered during the last session.

 

Security Levels

Security levels are protecting your wallet and key cards, even if others are able to physically access them.

Security levels for encrypted protection

Security levels are additional features, available exclusively in the free mobile application we develop.

Levels above zero can be used to encrypt your data before saving it to the card. This way the secret data will be protected even if others are able to access your card.

You can read detailed info about security levels here

 

Project status

We have been developed a working product, we have supplier contracts and a logistic partner. We have a stock of more than 1000 cards ready for shipment!

(untouched photo, took by my phone during home light conditions)

We are about to extend our business, but we need your help with our crowdfunding campaign to succeed!

 

Milestones and rewards

If the project succeeds, all backers will have a 10% lifetime discount of our future products!

Milestone 1 - 1920 USD raised
We will start shipping as soon as we received the funds. Cards are open and works out-of-the-box with any NFC software and mobile application you like.

Milestone 2 - 6776 USD raised
We will guarantee that the development of the Android application will be finished ASAP, and will be available for free.

Every card comes with a FREE black RFID blocking sleeve, which protects your card by blocking radio signals, so the card in the sleeve can not be accessed by NFC readers/writers around.

 

Free shipping

Shipping fees can be a problem for the most crowdfunding projects, but fortunately we have a logistic partner, and we can offer you free shipping worldwide!

Cards will be sent as International Primary Business Letter, which is one of the fastest options available.

 

If you need Registered Mail method you can add this option as an additional Perk!

 

Have questions?

You can reach us using the comments section, Reddit, Youtube, Twitter, Facebook and our contact form.

 

Thank you for reading!

Please don't forget to share this site if you like our project! We will really appreciate your help!

 

nfcwalletcard.com

 

 

By claiming any Perk, you acknowledge that you have read an understand our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.

By claiming any Perk that contains our product(s), you are supporting our project with the 99% of the Perk's value as a donation, and 1% of the Perk's value will be the amount you actually pay for our product(s).

This feature will wipe all previously used memory blocks, to completely remove any trace of your private data you entered. Development progressCurrently we are working hard to finish the development of the Android application, which is supposed to be publicly available soon.Our application will always have a free version which will work with all the cards we offer.As a new startup, we really could use any help to raise funds for the application development. If you like our project and you can afford, please donate some crypto or buy your cards at our crowdfunding page at Indiegogo to support our progress! Advance features of our mobile applicationYou can use all the additional security features with our free and easy-to-use application. Creating a new wallet cardYou can save your data to a new and empty wallet card using this feature. Creation of a new wallet card is just three easy steps:
You enter the data you want to store securely. This can be any kind of important secret text you want to protect. Check the technical overview for more info!
Select one of the security levels, and enter the details required by the chosen level.
Place the wallet card to the back of your mobile device to write the data to it.
 Creating a new key cardThis feature helps you to create a new key card by generating a very secure random encryption key and saving it to the key card.Creation of a new key card is also very easy:
Select a security level you want to apply to the key card.
Enter the details required by the chosen security level.
Place the card to the back of your device and it will write the newly generated data to the key card.
 Opening a wallet cardYou can view the data stored on the wallet card by opening it. Opening a wallet card is really easy:
Scan the wallet card you want to open.
Enter the credentials required by the security level you used to create the wallet.
After you opened the wallet card successfully, you will be able to make modifications and save the edited data to the card. Making a cloneYou have the option to easily create backups of any cards you have. Of course this feature works for wallet and key cards too.You only need to scan the card you want to clone, then use the other card to save a copy.Clones will require the same credentials as the card you cloned. Making cards readonlyIn some cases it is very important to write protect your wallet or key cards to prevent overwrites.This way nobody will be able to delete or overwrite data on your wallet card. Keep in mind that making a card readonly is a permanent operation and can not be undone. Wiping dataWhen you don't need the data on the card anymore, you can clean it by wiping it's memory.This operation will safely remove the data from the chip by overwriting all bytes on the card before emptying it to remove traces of previously stored data. Security checklistIt is always a good practice to going through the security checklist before interacting with cards to protect yourself against unseen threats.This checklist will suggest you some quick tasks like turning off networking, bluetooth, entering airplane mode and rebooting your device. Safe exitAlways use the safe exit command to shut down the application!This feature will explicitly overwrite and clean the memory which was used by the app to remove traces of data you entered during the last session. Security LevelsSecurity levels are protecting your wallet and key cards, even if others are able to physically access them.Security levels for encrypted protectionSecurity levels are additional features, available exclusively in the free mobile application we develop.Levels above zero can be used to encrypt your data before saving it to the card. This way the secret data will be protected even if others are able to access your card.You can read detailed info about security levels here Project statusWe have been developed a working product, we have supplier contracts and a logistic partner. We have a stock of more than 1000 cards ready for shipment! (untouched photo, took by my phone during home light conditions)We are about to extend our business, but we need your help with our crowdfunding campaign to succeed! Milestones and rewardsIf the project succeeds, all backers will have a 10% lifetime discount of our future products!Milestone 1 - 1920 USD raisedWe will start shipping as soon as we received the funds. Cards are open and works out-of-the-box with any NFC software and mobile application you like.Milestone 2 - 6776 USD raisedWe will guarantee that the development of the Android application will be finished ASAP, and will be available for free.Every card comes with a FREE black RFID blocking sleeve, which protects your card by blocking radio signals, so the card in the sleeve can not be accessed by NFC readers/writers around. Free shippingShipping fees can be a problem for the most crowdfunding projects, but fortunately we have a logistic partner, and we can offer you free shipping worldwide!Cards will be sent as International Primary Business Letter, which is one of the fastest options available. If you need Registered Mail method you can add this option as an additional Perk! Have questions?You can reach us using the comments section, Reddit, Youtube, Twitter, Facebook and our contact form. Thank you for reading!Please don't forget to share this site if you like our project! We will really appreciate your help! nfcwalletcard.com  By claiming any Perk, you acknowledge that you have read an understand our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service. By claiming any Perk that contains our product(s), you are supporting our project with the 99% of the Perk's value as a donation, and 1% of the Perk's value will be the amount you actually pay for our product(s).

story:
The World's First Independently Driven Dual Pinch Wheel Extruder...

The World's Smallest Dual Nozzle Extruder (in all the dimensions which matter)...

One and the same - The Kraken.


Current Status: We at BrainyDeep have been keenly listening to the feedback we have received. We have peeled the Kraken design back to see what is essential and what isn't. We have also sought international sourcing options and requoted for every part on the Kraken. We are currently awaiting sample parts for many of these and hope to release the Kraken 2.0 at a significantly reduced price point. Stay in touch by visiting our website www.brainydeep.com!
Thanks for the attention throughout the campaign!

The Kraken is a revolution in extruder technology for filament based 3D Printing applications. The Kraken’s unique mechanism is the key to enabling the incredible performance and flexibility offered by the Kraken. In fact, we are confident that our extruder is the best extruder available in the world, even in many thousand dollar commercial machines.

The mechanism used by the Kraken enables all of the following features, regardless of configuration:

  • Unique Mechanism with Huge Gear Ratio (20:1)
  • Extrusion rate control – The gearing means each motor step is now smaller than ever before, giving better control of filament deposition rates! We’ve tested down to 0.02mm layers at 30mm/s!! (0.36mm^3/s)


  • Smaller Lighter Motors – Using NEMA 11 motors, only 28mm square, only 140g and only 0.6 amps each!
  • Small Size – 41.2mm wide, ~90mm tall – Print larger than you thought possible on your current chassis!
  • Increasing Tangential Force – Filament force increases with increasing speed, for perfect printing across the widest range of printing conditions. Over 300:1 ratio between the fastest and slowest tested extrusion rates!
  • Step Loss, not Filament Strip – Step loss rather than stripping the filament – step loss will recover, stripped filaments will not - the difference is a minor blemish instead of an aborted print.
  • Suits all filament sizes – Using different filament sizes is as easy as just swapping your J head!
  • Metal design – Machined chassis is compatible with any high temperature hot end designs with a J head mount. Use higher temperatures for exotic printing materials such as Nylon, Polycarbonate and more!
  • Printable Mounts – Maximum compatibility with printers on the market. Currently we have developed and tested mounts for a Prusa Mendel, but we will release the mounting layout for development of all types of mounts, including for mounting accessories (fans, cameras, etc)
  • Bowden Compatible – Can easily be adapted to use as a Bowden extruder.

 

In addition, the Kraken is 2 extruders in 1!

Dual Pinch Wheel Configuration


In dual pinch wheel mode, both motors on the Kraken are used to drive a single filament, one from each side. This means greater grip on the filament than could ever be achieved before, all but eliminating any chance of stripped out filament and increasing the extrusion force which can be achieved. And what benefits come with high reliability high force extrusion?

  • Print faster - 900mm/s+ extrusion speeds!!  No longer is the extruder the bottleneck for high speed printing. (>100mm^3/s)
  • Print reliably – Filament slip is a problem of the past!
  • Print cooler – High force extrusion means you can print at lower temperatures for faster material setting times and less heat left in the print, perfect for printing without a fan and ooze free prints.

  • Plus all of the Kraken's regular benefits above.

 

Dual Nozzle Configuration


In dual nozzle configuration, each motor drives a single nozzle similar to traditional extruders, but with all of the benefits of the Kraken’s unique mechanism!

  • M-M-MAXIMUM nozzles – Squeeze more nozzles onto your printer than ever before! 2 Nozzles with a total width of 41.2mm means you can have 4 nozzles in less than the size of 1 Wade’s Geared extruder!!
  • Print Larger – The nozzles themselves are located closer to each other than ever before. This means each nozzle can reach more of the build area, reducing loss of build size when using multiple nozzles! Print up to 26x20cm with 1 nozzle, 23x20cm with 2 nozzles and up to 15x20cm with 4 nozzles on a standard build Prusa Mendel!!
  • Plus all of the benefits of the Kraken's mechanism as listed above!

I've had some questions about the quality of this print - we're still dialling in the tool change G codes - this print was done without temperature changes or a fan on the old nozzle, causing a bit of leaking. Hope to update this as soon as we get a chance!

How does it work?

The Kraken uses a unique mechanism unlike what has been used in extruders previously. Watch the video to find out more!


Compatibility

The Kraken is designed to ease integration into as many existing printers as possible. Currently we have developed complete mounts for reprap Prusa Mendels, and all printers that use the same mounting (2x 8mm rods 50mm apart). The Kraken also has plenty of mounting holes to adapt it to other printers on the market.

Dual pinch wheel mode will work on all printers and boards, provided the current can be adjusted. This is because both motors can be run off a single controller, so even single nozzle electronics will work!

Using more than a single nozzle obviously requires electronics and firmware which supports this, requiring additional stepper driver and hot end connections. The Kraken has been successfully tested with unmodified Gen6 and RAMPS electronics and existing firmware for both dual pinch wheel and dual nozzle printing (RAMPS only, Gen6 only supports dual pinch wheel mode).

We are aiming to providing a basic connection kit, including looms for the motors. This will be targeted at RAMPS and equivalent connections. 

See update 2 for more mounting options!


What is the delivery schedule?

The major project activities and durations are as follows:

  • Funding period - 6 weeks
  • Supplier Qualification and Beta Builds - 8 weeks
  • Beta Build Test Phase - 2 weeks
  • Full Scale Ordering - 8 weeks
  • Assembly - 2 weeks
  • Delivery Timeframe - 2 weeks

Based on this rough timeline, everyone should have their Krakens in March 2014. 

We are committed to this timeline, and have set it accordingly so that we are not one of those typical crowdfunding projects that promises the world yet delivers a year late. This is the primary reason for finishing all R&D work before seeking funding.


Risks and challenges

The Kraken itself has gone through many design iterations and months of testing to get to this point. The main risk lies in the scale up phase, as we transition designs from our prototype suppliers to larger scale manufacturers. For this reason we are conducting a supplier qualification phase (with short test period) to ensure that the design transfer has been successful. Parts received during the qualification test will be inspected and built up for testing before full scale ordering begins to minimize risk of receiving incorrect batches or materials which aren't up to spec.


What is BrainyDeep?

BrainyDeep is a startup located in sunny/windy/rainy Melbourne, Australia (cross out all that do not apply at this particular instant). Founded by Zbigniew Mioduszewski (aka Ziggy), an engineer with degrees in Mechanical Engineering, Electronics and Computer Science and with years of experience in top end automotive and medical device design.

We are aiming to bring a fresh wave of product development to 3D Printing and utilizing 3D Printing, including digital product distribution. For more info, BrainyDeep's vision can be found on our website at http://www.brainydeep.com/our-vision/


Why Crowdfunding?

Australia is a minefield for start-ups and technology development, with virtually no showing in the manufacturing sector.

This means that obtaining funding via traditional methods is difficult, as shown by the lack of capital raised by Australian startups.

Crowdfunding presents a unique opportunity as our funding is linked purely to market interest. All funds raised are direct from consumers, so only projects that succeed in the market receive funding. And hey, backers get some nice perks too! Promotional pricing, world leading technology ahead of the pack, increased productivity and enjoyment from your 3D printer, and that warm fuzzy feeling of being that crucial part of getting one Aussie’s invention out to the world. Win win!
 

The Press

Read about the Kraken here on the following sites. Thanks for the press guys!

http://www.3ders.org/articles/20130822-first-dual-pinch-wheel-extruder-for-3d-printers.html

http://www.popular3dprinters.com/the-kraken-the-worlds-first-dual-pinch-wheel-extruder-for-3d-printers/

http://3dprinterplans.info/the-kraken-dual-pinch-wheel-extruder-for-3d-printers-launches-on-indiegogo/


What next?

Provided the project gets funded, I imagine shockwaves will be spread through the community as all existing extruders will suddenly feel obsolete. It's time to ditch the Wade's!

Please help out in any way you can - fund the project, provide feedback or help spread the word, it all helps!

Make sure the word gets out - the Kraken is coming, straight from the BrainyDeep!

story:
The world’s most elegant wall-mounted wireless charger that declutters your house and keeps you organized. 


WallJax is a wireless cell phone charger based on the Qi wireless power standard. WallJax solves the problem of looking for chargers, searching for misplaced phones, and constantly losing your keys. It also eliminates unsightly, tangled cords and counter clutter.


Two versions to fit every location and lifestyle.


Plug-and-play simplicity

WallJax EZ plugs directly into an existing 120-Volt outlet, and does not require screws or any installation at all. WallJax EZ has overwhelming simplicity, but must go where an outlet already exists. It has a USB port, on the bottom, for versatility and passes through 2 regular AC outlets, so you can still use both plugs for anything you’d like!

  • Wireless Power = 5W (1 Amp, 5 Volt) by Qi standard (WPC 1.1)
  • Charging Distance = 1/8 inch. *Phone must sit flat on WallJax EZ.
  • USB Power Output = 10W (2 Amp, 5 Volt) from female USB-A receptacle
  • Pass Through Outlets = 2 of NEMA type 15-5, 120 Volts AC, 15 Amps
  • Safety Certification = UL 60950-1 and UL 498A



WallJax Float is a wall-mounted wireless charging shelf that you can put wherever you’d like with the supplied non-mark adhesive (recommended) or screws. Essentially, WallJax Float is the top, shelf part of the WallJax EZ. A standard USB power supply “Wall Wart” (like the ones that come with phones) provides power over a USB cable. The cable can either run in front of the wall or behind wall. With the cable in front of the wall, installation is easier and requires no tools at all. To get the stunning, completely floating look, the cable must be ran behind the wall. Installing the cable behind the wall requires some skill and a drill, and takes about 15 minutes.



  • Internationally available
  • Wireless Power = 5W (1 Amp, 5 Volt) by Qi standard (WPC 1.1)

  • Charging Distance = 1/8 inch. *Phone must sit flat on WallJax Float.
  • USB Power Output = 10W (2 Amp, 5 Volt) from female USB-A receptacle
  • USB Power Input = 10W from USB Micro B cable (standard USB cable for phones)
  • Power cable entry, either from below or back

WallJax Float mounting: Standard or Handy mounts WallJax anywhere

  • Standard installation takes just minutes and requires no tools.  You can even use non-mark adhesive instead of screws.  
  • Handy installation give a stunning free floating look.  





Yes, WallJax is compatible with most phones! Some phones, such as the Galaxy S6, come with built-in wireless charging compatibility. Or, you can enable your phone, such as your iPhone, with a wireless charging case or wireless back and enjoy the drop-and-go convenience of wireless charging.


For complete compatibility list click here 

WallJax uses the international wireless charging standard “Qi” from the Wireless Power Consortium. Over 150 million phones are built that can receive “Qi” wireless power. The phones you plan to charge on WallJax must either be wireless charging ready or have a case that enables it. Wireless charging is based on magnetic coupling. WallJax creates a fluctuating magnetic field in a coil called the “transmitter coil,” which induces a current in the “receiver coil” inside the phone. Circuitry already in the phone or case converts the current to power for charging.

In May of 2015, confident with our designs, the team here at WallJax divided and conquered; Jeff set out to figure out how to get the message out. He needed to find a way that everyone in the world who wants their charging problems solved can learn about WallJax. WallJax will use funding to purchase expensive molds, tooling and complete regulatory compliance testing. At this point, we have thousand of hours of hard work into WallJax, and we are completely confident that everyone will love WallJax.


From Jeff’s manufacturing background he knows the true costs to deliver the highest quality products.  First, tooling must be made.  This includes injection molds and stamping dies.  Sample tooling is also needed to produce WallJax to submit for destructive regulatory testing.  CNC (Computer Numerical Controlled) machines will be used for creating wooden covers and assembling the circuit boards.  These machines must have programs created.  Rigorous regulatory test and certification is expensive and required.  WallJax also budgets for high grade components to ensure a long lasting product with furniture grade quality. 

First, WallJax significantly reduced unknowns by having fully functional prototypes before launching pre-order.  The current WallJax models have all the functional features required to go to market.  Even with upfront work some risks remain.  

The largest amount of unknowns is around WallJax EZ.  This is because WallJax EZ has built in power supply, outlet plug and outlet receptacle.  Each of these must be individually certified by a regulatory agency.  Because certification is done by a third party; it is difficult to know exactly how long it could take.  These agencies could also provide feedback which requires some redesign to accommodate.  To mitigate this risk WallJax has already met with a regulatory agency and based components off known approved components.

WallJax started working with manufacturers before going to crowdfunding.  Final complete quoting process and final vetting with samples must be done.  We have built this into our schedule but timing could vary.  

WallJax is in a good position with two experienced engineers to manage unforeseen challenges that arise.


Jeff Kittredge and Head Engineer Roy Wang met in graduate school at Boston University. They had similar interests and worked together on a capstone design project. They crushed the project and figured, as a team, they could do anything! Roy and Jeff also took a class together on invention that confirmed their suspicion they needed to make WallJax into a real product. During their last semester, Roy and Jeff started prototyping and developing WallJax. The team compliments each other well and they have a great time working through each new challenge. 


Jeff Kittredge, PE, Founder

Founder Jeff Kittredge studied Manufacturing Engineering for undergraduate. During that time, he spent half a year in India learning lean manufacturing, sourcing and meeting great people. Upon graduating, he went to work for Procter and Gamble- Gillette in Boston. Jeff worked with everything from injection molding, stamping presses to assembly equipment. Six awesome years in manufacturing and controls engineering lit the fire to go to school for Electrical Engineering. He took two years earning his Master of Electrical Engineering from Boston University, and is now a licensed Professional Electrical Engineer. Jeff focused his MS coursework on power electronics and radio frequency circuits. Even with a masters in electrical engineering, his most endorsed skill on LinkedIn remains manufacturing. Jeff loves solving problems, design, getting feedback from customers and manufacturing. Learn more via his LinkedIn page.


How do I select multiple Perks?

Indiegogo has made it easier than ever to add additional perks and add-ons. If you’d like to add a phone case or cable to install your WallJax Float, you can now do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile.

For example, if you originally claimed a $49 WallJax Float perk but now you want to add a $20 phone case, you can click "Upgrade to Higher Priced Perk” next to your $49 perk.

This will direct you back to contribution flow of our campaign. You can then select the new add-on you’d like to claim. Selecting a perk of equal or lower-value to your original contribution will result in an additional contribution, easy as that!

Please feel free to reach out to us if you have any questions about selecting every perk you would like!

How fast is WallJax wireless charging?

5 Watts / 1 Amp.  It is hard to compare wireless and wired because of the huge variety.  The USB port on WallJax provides 10 Watts/ 2 Amps.

How long does wireless charging take?

Our testing on a completely dead Samsung S6 took 3 hours to full charge.

Is an app or program or special phone setting needed?

No app is required.

Can I wirelessly charge 2 phones at once?

Only one phone can wirelessly charge at once.  The phone stacked on top of the other won’t get damaged, it just won`t wireless charge either.  But it’s fine to wirelessly charge the bottom phone and charge the top phone with a cable.

Can I charge different devices at the same time by wireless and USB cable?

Yes, 10 Watts are available for any combination of wireless or cable charging, or both.

The outlet where I want to mount WallJax EZ is upside down (or horizontal) compared to the video and pictures.  Will WallJax mount to my outlet?

WallJax EZ requires an outlet where the ground circle is below the line and neutral slots.  If you don not have an outlet like that; you should get WallJax float, and then outlet orientation does not matter at all.  The other option is depending on your skill and local requirements you flip the outlet upside down or have a qualified electrician perform the task.  Warning hazardous voltages are present behind outlets.  Only attempt if you are qualified.

How sturdy is WallJax EZ once plugged into an outlet?

WallJax EZ is sturdy and easily holds a phone and keys; if plugged into a sturdy outlet.  Super old outlets can be loose and not hold WallJax EZ well.  Best to find a sturdy outlet or just get WallJax Float if you`re worried about the outlet.  3M Command Adhesive can be used to stabilize WallJax EZ at the outlet.

Can WallJax charge things other than phones that charge with USB? iPad? Fitbit? Bicycle headlight? Or USB appliance that is always on?

Yes, WallJax can charge any device that charges over USB; such as iPad, FitBit or bicycle headlight.  WallJax can continuously provide 10 Watts to a USB appliance too.

Is Near Field Communication "NFC" the same as wireless charging?

No, NFC and wireless charging are different technologies for different purposes.  The only similarity is they both use the Near (magnetic) field to operate.

Which mounting method do you recommend for WallJax-Float? Screws or adhesive?

We recommend adhesive more than screws.  Using provided non-mark adhesive is easier, plenty strong and leaves no mark.

How strong is WallJax Float after it's been mounted with non-mark adhesive?

Super strong!  WallJax Float mounted with adhesive will easily hold phone and keys.

How many WallJax do I need for my house?

With smaller apartments having one WallJax EZ and one WallJax Float works out great.  Get the One-and-One package.  For larger houses and families the Family Pack works great.

Should I get the wooden walnut top, or the pure white plastic top?

Wood usually looks great in bedrooms, living rooms and kitchens.  The white plastic work greats for bathrooms or kitchens.

What happens if I get a new phone before my WallJax arrives and I don’t need the case add-on, or need a different case?

In good faith WallJax will make reasonable attempts to swap to the correct case, refund you the cost of the case or give you another accesory worth the value of case.  You will need to promptly and accurately respond the backer emails to help us with this.  

Is WallJax patented?

WallJax currently has patents pending.

Does WallJax ship internationally?

Only WallJax Float ships internationally.  WallJax EZ only ships to North America because it only fits NEMA type 15-5 outlets.

Are there LED status lights?

Yes, LED status lights shine through the bottom.  

Will WallJax be UL-Listed?

WallJax EZ will certify to UL498-A and UL60950-1.  Power supplies sold as add-ons to WallJax Float will be UL-Listed or equivalent.

I want to have 2 WallJax next to each other.  Could I power a WallJax Float from a WallJax EZ?

Yes, WallJax EZ can power WallJax Float from the USB port.  However keep in mind only 10 Watt total power are available.  So both phones may not charge at max rate.

I want to have 2 WallJax next to each other.  Could I power 2 WallJax Float from the add-on 10 Watt power supply?

If you plan to install 2 WallJax Float and power from the same power supply we recommend using a 20 Watt power supply.

Will WallJax eventually be sold in retail?

After we fulfill the Indiegogo, we aim to get WallJax into retail. Our first priority is fulfilling all Indiegogo orders; retail could take up to a year.

What will eventual retail pricing be?

We do not know what the price will be for WallJax in stores; buying from us now is the most direct way, as adding in retail could potentially increase the price due to added distribution channel costs.
story_txt:
The world’s most elegant wall-mounted wireless charger that declutters your house and keeps you organized. WallJax is a wireless cell phone charger based on the Qi wireless power standard. WallJax solves the problem of looking for chargers, searching for misplaced phones, and constantly losing your keys. It also eliminates unsightly, tangled cords and counter clutter. Two versions to fit every location and lifestyle.Plug-and-play simplicityWallJax EZ plugs directly into an existing 120-Volt outlet, and does not require screws or any installation at all. WallJax EZ has overwhelming simplicity, but must go where an outlet already exists. It has a USB port, on the bottom, for versatility and passes through 2 regular AC outlets, so you can still use both plugs for anything you’d like!

Wireless Power = 5W (1 Amp, 5 Volt) by Qi standard (WPC 1.1)


Charging Distance = 1/8 inch. *Phone must sit flat on WallJax EZ.


USB Power Output = 10W (2 Amp, 5 Volt) from female USB-A receptacle


Pass Through Outlets = 2 of NEMA type 15-5, 120 Volts AC, 15 Amps


Safety Certification = UL 60950-1 and UL 498A






WallJax Float is a wall-mounted wireless charging shelf that you can put wherever you’d like with the supplied non-mark adhesive (recommended) or screws. Essentially, WallJax Float is the top, shelf part of the WallJax EZ. A standard USB power supply “Wall Wart” (like the ones that come with phones) provides power over a USB cable. The cable can either run in front of the wall or behind wall. With the cable in front of the wall, installation is easier and requires no tools at all. To get the stunning, completely floating look, the cable must be ran behind the wall. Installing the cable behind the wall requires some skill and a drill, and takes about 15 minutes.

Internationally available


Wireless Power = 5W (1 Amp, 5 Volt) by Qi standard (WPC 1.1)



Charging Distance = 1/8 inch. *Phone must sit flat on WallJax Float.


USB Power Output = 10W (2 Amp, 5 Volt) from female USB-A receptacle


USB Power Input = 10W from USB Micro B cable (standard USB cable for phones)


Power cable entry, either from below or back

WallJax Float mounting: Standard or Handy mounts WallJax anywhere

Standard installation takes just minutes and requires no tools.  You can even use non-mark adhesive instead of screws.  


Handy installation give a stunning free floating look.  

Yes, WallJax is compatible with most phones! Some phones, such as the Galaxy S6, come with built-in wireless charging compatibility. Or, you can enable your phone, such as your iPhone, with a wireless charging case or wireless back and enjoy the drop-and-go convenience of wireless charging.For complete compatibility list click here WallJax uses the international wireless charging standard “Qi” from the Wireless Power Consortium. Over 150 million phones are built that can receive “Qi” wireless power. The phones you plan to charge on WallJax must either be wireless charging ready or have a case that enables it. Wireless charging is based on magnetic coupling. WallJax creates a fluctuating magnetic field in a coil called the “transmitter coil,” which induces a current in the “receiver coil” inside the phone. Circuitry already in the phone or case converts the current to power for charging.In May of 2015, confident with our designs, the team here at WallJax divided and conquered; Jeff set out to figure out how to get the message out. He needed to find a way that everyone in the world who wants their charging problems solved can learn about WallJax. WallJax will use funding to purchase expensive molds, tooling and complete regulatory compliance testing. At this point, we have thousand of hours of hard work into WallJax, and we are completely confident that everyone will love WallJax.From Jeff’s manufacturing background he knows the true costs to deliver the highest quality products.  First, tooling must be made.  This includes injection molds and stamping dies.  Sample tooling is also needed to produce WallJax to submit for destructive regulatory testing.  CNC (Computer Numerical Controlled) machines will be used for creating wooden covers and assembling the circuit boards.  These machines must have programs created.  Rigorous regulatory test and certification is expensive and required.  WallJax also budgets for high grade components to ensure a long lasting product with furniture grade quality. First, WallJax significantly reduced unknowns by having fully functional prototypes before launching pre-order.  The current WallJax models have all the functional features required to go to market.  Even with upfront work some risks remain.  The largest amount of unknowns is around WallJax EZ.  This is because WallJax EZ has built in power supply, outlet plug and outlet receptacle.  Each of these must be individually certified by a regulatory agency.  Because certification is done by a third party; it is difficult to know exactly how long it could take.  These agencies could also provide feedback which requires some redesign to accommodate.  To mitigate this risk WallJax has already met with a regulatory agency and based components off known approved components.WallJax started working with manufacturers before going to crowdfunding.  Final complete quoting process and final vetting with samples must be done.  We have built this into our schedule but timing could vary.  WallJax is in a good position with two experienced engineers to manage unforeseen challenges that arise.Jeff Kittredge and Head Engineer Roy Wang met in graduate school at Boston University. They had similar interests and worked together on a capstone design project. They crushed the project and figured, as a team, they could do anything! Roy and Jeff also took a class together on invention that confirmed their suspicion they needed to make WallJax into a real product. During their last semester, Roy and Jeff started prototyping and developing WallJax. The team compliments each other well and they have a great time working through each new challenge. Jeff Kittredge, PE, FounderFounder Jeff Kittredge studied Manufacturing Engineering for undergraduate. During that time, he spent half a year in India learning lean manufacturing, sourcing and meeting great people. Upon graduating, he went to work for Procter and Gamble- Gillette in Boston. Jeff worked with everything from injection molding, stamping presses to assembly equipment. Six awesome years in manufacturing and controls engineering lit the fire to go to school for Electrical Engineering. He took two years earning his Master of Electrical Engineering from Boston University, and is now a licensed Professional Electrical Engineer. Jeff focused his MS coursework on power electronics and radio frequency circuits. Even with a masters in electrical engineering, his most endorsed skill on LinkedIn remains manufacturing. Jeff loves solving problems, design, getting feedback from customers and manufacturing. Learn more via his LinkedIn page.How do I select multiple Perks?Indiegogo has made it easier than ever to add additional perks and add-ons. If you’d like to add a phone case or cable to install your WallJax Float, you can now do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile.For example, if you originally claimed a $49 WallJax Float perk but now you want to add a $20 phone case, you can click "Upgrade to Higher Priced Perk” next to your $49 perk.This will direct you back to contribution flow of our campaign. You can then select the new add-on you’d like to claim. Selecting a perk of equal or lower-value to your original contribution will result in an additional contribution, easy as that!Please feel free to reach out to us if you have any questions about selecting every perk you would like!How fast is WallJax wireless charging? 5 Watts / 1 Amp.  It is hard to compare wireless and wired because of the huge variety.  The USB port on WallJax provides 10 Watts/ 2 Amps.How long does wireless charging take?Our testing on a completely dead Samsung S6 took 3 hours to full charge.Is an app or program or special phone setting needed?No app is required.Can I wirelessly charge 2 phones at once?Only one phone can wirelessly charge at once.  The phone stacked on top of the other won’t get damaged, it just won`t wireless charge either.  But it’s fine to wirelessly charge the bottom phone and charge the top phone with a cable.Can I charge different devices at the same time by wireless and USB cable?Yes, 10 Watts are available for any combination of wireless or cable charging, or both.The outlet where I want to mount WallJax EZ is upside down (or horizontal) compared to the video and pictures.  Will WallJax mount to my outlet?WallJax EZ requires an outlet where the ground circle is below the line and neutral slots.  If you don not have an outlet like that; you should get WallJax float, and then outlet orientation does not matter at all.  The other option is depending on your skill and local requirements you flip the outlet upside down or have a qualified electrician perform the task.  Warning hazardous voltages are present behind outlets.  Only attempt if you are qualified.How sturdy is WallJax EZ once plugged into an outlet?WallJax EZ is sturdy and easily holds a phone and keys; if plugged into a sturdy outlet.  Super old outlets can be loose and not hold WallJax EZ well.  Best to find a sturdy outlet or just get WallJax Float if you`re worried about the outlet.  3M Command Adhesive can be used to stabilize WallJax EZ at the outlet.Can WallJax charge things other than phones that charge with USB? iPad? Fitbit? Bicycle headlight? Or USB appliance that is always on?Yes, WallJax can charge any device that charges over USB; such as iPad, FitBit or bicycle headlight.  WallJax can continuously provide 10 Watts to a USB appliance too.Is Near Field Communication "NFC" the same as wireless charging?No, NFC and wireless charging are different technologies for different purposes.  The only similarity is they both use the Near (magnetic) field to operate.Which mounting method do you recommend for WallJax-Float? Screws or adhesive?We recommend adhesive more than screws.  Using provided non-mark adhesive is easier, plenty strong and leaves no mark.How strong is WallJax Float after it's been mounted with non-mark adhesive?Super strong!  WallJax Float mounted with adhesive will easily hold phone and keys.How many WallJax do I need for my house?With smaller apartments having one WallJax EZ and one WallJax Float works out great.  Get the One-and-One package.  For larger houses and families the Family Pack works great.Should I get the wooden walnut top, or the pure white plastic top?Wood usually looks great in bedrooms, living rooms and kitchens.  The white plastic work greats for bathrooms or kitchens.What happens if I get a new phone before my WallJax arrives and I don’t need the case add-on, or need a different case?In good faith WallJax will make reasonable attempts to swap to the correct case, refund you the cost of the case or give you another accesory worth the value of case.  You will need to promptly and accurately respond the backer emails to help us with this.  Is WallJax patented?WallJax currently has patents pending.Does WallJax ship internationally?Only WallJax Float ships internationally.  WallJax EZ only ships to North America because it only fits NEMA type 15-5 outlets.Are there LED status lights?Yes, LED status lights shine through the bottom.  Will WallJax be UL-Listed?WallJax EZ will certify to UL498-A and UL60950-1.  Power supplies sold as add-ons to WallJax Float will be UL-Listed or equivalent.I want to have 2 WallJax next to each other.  Could I power a WallJax Float from a WallJax EZ?Yes, WallJax EZ can power WallJax Float from the USB port.  However keep in mind only 10 Watt total power are available.  So both phones may not charge at max rate.I want to have 2 WallJax next to each other.  Could I power 2 WallJax Float from the add-on 10 Watt power supply?If you plan to install 2 WallJax Float and power from the same power supply we recommend using a 20 Watt power supply.
Will WallJax eventually be sold in retail?
After we fulfill the Indiegogo, we aim to get WallJax into retail. Our first priority is fulfilling all Indiegogo orders; retail could take up to a year.
What will eventual retail pricing be?
We do not know what the price will be for WallJax in stores; buying from us now is the most direct way, as adding in retail could potentially increase the price due to added distribution channel costs.

story:
Riyo with 3 cards

Riyo with two cards. Modern

Riyo is the first minimalist wallet case for iPhone 5 and 5S that was designed for today's mobile lifestyle. 

Key Features

  • Modern: Carry up to 3 cards without the bulk
  • "Taffy Wrap": Snugly holds your phone with a premium fit and feel
  • "Kanga" Pouch: Keeps your cards from falling out. 
  • Easy: Access cards with one hand
  • Slick: Moves in and out of your pocket with ease
  • Bold: Unique front design complements iOS 7


Available Matte Colors


Available Chrome Colors



Where will YOU use Riyo?


Who We Are

Don't be like George




Use of Funds

We've designed the case. We’ve figured out our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to build the molds and put Riyo into production. We know what we’re doing; we've led the development and manufacturing of several multi-million dollar products - so we know exactly what's required to pull this off. You are getting in early, and getting a premium product ahead of everyone else.

We’re asking you to help us make Riyo a reality.


Helps Us Raise Awareness


Comments, Questions, Ideas?

Ask on the comment thread here or email sales@riyocase.com

story:
Our Goal

  1. Produce the safest iPhone and iPad case in the world.
  2. Bring NASA and F1 technology to the public at affordable prices.

     

    What is EXPLOSHIELD

    EXPLOSHIELD is the safest iPhone case and iPad case made with NASA space suit and bomb suit bulletproof and fireproof material, Kevlar® and Nomex®.

    Kevlar® and Nomex® are 5 times stronger than steel and will protect you from fire and explosion. 

     

     

     

     

    100% SGS Certified Fireproof and Bulletproof material - Kevlar® and Nomex®

     

    EXPLOSHIELD S2.0

    40% Stronger 

    Extra back pocket for your phone, passport and boarding pass.

     

    EXPLOSHIELD M for iPad

    • One Apple Pencil holder
    • One Pen holder
    • One note pad holder
    • One iPad holder
    • One back pocket
    • Two card pockets

     

     

    EXPLOSHIELD Experiment 

    Water Repellent 

     

    Tofu Test 2.0 - 100% Protection!!

     

     

     

    Jelly Test 2.0 - 100% Protection!!

     

     

    Paper towel Test 2.0 - 100% Protection!!

     

     

     

     

    Our experience

    2017 Kickstarter campaign

    • Shipped to 12 different countries
    • 100% delivery rate
    • 100% client satisfaction

    2019 EXPLOSHIELD ver2.0 on Indiegogo!

    • 40% Stronger 
    • 60% Discount at Indiegogo

     

     

     

    Make this world a safer place

    With 100% client satisfaction, we hope we can continue to bring the safest product to everyone. 

    • Keep everyone safe from fire and explosion
    • Practical use for our everyday life
    • Safest case in the world
    • Suitable for vaporizer, camera batteries and professional use 

     

     

     

    Risks & Challenges

    We have a history of success and overcoming challenges, here is a brief history:

    Nov 2016 - EXPLOSHIELD journey begins 

    May 2017 - SGS Certified Fire Proof - 16 CFR Part 1610 Standard

    May 2017 - Kickstarter launch

    Nov 2017 - Kickstarter delivery - 100% delivery rate

    Jan 2018 - 100% client satisfaction

    May 2018 - EXPLOSHIELD ver2.0 development

    Nov 2018 - Testing EXPLOSHIELD ver2.0 and EXPLOSHIELD M for iPad

    March 2019 - EXPLOSHIELD ver2.0 and EXPLOSHIELD M for iPad production

    Aug 2019 - Indiegogo launch!

     

     

    Please help us by sharing this page

    We have a great product and now we need your help to promote it!

    • Please share this page!
    • Please tell your family and friends about us!

     

    EXPLOSHIELD - the safest case with NASA and F1 technology!

story:
Hi everybody! My name is Max

I’ve made an interesting project, and I’m looking forward to share with you.

The purpose of my project is creating steampunk Nixie Tube Clock, with wireless charging of mobile phones, getting a beautiful product and getting everyday use of it.

This project is in great demand and popular with the people using mobile phones and those who appreciates the beauty of steampunk products.

I’ve had the necessary details for production of Nixie Tube clock, for a long time, but I could not choose a form for the finished product. It should be an entirely functional and beautiful product, not a simply dead dog for you money.

As a rule, steampunk involves  an alternative way of human development with the expressed general stylization Victorian era (the second half of the XIX century). Tower Bridge is one of the symbols of London and the UK, which perfectly suits as a basis of my work.

Worked in cooperation with my friends who offered me a big choice of different designs , I’ve at last chosen the best option (to my opinion).

I’ve chosen Indiegogo  as a way to tell you about my product and obtain the necessary transformation of my hobby into a job. So, with you, I’ll be able to upgrade my small workroom and improve the production to buy the best materials at an reasonable price. I like producing wooden hand made.  

Lots of different kinds of wood are beautiful on their nature. I’d like to express the beauty of wood, a good design of the old bridge, old Nixie Tube and modern wireless charging in a single device for your enjoyment every day.

Applicable wireless charging device is the next generation of phone charging and is meant to improve your life standart. Just put the phone on the charging surface and get to your own business. If you need your phone, just take it, nothing will be pulled behind it. You need not disconnect  anything. You can always  find your phone where you left it, even in the dark, you’ll see a beautiful glow Nixie Tube as a beacon. By the way, you’ll always know what time it is.

All the participants Indiegogo – represent an interesting community.I wanna ask you for you help in bring this idea to life, so that, you’ll get steampunk Nixie Clock with wireless charging of mobile phones.

I cooked just for you t-shirts with a picture steampunk, key chains and an improved version of clock, and something else. Keychain can make with the U.S. Choose any type of wood I can suggest, and I’ll do it for you with great pleasure. Thank you in advance.

 

Prices including shipping to US !


 Risks and challenges.

There are essentially no risks for this project. I have a working model of the clock which I have fired up, run for days, and has had no issues. The Nixie clock components come from a reputable producer, and I have had no issues with the quality of their work in the past. I also personally have a resume of completed projects with high profile clients that showcase both my craftsmanship and ability to complete projects. If you buy a clock, you're getting a clock, and it will look exactly like it does in the photo (with some variation of wood grain).   Based on this amount of orders, there should be no delays in obtaining all necessary hardware and components.

story:
Put all your essentials in your iPhone 4 or 5 case!

NOTE: The Cavity Case shown is a 3D printed part and spray painted, poorly. The production parts will be shiny and prettier.

Put all your eggs in one basket and watch that basket! – Albert Einstein

 

 

A fun message from the founders

 

 

 

What does Cavity Case keep?

  • Your iPhone 4 or 5

  • Three house keys or smaller keys

  • One average-sized car key

  • Either a car remote, lip gloss, USB stick, or two of our custom round enclosures

  • One telescoping pen

  • Your stuff from falling out from shaking (both hand and booty)

 

 

What does Cavity Case come with?

  • A compact mirror recessed into the case

  • A flexible plastic cover and a solid cover for the storage area

  • Four versatile round enclosures that fit in the storage area

  • One custom-fit telescoping pen

  • A leather strap

  • Love from us!

 

Bring your Wallet

Put in the card slot:

  • Up to 4 credit cards 

  • An ID

  • A $20 (or a $1, we don’t judge)

 

The cards are pinched securely and are held in a way that allows them to be removed individually, with or without the top of the case connected.

 

Bring your Key Chain

The case fits up to three small keys (house, padlock, etc.)

The case also fits one average-sized car key in the top case. The head of the car key can be up to 1.24” wide by 1.4” long by 0.63” tall.

 

 

Bring your car remote, lighter, lip gloss, contacts….

The storage area has two different covers: a transparent plastic cover that lets you push your car remote buttons without taking off the cover, and a solid plastic one for aesthetics and privacy. Both covers snap into place so they don’t fall off.

 

If you don’t have a car remote, try a lighter, USB stick, lip balm, or pack of gum.  Use our two custom containers for storing makeup, contacts, or pills in the remote storage fob area.  Instead of having to rummage through your pockets or purse, get creative!   Our containers store whatever small, secret items you can think of.

 

The case fits a mini lighter

 

A USB in the storage area

 

Filling our custom round enclosures with contact lens fluid

 

Our custom round enclosures

 

The storage area measures 1.45” wide by 2.44” long by 0.73” tall.

 

Sling it around your wrist

The strap is actually quite comfy around my wrist. I’m sure it will look much more stylish around yours, though. If you’re not into it, you can always remove it. We won’t be offended. No, seriously, it’s fine. It was really hard to get it to work, but really, it’s no big deal.

 

 

Take it apart and put it in your pockets

Slide the case apart and shove it in your pockets. It’s smaller than a wallet and makes carrying keys more comfortable. It feels good even in tight jeans.

 

 

 

Check yourself out in the mirror

The 2" by 2" mirror is recessed in the cover.

 

 

iPhone 4 and iPhone 5

We’re developing both units for production.

The iPhone 5 case is a tad slimmer and has a ¼ inch longer remote storage area. It also has the added advantage of containing an iPhone 5, which we really have no right to claim credit for, but will anyway.*

*iPhone 5 sold separately.

 

 

Color Options

You can get the top of the case in white, blue, green, red, and pink. You can get the bottom of the case in any color you want, as long as it’s black.

 

 

 

 

 

 

You want to order for Christmas, Hanukkah, or Kwanzaa!

Good call! We’re projecting that both the iPhone 4 and iPhone 5 versions will ship by February. If you’re ordering for the holidays, we’ll send a brochure in the mail for the case. Our elves work cheerfully until their tiny fingers give out, but they need a minimum of 4 hours of sleep per day and two 15-minute breaks for reindeer games.*

*Note: no elves were harmed in the making of Cavity Case.

 

Progress

The design is complete, and we’re currently working with mold makers in the U.S. to optimize the parts for production. Once we hit our goal, we’ll pull the trigger. It will take another 3-4 weeks to produce the tools, and an additional 2 weeks to produce our first production batch. After that, we’ll be shipping out product in February.

 

Rewards

So, the deal is, we know that once you get this case, all your friends will think it’s super clever and cool, and by the transitive property, you will be assumed (accurately) to be super clever and cool, as well. Everyone wants to be considered clever and cool, so they will buy the case also (like the sheep that they are) but YOU will be the first and therefore MOST clever and cool person. This is why we’re kickstarting the case at the low, low price of $39.  What’s that? Too generous, you say? No, no, we feel you’re helping us sell more, so we want to pass our marketing savings onto you, our early adopters! In seriousness, we really couldn’t do it without you.

After Kickstarter, we’re going to reassess the price point and our costs, and charge between $50 and $70 without the pen.

 

Shipping Price

Shipping is not included. We will email you an invoice for the cost of shipping to you starting at the end of the campaign.

  • Shipping in United States is approximately $5

  • Shipping to Canada is approximately $10

  • Shipping International is approximately $15

 

FAQs

Will stuff fall out?

Not without pulling it out. The mechanisms that hold things in place have been thoroughly tested and redesigned several times. This was the hardest aspect of the design to get correct, but we’re confident in it now.

How rugged is the case?

The case is made of a very rugged polymer (polycarbonate for stiffness combined with ABS for resilience). This combination is commonly used where impact is likely and is regarded as the best for this application. It also has a shiny and aesthetically pleasing look.

So cool, but I don’t have an iPhone!

We’re starting with the iPhone, but assuming this goes well, we will be developing cases for other phones as well. Stay tuned by liking www.facebook.com/cavitycase!

What kind of car keys does it accept?

The case fits almost all car keys we’ve tried, with a few exceptions for monstrous keys. If you’re worried, just take out your ruler and measure. If your car key doesn’t fit, you can attach it to the case on a key ring that we provide, carry it separately, or buy another car with a more respectable car key, whichever.

Will it take any size door or padlock key?

Yes, it takes most keys, but we won’t go as far as to say all. If you have one of those bizarre keys that won’t fit, you’ll know it, but measure it and it might fit in the key fob. If it looks like a normal house key or a short padlock key, that will almost certainly be fine.

How do the cards stay in?

Very well, actually. There is a slight taper on the card holder so that they bend in the middle (not enough to damage them… it’s more of a gentle nudge).  They are also pinched from the top and bottom as they slide in, allowing you to put one to five cards into the case and still have them held securely.

How do the keys stay in?

We spent a lot of time perfecting this mechanism. The slots have springs inside that pinch the keys hard enough that they can’t jiggle out, but flexibly enough to still allow you to pull them out without trouble.

What's the deal with the mirror?

It’s the size of a standard sized compact mirror and looks just like one.  It can be used to spy on people sitting behind you, to find and eliminate pieces of spinach stuck in your teeth, or to reflect light signals to passing ships if you become stranded on a desert island.

How does the hook mechanism keep the case together?

The two hooks that keep the top (colored part) and bottom (black part) connected snap together past a slight divot, so they don’t fall apart without a good push.

Can you put any size key fob in the storage area?

No, but it fits most medium-sized ones. If this is very important to you, check the size of yours ahead of time and ensure that it fits, but you can always put other things in that area.

Does the telescoping pen come with it?

Normally, no, but we’re throwing it in during the Kickstarter phase because we’re cool like that.

All of the other cases on the market are super lame and boring. How is yours so amazing and smart?

We know. It’s a real shame, but we’re here to help. Working through the technical issues we faced while designing this was extremely brain- and time-consuming. Thanks for your support!  

 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We have some minor pre-tooling adjustments we will make. After that, we're prepared to develop the tooling and start producing parts. All the manufacturing will take place within the U.S. We’ve secured sourcing for all the components accompanying the case and are working with a highly qualified tool maker and plastic injection molding company in Southern California. Our team has experience in plastic injection molding and understands how to get accurate and consistent quality from our parts. The renderings show the various color options available and will be matched during production.

So you’re aware, we’re considering incorporating a way to connect a purse strap (not to be confused with the wrist strap we’re definitely incorporating) in the design, but we haven’t resolved a couple of issues with it, so we’re not promoting the case with that yet. We’ll keep you updated.

Put all your essentials in your iPhone 4 or 5 case!
NOTE: The Cavity Case shown is a 3D printed part and spray painted, poorly. The production parts will be shiny and prettier.
Put all your eggs in one basket and watch that basket! – Albert Einstein
 

 
A fun message from the founders
 

 
 
What does Cavity Case keep?


Your iPhone 4 or 5


Three house keys or smaller keys


One average-sized car key


Either a car remote, lip gloss, USB stick, or two of our custom round enclosures


One telescoping pen


Your stuff from falling out from shaking (both hand and booty)

 

 
What does Cavity Case come with?


A compact mirror recessed into the case


A flexible plastic cover and a solid cover for the storage area


Four versatile round enclosures that fit in the storage area


One custom-fit telescoping pen


A leather strap


Love from us!

 
Bring your Wallet
Put in the card slot:


Up to 4 credit cards 


An ID


A $20 (or a $1, we don’t judge)

 

The cards are pinched securely and are held in a way that allows them to be removed individually, with or without the top of the case connected.
 
Bring your Key Chain
The case fits up to three small keys (house, padlock, etc.)
The case also fits one average-sized car key in the top case. The head of the car key can be up to 1.24” wide by 1.4” long by 0.63” tall.
 

 
Bring your car remote, lighter, lip gloss, contacts….
The storage area has two different covers: a transparent plastic cover that lets you push your car remote buttons without taking off the cover, and a solid plastic one for aesthetics and privacy. Both covers snap into place so they don’t fall off.

 
If you don’t have a car remote, try a lighter, USB stick, lip balm, or pack of gum.  Use our two custom containers for storing makeup, contacts, or pills in the remote storage fob area.  Instead of having to rummage through your pockets or purse, get creative!   Our containers store whatever small, secret items you can think of.
 
The case fits a mini lighter

 
A USB in the storage area

 
Filling our custom round enclosures with contact lens fluid

 
Our custom round enclosures

 
The storage area measures 1.45” wide by 2.44” long by 0.73” tall.

Shipping in United States is approximately $5

Shipping International is approximately $15
