story:
We are pleased to announce that, we are now offering a CRAZY SALE.

For this limited Perk, THREE WaveJuice only for USD138.

Be the first 20 Funders to get this limited Perk.

Get the CRAZY SALE


SUPER EARLY BIRD, Twin Pack is also available.

For this limited Perk, TWO WaveJuice only for USD99.

Be the first 20 Funders to get this limited Perk.

Get the SUPER EARLY BIRD



WaveJuice - Go Wireless!!!

 

What is WaveJuice?

 

Outlook of WaveJuice

WaveJuice Specification

  • Wireless High-Capacity Battery Pack
  • Dimension : 6inch x 2.9inch x 0.6inch
  • Weight: 250g
  • Wireless charging of Qi standard. 1A charging with over 75% efficiency. Maximum charging current depends on the model of tag or phone used.
  • 8000mAh Li-polymer battery inside
  • Two USB output charging ports: 2.1A + 1A
  • Simultaneously can charge three devices with the use of wireless charging and two USB ports
  • With LED to show remaining capacity

 

Accessories

From left: WJ-S4, WJ-S3, WJ-N2, WJ-A4, WJ-A5

WJ-S4 / WJ-S3 / WJ-N2

  • Wireless Charging Tag of Qi Standard 
  • ~1mm thick. Pasted on the battery under the battery cover 
  • WJ-S4 used in Galaxy S4
  • WJ-S3 used in Galaxy S3
  • WJ-N2 used in Galaxy Note II 

WJ-A4 / WJ-A5

  • Wireless Charging Case of Qi Standard 
  • Best fit for the size of iPhone4/iPhone4s/iPhone5
  • WJ-A4 used with iPhone4/iPhone4s
  • WJ-A5 used with iPhone5

Which accessory is suitable for your cell phone?

Compatibility Table of Wireless Charging Tags/Cases

 

Tag is ~1mm thick. Pasted on the battery under the battery cover

How about new/future phone models not listed above?

New design of the tags/phone cases may be needed for any new/future phone models, that need an accessory to support the wireless charging function, not listed above, e.g. Samsung Galaxy S4 Active.

Any new phone models that have integrated wireless charging function can be supported immediately without any accessories though!

We will keep the R&D action going when the funding is succuessful, meaning WaveJuice can be borned successfully!

Please support and stay tuned!!

How to use?

Wireless Charging

  • Use suitable accessory with your cell phone
  • Press the side button of WaveJuice
  • Put cell phone on top of WaveJuice at central position
  • Pop-up message of Wireless Charging will be shown on cell phone if successful

 Video for Wireless Charging

USB Charging

  • Connect WaveJuice to any USB power-in device (e.g. cell phone) with USB cable
  • Press  the side button of WaveJuice
  • 1A and 2.1A USB output can be used simultaneously

 

Three devices can be simultaneously charged with Wireless charging and two USB charging ports.

Dual USB Power Output

 

WaveJuice (WJ-08Q) charging three phones simultaneously, one wirelessly and two via USB charging ports

 

Stop looking foolish. Stay cool with WaveJuice.

Advantages or Li-Polymer Batteries VS Li-ion Batteries

WaveJuice uses Lithium Polymer (Li-Po) batteries. They have several advantages over Lithium ion batteries (Li-ion or commonly known as 18650 Li-ion batteries), which are commonly used in other battery packs. Below are the advantages of Li-Po batteries:

  • Thinner
  • Lighter in weight
  • Larger capacity to size ratio, which means having more capacity in the same size of batteries.
  • Lower chance of electrolyte leakage
  • Most importantly, safer to use. It has gelled electrolytes (while Li-ion batteries have liquid electrolytes). This gives more resistance to overcharging, overheating or short circuit.

Li-Polymer Cells

 

How was WaveJuice born?

At the beginning, we conducted research on different battery packs in the market and discovered that most of them used a Li-ion cell which was thick and bulky. Worse still, it may be explosive after a long time of use at a high temperature. To build a thinner and safer battery pack, we decided to use a Li-Polymer cell,  which is slim in size and non-explosive, in WaveJuice. Li-ion contains liquid-form solvents in the cell, which may cause danger. In contrast, all parts in the Li-polymer cell are in solid form. Prototypes of the Li-polymer battery pack were built in order to confirm the slim outlook.

Building a slim battery pack is not our ultimate goal. What we aimed at is to develop a product which can revolutionize the traditional use of battery packs. To achieve this goal, we tried different methods to upgrade WaveJuice. Finally, we decided to make WaveJuice ‘wireless’. What is meant by ‘wireless’? It is not about Wi-Fi or Bluetooth, but about the charging method – Wireless Charging.

After long-term observation of the use of ordinary battery packs from people around, we discovered that battery packs always needed a USB cable for charging electronic devices (e.g. cell phones). In order to achieve our goal, we then built a prototype of wireless charging transmitter, which is a desktop wireless charger without a battery inside. After the technology of wireless charging had been approved, we started to build our final goal - WaveJuice (WJ-08Q). It has an 8000mAh battery inside and is with wireless charging technology. On the way to building WaveJuice, we have also developed 5 accessories (WJ-S3, WJ-S4, WJ-N2, WJ-A4, WJ-A5) which can turn several models of cell phones into wireless-able.

After over half a year of effort, WaveJuice was born. Enjoy it.

Development History

January - March 2013
  • Conducted research on similar products in the market
  • Gathered samples of other similar products
  • Tested the samples and analyzed their pros and cons
  • Defined product features of WaveJuice
  • Developed prototype of Wireless Charger
  • Develop High-Capacity Battery Pack prototype
April - June 2013
  • Combined the idea of Wireless Charger and High-Capacity Battery Pack
  • Developed WaveJuice (WJ-08Q)
  • Developed the accessories for WaveJuice (WJ-S3, WJ-S4, WJ-N2, WJ-A4, WJ-A5)

Manufacture Plan

August 2013
  • Finalize design of logo
September 2013
  • Order materials for production
  • Order PCBs and cases
  • Order Li-polymer cells
October 2013
  • Assemble PCBA
  • Conduct QC of products before they leave factory
  • Pack products into small parcels for each backer
November 2013
  • Product shipment

FAQ

Q: How many time can the WaveJuice charges my phone?

A: WaveJuice has a 8000mAh battery pack and ~75% charging efficiency. Here are some references, if the WaveJuice is fully charged.

  • iPhone 5/4S/4, fully cycle recharge for ~4.5times.
  • Galaxy S4, fully cycle recharge for ~2.5times.
  • Galaxy S3, fully cycle recharge for ~3times.
  • Galaxy Note II, can fully cycle recharge for ~2times.

Q: What do I need to make my phone capatible with the wireless charging function of WaveJuice?

A: The section Which accessory is suitable for your cell phone? above showed the list of phones support wireless charging with WaveJuice.

  • For phones that with Integrated wireless charging function. You don't need any accessories. Just simply put your phone on top of WaveJuice to start charging.
  • For Samsung Galaxy S3/S4/Note 2, you need to paste the thin tag (WJ-S3, WJ-S4 or WJ-N2) on top of the battery and connect it with the special contact points besides the battery area. This will add wireless charging function to your phone.
  • For iPhone4/4S/5, you need to put your phone into our special phone case (WJ-A4 or WJ-A5). This will add wireless charging function to your phone.

Q: Will the WaveJuice act like a standard wireless charger when it's connected to an outlet?

A: Yes. When the WaveJuice is connected with an 5V DC outlet/USB output via its micro-USB connector, it will act just like a standard wireless charger. And at the same time, it will also recharge the 8000mAh battery bank if the supply current is large enough.

Q: How to start charging with WaveJuice? 

A: You can charge your phone with USB cable or wirelessly:

  • Charge with USB Cable:
    • Simply connect your phone with one of the USB outlet of WaveJuice with a USB cable to charge your phone anytime.
  • Charge wirelessly without a power supply to WaveJuice:
    • Make sure your phone support wireless charging.
    • If the wireless charging function of WaveJuice is not recently used for 1 minute, the function will temporarily disabled to save power.
    • In this case, you need to press the button on WaveJuice, which will show the remained capacity with the LEDs of the WaveJuice as well as activating the wireless charging function.
    • Then simply put your phone on top of WaveJuice to start charging wirelessly
  • Charge wirelessly when WaveJuice is connected with 5V supply: 
    • Make sure your phone support wireless charging.
    • Wireless charging function of WaveJuice is always activated. Your Phone will start charging wirelessly when you put the phone on top of WaveJuice.

Combined the idea of Wireless Charger and High-Capacity Battery Pack
Developed WaveJuice (WJ-08Q)
Developed the accessories for WaveJuice (WJ-S3, WJ-S4, WJ-N2, WJ-A4, WJ-A5)

Manufacture Plan
August 2013
Finalize design of logo

September 2013
Order materials for production
Order PCBs and cases
Order Li-polymer cells

October 2013
Assemble PCBA
Conduct QC of products before they leave factory
Pack products into small parcels for each backer

November 2013

Product shipment

FAQ
Q: How many time can the WaveJuice charges my phone?
A: WaveJuice has a 8000mAh battery pack and ~75% charging efficiency. Here are some references, if the WaveJuice is fully charged.

iPhone 5/4S/4, fully cycle recharge for ~4.5times.
Galaxy S4, fully cycle recharge for ~2.5times.
Galaxy S3, fully cycle recharge for ~3times.
Galaxy Note II, can fully cycle recharge for ~2times.

Q: What do I need to make my phone capatible with the wireless charging function of WaveJuice?
A: The section Which accessory is suitable for your cell phone? above showed the list of phones support wireless charging with WaveJuice.

For phones that with Integrated wireless charging function. You don't need any accessories. Just simply put your phone on top of WaveJuice to start charging.
For Samsung Galaxy S3/S4/Note 2, you need to paste the thin tag (WJ-S3, WJ-S4 or WJ-N2) on top of the battery and connect it with the special contact points besides the battery area. This will add wireless charging function to your phone.
For iPhone4/4S/5, you need to put your phone into our special phone case (WJ-A4 or WJ-A5). This will add wireless charging function to your phone.

Q: Will the WaveJuice act like a standard wireless charger when it's connected to an outlet?
A: Yes. When the WaveJuice is connected with an 5V DC outlet/USB output via its micro-USB connector, it will act just like a standard wireless charger. And at the same time, it will also recharge the 8000mAh battery bank if the supply current is large enough.
Q: How to start charging with WaveJuice? 
A: You can charge your phone with USB cable or wirelessly:


Charge with USB Cable:

Simply connect your phone with one of the USB outlet of WaveJuice with a USB cable to charge your phone anytime.



Charge wirelessly without a power supply to WaveJuice:

Make sure your phone support wireless charging.
If the wireless charging function of WaveJuice is not recently used for 1 minute, the function will temporarily disabled to save power.
In this case, you need to press the button on WaveJuice, which will show the remained capacity with the LEDs of the WaveJuice as well as activating the wireless charging function.
Then simply put your phone on top of WaveJuice to start charging wirelessly



Charge wirelessly when WaveJuice is connected with 5V supply: 

Make sure your phone support wireless charging.
Wireless charging function of WaveJuice is always activated. Your Phone will start charging wirelessly when you put the phone on top of WaveJuice.

story:
Examiner


With Total Control controlling your electronic devices becomes fun!

With the "Stinger" unit (Bluetooth technology), all you have to do is point the laser at the device you want to operate.


Pointing is really easy. Just slide the green button and point the laser at the desired device. This operation differs from touch pad scrolling because the device location is predetermined, and the laser points right at the center of the device. Once you select the device, it appears on the “device spinner” on your smartphone.

Next, select the desired button and click to operate the device.

The beauty of this system is that every object in the room can serve as a button for your device.Let's take the receiver for instance. You can use the DVD button on the surface of thereceiver to play the DVD or change the button position and locate it on the DVD machine.This way, we can also configure the TV to display all devices with video output, like PC, DVD,Cable TV decoder and more, simply by pointing at the actual devices.

We recommended organizing the most useful and common device functions into one well-designed icon set. Thus, every device can use this icon set for its buttons.

Now we can use the Setup icon for example to setup every device and navigate thru its menus by simply sliding the green button.The mute icon can be used to mute any audio device. The arrows icon gives control over the device's navigation arrows, if such exist, and so on.

Not every possible button of the remote control can be represented on the icon set, simply because we want to have the most common ones on the visual set; Nevertheless, all buttons appear in the “button spinner” on your smartphone and we can choose and operate each and every one of them. Devices that use a keypad can be operated from the drawer located at the right side of the application, and for the comfort of the couch potatoes among us, plus andminus buttons, are available for zapping.

When selecting a PC as a device to operate, the Total Control application can function both as a mouse and keyboard.

Adding new devices to the system is really easy!

All you have to do is to use the device's perspective, push the option menu button and select Add New Device option. You will be asked to point the laser at the new device's top left corner. Then you will be asked to point the laser at the new device's bottom right corner.Now the system knows your device location. The application will then connect automatically to Total Control's servers in order to recognize the added device. You will be asked to select the device type, the device brand name, and finally the model number. Now,the magic starts to happens. All device codes and buttons will be downloaded to your system and all the visual buttons will be recognized. Total Control's servers contain a large databaseof infrared codes that are continually updated.

But what happens if my device is very old or very new and I can't find my device model inTotal Control's code server?

Stinger and Blaster are learning units and they can be easily programed to recognize new devices, their buttons, and IR codes. Thus, we can also teach the system to recognize devices that, until now, could not be controlled directly, such as the left speaker, subwoofer and etc. We can also create virtual devices, like pictures, that when selected, a PC application device or function will be operated.

How can I integrate my coffee machine or a lamp into Total Control?

Stinger and Blaster are equipped with 360 degree infrared transmitters, so every device controlled by the traditional remote control can easily integrated into the system. In addition,infrared switches can be bought as one of our perks for 15$.This switch can turn any simpleon/off device into a controllable device that can be integrated within the Total Control system. Every switch bought from our perk list will help fund our project by 9$. Alternatively this infrared switch is an off-the-shelf product and can be bought from EBay for approximately 6$. There are many more infrared controlled products that can be integrated into the Total Control system, thus making your house smarter. This can include infrared controlled dinners, in-wall switches for your boiler or for your electric blinds and more.

More exiting features!

The Total Control application is location-aware and will automatically turn your Bluetooth on when you approach your house so that when you enter your door, you will already be connected to the Stinger unit. Stinger obtains your phone ID and alerts if another user left you a message that greets you as you enter the house.

About Blaster

Blaster has activation capabilities similar to Stinger's but without laser-pointing equipment,and thus, is less intuitive, but more economical. It is designed for use in smaller areas that contain up to 3 electronic devices. You control the devices by selecting it from the device spinner on the smartphone app and then selecting the desired button to activate on the device.




Total Control has been tested in users trials with prototypes since December 2013. We have just completed manufacturing our first 20 Stinger and Blaster units in preparation for our beta test program.

We’ve entered into formal compliance testing, developed the hardware test suite, and designed the test mount.

We’ve completed the main feature development on Android mobile platform, and are currently engaged in the bug fixing cycle.


FAQ

.

Q: When/where do I install the Stinger or Blaster?

Stinger is designed for spaces that have multiple electronic devices, so the living room where most of our electronic devices are located, would be the appropriate place. The Blaster on the other hand, is designed for rooms that has 1-3 electronic devices at the most.

Q: How do I install Stinger/Blaster?

Both the Stinger and Blaster should be mounted on the ceiling with two screws or with strong double-sided adhesive, included with every Stinger/Blaster unit.

Q: Can I use it with my iPhone?

Currently Stinger and Blaster units are supported only on the Android platform, but one of our main stretch goals is to develop iOS support.

Q: What is the icon set?

The icon set is simply a well-designed screen that contains the most common button icons of typical home entertainment devices. So after you mount the device and define it like anyother electronic device (simply by pointing at its two diagonal corners) all the device's common buttons will be directed to this icon set, thus making the system more intuitive. You can make your own icon set, give it any form you wish, and integrate it into the system in few simple steps. Our icon set is delivered free with every Stinger unit.

Q: What are the shipping costs?

All shipping in the US and Israel are free of charge. There is additional cost for international shipping. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country. Also, there is no guarantee that this will work in your country (e.g. unknown power & connectivity issues) – there are many hurdles we need to go over until we have a complete picture on the international market. If it turns out that shipment to your country proves impossible, we will reimburse your order.

Q:What are the challenges?

We are doing something that has never been done before: a completely revolutionary device like nothing else in the market. While there may be manufacturing and production delays outside of our control, we promise timely and transparent communication throughout the process.

Any more questions? Ask away!

story:
CIBS is a mobile app that sends automated alert messages when its user is incapacitated or otherwise unable to do so.


Safety shouldn't be an afterthought, it should be your first thought! 


Think about the unthinkable. Sadly, each year around the world, thousands of people disappear without a trace and thousands of our mothers, daughters and sisters are assaulted. These people are not just statistics or pictures on a “Have you seen me” boards, they are our moms, dads, sons, daughters, friends, classmates, and neighbors. With these tragedies in the forefront of our minds, we developed the Check In Be Safe (CIBS) Emergency- Status Locator Notification System (E-SLNS) and CIBS Network Communications Monitoring Accountability System (NCMAS). 

WHAT EXACTLY IS CIBS?

PERSONAL SAFETY (CIBS E-SLNS)

The CIBS mobile application and its provisionally patented Emergency-Status, Locator Notification System was created to reduce the time a person goes missing from an abduction, or goes without assistance from emergency responders due to incapacitation from accidents, physical assault, medical or mental affliction while in solitary or isolated conditions. This is accomplished by sending an automated alert message to the user’s authorized contact list with his or her current or last geographical location, current photo, time stamp and status if a proper response to the app’s hail is not received within the users pre-defined time interval. Put simply, CIBS will alert others when you can't and authenticates the transmission's integrity. In the unfortunate event that you are incapacitated or unable to request help for any reason, CIBS will be your voice.

HOW DOES CIBS WORK? 

While there are literally hundreds of uses for the CIBS E-SLNS, the following fictional scenarios will give you an understanding of how it works. The scenarios may prove graphic for some people, but they represent everyday occurrences and should be regarded as such.

Scenario A without CIBS: 

Jane Doe is a nurse working at a local hospital. She alternates between swing and mid shifts so she routinely transits between home and work during dark hours. Once she arrives at her job, it takes Jane five minutes to walk from her car which is located in a parking garage a block away to the hospital's entry doors. Every night she makes this trip without incident - until last night.  

After her shift ended last night, Jane headed for the parking garage as usual. Three minutes into the walk to her car she heard a noise. She caught a glimpse of someone to her left, but before she could react she was knocked unconscious. The blow was severe enough to keep Jane unconscious for nearly fifteen minutes. As a result of her injuries, when Jane regained consciousness, she was temporarily unable to speak and her vision was degraded to the point where she could not locate and use her cell phone. By the time another nurse who was also leaving work found Jane and got medical and police assistance, nearly thirty-five minutes had passed. Due to the gap in time from attack to medical assistance, Jane's injuries became life-threatening. With a half hour start, Jane's assailant escaped police and was able to attack yet another innocent victim.

Alternative Scenario A with CIBS:

Jane Doe is a nurse working at a local hospital. She alternates between swing and mid shifts so she routinely transits between home and work during dark hours. Once she arrives at her job, it takes her five minutes to walk from her car which is located in a parking garage a block away to the hospital's entry doors. Every night she makes this trip without incident - until last night. 

After her shift ended last night, Jane headed for the parking garage as usual. But before she leaves the hospital, she takes a moment to activate CIBS. Jane knows it takes her five minutes to get to her car, so she sets her check in interval to 4 minutes. She is then prompted to take a CIBS selfie and provide any other information that can uniquely identify or locate her in an emergency. She types "walking to car parked at C14". Three minutes into the walk to her car Jane hears a noise. She catches a glimpse of someone to her left, but before she can react she is knocked unconscious. One minute later “CIBS IS CALLING” pops up on Jane's phone. She is unable to respond and CIBS immediately notifies her contacts. Since she knows the walk to and from the hospital can be dangerous, one of Jane's contacts is the security station at the hospital. One of the guards on duty immediately responds to the location identified by the CIBS alert while the second guard notifies hospital and local law enforcement. Jane is quickly transported back to the hospital where she is immediately treated thereby preventing any permanent damage sustained from her injuries. Meanwhile, police are able to apprehend the assailant since he only had a five minute escape window. 

Although these scenarios are fictional, they are extremely relevant and could have been pulled from any current newspaper or news report. In fact, here is an article from an Australian website citing nurses having to carry scissors to feel safe while walking to and from work. You can probably relate with your own similar personal encounters or from someone you know. The unfortunate fact is we've all been in circumstances where a capability like CIBS would have been an invaluable and possibly even life-saving tool. 


CIBS Overview 

 • Authenticates user • Time sensitive automated Check In Feature • Secure by design • No invasion of privacy • Unique features • Discrete  • Not just another locator App • Easily integrated into any current Emergency Management Plan  • Potential users pre-teens to active elders • Affordable 

HOW IS CIBS DIFFERENT FROM OTHER APPS?

First, unlike others, CIBS is NOT a continuous surveillance app, it only provides geographical data and safety information when requested to do so, and ONLY to those contacts the user has predetermined. CIBS provides additional security, and performs its functions without EVER compromising user privacy! This decreases the chance users such as preteens to young adults will circumvent the system and create a security threat just to maintain their independence. 

Second, most apps comparable to CIBS are reactive by design, meaning the user has to physically activate the app in the event of an incident, and are not authenticated. Users of other apps are also not provided with functions and features that would increase their chances of surviving an unforeseen event. For example, they don’t account for situations where users may be unable to reach their phone, or where users may need to activate an alert discreetly. 

CIBS literally can mean the difference between life and death. In instances where EVERY SECOND COUNTS, you want CIBS in your corner. CIBS takes an proactive stance when it comes to safety. With CIBS you can breathe a little easier, and security is literally in the palm of your hands. 

HELP US SAVE JANE and JOHN DOE!

The CIBS NCMAS utilizes the CIBS user authentication system to quickly and accurately locate and account for missing personnel during active shooter incidents, extremely inclement weather conditions, military unit mobility exercises, and even youth events. A critical feature of the NCMAS is it provides a way to track the movements of an active shooter so your CIBS networked community can avoid the affected areas and can better weigh their escape options and emergency responders can localize and contain the threat. 

WHY WE DEVELOPED CIBS and CIBS NCMAS 

Like you, every member of Totally Cool Travels has a family we love, friends we care for, and a desire to go through life without any serious incidents or accidents. We developed the CIBS application because in our dangerous and uncertain world, safety has to be a daily consideration, and we need every additional tool in our arsenals to ensure our spouses get home safely, to make sure our parents or grandparents have an effective way to alert us if they are incapacitated and have a medical emergency, to help mitigate the number of sexual assaults on the campuses where our daughters attend, and to allow an expedient way to account for our children, office workers, and our neighbors in the event of an active shooter or natural disaster. We developed CIBS to do these things, but the primary reason we developed CIBS was to help save lives!

Help us fund CIBS so we can all enjoy an extra layer of protection and a NEW layer of prevention that will provide peace of mind for ourselves, our loved ones, co-workers or comrades in arms. 

WHY YOU SHOULD USE CIBS 

 • If you have ever been involved in any emergency situation you understand the need for quick notification and accountability. 

 • If you have seen the news recently you know that current Emergency Response Plans in cities, office buildings or facilities need to be upgraded. 

 • If something were to happen right now, how would you notify your loved ones if you were unable to get to your phone and they were unable to hear your screams? How long would it be before people started looking for you? 

 • Do you trust your employer's current Emergency Management Plan? 

 • Don’t you think it is time that we stop depending solely on Emergency Responders and start doing everything we can to ensure we are protected? 

For more information and additional scenarios of how CIBS can help you, visit our website: http://www.totallycooltravels.com/cibs/introduction.html or our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/visionarytechsolutions1. You can also follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/VisionarySolu

WHAT YOU’RE FUNDING… 

With your generous pledges (thank you in advance) you will directly impact the future success of CIBS and help us protect millions of users from unforeseen events. We plan to have CIBS Phase One complete by Sept 2014 and CIBS fully functional by Dec 2014.

 Whether you donate a dollar or a million, you are extremely important to the development and creation of this revolutionary product which will change how users look at security.

More specifically, this is what your pledges will fund...

Phase I - system, network, mobile app, database, and software framework prototype design/development:

1. Development server build 

  hardware search, parts order, assembly, build, testing

2. Software development environment setup 

  1) Server software installation, configuration, fine tune and testing on development server 

  2) iOS mobile app development environment setup 

3. Client software development 

  1) client server database and programs 

  a. database, tables, security, service and interface programs 

  b. administration control 

  2) iOS mobile app design/development 

4. Company software development (client management and license control) 

5. Test/QA server build, software, database, app installation, setup, and initial testing 

6. Delivery of CIBS 1.01 to customers

and ONLY to those contacts the user has predetermined. CIBS
provides additional security, and performs its functions without EVER compromising
user privacy! This decreases the chance users such as preteens to young adults
will circumvent the system and create a security threat just to maintain their
independence. 
Second,
most apps comparable to CIBS are reactive by design, meaning the user has to
physically activate the app in the event of an incident, and are not
authenticated. Users of other apps are also not provided with functions and features that
would increase their chances of surviving an unforeseen event. For example, they don’t
account for situations where users may be unable to reach their phone, or where
users may need to activate an alert discreetly. 
CIBS
literally can mean the difference between life and death. In instances where
EVERY SECOND COUNTS, you want CIBS in your corner. CIBS takes
an proactive stance when it comes to safety. With CIBS you can breathe a
little easier, and security is literally in the palm of your hands. 
HELP
US SAVE JANE and JOHN DOE!
The
CIBS NCMAS utilizes the CIBS user authentication system to quickly and
accurately locate and account for missing personnel during active shooter
incidents, extremely inclement weather conditions, military unit mobility
exercises, and even youth events. A critical feature of the NCMAS is it provides a way to track the
movements of an active shooter so your CIBS networked community can avoid the
affected areas and can better weigh their escape options and emergency responders can
localize and contain the threat. 
WHY
WE DEVELOPED CIBS and CIBS NCMAS 
Like
you, every member of Totally Cool Travels has a family we love, friends we care
for, and a desire to go through life without any serious incidents or
accidents. We developed the CIBS application because in our dangerous and
uncertain world, safety has to be a daily consideration, and we need every additional tool in our arsenals to ensure our spouses get home safely, to make sure our parents or
grandparents have an effective way to alert us if they are incapacitated and have a medical emergency, to
help mitigate the number of sexual assaults on the campuses where our daughters attend,
and to allow an expedient way to account for our children, office workers, and
our neighbors in the event of an active shooter or natural disaster. We developed CIBS to do these things, but the primary reason we developed CIBS was to help save lives!Help us fund CIBS so we can all enjoy an extra layer of protection and a NEW layer of
prevention that will provide peace of mind for ourselves, our loved ones,
co-workers or comrades in arms. 
WHY
YOU SHOULD USE CIBS 
 •
If you have ever been involved in any emergency situation you understand the
need for quick notification and accountability. 
 •
If you have seen the news recently you know that current Emergency Response
Plans in cities, office buildings or facilities need to be upgraded. 
 •
If something were to happen right now, how would you notify your loved ones if
you were unable to get to your phone and they were unable to hear your
screams? How long would it be before people started looking for you? 
 •
Do you trust your employer's current Emergency Management Plan? 
 •
Don’t you think it is time that we stop depending solely on Emergency
Responders and start doing everything we can to ensure we are protected? 
For
more information and additional scenarios of how CIBS can help you, visit our
website: http://www.totallycooltravels.com/cibs/introduction.html or
our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/visionarytechsolutions1. You can also follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/VisionarySolu
WHAT
YOU’RE FUNDING… 
With
your generous pledges (thank you in advance) you will directly impact the
future success of CIBS and help us protect millions of users from unforeseen
events. We plan to have CIBS Phase One complete by Sept 2014 and CIBS fully functional by Dec 2014. Whether you
donate a dollar or a million, you are extremely important to the development and
creation of this revolutionary product which will change how users look at
security.More specifically, this is what your pledges will fund...Phase I - system, network, mobile app, database, and software framework prototype design/development:
1. Development server build 
  hardware search, parts order, assembly, build, testing
2. Software development environment setup 
  1) Server software installation, configuration, fine tune and testing on development server 
  2) iOS mobile app development environment setup 
3. Client software development 
  1) client server database and programs 
  a. database, tables, security, service and interface programs 
  b. administration control 
  2) iOS mobile app design/development 
4. Company software development (client management and license control) 
5. Test/QA server build, software, database, app installation, setup, and initial testing 6. Delivery of CIBS 1.01 to customers

story:
PopTop - 16GB USB Drive, Bottle Opener and Keychain

The PopTop combines a usb drive and bottle opener in one device that fits on your keychain. It feels solid in your hand without being heavy. The water resistant cap means your data is safe for years to come. It's designed to be the last USB drive you'll buy.

 
It's cap is lined in rubber to keep moisture and debris out.
 
 
The slot allows for keychains and lanyards while still being able to use the bottle opener.
 
You can also use the corner to punch a hole for smooth pouring and the ocasional chugging contest.

We have everything lined up and ready for manufacturing, we only require orders now. Your pre-order here on Indiegogo means we can make minimum order quantities from our suppliers, tool up and start production.

Thanks!

 

Photography by Kinzie James

Thanks!

story:
"Aussie eyes OTTO to assist your automobile experience"

November 20, 2012

 

       Life and Technology Show with Charlie Brown

November 17, 2012

 

THE CONNECTED CAR HAS ARRIVED!

We all live in a connected world with our mobiles and other Internet enabled devices. So why is it then that once we enter a car, all of that seems to either stop or become a messy and unsafe experience? Why shouldn't you be able to receive a Skype call just as easily as a hands free mobile call? Or have an email read out in a human voice instead of fumbling for a mobile phone in your lap (illegally)? 

THE MISSION

This project is about taking the things we like to do technologically and making them user friendly, safe and legal in an automotive environment.

Our aim is to lead the way with a connected vehicle solution that embraces  technology in a manner that allows users to safely do the things that they would otherwise attempt to do discreetly & dangerously on a mobile device.

We want to see distraction related accidents reduced but it is our belief that this cannot be achieved through introducing restrictive laws that cannot be adequately policed, but by harnessing technology to enable the functionality that people now demand in a way that is safe and makes sense.

So how do you encourage drivers to use such a device? Well firstly, you make it very, very cool! Next, you make it user-friendly and finally, it has to do the things that we now expect to be able to do, regardless of driving a vehicle or not! 

Gizmosis has been researching and marketing car computers and other connected devices since 2007 with the aim of truly understanding the needs of users, as well as waiting for the technology to mature enough for it to become a mainstream product...that time has finally come! 

  • Android has matured into a functional and widely used OS
  • Mobile phones are now able to act as wireless hotspots removing the need for additional data devices
  • Data plans have become more cost effective. 

THE SOLUTION

What happens when you take a car entertainment system and mix it up with the best features from a mobile phone?

Well, you get OTTO!

otto is a great car entertainment system that includes:

  • AM/FM Radio
  • DVD
  • GPS
  • Bluetooth
  • MP3
...but wait, there's more!
 
 

There's An Android In My Car!!

You also get a device running Android OS that allows you to download and fully customise your driving experience. With over half a million apps available, there is no limit to what you can do!

Some of our favourite activities include:

  • Listen to radio stations from anywhere in the world
  • Talk to friends using communication apps on handsfree
  • Have emails & text messages read out to you
  • Have Facebook updates read out to you
  • Listen to your customised list of podcasts

and so much more!

Turn your mobile phone into a mobile WIFI hotspot and your car is ready to connect to the world.

The other great benefit of an app driven system is that it never becomes outdated. Whereas most car entertainment systems are heavily reliant on their hardware, there is no shortage of new apps being constantly released to add additional functionality.

WHY ARE WE DOING THIS?

Ever since Michael Knight aka David Hasselhoff appeared on TV in the 80's driving a heavily modified Trans Am sporting the ultimate in artificial intelligence, it was a dream to recreate this.

In fact, several years ago, we released a Windows based car computer that you could converse with:

Watch Cybershack Video 

The idea of what you could do in the car was catching on... 

Watch Sunrise Video 

Then a shift began towards app based platforms and we aligned ourselves with this new direction.

With around half a million apps available on Google Play (formerly Android Market), there is no limit to how you can customise your experience.

Many were trying to achieve an in-car experience that parallelled their mobile phone experience however the results ranged from cumbersome workarounds to just being unsafe!

Whilst many states are debating the use of technology in vehicles and some even trying to legislate against it's use, the reality is that many people will still try and check messages on their phones in their lap and continue to pursue other  dangerous behaviours.

So rather than pretend that it won't happen, we have taken the step of actively trying to find safe ways of keeping connected.

So...

In order to make this a reality, we need your help!!

Firstly, we want your ideas. We want to hear what you would want in a system like this. What features, apps and design elements would you like?

We have developed a user environment where key functions such as media controls and information feeds can be easily accessed through our custom UI as well as via voice command and text-to-speech.

Now we need funding to get this produced!

The otto hardware is already rolling off the production line.

Funds will be used to build the software design for otto as well as fulfil the minimum order quantities that we need to manufacture at a reasonable cost. We also need to receive your input for features that you would like incorporated and then build these in.

In return, we are offering the Indiegogo community the opportunity to be the first to get hold of the new units at a heavily discounted price. The rewards provide a significant saving off the launch price and even greater savings for those who act earliest!

You will also have your name forever credited with contributing to the product's development. You will be recognised on our website's product page as well as here on our campaign page.

For those that are pre-ordering the new unit, you will also be on our beta test list and will be amongst the first to try out new apps and updates before they are released to the general public.

Stretch Goals

If we are able to reach our goal of $120,000 then we will be able to deliver an awesome product.

If we are fortunate enough to exceed our goal then we have plans to introduce even more features into OTTO including:

$150K - we will create the software development kit (SDK) so you will be able to create your own apps to work within OTTO's safe operating environment

$200K - we will integrate even more functions into OTTO's voice control at launch including Twitter, news feeds, AM/FM radio & many others 

 

The Geeky Stuff...(aka "the specifications")

Main Unit

Model： otto Head Unit v1
Work temperature： -10°C~70°C 
Storage temperature： -20°C~85°C
Size： 200*178*100mm 

 

Power Supply
Working (operating) voltage: DC 10V～16V
Working (operating) current: 1A～10A
Standby current: 6mA～12mA 　

Interfaces (ports)
Power: BATT、ACC、GND 　 
Speaker: 4x45W quadraphonics 　 

AUX
2 video output, 1 video input, 
1 rear view camera input, 
1 four channels audio output, 
1 subwoofer output, 1 stereo input. 　 

Steering wheel
The AD port of the steering wheel with two connections, IR infrared input interface. 
　 
Other
USB x 1 　 
iPod x 2
Antenna x 1 　 
Power Amplifier Control x 1 　 
Headlight detection x 1 　 
Brake testing x 1 　 
Reversing test x 1 　 
Phone mute test x 1 　 

Modes

DVD/SD/USB
MP4/ DVD/ VCD 1.0/ 1.1/ 2.0/ 3.0 versions, DVD, CD-R/ CD-RM/ MP3/WMA/ JPEG/ WMV/ MTV/ AVI/ MPG 　 

Radio
FM：65MHz～108MHz
AM:522KHz～1720KHz

GPS
Baud rate：9600bps 
COM port：2 　 

Bluetooth
Supports OPP,OBEX,SPP,A2DP,AVRCP,FTP,HS/HF,DUN

Steering wheel
Supports High resistance steering wheel, 0V～5V simulative keypad voltage

DVR Black Box Recorder
120 degree wide angle camera for recording road traffic

 

Android Tablet

Model：otto Tab v1  
OS：Currently Android 2.3 / Plan to upgrade to 4.0  
Work temperature ：-10°C~70°C
Storage Temperature：-20°C~85°C  
Size：170*104*15mm
CPU：Telechips TCC8803 1GHz Cortex-A8 inner core, 45nm  
RAM：512MB DDR3
ROM: Flash 4GB (2GB,8GB,16GB & 32GB are also compatible)   
Battery：3.7V/2800mAH Polymer lithium Ion Batteries
GPU: OpenVG 1.1 / OpenGL ES 1.1 & 2.0
WiFi: Atheros 6302 WiFi802.11b/g/n  
GPS: JRC G591 receiver module
Loudspeaker: Internal 8Ω/1W 　 
Camera: Rear view camera with 20K pixels 　 
MIC: Internal MIC 　 
Motor: Internal vibrating motor 　    

 

LCD

Screen size: 7 inch 　 
Screen resolution: 800*480 TFT 　 

Push buttons
Power, Volume +, Volume -, Return, Menu

Other 　 
Touch pen (Stylus) 　 
Reset hole
 　 
Ports
USB: Mini USB*1 (USB2.0 OTG) 
Earphone: 3.5mm standard earphone interface 
DC: 2.5MM, 5V charging port 
HDMI: HDMI standard port, Type-C 
Car multimedia: Patented double 22pin ports to connect with the head unit
 
Accessories 
Power adapter: 5V/2A AC plug 
USB cable: 　 Standard configuration 
USB OTG cable: Transferring OTG to HOST

Software configuration
OS: Android 2.3 / Plan to upgrade to 4.0　 
Language: Multi-languages supported 
Input: Android keyboard 　 
Flash: Supports Adobe FLASH10.1 　 
Browser: Google Chrome browser preloaded 
Gmail: Google email 
E-mail: Email app 　 
Map: Google maps 
Other: Plenty of standard apps included plus download any compatible app from Google Play

Note: Individual hardware and software specifications are subject to change

story:
Thank You!

A big "Thank you!" to all our backers who pledged their support for this great idea!

The campaign for PartySnapper has ended without meeting the funding goal. Indiegogo will refund all the contributions within a couple of days.


What's Next?

We love the idea for PartySnapper and we have received ravingly positive feedback. Therefore, we have decided to go ahead with development although we will not get any funds from this campaign. 

We have a working prototype and we will go into beta testing soon.

If you like to follow PartySnapper's progress, it is best to visit our blog regularly or subscribe to the Boinx Newsletter.

_______________________


What is it?

PartySnapper is a social photo wall on steroids. Every guest at your party takes pictures with their iPhones. These are transmitted instantly to your own iPad or iPhone wirelessly and turned into a beautiful slide show that plays on a TV or projector connected via AirPlay or cable. At the end of the party, you don’t need to ask your guests to send you their photos because they already are collected on your device.

PartySnapper is a single app that has both a photo taking mode for party-goers and mode for hosting a party.

The app is super easy to use. Hosts and party-goers alike should both be able to use it, even at the end of a long night of partying.


Why we need your help

We totally love this idea and have been toying around with it ever since Bastian built a prototype for his wedding. But making a great app takes a lot of effort and more often than not, an app is not appreciated by users enough to pay the developer back.

In fact, development, design and marketing will take about three times more than the $20,000 campaign goal. 

But we are prepared to match every dollar of yours with two of ours to make PartySnapper a reality if you also think this is a great idea. All we ask is that with a small (or large) contribution you show us that our efforts will not be in vain. And there are great perks for you as well.


What’s in it for you?

Apart from PartySnapper and the good feeling of supporting a cool project, you can get some great perks:


Design Team

The Boinx Software team knows how to make great photo and video apps. Our stop motion app “iStopMotion” won the “Macworld Best of Show” award two years in a row. Other quality apps from Boinx Software include You Gotta See This! and PhotoPresenter. On the Mac side, we have three Apple Design Awards to our credit, recognizing excellence in designing apps that reflect Apple’s values in design and usability.

Peter Kraml
This whiz kid came close to winning his own Apple Design Award last year as one of the best student developers at the Apple World Wide Developers Conference 2013 where he went on a student scholarship awarded to him by Apple.


Max Christ
The apps that owe him their existance go into the hundreds. Most recently, he was the driving force behind the Leica T app that we developed in cooperation with Leica.


Peter Schlossnikel
His signature design graces all of the Boinx products, our website and other top selling apps on the app store.


Kerstin Wölfle
If she hadn’t allowed her husband Bastian (aka Dr. Term T. Bowman) to create and try a prototype of PartySnapper at their wedding, it wouldn’t exist. Bastian is also PartySnapper product manager.


These four are supported by the amazing staff of Boinx Software. Check out our team page for the full cast and crew.

Bastian is also PartySnapper product manager.These four are supported by the amazing staff of Boinx Software. Check out our team page for the full cast and crew.

story:
ABOUT PROJECT S:


We are so excited that there are more and more people who support us through many different ways.

We appriciate that every little support from all of you. All we want is brining the world the perfect smartphone - Project S to all of you.

Please keep spreading out Project S to let more and more people to hear our voice!

Thank you!

 

We were so excited that we had this great opportunity to introduce our Project S to every media and PR companies in CES Unveiled New York on 12th November 2013. 

Many thanks that there were so many people interested in our Project S and wished that will be able to see this great mobile device in the future. With all of your support, we will be able to make Project S into reality. 

 

 

 

                                      

Project S, a project seeking to bring the world a smartphone
to fit all your needs.

Project S phone  is our vision of the perfect smartphone - delivering on all fronts, with countless innovative features, and world class specs.

 

 

 

 

We are a small company with big ideas - with the simple goal of delivering better mobile life to people. Each of us has a real passion for electronics and high quality consumer products. Project S is supported by BungBungame (founded in 2008), which is headquartered in Taiwan, with a subsidiary in Ginza, Tokyo. BungBungame specializes in mobile applications and tablets design.

For understanding consumers’ needs, we have studied the consumer usage and worked with Consumer Behavior Experts for years. As a result, we have already successfully launched 2 generations of tablets over Taiwan, Japan and USA.

Our reason for starting Project S is simple: there are no low-cost and high quality smartphone that meets most of consumers’ needs. In fact, all high-tech smartphones are a staggering $750~$849, rendering them unaffordable to most customers.

In 2012, we decided to design a solution to this problem ourselves. With your help, we will be ready to take Project S into production.

We have been working on this for 2 years.
We have flown round the world and back, met with tech experts, manufactures, and sourced everything along the product lifecycle. We’ve done the whole nine yards to find the best suppliers and manufactures. We have hand-picked our product partners to ensure that we can deliver quality parts, on time and cost effectively. 

Our suppliers and manufactures have promised to produce with the small quantities. But they would need to know our estimated number of units needed before they begin production. We take this last step seriously, and will need a lot of support to do the job right. That is the reason why we have turned to Indiegogo to get the production lines up and running. We believe we can reach the goal with you suport!

 

Since we have already finished our initial studies and research about designing a smartphone and how to solve the tech problems, we need your support for purchasing components and patent application costs.

Project S is equipped many great functions and powerful spec, which has never all come together in any single device. To ensure the innovative new user interface and powerful hardware can function together harmoniously, we have to test to make sure that everyone who supports our project will receive only the highest quality smartphone.

For the production line, we need your support to secure procurement of long lead components and meet the minimum order quantities required by our suppliers and manufactures.

A smartphone needs a smart packing. We only have one earth. With a mimal, yet strong design, we will design the packaging without any unnecessary fluff while using only eco-friendly materials.

The amount of funding we require to achieve the final milestones is $500,000. We hope you will find it in your heart to help us deliver this long sought after, valuable and powerful technology.

Let's watch again how beautiful and elegant body design the Project S phone is

  

 Same as many Indiegogo campaigns, we encounter several key risks and challenges in this revolution. The main risks for us include:

To achieve the level of meeting consumers’ needs, and ensure to make it real. We have to design and test for many times. We have discussed with many tech experts and manufactures. And some of features have already been tested and proven successful.

Since we have successfully launched 2 generations of tablets, we have been working with some reliable suppliers, manufactures and logistics consultants. As a result, with the hardware, Project S, is well managed and we have experience in successfully bringing products to the market, as well as managing the supply chain, production line, and logistics.

Consumer Electronic is our business, but design is our passion. Project S willneed some additional development when we reach our goal. Such as work to improve user interface and advance even further the hardware.

We promise timely and transparent communication throughout the process. 

If you can’t contribute, you can still help us to meet our goal!

  • Spread the word out and make some noise about this campaign
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Q: Do I need to add any additional shipping cost if I’m not living in USA?

A: Yes, you will need to add $30 for international shipping if you aren’t living in Taiwan, Canada or United States of America.

Q: I contributed to a perk but forgot to add $30 for international shipping. How can I fix this?

A: If you need to add funds for shipping, you can select $30 International shipping perk for contribution.

Q: Do you have plans of releasing Project S in the future?

A: Without your support, the dream will not be realized. Our first priority now is to get this in hands of user everywhere.

Q: When will my Project S phone arrive?

A: We are already working hard to plan our supply chain and manufacturing operations to make sure you get your Project S phone as soon as possible. We feel it is safe to set the target in November 2014 for our first full-production shipments in Taiwan, Canada and USA.

Q: What countries and mobile networks will support Project S?

A: Project S is an unlocked smartphone. It works in all countries that provide GSM/3G/4G LTE based network services around the world.

(subject to network availability and data fees)

Q: Will Project S offer a warranty or support?

A: Based on our contract with our manufactures, the standard 1 year warranty will be offered.

Q: What if my questions aren’t answered here?

A: We’re happy to respond any other questions you might have about Project S, Email us at indiegogofunder@bungbungame.com

story:
FlashMober

We welcome you, if you have fun, making crazy and creative videos or photos and to become famous with it in the Internet area.

Аs well as you we also are great fans of fun, and at the same time we are the team of the «FlashMober» project, and we’re going to tell the entire world  about it today.

All of us are users of an enormous number of social networks, subscribers of hundreds of social communities and famous bloggers who are spending with these kilometers of timelines hours and hours without a break. Let’s agree that sometimes it becomes quite boring and doesn't bring that fun and interest any more. How often do you want something more fascinating and new? Something that you didn't try or participate  yet?

We decided to change this and to try something absolutely new. After absolutely incredible videos "Harlemshake", "Ice bucket challenge" and many other flashmobs with push-ups, parodies of celebrities and other interesting, and sometimes even useful subjects, we’ve been disappointed that all of them were scattered through the internet as planets in galaxies! It is so interesting and funny, but hard to find a new flashmob or to join it when you don’t even know about its existence.

Have a look. How!? HOW is it possible not to take part in such epic masterpieces and not to make the similar parody? It just blows one’s mind! 

Download the app IOS can here

 



Having decided to fix this howling shame and to give a chance to all hankers to cross from a roadside of Internet entertainments to its front line, we started to develop the concept of the platform which has to gather fans of such flashmobs together, and it definitely will be hundred times more convenient and more interesting than just sending each other such tasks by  messages.

We were drawing, looking for performers, designers, programmers, creative producers, operators, advertisers, photographers and we visited a lot of other professionals in great amount of areas. We communicated with all of them, considering criticism, advices, wishes and remarks from potential users. Taking into account that it’s the first time we make such project, it was extremely difficult for us, but finally it seems that we have managed the task. We will be honest with you, we have managed with tremendous quantity of mistakes and a lot of work is still to be done, but we really like it! :)

For bright, active and extraordinary users tired of trivial selfies and food photos, we are glad to present you the FlashMober project. Our platform is a mobile application where users exchange the most interesting and outstanding flashmobs!

What is the app?

The point of the application is creation, implementation and sharing of various flashmobs, tasks and challenges with users. Users can create and carry out flashmobs,  and  photo or video files loaded by users to their profiles and history of performance of the task are the reports. Users can put likes and comments to reports (photos and videos) and look through all reports which have been made to any of tasks. Users can also share their masterpieces with friends by publishing them on popular social networks.

The most interesting and challenging thing will be sending and receiving tasks among absolutely unfamiliar people. In other words, after creating a task, the user can send it worldwide, and moreover no report will be lost, all results of a task can be seen in the history of its performance.

In a word, there is almost everything that all of us like so much :)

Just have a look how it looks in the app! It is extremely funny and interesting!


When you use telekinesis Flashmob!


Funny cosplay Flashmob!


Why our platform will be interesting and convenient for our users?

1. Users will be able to share tasks not only with friends, but also to send them to the "cloud", from where tasks will go to totally unfamiliar people. Come on, it will be unfair if  strangers are deprived of opportunity to brag talents in your genious flashmob ☺

2. The same task can be performed by different users hundreds or even maybe thousands times, but some results can become real masterpieces of the modern art. It will be a pity if you aren't able to find these masterpieces. In our appendix everyone can see how this or that task was implemented by other users, as we will have an easy-to-use system of viewing the reports of all users.

3. Any user will be able to join any flashmob he likes and to implement it! (All the best is for children (c) :)

4. Hashtags, likes, comments, pages with the most popular reports, friends, subscriptions and subscribers! Wherewecangowithoutallofit?! ☺

5. Besides, there will be a lot of amusing tasks and users’ reports in the application, we also will collect and carry out the best, interesting and bright tasks and to appoint them to users;

6. Like cats? Ok! Fancy about magnificent landscapes or more serious social subjects? No problem! We give you a possibility to filter the content in your timeline;

We hope that our platform will become a new milestone of social interaction among users and we will set a new format of entertainment in the Internet.

Now we have almost ready app version for iOS which is being tested and is available to download in App Store (by the way, your opinion on functionality and easement of the app is very important for us, thus we weekly collect comments & wishes and consider them in the following releases of the application).


We want to release the version for Android devices in order to target more users and increase quantity of extra interesting flashmobs and reports as much as possible. Moreover, we want to expand  functionality seriously and to improve app’s design ;).


As all our budget is over after programming of iOS version, server part and the organization of all this madness, and Android version is necessary to us as air, we decided to storm IndieGOGO. We hope that with your help we "will recieve a great experience and leve-up" and release Android version!


We hope that with your help we "will recieve a great experience and leve-up" and release Android version!

The necessary budget consist of following:

1. Development of design models;

2. Development of  work algorithms for Adroid version;

3. Client part programming;

4.Server part programming and modernization;

5. Server part  upgrade ;

6. iOS app’s version  improvings;

7. Project management;

8.Commission for the platform and payment  for service provider;

9. Taxes.

Everybody who will help the project will be rewarded by our kowtow???, words of gratitude and, of course, a number of pleasant bonuses :)

Perk of $5 – There will be a bronze crown on your profile picture. This crown will be granted only to sponsors and  symbolize you as one of creators and active participant in development of the mobile application.


Perk of $10 – There will be a silver crown  on your profile picture.  This crown will be granted only to sponsors and  symbolize you as one of creators and an active participant in development of a mobile application.


Perk of $20 – there will be a gold crown on your profile picture. This crown will be granted only to sponsors and  symbolize you as one of creators and an active participant in development of a mobile application.


Perk of $50 – There will be a gold crown  on your profile picture.  This crown will be granted only to sponsors and symbolize you as one of creators and an active participant in development of a mobile application.

Also your name as a founder of the project will be posted on our website. A super baseball cap from FlashMober with words of gratitude will be sent additionally!


Perk of $100 – There will be a gold crown  on your profile picture.  This crown will be granted only to sponsors and symbolize you as one of creators and an active participant in development of a mobile application.

Your name as a founder of the project will be posted on our website. A super baseball cap from FlashMober with words of gratitude will be sent additionally!

Don't be indifferent! Join, and we will make together the most interesting and funny application in the world! ;)

Download the app IOS can here

story:
The Shield that Guards your Privacy

Mailshield will be a Swiss company providing secure email service that will offer webmail as well as POP3 and IMAP access. We will provide you with an e-mail address with the strongest privacy protection on the World: no one will be able to read your emails (including us), but you.

The whistleblower Edward Snowden exposed a very startling truth: everything you say or write on the Internet can become exposed by tech-savy people. Some police forces — primarily, the NSA from the USA and the GCHQ from the UK — routinely listen to everything, and of course many criminals do just the same.

We are a group of programmers, system administrators, and security experts who aim to bring back privacy and security to means of communication, starting from your mailbox

    1. The Swiss Federal Constitution (read it here) says it all in Article 13: Every person has the right to privacy in their private and family life and in their home, and in relation to their mail and telecommunications. Every person has the right to be protected against the misuse of their personal data.
    2. We will  use servers physically placed in Switzerland and under our own direct control: no cloud computing, no outsourcing. We will only make use of open source software: no backdoors for corporations and governments.
    3. On our website we will explain in simple terms, with easy screenshots and examples, how to configure your PC, Mac, Linux box, iPhone, or iPad in order to make your end secure. Many of the tips and tricks here will be usable with other email providers. We will plainly mark them as such, so that even people who are not our customers can make their computers as secure as they can be.
    4. After launch, we will investigate how to allow you to buy a mailbox anonymously, with cash. We won’t know who you are, if you don’t want us to.
    5. We will employ cryptography everywhere — when receiving, sending, and storing email, as well as on our website, including e-commerce pages and webmail.
    6. If you want to, we will encrypt your whole mailbox. This means that no one will be able to read your emails including us. 

    7. In the event that a Swiss federal judge asks us to reveal any data to the authorities, we will of course comply. We will also regularly publish a statistical report detailing the amount of cases in which  this has happened,  the  provision (law) under which request has been made and — if known to us — the foreign government that issued that request. This is known as a warrant canary and can be used by our customers to see if they could potentially be the subject of an ongoing investigation.

    About Us

    We are an international team of six engineers, system administrators and security experts between 40 and 50 years of age. We have been working together for the past fifteen years on projects such as e-commerce, secure file sharing, private telecommunications, and finance. Our customers include big and moderately sized companies in Switzerland and elsewhere in Europe. Our team comes from three countries: Switzerland, Italy and Russia.

    The Mailshield project was born from a simple, yet profound series of discussions. Essentially, what we have been doing for companies can be of help to professionals  and private citizens all over the world. The whistleblower, Edward Snowden, had the world stand up and understand what we in computer security have been suspecting for some time. Governments and big data companies, together, have subverted the phone system, the email system, and the web. Privacy is dead for you if you, the consumer, the citizen, do not take a stand and choose to protect yourself. We are here to help.

    We have searched for the technologies that can protect telecommunication. We have looked for all the defects present in protocols, softwares, and operating systems  subverted by national security agencies and hackers. Here, the Edward Snowden papers have been paramount. For example, we now know that the NSA has been investing almost a hundred million dollars for a quantum computer, but still they don’t have one. A quantum computer is theoretically predicted to be capable of breaking Diffie-Hellmann crypto. Therefore, we are using  Diffie-Hellmann crypto everywhere to ensure that our data will be safe even from the powerful NSA.

     

    We have decided to create a brand new company for this. Mailshield will be incorporated in Switzerland (a democracy which is centuries old and treasures privacy) and will only work on secure telecommunications — starting with email, then branching into file storage and voice — for the people and the small companies who do not have the equipment and resources necessary to protect themselves. If we are successful, we plan to develop the business.

    Why Switzerland

    When you think of Switzerland you probably come up with postcard images of precision watches, cheese and chocolate, and snow peaks and banks. But consider that Switzerland is a multi-lingual, multi-religion confederacy of sovereign states, under a federal charter since 1291. For more than eight centuries Switzerland has been independent and neutral: from the Holy Roman Empire to the European Powers under the Council of Vienna, and from NATO to the Warsaw pact. It remains firm in its neutrality today, as is evident in the case of European Union.

    The Swiss Federal Constitution  is among the oldest constitutions in the world, making Switzerland a direct democracy. The central government is granted very limited powers (there are only seven government departments and the president is one of the seven ministers, holding office for only one year granted no additional powers). The citizens can revoke or propose laws, and even change the Constitution itself by referendum.

    What will your dollars buy?

    The funds we receive will go towards:

    • Buying physical servers, installing open source operating systems and software, hardening them, firewalling them, and creating a secure in-place backup system. We already know how. We've done this for quite a few big customers in the past. Now we want to give the same military-level security to you.
    • Placing the servers in a Swiss server farm and maintaining them with ample international bandwidth.
    • Developing a unique system for handling incoming email and storing it in the customers’ mailboxes in a strongly encrypted form (see #6, above).
    • Incorporating a new company, MailShield SA, in Switzerland which will be 100% dedicated to develop more new security services in telecommunications, including file storage and voice.
    • Paying the lawyers -- we want a bullet-proof statute of services. Additionally, in event that we get harassed by foreign agents, nosy police officers, taxmen, jealous ex boyfriends with law degrees, people who speak aloud in theaters, and other bad, bad people, we can defend ourselves vigorously and send them to hell. A special hell.

    If we do not reach the financial goal, the funds you provide will not be withdrawn from your credit card account. You will not lose one cent.

    If we exceed the financial goal, we will add more features starting with localization in multiple languages of our website and tools.

    All of our customers will get the most secure email mailbox that can possibly exist. Size and accessories depend on the contribution. See the available perks on the right.

    To reiterate, this is not rocket science for us. We've done it time and again. We do not anticipate any issues and we are very confident that everything will be in place four months after the Indigogo campaign is finished.

    We are listening

    Let us highlight that this is just the start. We already have many ideas for more features, and we know that you have ideas too so share them with us.

    Further, we have added two unique perks to the list: a direct, one-to-one chat with our engineers and/or lawyers. If you have any special requirements, we are willing to listen and create something tailored to your needs.

    Other Ways You Can Help 

    Please, help us get the word out and share our campaign. We know that many people need this kind of service: lawyers and dissidents, religious citizens in atheist countries and atheists in theocracies, honest people in fear of not-so-honest governments… This will work if the word gets out, because everybody needs privacy.

    In the short term if everybody requests this service, we will get many customers and will be able to create not only the most secure, but the best email system in the world, and will continue to enhance it. Looking towards the impending future, we will get competition, which will raise the bar for everybody. If Google is finally forced to add security to GMail, for example -- if they start supporting the S/MIME protocol for which every security professional in the world has been asking for years -- everybody wins. In the long term, even boneheaded politicians all over the world will start to get the message: we, the people, care for our privacy; so move your big asses and do your jobs, politicos: change the laws, dismiss the people in charge of your secret services and make the Internet the secure place it was always meant to be.

    Let's do this together.
story_txt:
The Shield that Guards your Privacy
Mailshield will be a Swiss company providing secure email service that will offer webmail as well as POP3 and IMAP access. We will provide you with an e-mail address with the strongest privacy protection on the World: no one will be able to read your emails (including us), but you.The whistleblower Edward Snowden exposed a very startling truth: everything you say or write on the Internet can become exposed by tech-savy people. Some police forces — primarily, the NSA from the USA and the GCHQ from the UK — routinely listen to everything, and of course many criminals do just the same.
We are a group of programmers, system administrators, and security
experts who aim to bring back privacy and security to means of communication,
starting from your mailbox
The Swiss Federal Constitution (read it here) says it all in Article 13: Every person has the right to privacy in their private and family life and in their home, and in relation to their mail and telecommunications. Every person has the right to be protected against the misuse of their personal data.


We will  use servers physically placed in Switzerland and under our own direct control: no cloud computing, no outsourcing. We will only make use of open source software: no backdoors for corporations and governments.
On our website we will explain in simple terms, with easy screenshots and examples, how to configure your PC, Mac, Linux box, iPhone, or iPad in order to make your end secure. Many of the tips and tricks here will be usable with other email providers. We will plainly mark them as such, so that even people who are not our customers can make their computers as secure as they can be.
After launch, we will investigate how to allow you to buy a mailbox anonymously, with cash. We won’t know who you are, if you don’t want us to.
We will employ cryptography everywhere — when receiving, sending, and storing email, as well as on our website, including e-commerce pages and webmail.

If you want to, we will encrypt your whole mailbox. This means that no one will be able to read your emails including us. 


In the event that a
Swiss federal judge asks us to reveal any data to the authorities, we will of course
comply. We will also regularly publish a statistical report detailing the
amount of cases in which  this has
happened,  the  provision (law) under which request has been
made and — if known to us — the foreign government that issued that request.
This is known as a warrant canary and can be used by our customers to see if they could potentially be the subject of an ongoing investigation.

About Us
We are an international team of six engineers, system administrators and security experts between 40 and 50 years of age. We have been working together for the past fifteen years on projects such as e-commerce, secure file sharing, private telecommunications, and finance. Our customers include big and moderately sized companies in Switzerland and elsewhere in Europe. Our team comes from three countries: Switzerland, Italy and Russia.
The Mailshield project was born from a simple, yet profound series of discussions. Essentially, what we have been doing for companies can be of help to professionals  and private citizens all over the world. The whistleblower, Edward Snowden, had the world stand up and understand what we in computer security have been suspecting for some time. Governments and big data companies, together, have subverted the phone system, the email system, and the web. Privacy is dead for you if you, the consumer, the citizen, do not take a stand and choose to protect yourself. We are here to help.
We have searched for the technologies that can protect telecommunication. We have looked for all the defects present in protocols, softwares, and operating systems  subverted by national security agencies and hackers. Here, the Edward Snowden papers have been paramount. For example, we now know that the NSA has been investing almost a hundred million dollars for a quantum computer, but still they don’t have one. A quantum computer is theoretically predicted to be capable of breaking Diffie-Hellmann crypto. Therefore, we are using  Diffie-Hellmann crypto everywhere to ensure that our data will be safe even from the powerful NSA. 
We have decided to create a brand new company for this. Mailshield will be incorporated in Switzerland (a democracy which is centuries old and treasures privacy) and will only work on secure telecommunications — starting with email, then branching into file storage and voice — for the people and the small companies who do not have the equipment and resources necessary to protect themselves. If we are successful, we plan to develop the business.Why SwitzerlandWhen you think of Switzerland you probably come up with postcard images of precision watches, cheese and chocolate, and snow peaks and banks.
