For more than eight centuries Switzerland has been independent and neutral: from the Holy Roman Empire to the European Powers under the Council of Vienna, and from NATO to the Warsaw pact. It remains firm in its neutrality today, as is evident in the case of European Union.The Swiss Federal Constitution  is among the oldest constitutions in the world, making Switzerland a direct democracy. The central government is granted very limited powers (there are only seven government departments and the president is one of the seven ministers, holding office for only one year granted no additional powers). The citizens can revoke or propose laws, and even change the Constitution itself by referendum.What will your dollars buy?The funds we receive will go towards:
Buying physical servers, installing open source operating systems and software, hardening them, firewalling them, and creating a secure in-place backup system. We already know how. We've done this for quite a few big customers in the past. Now we want to give the same military-level security to you.
Placing the servers in a Swiss server farm and maintaining them with ample international bandwidth.
Developing a unique system for handling incoming email and storing it in the customers’ mailboxes in a strongly encrypted form (see #6, above).
Incorporating a new company, MailShield SA, in Switzerland which will be 100% dedicated to develop more new security services in telecommunications, including file storage and voice.
Paying the lawyers -- we want a bullet-proof statute of services. Additionally, in event that we get harassed by foreign agents, nosy police officers, taxmen, jealous ex boyfriends with law degrees, people who speak aloud in theaters, and other bad, bad people, we can defend ourselves vigorously and send them to hell. A special hell.
If we do not reach the financial goal, the funds you provide will not be withdrawn from your credit card account. You will not lose one cent.If we exceed the financial goal, we will add more features starting with localization in multiple languages of our website and tools.All of our customers will get the most secure email mailbox that can possibly exist. Size and accessories depend on the contribution. See the available perks on the right.To reiterate, this is not rocket science for us. We've done it time and again. story:
The Cause

Stickam.com was the pioneer of live streaming. In 2005 they launched and there was much rejoicing... and then drama. and then more rejoicing.

Now 7 years later the word came down from on high to shut it down.

I (Sam Proof) have long been involved with the staff at stickam, helped run and cover events and have climbed my way to the 7th most watched channel on stickam.

Sufficed to say this like being told from the vet they have no other choice but to put down you're most beloved pet. I do not hold to that.

I believe Stickam still has life left in, still has a community that loves it, and still deserves to exist.

So join me in pooling our money to take over and Occupy Stickam.com

My plan is to purchase the company in full, and provide people with the live streaming services it's always provided and maybe even make it better.

It's a community site, so why shouldn't the community own it?


Thank you,

-Sam Proof

This is NOT just buying a business. It is a whole project to upgrade the platform and create something new from the ashes.

A stickam studio - The new studio space will be open to live streamers to use for their events and will help take your live streaming ideas to the next level.

The Impact

Help us help you!

  • Stickam is a community of over 7 million users
  • Letting it fade away now would be like traveling back in time to shoot your looper self in the face!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you loved stickam please

• Tweet this link

• Share it on facebook

• make a youtube video asking people to help.

 

5 Million Dollars?!


I know, it sounds unfathomable. At the same time, this is why I chose to do a fixed campaign and not an open one (so either we raise ALL the money or it all goes back to the people that donated it.).

I'm not interested in taking your money. 

I don't want to push and push, raise thousands of dollars and turn around and say "sorry gang, but thanks"... so this is it, It's ALL or NOTHING.

Stickam is an amazing website, and I think not only can we raise the money, but WE SHOULD!

Let's pool together, let's take back our favorite site and let's OCCUPY STICKAM!

story:
BitCube is an innovative programming interface which you can code by simply pushing or turning on the physical block with your fingertips without the hassle of connecting to a computer.

 By controlling sensor, motor, and LED by your hands, algorithmic thinking and programming are easily feasible with BitCube's tech kit.





 World's Most Simple Tech Kit of Sensor, Motor, and LED Controls.                            Just Push & Turn for Fun!


Arduino is difficult. 

 Up to now, the only way we could create crafts utilizing sensors, motors, and LEDs was by using Arduino. However, it is nearly impossible for beginners to use Arduino without the knowledge of soldering or wires, electrical engineering and coding.

 You can create your work by just connecting sensors, motors and LEDs with the data cable. When beginners start to enjoy making through BitCube, they can then develop capacity to challenge themselves with harder hardware kits, such as Arduino. 


Programming is difficult.

 Young children need outstanding programming knowledge in order to use sensors, motors, and LEDs. Even for adults, without having enough programming knowledge, simply making a motor run can cause a brain cramp. 

 BitCube, on the other hand, with its interface that requires more intuition rather than the technical knowledge, makes controlling of sensor, motor, and LED very easy as all one needs to do is simply push and turn the knob on the output modules.


BitCube is easy and simple.

 You do not need any knowledge of soldering or electrical engineering to use BitCube. Moreover, there is no need of computer connection and programming. 

 BitCube allows you to focus on creation. Let's Learn and Run BitCube!



  •  BitCube is a set of tangible block that consist of three functional parts, Power + Sensor + Output. Power module is a type of rechargeable battery with Micro USB connector. BitCube has diverse sensor modules which are perceiving data, such as light, distance, sound, bluetooth signal, etc. Output modules receive data from sensor modules, and actuate LED, buzzer, motor, effector, etc.

  • In order to use BitCube, one needs to connect modules in the following order: sensor module, power module, and output module. The value generated by a sensor is transferred to an output module through a power module.

  • All output modules work in either "Pass Mode" or "IF Mode" and you get to make your selection when you build with BitCube. In Pass Mode, the output module operates with the same input value from the sensor module.

  • IF Mode is what makes BitCube really special. BitCube does not require any additional computer devices or software for coding. IF Mode basically does that for you by comparing the value picked up by a sensor with the value set by you in advance. When you use IF Mode, you can utilize mathematical conditions such as “greater than”, “smaller than”, and “equal to” to control when and how an output module will operate. Depending on whether the condition you set up is satisfied (True) or not satisfied (False), you can choose which value an output module will generate. All of this “programming” can be done by simply pushing and turning the knob on a BitCube.

  •  For example, let’s  say that you have created a smart light bulb that turns itself on when the room is dark and turns itself off when the room gets bright. If you want to make the light bulb to stay on while the room is bright, you can do that by merely setting up your own condition using IF Mode.

       

  •  In other words, users can use IF Mode to modify conditions and follow results right away. This allows instant debugging: you can have immediate interaction with programs using your hand as an instrument.

  •  Although very simple, BitCube is an exceptional tool that can encourage effective learning of programming. As one can immediately be provided with numerous feedback such as movement of a motor or changing level of LED’s brightness that stimulate one’s senses, he/she can easily learn the associated algorithm.



 BitCube is a tech kit that is easy and accessible for people of all ages even without the prior knowledge of programming. With its sensor, motor, and LED, BitCube allows you to build your own unique creation. You only need creativity to pull you through. You can utilize other materials like paper, tape, and personal 3D printers to develop something of your own. It also comes with the ability to combine with LEGO, so you can also come up with ways to move your current LEGO sets!


Introduce the Bluetooth Module 

 You can also use Bluetooth with your smart device to control the sensor and output values. Or connect the two Bluetooth modules together! 

This is a bluetooth controller which is made of BitCube. We use the volume sensor here, but you can try to make something funny, using the light sensor or distance sensor, etc.

      






  We created BitCube, “The World's Most Simple Tech Kit of Sensor, Motor, and LED Controls.”

 Now on a bigger scale, what will BitCube impact? The issue BitCube is solving is in regards to STEAM education. This is a multi-dimensional curriculum featuring:

Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts and Mathematics. 

 Within the STEAM education curriculum, there are various times where you need to use sensors motors and LEDs. However, existing kits in the market were expensive and difficult to follow, having a pre requirement of extensive programming knowledge. BitCube is the best method that allows easiest way for children to experience STEAM education.

 We now have to remember that kids like creating, and building, and playing games. On their computers and on their smart phones. They are constantly surrounded by new programs. The lack of hands-on environment on technology is really unfortunate. Then what can we give them without the boundaries of a screen with the objective of creative construction? How do we give the kids the satisfaction when they make something on their own? Well, BitCube gives the opportunity for kids to move, collaborate, create, and develop a product without a “right or wrong” result. With BitCube’s different modules and functions that include sensor, motor, and LED, the users can connect and build like Lego while learning the fundamentals of programming logic. 

 We started in South Korea in early 2013 with a vision to make a mark in the extremely narrow-framed South Korean education system.
 But we vie to encourage our principle across the world. To introduce STEAM curriculum into as many educational systems around the world to enhance the next generation’s creativity and technological logic and to encourage geeks from a young age to lead them to become what they can uniquely be.

 Help BitCube complete our mission. 







 We believe that quality control is extremely important within the manufacturing process. From the manufacturing process there may be slight changes to improve the quality and design of the product, in which you will be able to receive the improved version. Please bear in mind that the item shown in the video may be slightly different from the actual item you receive.

Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.



 Can I still purchase BitCube even when you do not reach the funding goal?

 BitCube opts for fixed funding, because we need a minimum budget ($100,000) to begin BitCube's mass production. Without achieving our campaign goal, you will unfortunately not be able to purchase BitCube.

 Can I get more than one BitCube kit?

 Of course! You can email us at info@bitcube.ccwith the list of perks you are interested in.

 Can I mix & match separate modules in different amounts?

Yes. We would like to facilitate everyone's needs. Please email us at info@bitcube.cc with your selected modules and amounts for each module for a specialized perk value. 

 When will I receive my BitCube kit?

 We plan to ship in April, 2015, after manufacturing and packaging stages. The shipping itself would take about 5~10 days depending on your address. 

 What’s the difference between BitCube and LittleBits?

 There is no argument that LittleBits is a superb product. Also, it is used as an effective educational kit for children. LittleBits is an innovative kit that comes with a magnetic modules that make the product both easily attachable and detachable. However, LittleBits is limited to a simple function of only receiving a value from a sensor and transferring that value into an output module. In BitCube language, this is equivalent to only having Pass Mode available, and therefore, the kit lacks of hands-on customization that BitCube provides to its users through its own unique "IF Mode". 

 Is the BitCube product open source? 

 At the moment, BitCube is not open source, but we are planning to release it later in time. 

We will first release the API for smartphone in order to connect gadgets with BitCube's Bluetooth module. With this API, developers will be able to create apps for BitCube. 

 How is BitCube charged?

 BitCube power is charged using Micro-USB cords (conventional smartphone charging cords). It takes 4 hours for a full recharge, and lasts 3~5 hours depending on usage.

 How safe is it to use BitCube?

 With the exception of our Bluetooth module, BitCube does not generate electromagnetic waves of any risk. However, as there is still a flowing current of 5 volts within the data cables, it is recommended not to place cables near sensitive areas such as skin or mouth for a long duration. 

 Who would be the primary users of BitCube?

 BitCube was originally created to help 5 to 15 year old children make their own projects without the need to learn programming. But by all means, adults without programming knowledge can also use BitCube to make their own creations. Media artists, kinetic installation designers, architects, and engineers are some examples of professions that would use BitCube.  

 Does BitCube support Scratch integration?

 Not yet... But coming soon! 

 Scratch (http://scratch.mit.edu/) is a globally ubiquitous educational tool that helps children learn coding. A great number of elementary schools throughout the world is using Scratch to encourage coding education. In order to control sensors, motors, and LEDs, children uses a tool such as S4A (Scratch for Arduino), but as mentioned before, Arduino is more difficult than what we want for the children. 

 As expected, BitCube is now preparing a new version of BitCube that would facilitate the entire learning experience through Scratch compatibility.



 Special thanks to Visually Unboxed in The University of British Columbia, Vancouver, Canada for doing a fantastic job on creating this campaign video and supporting BitCube throughout the campaign.

They are constantly surrounded by new programs. The lack of hands-on environment on technology is really unfortunate. Then what can we give them without the boundaries of a screen with the objective of creative construction? How do we give the kids the satisfaction when they make something on their own? Well, BitCube gives the opportunity for kids to move, collaborate, create, and develop a product without a “right or wrong” result. With BitCube’s different modules and functions that include sensor, motor, and LED, the users can connect and build like Lego while learning the fundamentals of programming logic. 
 We started in South Korea in early 2013 with a vision to make a mark in the extremely narrow-framed South Korean education system. But we vie to encourage our principle across the world. To introduce STEAM curriculum into as many educational systems around the world to enhance the next generation’s creativity and technological logic and to encourage geeks from a young age to lead them to become what they can uniquely be.
 Help BitCube complete our mission. 










 We believe that quality control is extremely important within the manufacturing process. From the manufacturing process there may be slight changes to improve the quality and design of the product, in which you will be able to receive the improved version. Please bear in mind that the item shown in the video may be slightly different from the actual item you receive.
Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.



 Can I still purchase BitCube even when you do not reach the funding goal?
 BitCube opts for fixed funding, because we need a minimum budget ($100,000) to begin BitCube's mass production. Without achieving our campaign goal, you will unfortunately not be able to purchase BitCube.
 Can I get more than one BitCube kit?
 Of course! You can email us at info@bitcube.ccwith the list of perks you are interested in.
 Can I mix & match separate modules in different amounts?
Yes. We would like to facilitate everyone's needs. Please email us at info@bitcube.cc with your selected modules and amounts for each module for a specialized perk value. 
 When will I receive my BitCube kit?
 We plan to ship in April, 2015, after manufacturing and packaging stages. The shipping itself would take about 5~10 days depending on your address. 
 What’s the difference between BitCube and LittleBits?
 There is no argument that LittleBits is a superb product. Also, it is used as an effective educational kit for children. LittleBits is an innovative kit that comes with a magnetic modules that make the product both easily attachable and detachable. However, LittleBits is limited to a simple function of only receiving a value from a sensor and transferring that value into an output module. In BitCube language, this is equivalent to only having Pass Mode available, and therefore, the kit lacks of hands-on customization that BitCube provides to its users through its own unique "IF Mode". 
 Is the BitCube product open source? 
 At the moment, BitCube is not open source, but we are planning to release it later in time. 
We will first release the API for smartphone in order to connect gadgets with BitCube's Bluetooth module. With this API, developers will be able to create apps for BitCube. 
 How is BitCube charged?
 BitCube power is charged using Micro-USB cords (conventional smartphone charging cords). It takes 4 hours for a full recharge, and lasts 3~5 hours depending on usage.
 How safe is it to use BitCube?
 With the exception of our Bluetooth module, BitCube does not generate electromagnetic waves of any risk. However, as there is still a flowing current of 5 volts within the data cables, it is recommended not to place cables near sensitive areas such as skin or mouth for a long duration. 
 Who would be the primary users of BitCube?
 BitCube was originally created to help 5 to 15 year old children make their own projects without the need to learn programming. But by all means, adults without programming knowledge can also use BitCube to make their own creations. Media artists, kinetic installation designers, architects, and engineers are some examples of professions that would use BitCube.  
 Does BitCube support Scratch integration?
 Not yet... But coming soon! 
 Scratch (http://scratch.mit.edu/) is a globally ubiquitous educational tool that helps children learn coding. A great number of elementary schools throughout the world is using Scratch to encourage coding education. In order to control sensors, motors, and LEDs, children uses a tool such as S4A (Scratch for Arduino), but as mentioned before, Arduino is more difficult than what we want for the children. 
 As expected, BitCube is now preparing a new version of BitCube that would facilitate the entire learning experience through Scratch compatibility. 



 Special thanks to Visually Unboxed in The University of British Columbia, Vancouver, Canada for doing a fantastic job on creating this campaign video and supporting BitCube throughout the campaign.

story:
Frequently Asked Questions


I love this product, but how does this site work?

Crowdfunding sites, such as Indiegogo, are a platform for developers to raise the necessary funds to make their inventions a reality. We spent several months perfecting a prototype and lining up manufacturing firms. With this great new innovation and production ready to go, we just need your support to get the Voltair into the  hands of people everywhere. If you love this product, select a perk from the right side of the page. Your monetary support of this project is rewarded with one of the first models, hot off the production line!


How do I choose a connection type?


We offer 8 pin (iphone 5, 5C, 5S), 30  pin (iphone 3, 4), and micro-usb (samsung galaxy) connectivity for our battery packs. After you make you chose a reward level, we will contact you to collect additional order information, including connection your model preference.


Do you offer different colors?

We have a strech goal of raising $75,000, at which point we will be able to offer 3  or more color options.


How much can this charge my phone?

The Voltair can charge your phone from 0-100% battery when fully charged (which due to it’s effortless design, it will ALWAYS be fully charged!)


Why do I have to wait until April to get my Voltair?

This is a true crowdfunding project, which means that your early support is helping drive the initial mass production of the Voltair. You will be the first person to get your hands on this product when it ships. We anticipate that retail stores will love our product too and it will be in stores by Fall 2014.


More questions? Contact us! We would love to hear from you.

story:
Inplug: Control your home from anywhere

·Do you want your light and music turned on automatically every morning to wake you up and your coffee machine cooked a cup of coffee for you automatically?

·Do you want to turn on your home security camera to check your home or just switch on your home washing machine while you are working in the office?

·Do you want to turn on your water heater or your air conditioner one hour before you arrived home so that you can enjoy shower or get warm/cool immediately?

·Do you want to control your home with your phone anytime anywhere you want?

 The smart inplugmakes this happen:

  • Turn your electronic devices ON or OFF from anywhere in the World!
  • Control Lights, Fans, Heaters, Hair Straighteners, Stereos, you name it,
  • Just plug it in, you can control it from your smart smart phone, tablet or desktop.
  • Inplug Smart Socket by VIXOM uses your home Wi-Fi network, and also perates over mobile internet (3G/4G), So you can control appliances while you’re away. You don't need anything else,
  • INPLUG is ready to go straight out of the box, the patented 'One Click' set up gets you going in 30secs.

 Now, with Inplug, you can prepare your morning coffee in bed!

Inplug features

  •  FREE Worldwide Delivery
  • 12 Months Warranty
  • Free INPLUG App (Android & iOS)
  • Works with your existing home Wi-Fi Router 
  • Login from up to 10 different devices at the same time
  • API for Developers
  • Master Switch ON/OFF - Turn everything on with one click
  • Group your plugs (Office, Living Room, House etc)
  • New Timer Settings (unlimited amount)
  • Instant Set Up (one click and it's done)                                                      

We are now ready to take Inplug into full production!

With your help and support, we can bring vixom Inplug to your homes all around the world and make your life easier.

Your contribution will help us :

·Optimize our final design 

·Order production tooling, moulds and electronics 

·Obtain the necessary all the global certifications 

·Launch full production


Where We Are?

We have finished both software app and hardwaredesign, we have the fully functioning protype now.

After 2 trial productions and numerous testing,we are now confident about the product and ready to bring Inplug to the next stage.


Who We Are?


 

Risks and challenges

Prior this campaign, we had the fully functioning prototype and trial production, manufacturers has been secured, and production schedule has been set.

-That being said, as is the case with startups (and even more frequently the case with hardware startups), errors will occur that we did not and could not have anticipated. The unknowns exist.

-We want you to know that we've taken done lots of testing prior to launch to ensure a quality product.

-As for the delivery, to cut down shipping cost for you, we will arrange standard shipping to worldwide; this may take 2-4 weeks, sometimes even longer.

-We appreciate your understanding and even more, your support, as you help us to make this idea a reality!


FAQ

Q1  What is the button on the socket for?

A: The buttons on the Inplug has two functions, short press the switch can make the Inplug"on" or "off"; keep press for 3-4 seconds, it will restore factory Settings.

Q2  Why I can’t connect the Inplug after I powered it on?

A: After Inplug powered on or restored to the factory Settings, you need to wait for about 20 seconds for him to get set. When the blue light stops flash, it is ready.

Q3  Why it failed to connect the Inplug?

A: 1, check whether the WiFi networking is working properly;

  2, check if you input the right WiFi password;

If the configuration is not successful, please push the Inplug long about 4 seconds and do it again;

Q4  What is direct mode?

A: Direct mode means the Inplug establishing a direct connection with mobile phone at close distance. In direct mode, Inplug will have no access to WiFi network, so it cannot be remote controlled.

Q5  Whether the App can only control the Inplug in a very short distance?

A:  As long as there is WIFI internet connection to Inplug, mobile phones can control Inplug anywhere.

Q6  Is the App client can control multiple Inplug?

A: You it does. The client can connect and control multiple Inplug, and there is no limit. You can name every Inplug to such as ‘light’ ‘water heater’ etc…

Q7  When I have a lot of Inplug, how to identify them?

A: In the "equipment" interface, you can modify the icon of each Inplug. You can rename them to such as ‘light’ ‘water heater’ etc…be more safe.

Q8  Will other people's cell phones control my Inplug?

A:  It won't! As long as other people don't know your WiFi password, it will not be able to search to your Inplug. You can also set access password on the app to any Inplug to enhance security.

Q9  What is WiFi repeater on Inplug?

A: InplugWiFi repeater function is for expand the WiFi signal coverage, strengthen the WiFi signal, make every corner is full of WiFi at home. In direct mode, you can't use this function.

Q10  How to set charging protection function?

A: When you use Inplug for charging the mobile phone, once the phone was fully charged, the power supply will be cut automatically. This can be energy saving and enhance the life of mobile phone battery, and be more safe.
